XXbsu022_u:173: maṇiratnaṃ vimalabuddhe pravarṣa jambudhvaje varṣam // Lal_2.19 //
XXbsu022_u:175: codenti karuṇāmanasaṃ ayaṃ sa kālo mā upekṣasva // Lal_2.20 //
XXbsu022_u:181: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattva evaṃ dharmakālasaṃcoditaḥ saṃstato mahāvimānānniṣkramya dharmoccayo nāma mahāprāsādo yatra niṣadya bodhisattvastuṣitebhyo devebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati sma, taṃ bodhisattvo 'bhirohati sma, abhiruhya ca sudharme siṃhāsane niṣīdati sma /
XXbsu022_u:182: atha ye devaputrā bodhisattvasya sabhāgāḥ samayānasaṃprasthitāste 'pi tameva prāsādamabhirohanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:183: ye ca daśadiksaṃnipatitā bodhisattvāḥ sabhāgacaritā bodhisattvasya devaputrāśca, te 'pi taṃ prāsādamabhiruhya yathāpratyarheṣu siṃhāsaneṣu svakasvakeṣu niṣīdanti, sma apagatāpsarogaṇā apagataprākṛtadevaputrāḥ samānādhyāśayaparivārā aṣṭaṣaṣṭikoṭisahasraparivārāḥ //
XXbsu022_u:184: iti hi bhikṣavo dvādaśabhirvarṣairbodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣimavakramiṣyatīti
XXbsu022_u:185: atha śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrā jambudvīpamāgatya divyaṃ varṇamantardhāpya brāhmaṇaveṣeṇa brāhmaṇān vedānadhyāpayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:187: garbhāvakrāntirbhavati, sa dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
XXbsu022_u:188: yaiḥ samanvāgatasya dve gatī bhavato na tṛtīyā /
XXbsu022_u:189: sacedagāramadhyāvasati, rājā bhavatī cakravartī caturaṅgo vijitavān dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ /
XXbsu022_u:191: tadyathā - cakraratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ strīratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam //
XXbsu022_u:192: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī cakraratnena samanvāgato bhavati? iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tadeva poṣadheyaṃ ca pañcadaśyāṃ
XXbsu022_u:193: śiraḥsnātasyopavāsoṣitasyopariprāsādatalagatasya stryāgāraparivṛtasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi divyaṃ cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati /
XXbsu022_u:194: sahasrāraṃ sanemikaṃ sanābhikaṃ suvarṇavarṇakarmālaṃkṛtaṃ saptatālamuccaiḥ samantād dṛṣṭvāntaḥpuraṃ rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya taddivyaṃ cakraratnameva bhavati /
XXbsu022_u:195: śrutaṃ khalu mayā yasya kila rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tadeva poṣadheyaṃ pañcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnātasyopavāsoṣitasyopariprāsādatalagatasya stryāgāraparivṛtasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi divyaṃ cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati, sa bhavati rājā
XXbsu022_u:197: nūnamahaṃ rājā cakravartī yannvahaṃ divyaṃ cakraratnaṃ mīmāṃsayeyam /
XXbsu022_u:198: atha rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikta ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā taddivyaṃ cakraratnaṃ prārthayedevaṃ cāvedayet - pravartayasva bhaṭṭa divyaṃ
XXbsu022_u:200: atha taddivyaṃ cakraratnaṃ rājñā kṣatriyeṇa mūrdhābhiṣiktena pravartitaṃ samyageva ṛddhau vihāyasā pūrveṇa vrajati /
XXbsu022_u:201: anveti rājā cakravartī sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena /
XXbsu022_u:202: yatra ca pṛthivīpradeśe taddivyaṃ cakraratnaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate, tatra rājā kṣatriyo
XXbsu022_u:203: mūrdhābhiṣikto vāsaṃ kalpayati sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena /
XXbsu022_u:204: atha ye te bhavanti pūrvasyāṃ diśi rājāno maṇḍalinaḥ, te rūpyapātrīṃ vā (Vaidya 12)
XXbsu022_u:205: suvarṇacūrṇaparipūrṇāmādāya svarṇapātrīṃ vā rūpyacūrṇaparipūrṇāmādāya rājānaṃ cakravartinaṃ pratyuttiṣṭhanti - ehi deva svāgataṃ devāya, idaṃ devasya rājyamṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca /
XXbsu022_u:207: evamukte rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktastrātā tān rājño maṇḍalina etadavocat - kārayantu bhavantaḥ svakāni rājyāni dharmeṇa /
XXbsu022_u:208: hanta bhavanto mā prāṇinaṃ ghātayiṣyatha, mādattādāsyatha, mā kāmeṣu mithyā cariṣyatha, mā mṛṣā vakṣyatha, yāvanmā bhe vijite adharmamutpadyate, mādharmacāriṇo rocetha /
XXbsu022_u:209: evaṃ khalu rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ vijayati /
XXbsu022_u:210: pūrvāṃ diśaṃ vijitaḥ pūrvaṃ samudramavagāhya pūrvaṃ samudramavatarati /
XXbsu022_u:211: pūrvaṃ samudramavatīrya samyageva ṛddhyā vihāyasā dakṣiṇena vrajati /
XXbsu022_u:212: anveti rājā cakravartī sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena /
XXbsu022_u:217: pratyuttīrya samyageva ṛddhyā vihāyasā rājadhānīmāgatyopari antaḥpuradvāre 'kṣatamevāsthāt
XXbsu022_u:218: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaścakraratnena samanvāgato bhavati //
XXbsu022_u:219: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī hastiratnena samanvāgato bhavati? iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pūrvavaddhastiratnamutpadyate /
XXbsu022_u:220: sarvaśvetaṃ saptāṅgasupratiṣṭhitaṃ svarṇacūḍakaṃ svarṇadhvajaṃ svarṇālaṃkāraṃ hemajālapraticchannaṃ ṛddhimantaṃ vihāyasā gāminaṃ vikurvaṇādharmiṇaṃ yaduta bodhirnāma nāgarājā /
XXbsu022_u:221: yadā ca rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktastaddhastiratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmo bhavati, atha sūryasyābhyudgamanavelāyāṃ taddhastiratnamabhiruhya imāmeva mahāpṛthivīṃ samudraparikhāṃ samudraparyantāṃ samantato 'nvāhiṇḍya rājadhānīmāgatya praśāsanaratiḥ pratyanubhavati /
XXbsu022_u:222: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī hastiratnena samanvāgato bhavati //
XXbsu022_u:223: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī aśvaratnena samanvāgato bhavati? atha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pūrvavadaśvaratnamutpadyate /
XXbsu022_u:224: sarvanīlaṃ kṛṣṇaśirasaṃ muñjakeśamādṛtavadanaṃ svarṇadhvajaṃ svarṇālaṃkāraṃ hemajālapraticchannaṃ ṛddhimantaṃ vihāyasā gāminaṃ vikurvaṇādharmiṇaṃ yaduta bālāhako nāmāśvarājam /
XXbsu022_u:225: yadā ca rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto 'śvaratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmo bhavati, atha sūryasyābhyudgamanavelāyāmaśvaratnamabhiruhya imāmeva mahāpṛthvīṃ samudraparikhāṃ samudraparyantāṃ samantanto 'nvāhiṇḍya rājadhānīmāgatya praśāsanaratiḥ pratyanubhavati /
XXbsu022_u:226: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartīṃ aśvaratnena samanvāgato bhavati //
XXbsu022_u:227: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartīṃ maṇiratnena samanvāgato bhavati? iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya
XXbsu022_u:229: tasya khalu punarmaṇiratnasyābhayā sarvamantaḥpuramavabhāsyena sphuṭaṃ bhavati /
XXbsu022_u:230: yadā ca rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktastaṃ (Vaidya 13) maṇiratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmo bhavati, atha rātryāmardharātrasamaye 'ndhakāratamisrāyāṃ taṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre ucchrāpayitvā udyānabhūmiṃ niryāti subhūmidarśanāya /
XXbsu022_u:231: tasya khalu punarmaṇiratnasyābhayāsarvāvantaṃ caturaṅgabalakāyamavabhāsena sphuṭībhavati sāmantena yojanam /
XXbsu022_u:232: ye khalu punastasya maṇiratnasya sāmantake manuṣyāḥ prativasanti, te tenāvabhāsenāsphuṭa samānā
XXbsu022_u:233: saṃjānanti, anyonyaṃ paśyanti, anyonyamāhuḥ - uttiṣṭha bhadramukhāḥ karmāntāni kārayataḥ āpaṇāni prasārayata, divā manyāmahe sūryamabhyudgatam
XXbsu022_u:234: / evaṃrūpeṇa rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto maṇiratnena samanvāgato bhavati
XXbsu022_u:235: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī strīratnena samanvāgato bhavati? iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pūrvavatstrīratnamutpadyate /
XXbsu022_u:236: sadṛśī kṣatriyā nātidīrghā nātihrasvā nātisthūlā nātikṛśā nātigaurī nātikṛṣṇā abhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā /
XXbsu022_u:239: śītalakāle cāsyā uṣṇasaṃsparśāni gātrāṇi bhavanti, uṣṇakāle ca śītasaṃsparśāni /
XXbsu022_u:240: sā rājānaṃ cakravartinaṃ muktvā nānyasmin manasāpi rāgaṃ karoti kiṃ punaḥ kāyena /
XXbsu022_u:241: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī strīratnena samanvāgato bhavati //
XXbsu022_u:242: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī gṛhapatiratnena samanvāgato bhavati? iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pūrvavad gṛhapatiratnamutpadyate
XXbsu022_u:244: sa tena divyacakṣuṣā sāmantena yojanaṃ sasvāmikāni nidhānāni paśyati, asvāmikāni nidhānāni paśyati /
XXbsu022_u:245: sa yāni tāni bhavanti asvāmikāni, tai rājñaścakravartino dhanena karaṇīyaṃ karoti /
XXbsu022_u:246: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī gṛhapatiratnena samanvāgato bhavati //
XXbsu022_u:247: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī pariṇāyakaratnena samanvāgato bhavati? iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhāṣibhiktasya pūrvavatpariṇāyakaratnamutpadyate paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī /
XXbsu022_u:249: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī pariṇāyakaratnena samanvāgato bhavati /
XXbsu022_u:251: bhavati cāsya putrasahasraṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām
XXbsu022_u:256: tathā anye 'pi devaputrā jambudvīpamāgatya pratyekabuddhebhya ārocayanti sma - riñcata mārṣā buddhakṣetram /
XXbsu022_u:258: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena rājagṛhe mahānagare golāṅgulaparivartane parvate mātaṅgo nāma pratyekabuddho viharati sma /
XXbsu022_u:259: sa taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā kardama iva śilāyāṃ prasthāya vihāyasā saptatālamātramatyudgamya ca tejodhātuṃ samāpadyolkeva parinirvāṇo 'yam /
XXbsu022_u:260: yattasya pittaśleṣmasnāyvasthimāṃsarudhiraṃ (Vaidya 14) cāsīt, tatsarvaṃ tejasā paryavadānamagacchat
XXbsu022_u:263: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena vārāṇasyāṃ ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve pañca pratyekabuddhaśatāni viharanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:264: te 'pi taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā vihāyasā saptatālamātramatyudgamya tejodhātuṃ samāpadyolkeva parinirvānti sma /
XXbsu022_u:265: yatteṣāṃ pittaśleṣmamāṃsāsthisnāyurudhiraṃ cābhūt, tatsarvaṃ tejasā paryavadānamagacchat
XXbsu022_u:268: abhayadattāśca tasmin mṛgāḥ prativasanti iti tadagreṇa mṛgadāvasya mṛgadāva iti saṃjñodapādi
XXbsu022_u:269: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvastuṣitavarabhavanasthitaścatvāri mahāvilokitāni vilokayati sma
XXbsu022_u:270: katamāni catvāri? tadyathā - kālavilokitaṃ dvīpavilokitaṃ deśavilokitaṃ kulavilokitam //
XXbsu022_u:271: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ kālavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma? na bodhisattva ādipravṛtte loke sattvasaṃvartanīkālasamaye mātuḥ
XXbsu022_u:272: kukṣimavakrāmati, atha tarhi yadā vyakto lokaḥ susthito bhavati, jāti
XXbsu022_u:273: prajñāyate, jarā prajñāyate, vyādhi prajñāyate, maraṇaṃ prajñāyate, tadā bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāmati //
XXbsu022_u:274: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo dvīpavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma? na bodhisattvā pratyantadvīpā upapadyante, na purvavidehe, nāparagodānīye, na cottarakurau /
XXbsu022_u:276: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvo deśavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma? na bodhisattvāḥ pratyantajanapadeṣūpapadyante, yeṣu manuṣyā andhajātyā jaḍā eḍamūkajātīyā abhavyāḥ subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāmarthaṃ jñātum /
XXbsu022_u:278: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ kulavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma? na bodhisattvā hīnakuleṣūpapadyante caṇḍālakuleṣu vā veṇukārakule vā rathakārakule vā puṣkasakule vā /
XXbsu022_u:279: atha tarhi kuladvaye evopapadyante brāhmaṇakule kṣatriyakule ca /
XXbsu022_u:282: yadā kṣatriyaguruko loko bhavati, tadā kṣatriyakule upapadyante /
XXbsu022_u:285: tamarthaṃ ca saṃpratītya bodhisattvastuṣitavarabhavanasthaścatvāri mahāvilokitāni vilokayati sma //
XXbsu022_u:287: iti hi bhikṣavaste devaputrāḥ bodhisattvasyānyonyaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - katamasmin kularatne kiyadrūpāyāṃ jananyāṃ bodhisattvaḥ pratiṣṭhateti /
XXbsu022_u:288: tatra kecidāhuḥ - idaṃ vaidehīkulaṃ magadheṣu janapadeṣu ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca /
XXbsu022_u:291: tatkasmāt? tathā hi - tanna (Vaidya 15) mātṛśuddhaṃ pitṛśuddhaṃ aplutaṃ cañcalamanavasthitaṃ parittapuṇyābhiṣyanditaṃ na
XXbsu022_u:294: apare tvāhuḥ - idaṃ punaḥ kauśalakulaṃ mahāvāhanaṃ ca mahāparivāraṃ ca mahādhanaṃ ca /
XXbsu022_u:299: hīnādhimuktikaṃ na ca kuloditaṃ na cāparimitadhanaratnanidhisamutthitam /
XXbsu022_u:301: apare tvāhuḥ - idaṃ vaṃśarājakulaṃ ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca /
XXbsu022_u:304: kiṃ kāraṇam? tathāhi - vaṃśarājakulaṃ prākṛtaṃ ca caṇḍaṃ ca na cojjvalitatejasaṃ parapuruṣajanmāvṛtaṃ ca na mātṛpitṛsvatejaḥ karmābhinirvṛttaṃ ca /
XXbsu022_u:307: apare 'pyāhuḥ - iyaṃ vaiśālī mahānagarī ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca
XXbsu022_u:308: subhikṣā ca ramaṇīyā cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca vitardiniryūhatoraṇagavākṣaharmyakūṭāgāraprāsādatalasamalaṃkṛtā ca puṣpavāṭikāvanarājisaṃkusumitā ca amarabhavanapuraprākāśyā /
XXbsu022_u:312: kiṃ kāraṇam? tathā hi - teṣāṃ nāsti parasparanyāyavāditā,
XXbsu022_u:318: apare tvevamāhuḥ - idaṃ pradyotakulaṃ mahābalaṃ ca mahāvāhanaṃ ca
XXbsu022_u:323: kāraṇam? tathā hi - te caṇḍāśca capalāśca raudrāśca paruṣāśca sāhasikāśca,
XXbsu022_u:326: apara evamāhuḥ - iyaṃ mathurā nagarī ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca /
XXbsu022_u:330: kiṃ kāraṇam? tathāhi - sa rājā mithyādṛṣṭikulavaṃśaprasūto dasyurājā /
XXbsu022_u:331: na yujyate caramabhavikasya bodhisattvasya mithyādṛṣṭikule upapattum /
XXbsu022_u:333: apare 'pyāhuḥ - ayaṃ hastināpure mahānagare rājā pāṇḍavakulavaṃśaprasūtaḥ śūro vīryavān varāṅgarūpasaṃpannaḥ parasainyapramardakānāṃ tatkulaṃ pratirūpamasya bodhisattvasya garbhapratisaṃsthānāyeti apare 'pyāhuḥ -
XXbsu022_u:335: kiṃ kāraṇam? tathā hi - pāṇḍavakulaprasūtaiḥ kulavaṃśo 'tivyākulīkṛto (Vaidya 16) yudhiṣṭhiro dharmasya putra iti kathayati,
XXbsu022_u:338: apara āhuḥ - iyaṃ mithilā nagarī atīva ramaṇīyā maithilasya rājñaḥ sumitrasya nivāsabhūmiḥ
XXbsu022_u:343: astyasau rājā sumitra evaṃguṇayuktaḥ, kiṃ tvativṛddho na samarthaḥ prajāmutpādayitumatibahuputraśca
XXbsu022_u:345: evaṃ bhikṣavaste bodhisattvā devaputrāśca sarvasmin jambudvīpe ṣoḍaśajānapadeṣu yāni kāniciduccoccāni rājakulāni, tāni sarvāṇi vyavalokayantaḥ(tāni) sarvāṇi sadoṣāṇyadrākṣuḥ /
XXbsu022_u:348: sa tāṃ mahatīṃ bodhisattvadevaparṣadametadavocat - etanmārṣā etameva bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya pariprakṣyāmaḥ - kīdṛgguṇasaṃpanne kule caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ pratyājāyata iti /
XXbsu022_u:349: sādhviti te sarve kṛtāñjalipuṭā bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya paryaprākṣuḥ - kīdṛgguṇasaṃpanne satpuruṣakularatne caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ pratyājāyata iti //
XXbsu022_u:350: tato bodhisattvastaṃ mahāntaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ devagaṇaṃ ca vyavalokya etadavocat - catuṣṣaṣṭyākārairmārṣāḥ saṃpannakulaṃ bhavati yatra caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ pratyājāyate /
XXbsu022_u:368: amātyāvekṣitaṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati bhogān paribhunakti /
XXbsu022_u:369: avandhyaśilpaniveśanaṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati bhogān paribhunakti /
XXbsu022_u:372: kṛtajñaṃ ca kṛtaveditaṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati /
XXbsu022_u:415: anavadyaṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati sarvajātivādadoṣaiḥ sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyām /
XXbsu022_u:416: ebhirmārṣāścatuṣṣaṣṭyākāraiḥ samanvāgataṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati yasmiṃścaramaḥ bhaviko bodhisattva utpadyate //
XXbsu022_u:417: dvātriṃśatā mārṣā guṇākāraiḥ samanvāgatā sā strī bhavati yasyāḥ striyāścaramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ kukṣāvavakrāmati /

XXbsu022_u:867: yā api tā lokāntarikā aghā aghasphuṭā andhakārāstamisrā yatremau candrasūryāvevaṃ maharddhikāvevaṃ mahānubhāvāvevaṃ maheśākhyau ābhayā ābhāṃ varṇena varṇaṃ tejasā tejo nābhitapato nābhivirocataḥ, tatra ye sattvā upapannāste svakānapi bāhuprasāritānna paśyanti /
XXbsu022_u:868: tathāpi tasmin samaye mahata udārasyāvabhāsasya prādurbhāvo 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:869: ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāste tenaivāvabhāsena sphuṭāḥ samānā anyonyaṃ samyak paśyanti sma
XXbsu022_u:871: evaṃ cāhuḥ - anye 'pi kila bhoḥ sattvā
XXbsu022_u:883: pūrvasyāṃ diśyavanamati sma, paścimāyāṃ diśyunnamati sma /
XXbsu022_u:884: paścimāyāṃ diśyavanamati sma, pūrvasyāṃ diśyunnamati sma /
XXbsu022_u:885: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśyavanamati sma, uttarasyāṃ diśyunnamati sma /
XXbsu022_u:886: uttarasyāṃ diśyavanamati sma, dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśyunnamati sma /
XXbsu022_u:887: tasmin samaye harṣaṇīyāstoṣaṇīyāḥ premaṇīyāḥ prasādanīyā avalokanīyāḥ prahlādanīyā nirvarṇanīyā asecanīyā apratikūlā anuttrāsakarāḥ śabdāḥ śrūyante sma /
XXbsu022_u:888: na ca kasyacit sattvasya tasmin kṣaṇe viheṭhā vā trāso vā bhayaṃ vā stambhitatvaṃ vābhūt /
XXbsu022_u:889: na ca bhūyaḥ sūryācandramasorna brahmaśakralokapālānāṃ tasmin kṣaṇe prabhā prajñāyate sma
XXbsu022_u:890: sarvanarakatiryagyoniyamalokopapannāśca sattvāstasmin kṣaṇe vigataduḥkhā abhūvan sarvasukhasamarpitāḥ
XXbsu022_u:891: na ca kasyacit sattvasya rāgo bādhate sma,
XXbsu022_u:892: dveṣo vā moho vā, īrṣyā vā mātsaryaṃ vā, māno vā mrakṣo vā, mado vā krodho
XXbsu022_u:894: sarvasattvāstasmin kṣaṇe maitracittā hitacittāḥ parasparaṃ mātāpitṛsaṅgino 'bhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:895: aghaṭṭitāni ca divyamānuṣyakāṇi tūryakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi manojñaghoṣamutsṛjanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:896: devakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi pāṇibhiraṃsaiḥ śirobhistaṃ mahāvimānaṃ vahanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:897: tāni cāpsaraḥśatasahasrāṇi svāṃ svāṃ saṃgītiṃ saṃprayujya purataḥ pṛṣṭhato vāmadakṣiṇena ca sthitvā bodhisattvaṃ saṃgītirutasvareṇābhistuvanti sma -
XXbsu022_u:899: satyadharmanayaśodhitasya te pūja adya vipulā pravartate // Lal_5.62 //
XXbsu022_u:901: pūrvi tubhya bahukalpakoṭiyo dānu dattu priyaputradhītarā /
XXbsu022_u:902: tasya dānacaritasya tatphalaṃ yena divya kusumāḥ pravarṣitāḥ // Lal_5.63
XXbsu022_u:903: ātmamāṃsa tulayitva te vibho so 'bhidattu priyapakṣikāraṇāt /
XXbsu022_u:904: tasya dānacaritasya tatphalaṃ pretaloki labhi pānabhojanam // Lal_5.64 //
XXbsu022_u:906: tasya śīlacaritasya tatphalaṃ yena akṣaṇa apāya śodhitāḥ // Lal_5.65 //
XXbsu022_u:907: pūrvi tubhya bahukalpakoṭiyo kṣānti bhāvita nidānabodhaye /
XXbsu022_u:908: tasya kṣānticaritasya tatphalaṃ maitracitta bhuta devamānuṣāḥ // Lal_5.66
XXbsu022_u:910: tasya vīryacaritasya tatphalaṃ yena kāyu yatha meru śobhate // Lal_5.67 //
XXbsu022_u:911: pūrvi tubhya bahukalpakoṭiyo dhyāna dhyāyita kileśadhyeṣaṇāt /
XXbsu022_u:912: tasya dhyānacaritasya tatphalaṃ yena kleśa jagato na bādhate // Lal_5.68
XXbsu022_u:913: pūrvi tubhya bahukalpakoṭiyo prajña bhāvita kileśachedanī /
XXbsu022_u:914: tasya prajñacaritasya tatphalaṃ yena ābha paramā virocate // Lal_5.69 //
XXbsu022_u:916: modiprāpta paramā upekṣakā brahmabhūta sugatā namo 'stu te // Lal_5.70 //
XXbsu022_u:919: cakṣubhūta trisahasrināyakā mārgadeśika mune namo 'stu te // Lal_5.71 //
XXbsu022_u:921: tīrṇa tārayasi anyaprāṇino dāśabhūta sugatā namo 'stu te // Lal_5.72 //
XXbsu022_u:923: lokadharmabhavanābhivartase no ca loki kvaci opalipyase // Lal_5.73 //
XXbsu022_u:924: lābha teṣa paramā acintiyā yeṣu darśana śravaṃ ca eṣyase /
XXbsu022_u:925: kiṃ punaḥ śṛṇuya yo tidharmatāṃ śraddha prīti vipulā janeṣyase // Lal_5.74
XXbsu022_u:926: jihma sarva tuṣitālayo bhuto jambudvīpi puri yo udāgataḥ /
XXbsu022_u:927: prāṇikoṭinayutā acintiyāṃ bodhayiṣyasi prasupta kleśato // Lal_5.75 //
XXbsu022_u:928: ṛddha sphīta puramadya bheṣyatī devakoṭinayutaiḥ samākulam /
XXbsu022_u:929: apsarobhi turiyairnināditaṃ rājagehi madhuraṃ śruṇiṣyati // Lal_5.76 //
XXbsu022_u:931: yasya putra ayameva samṛddhaḥ tisraloki abhibhāti śīriye // Lal_5.77 //
XXbsu022_u:933: no bhuyo puravarasmi dehināṃ lobhadoṣakalahā vivādakā /
XXbsu022_u:934: sarva maitramanasaḥ sagauravā bhāvino naravarasya tejasā // Lal_5.78 //
XXbsu022_u:936: bheṣyate kapilasāhvayaṃ puraṃ ratnakoṣabharitaṃ susamṛddham // Lal_5.79 //
XXbsu022_u:938: ye sthitā naravarasya rakṣakāḥ teṣu mokṣa nacireṇa bheṣyate // Lal_5.80 //
XXbsu022_u:940: sarva bodhi pariṇāmayāmahe kṣipra bhoma yatha tvaṃ narottama // Lal_5.81
XXbsu022_u:946: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ śiśirakālavinirgate vaiśākhamāse viśākhānakṣatrānugate ṛtupravare vasantakālasamaye taruvarapatrākīrṇe varapravarapuṣpasaṃkusumite śītoṣṇatamorajovigate mṛduśādvale susaṃsthite tribhuvanajyeṣṭho lokamahito vyavalokya ṛtukālasamaye pañcadaśyāṃ pūrṇamāsyāṃ poṣadhagṛhītāyā mātuḥ puṣyanakṣatrayogena bodhisattvastuṣitavarabhavanāccyutvā smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan pāṇḍuro gajapoto bhūtvā ṣaḍdanta indragopakaśirāḥ suvarṇarājīdantaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgo 'hīnendriyo jananyā dakṣiṇāyāṃ kukṣāvavakrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:951: na ca mama sukha jātu evarūpaṃ dṛṣṭamapi śrutaṃ nāpi cānubhūtam /
XXbsu022_u:953: atha khalu māyādevī ābharaṇavigalitavasanā prahlāditakāyacittā prītiprāmodyaprasādapratilabdhā śayanavaratalādutthāya nārīgaṇaparivṛtā puraskṛtā prāsādavaraśikharādavatīrya yenāśokavanikā tenopajagāma /
XXbsu022_u:954: sā aśokavanikāyāṃ sukhopaviṣṭā rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya dūtaṃ preṣayati sma -
XXbsu022_u:956: atha sa rājā śuddhodanastadvacanaṃ śrutvā praharṣitamanā ākampitaśarīro bhadrāsanādutthāya amātyanaigamapārṣadyabandhujanaparivṛto yenāśokavanikā
XXbsu022_u:957: tenopasaṃkrāmat, upasaṃkrāntaśca na śaknoti sma aśokavanikāṃ praveṣṭum /
XXbsu022_u:959: aśokavanikādvāre sthito muhūrtaṃ saṃcintya tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
XXbsu022_u:960: na smari raṇaśauṇḍi mūrdhasaṃsthasya mahyam eva guru śarīraṃ manyamī yādṛśo 'dya /
XXbsu022_u:961: svakulagṛhamadya na prabhomi praveṣṭuṃ kimiha mama bhave 'ṅgo kānva pṛccheya cāham // Lal_6.3
XXbsu022_u:964: atha khalu śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrā gaganatalagatā ardhakāyamabhinirmāya rājānaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣanta
XXbsu022_u:966: tuṣitapuri cyavitvā bodhisattvo mahātmā nṛpati tava sutatvaṃ māyakukṣaupapannaḥ // Lal_6.4
XXbsu022_u:967: daśanakha tada kṛtvā svaṃ śiraṃ kampayanto nṛpatiranupraviṣṭaścitrikārānuyuktaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:968: māya tada nirīkṣya mānadarpopanītāṃ vadahi kurumi kiṃ te kiṃ prayogo bhaṇāhi // Lal_6.5 //
XXbsu022_u:971: gajavaru dṛḍhasaṃdhirvajrakalpaḥ surūpaḥ udari mama praviṣṭastasya hetuṃ śruṇuṣva // Lal_6.6
XXbsu022_u:972: vitimira trisahasrāṃ paśyamī bhrājamānāṃ devanayuta devā ye stuvantī sayānā /
XXbsu022_u:973: na ca mama khiladoṣo naiva roṣo na moho dhyānasukhasamaṅgī jānamī śāntacittā // Lal_6.7 //
XXbsu022_u:974: sādhu nṛpati śīghraṃ brāhmaṇānānayāsmin vedasupinapāṭhā ye gṛheṣū vidhijñāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:975: supinu mama hi yemaṃ vyākarī tattvayuktaṃ kimida mama bhaveyā śreyu pāpaṃ kulasya // Lal_6.8
XXbsu022_u:977: māya purata sthitvā brāhmaṇānāmavocat supina mayi ha dṛṣṭastasya hetuṃ śṛṇotha // Lal_6.9
XXbsu022_u:979: brāhmaṇā āhuḥ - brūhi devi tvayā kīdṛśaṃ svapnaṃ dṛṣṭam /
XXbsu022_u:983: gajavaru dṛḍhasaṃdhirvajrakalpaḥ surūpaḥ udari mama praviṣṭastasya hetuṃ śṛṇotha // Lal_6.10
XXbsu022_u:984: vacanamimu śruṇitvā brāhmaṇā evamāhuḥ prīti vipula cintyā nāsti pāpaṃ kulasya /
XXbsu022_u:985: putra tava janesī lakṣaṇairbhūṣitāṅgaṃ rājakulakulīnaṃ cakravarti mahātmaṃ
XXbsu022_u:986: sa ca pura vijahitvā kāmarājyaṃ ca gehaṃ pravrajita nirapekṣaḥ sarvalokānukampī /
XXbsu022_u:987: buddho bhavati eṣo dakṣiṇīyastriloke amṛtarasavareṇā tarpayet sarvalokam
XXbsu022_u:990: iti hi bhikṣavo rājā śuddhodano brāhmaṇebhyo lakṣaṇanaimittikavaipañcakebhyaḥ svapnādhyāyīpāṭhakebhyaḥ pratiśrutya hṛṣṭastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastān brāhmaṇān prabhūtena khādanīyabhojanīyāsvādanīyena saṃtarpya saṃpravāryācchādanāni ca datvā visarjayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:991: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ kapilavastuni mahānagare caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu sarvanagaracatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu ca dānaṃ dāpayati sma
XXbsu022_u:994: evaṃ gandhamālyavilepanaśayyopāśrayaṃ prājīvikaṃ prājīvikārthibhyo yāvadeva bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe //
XXbsu022_u:995: atha khalu bhikṣavo rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyaitadabhavat - katamasmin gṛhe māyādevī sukhamanupakliṣṭā viharediti /
XXbsu022_u:996: atha tatkṣaṇameva catvāro mahārājāno rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaivamāhuḥ -
XXbsu022_u:997: alpotsuko deva bhava sukhaṃ tiṣṭha upekṣako /
XXbsu022_u:998: vayaṃ hi bodhisattvasya veśma vai māpayāmahe // Lal_6.14 //
XXbsu022_u:1000: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaivamāha -
XXbsu022_u:1003: atha khalu suyāmo devaputro rājānaṃ śuddhodanamusaṃkramyaivamāha -
XXbsu022_u:1006: atha khalu saṃtuṣito devaputro rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaivamāha -
XXbsu022_u:1008: tadeva bhavanaṃ ramyaṃ bodhisattvasya dāmyaham // Lal_6.17 //
XXbsu022_u:1009: atha khalu sunirmito devaputro rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaivamāha -
XXbsu022_u:1012: atha khalu paranirmitavaśavartī devaputro rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaivamāha -
XXbsu022_u:1018: upanāmayiṣye vipulaṃ yatra devī vasiṣyati // Lal_6.21 //
XXbsu022_u:1019: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ sarvaiḥ kāmāvacarraidaiveśvarairbodhisattvasya pūjārthaṃ kapilāhvaye mahāpuravare svakasvakāni gṛhāṇi māpitānyabhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:1020: rājñā capi śuddhodanena manuṣyātikrāntaṃ divyāsaṃprāptaṃ gṛhataraṃ pratisaṃskāritamabhūt /
XXbsu022_u:1021: tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāvyūhasya samādheranubhāvena sarveṣu teṣu gṛheṣu māyādevīmupadarśayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1022: abhyantaragataśca bodhisattvo māyādevyāḥ kukṣau dakṣiṇe pārśve paryaṅkamābhujya niṣaṇṇo 'bhūt
XXbsu022_u:1023: sarve ca te deveśvarā ekaikamevaṃ saṃjānīte sma - mamaiva gṛhe bodhisattvamātā prativasati nānyatreti //
XXbsu022_u:1026: mahāvyūhāya sthitaḥ samādhiye acintiyā nirmita nirmiṇitvā /
XXbsu022_u:1027: sarveṣa devānabhiprāya pūritā nṛpasya pūrṇaśca tadā manorathaḥ // Lal_6.22
XXbsu022_u:1028: atha khalu tasyāṃ devaparṣadi keṣāṃciddevaputrāṇāmetadabhavat - ye 'pi
XXbsu022_u:1030: kaḥ punarvādo ye tadanye udāratamā devāḥ trāyatriṃśā vā yāmā vā tuṣitā vā /
XXbsu022_u:1031: tatkathaṃ hi nāma sarvalokābhyudgato bodhisattvaḥ śucirnirāmagandhaḥ sattvaratnaḥ saṃtuṣitāddevanikāyāccyutvā durgandhe manuṣyāśraye daśamāsān mātuḥ kukṣau sthita iti //
XXbsu022_u:1032: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando buddhānubhāvena bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvajjugupsanīyaśca mātṛgrāmastathāgatenokto yāvadrāgacaritaśca /
XXbsu022_u:1034: kathaṃ hi nāma sarvalokābhyudgato bhagavān pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūta eva tuṣitāddevanikāyāccyavitvā manuṣyāśraye (durgandhe) māturdakṣiṇe (pārśve) kukṣāvupapanna iti /
XXbsu022_u:1035: nāhaṃ bhagavan idamutsahe evaṃ vaktaṃ yathaiva pūrve bhagavatā vyākṛtamiti /
XXbsu022_u:1037: - icchasi tvamānanda ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ draṣṭuṃ yo mātuḥ kukṣigatasya bodhisattvasya paribhogo 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:1038: ānanda āha - ayamasya bhagavan kālaḥ, ayaṃ sugata samayaḥ, yattathāgatastaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogamupadarśayed yaṃ dṛṣṭvā prītiṃ vetsyāmaḥ //
XXbsu022_u:1039: atha khalu bhagavāṃstathārūpanimittamakarot, yad brahmā sahāpatiḥ
XXbsu022_u:1041: sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikānte 'sthāt prāñjalībhūto bhagavantaṃ namasyan /
XXbsu022_u:1042: tatra khalu bhagavān jānanneva brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatimāmantrayate sma - gṛhītastvayā brahman sa bodhisattvaparibhogo daśamāsiko yo mama pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtasya mātuḥ kukṣigatasyābhūt brahmā āha -
XXbsu022_u:1047: bhagavānāha - tena hi tvaṃ brahman upadarśaya taṃ daśamāsikaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogam,
XXbsu022_u:1049: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatistān brāhmaṇānetadavocat - tiṣṭhatu tāvadbhavanto yāvadvayaṃ ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogamānayiṣyāmaḥ //
XXbsu022_u:1050: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatirbhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivanditvā bhagavataḥ purato 'ntarhitastatkṣaṇameva brahmaloke pratyasthāt //
XXbsu022_u:1051: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiḥ subrahmāṇaṃ devaputrametadavocat - gaccha tvaṃ mārṣā ito brahmalokamupādāya yāvattrāyatriṃśadbhavanam - śabdamudīraya,
XXbsu022_u:1056: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiścaturaśītyā devakoṭyā nayutaśatasahasraḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ parigṛhya mahati brāhme vimāne triyojanaśatike pratiṣṭhāpyānekairdaivakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ samantato 'nuparivārya jambūdvīpamavatārayati sma //
XXbsu022_u:1057: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ mahāsaṃnipāto 'bhūt
XXbsu022_u:1059: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo divyairvastrairdivyairmālyairdivyairgandhairdivyaiḥ puṣpairdivyairvādyairdivyaiśca paribhaugairabhisaṃskṛto 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:1060: tāvanmaheśākhyaiśca devaiḥ parivṛto 'bhūd yacchakro devānāmindraḥ sumerau(samudre) sthitvā dūrata eva mukhe tālacchatrakaṃ dattvā
XXbsu022_u:1067: atha khalu bhagavāṃstaṃ divyaṃ vādyanirghoṣamantardhāpayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1068: tatkasmāt? yatsahaśravaṇādeva jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā unmādamāpatsyanta iti //
XXbsu022_u:1069: atha khalu catvāro mahārājānaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramupasaṃkramyaivamāhuḥ -
XXbsu022_u:1070: kathaṃ devānāmindra kariṣyāmo na labhāmahe ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ draṣṭum /
XXbsu022_u:1073: api tu khalu punarmārṣā bhagavatsamīpamupanītaṃ drakṣyāmaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1074: te tadā āhuḥ - tena hi devānāmindra tathā kuru yathāsya
XXbsu022_u:1079: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiḥ sārdhaṃ taiścaturaśītyā devakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraistaṃ ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1080: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo 'bhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaścaturasraścatuṣṭhūṇaḥ
XXbsu022_u:1082: evaṃpramāṇaḥ tadyathāpi nāma ṣaṇmāsajāto dāraka uccaistvena /
XXbsu022_u:1083: tasya khalu punaḥ kūtāgārasya madhye paryaṅkaḥ prajñaptaḥ tadyathāpi nāma ṣaṇmāsajātasya dārakasya bhittīphalakaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1084: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhoga evaṃ varṇasaṃsthāno yasya na kaścit sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sadṛśo 'sti ākṛtyā vā varṇena vā
XXbsu022_u:1085: / devāḥ khalvapi taṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptā abhuvan /
XXbsu022_u:1087: sa ca tathāgatasyāntika upanīto 'tīva bhāsate tapati virocate sma /
XXbsu022_u:1088: tadyathāpi nāma dvinirdhāntaṃ suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa
XXbsu022_u:1089: supariniṣṭhitamapagatakācadoṣam, evaṃ (tasmin samaye) sa kūṭāgāro virājate
XXbsu022_u:1091: tasmin khalu punarbodhisattvaparibhoge paryaṅkaḥ prajñapto yasya sadevake loke nāsti kaścit sadṛśo varṇena vā saṃsthānena vā anyatra kambugrīvāyā (Vaidya 49) bodhisattvasya /
XXbsu022_u:1093: prāvṛtamabhūt, tattasya bodhisattvaparyaṅkasyāgrato na bhāsate sma tadyathāpi nāma vātavṛṣṭyābhihataḥ kṛṣṇakambalaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1094: sa khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāra uragasāracandanamayo yasyaikasuvarṇadharaṇī sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ mūlyaṃ
XXbsu022_u:1096: tādṛśa eva dvitīyaḥ kūṭāgāraḥ kṛto yastasmin prathame kūṭāgāre 'bhyantarataḥ asakto 'baddhasthitaḥ
XXbsu022_u:1097: tādṛśa eva tṛtīyo 'pi kūṭāgāro yastasmin dvitīye kūṭāgāre 'bhyantare 'sakto 'baddhasthitaḥ
XXbsu022_u:1098: sa ca paryaṅkastasmin gandhamaye tṛtīye kūṭāgāre vyavasthitaḥ saṃpraticchannaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1099: tasya khalu punaruragasāracandanasyaivaṃrūpo varṇaḥ tadyathāpi nāma abhijātasya nīlaivaḍūryasya
XXbsu022_u:1100: tasya khalu punargandhakūṭāgārasyopari samantādyāvanti kāniciddivyātikrāntāni puṣpāṇi santi, tāni sarvāṇi tasmin
XXbsu022_u:1102: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo dṛḍhasāro 'bhedyo vajropamaḥ sparśena ca kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśaḥ
XXbsu022_u:1103: tasmin khalu puna ratnavyūhe bodhisattvaparibhoge ye kecit kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ bhavanavyūhāste sarve tasmin saṃdṛśyante sma //
XXbsu022_u:1104: yāmeva ca rātriṃ bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāntastāmeva rātrimadha āpaskandhamupādāya aṣṭaṣaṣṭiyojanaśatasahasrāṇi mahāpṛthivīṃ bhittvā yāvad brahmalokaṃ padmabhyudgatamabhūt /
XXbsu022_u:1105: na ca kaścittaṃ padmaṃ paśyati sma anyatra sārathinarottamāddaśaśatasāhasrikācca mahābrahmaṇaḥ
XXbsu022_u:1106: yacceha trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātāvojo vā maṇḍo va raso vā, tatsarvaṃ tasmin mahāpadme madhubinduḥ saṃtiṣṭhate sma //
XXbsu022_u:1107: tamenaṃ mahābrahmā śubhe vaiḍūryabhājane prakṣipya bodhisattvasyopanāmayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1108: taṃ bodhisattvaḥ parigṛhya bhuṅkte sma mahābrahmaṇo 'nukampāmupādāya /
XXbsu022_u:1109: nāsti sa kaścit sattvaḥ sattvanikāye yasya sa ojobinduḥ paribhuktaḥ samyak sukhena pariṇāmedanyatra caramabhavikādbodhisattvāt sarvabodhisattvabhūmiparipūrṇāt /
XXbsu022_u:1110: kasya ca karmaṇo vipākena sa ojobindurbodhisattvasyopatiṣṭhate sma? dīrgharātraṃ khalvapi bodhisattvena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā glānebhyaḥ sattvebhyo bhaiṣajyaṃ dattamāśatparāṇāṃ sattvānāmāśāḥ paripūritāḥ,
XXbsu022_u:1111: śaraṇāgatāśca na parityaktāḥ, nityaṃ cāgrapuṣpamagraphalamagrarasaṃ tathāgatebhyastathāgatacaityebhyastathāgataśrāvakasaṃghebhyo mātāpitṛbhyaśca dattvā paścādātmanā paribhuktam /
XXbsu022_u:1112: tasya karmaṇo vipākena mahābrahmā bodhisattvasya taṃ madhubindumupanāmayati sma //
XXbsu022_u:1113: tasmin khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāre yāni kānicit santyatikrāntātikrāntāni
XXbsu022_u:1114: māyāguṇaratikrīḍāsamavasṛtasthānāni, tāni sarvāṇi tasmin prādurbhāvāni saṃdṛśyante sma bodhisattvasya pūrvakarmavipākena //
XXbsu022_u:1115: tasmin khalu puna ratnavyūhe bodhisattvaparibhoge śatasahasravyūhaṃ nāma vāsoyugaṃ prādurbhūtam
XXbsu022_u:1116: na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate yasya tatprādurbhavedanyatra caramabhavikād bodhisattvāt
XXbsu022_u:1118: kecana udārodārā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśā ye tasmin kūṭāgāre na saṃdṛśyante sma /
XXbsu022_u:1119: sacetkūṭāgāraparibhoga evaṃ suparibhoga evaṃ supariniṣpannaḥ sāntarabahirevaṃ supariniṣṭhita evaṃ mṛdukaśca /
XXbsu022_u:1120: tadyathāpi nāma kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśo nidarśanamātreṇa, na tu tasyopamā saṃvidyate
XXbsu022_u:1121: dharmatā khalveṣā bodhisattvasya pūrvakeṇa ca praṇidhānena iyaṃ cetanā ṛddhāvavaśyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manuṣyaloka upapattavyamabhiniṣkramya cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayitavyam /
XXbsu022_u:1122: yasyā mātuḥ kukṣāvupapattirbhavati, tasyā dakṣiṇe kukṣāvādita eva ratnavyūhakūṭāgāro 'bhinirvartate /
XXbsu022_u:1124: na hi caramabhavikasya bodhisattvasya kalalārbudaghanapeśībhāvaṃ kāyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate sma /
XXbsu022_u:1125: atha tarhi sarvāṅgapratyaṅgalakṣaṇasaṃpannaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇa eva prādurbhavati /
XXbsu022_u:1126: svapnāntaragatā ca bodhisattvamātā māyādevī mahānāgakuñjaramavakrāntaṃ saṃjānīte sma //
XXbsu022_u:1127: tasya khalu punastathā niṣaṇṇasya śakro devānāmindraścatvāraśca mahārājāno
XXbsu022_u:1128: 'ṣṭāviṃśatiśca mahāyakṣasenāpatayo guhyakādhipatiśca nāma yakṣakulaṃ yato vajrapāṇerutpattiste bodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ viditvā satataṃ
XXbsu022_u:1130: santi khalu punaścatasro bodhisattvaparicārakā devatāḥ - utkhalī ca nāma samutkhalī ca nāma
XXbsu022_u:1131: dhvajavatī ca nāma prabhāvatī ca nāma /
XXbsu022_u:1132: tā api bodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ viditvā satataṃ samitaṃ rakṣanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1133: śakro 'pi devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ pañcamātrairdevaputraśatairbodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ jñātvā
XXbsu022_u:1136: tadyathāpi nāma parvatamūrdhani rātrāvandhakāratamisrāyāṃ mahānagniskandho yojanādapi dṛśyate sma, yāvat pañcabhyā yojanebhyo dṛśyate sma /
XXbsu022_u:1142: bodhisattvasya mātā ca nidhyāya sthitā paśyati sma kukṣigataṃ bodhisattvam /
XXbsu022_u:1143: tadyathāpi nāma mahato 'bhrakūṭādvidyuto niḥsṛtya mahāntamavabhāsaṃ saṃjanayanti,
XXbsu022_u:1144: evameva bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigataḥ śriyā tejasā varṇena ca taṃ prathamaṃ ratnakūṭāgāramavabhāsayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1148: tamavabhāsya yatra cāsane niṣaṇṇo bhavati sma tadavabhāsayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1150: sarvaṃ gṛhamavabhāsya gṛhasyopariṣṭānniḥsṛtya pūrvāṃ diśamavabhāsayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1151: evaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ paścimāṃ uttarāmadha ūrdhvaṃ samantāddaśadiśaḥ krośamātramekaikasyāṃ diśi mātuḥ kukṣigato bodhisattvaḥ śriyā tejasā varṇena cāvabhāsayati sma //
XXbsu022_u:1154: mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ sārdhaṃ pañcamātrayakṣaśataiḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
XXbsu022_u:1155: tadā bodhisattvastānāgatān viditvā dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimabhyutkṣipya ekāṅgulikayā āsanānyupadarśayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1157: paśyanti sma bodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ jātarūpamiva vigrahaṃ hastaṃ cālayantaṃ vicālayantam utkṣipantaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayantam /
XXbsu022_u:1159: niṣaṇṇāṃśca tān viditvā bodhisattvo dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1160: yadā ca prakramitukāmā bhavanti tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva vicintitaṃ vijñāya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimutkṣipya saṃcārayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1163: tadā teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāmevaṃ bhavati sma - visarjitāḥ sma vayaṃ bodhisattveneti /
XXbsu022_u:1164: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāmanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1165: ayaṃ heturayaṃ pratyayo yadbodhisattvo rātryāṃ praśāntāyāṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ saṃcārya vicārayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1166: vicārya punarapi smṛtaḥ saṃprajānaṃstaṃ pāṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1167: punaraparaṃ yadā bodhisattvasya keciddarśanāyāgacchanti sma striyo vā puruṣo vā dārako vā dārikā vā, tān bodhisattvaḥ pūrvatarameva pratisaṃmodayate sma, paścādbodhisattvasya mātā iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigataḥ san sattvān pratisaṃmodanakuśalo bhavati smeti
XXbsu022_u:1168: na ca kaściddevo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā yaḥ śaknoti sma bodhisattvaṃ pūrvataraṃ pratisaṃmoditum /
XXbsu022_u:1169: atha tarhi bodhisattva eva tāvat pūrvataraṃ pratisaṃmodate sma, paścādbodhisattvamātā //
XXbsu022_u:1170: nirgate khalu punaḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye madhyāhnakālasamaye pratyupasthite atha khalu śakro devānāmindro niṣkrāntaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1171: abhiniṣkrāntāśca trāyatriṃśaddevaputrā bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
XXbsu022_u:1173: tāṃśca bodhisattvo dūrata evāgacchato dṛṣṭvā dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya śakraṃ devānāmindraṃ devāṃśca trāyatriṃśān pratisaṃmodate sma /
XXbsu022_u:1175: na ca śaknoti sma bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindro bodhisattvasyājñāṃ pratiroddhum /
XXbsu022_u:1176: niṣīdati sma śakro devānāmindrastadanye ca devaputrā yathāprajñapteṣvāsaneṣu /
XXbsu022_u:1177: tān bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇān viditvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1178: yena ca bodhisattvaḥ pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma, tanmukhā bodhisattvamātā bhavati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1179: tatasteṣāmevaṃ bhavati sma - asmābhiḥ sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃmodate sma /
XXbsu022_u:1180: ekaikaścaivaṃ saṃjānīte sma - mayaiva sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃlapati, māmeva pratisaṃmodate sma iti //
XXbsu022_u:1182: tasmin khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāre śakrasya devānāmindrasya trāyatriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ ca pratibhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
XXbsu022_u:1183: na khalu punaranyatraivaṃ pariśuddho bodhisattvaparibhogo bhavati yathā mātuḥ kukṣigatasya bodhisattvasya /
XXbsu022_u:1184: yadā ca bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindrastadanye ca devaputrāḥ prakramitukāmā bhavanti sma, tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva
XXbsu022_u:1186: saṃcārya vicārya punarapi smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1188: tadā śakrasya devānāmindrasyānyeṣāṃ ca trāyatriṃśānāṃ devānāmevaṃ bhavati sma - visarjitā vayaṃ bodhisattveneti /
XXbsu022_u:1189: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāmanti sma //
XXbsu022_u:1190: nirgate ca khalu punarbhikṣavo madhyāhnakālasamaye sāyāhnakālasamaye pratyupasthite atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiranekairbrahmakāyikairdevaputraśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtastaṃ divyamojobindumādāya yena bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmati sma bodhisattvaṃ draṣṭuṃ vandituṃ paryupāsituṃ dharmaṃ ca śrotum /
XXbsu022_u:1191: samanvāharati sma bhikṣavaḥ bodhisattvo brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatimāgacchantaṃ saparivāram /
XXbsu022_u:1192: punareva ca bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇapāṇimutkṣipya brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatiṃ brahmakāyikāṃśca devaputrān pratisaṃmodate sma /
XXbsu022_u:1194: na ca śaktirasti bhikṣavo brahmaṇaḥ sahāpaterbodhisattvasyājñāṃ pratiroddhum /
XXbsu022_u:1195: niṣīdati sma bhikṣavo brahmā sahāpatistadanye ca brahmakāyikā devaputrā yathāprajñapteṣvāsaneṣu
XXbsu022_u:1196: / tān bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇān viditvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1197: yena ca bodhisattvaḥ pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma, tanmukhaiva māyādevī bhavati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1198: tatasteṣāmekaikasyaivaṃ bhavati sma - mayā sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃlapati,
XXbsu022_u:1200: yadā ca brahmā sahāpatistadanye ca brahmakāyikā devaputrā gantukāmā bhavanti sma, tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhumutkṣipya saṃcārayati sma saṃcārya vicārayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1201: saṃcārya vicārya avasādatākāreṇa pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1203: tato brahmaṇaḥ sahāpatestadanyeṣāṃ ca brahmakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāmevaṃ bhavati sma - visarjitā vayaṃ bodhisattveneti /
XXbsu022_u:1204: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya punareva prakrāmanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1205: bodhisattvaśca smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan pāṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati sma //
XXbsu022_u:1206: āgacchanti sma khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarābhyo digbhyo
XXbsu022_u:1207: 'dhastādupariṣṭāt santāddaśabhyo digbhyo bahūni bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca dharmasaṃgītisaṃgāyanāya ca /
XXbsu022_u:1208: teṣāmāgatāgatānāṃ bodhisattvaḥ kāyāt prabhāmutsṛjya prabhāvyūhāni siṃhāsanānyabhinirmimīte sma /
XXbsu022_u:1210: niṣaṇṇāṃścainān viditvā paripṛcchati sma paripraśnayati sma yadutāsyaiva bodhisattvasya mahāyānasya vistaravibhāgatāmupādāya /
XXbsu022_u:1211: na ca tān kaścidanyaḥ paśyati sma anyatra sabhāgebhyo devaputrebhyaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1212: ayaṃ bhikṣavo heturayaṃ pratyayo yena bodhisattvaḥ praśāntāyāṃ rātryāṃ kāyāt prabhāmutsṛjati sma //
XXbsu022_u:1214: na khalu punarbhikṣavo māyādevī bodhisattvakukṣigate gurukāyatāṃ saṃjānīte sma anyatra laghutāmeva mṛdutāmeva saukhyatāmeva /
XXbsu022_u:1216: na ca rāgaparidāhena vā dveṣaparidāhena vā mohaparidāhena vā paridahyate sma /
XXbsu022_u:1217: na ca kāmavitarkaṃ vā vyāpādavitarkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitarkaṃ vā vitarkayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1218: na ca śītaṃ na coṣṇaṃ vā jighatsāṃ vā pipāsāṃ vā tamo vā rajo vā kleśaṃ vā saṃjānīte sma paśyati vā /
XXbsu022_u:1219: na cāsyā amanāpā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśā vā ābhāsamāgacchanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1220: na ca pāpakān svapnān paśyati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1221: na cāsyāḥ strīmāyā na śāṭhyaṃ nerṣyā na strīkleśā bādhante sma /
XXbsu022_u:1222: pañcaśikṣāpadasamādattā khalu punaḥ śīlavatī daśakuśalakarmapathe pratiṣṭhitā tasmin samaye bodhisattvamātā bhavati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1223: na ca bodhisattvamātuḥ kvacit puruṣe rāgacittamutpadyate sma, nāpi kasyacitpuruṣasya bodhisattvasya māturantike /
XXbsu022_u:1224: ye ca kecitkapilāhvaye mahāpuravare anyeṣu vā janapadeṣu devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍabhūtāviṣṭāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā vā, te sarve bodhisattvamātuḥ sahadarśanādeva svasthāḥ smṛtipratilabdhā bhavanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1226: ye ca kecinnānārogaspṛṣṭāḥ sattvā bhavanti sma, vātapittaśleṣmasaṃnipātajai rogaiḥ pīḍyante sma, cakṣurogeṇa vā śrotrarogeṇa vā ghrāṇarogeṇa vā
XXbsu022_u:1227: jihvārogeṇa vā oṣṭharogeṇa vā dantarogeṇa kaṇṭharogeṇa vā galagaṇḍarogeṇa vā uragaṇḍakuṣṭhakilāsaśoṣonmādāpasmārajvaragalagaṇḍapiṭakavisarpavicarcikādyai rogaiḥ saṃpīḍyante sma, teṣāṃ bodhisattvamātā dakṣiṇapāṇiṃ mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpayati sma te sahapratiṣṭhāpite pāṇau vigatavyādhayo bhūtvā svakasvakāni gṛhāṇi gacchanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1228: antato māyādevī tṛṇagulmakamapi dharaṇitalādabhyutkṣipya glānebhyaḥ sattvebhyo 'nuprayacchati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1230: yadā ca māyādevī svaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ pratyavekṣate sma, tadā paśyati sma bodhisattvaṃ
XXbsu022_u:1231: kukṣigatam, tadyathāpi nāma supariśuddha ādarśamaṇḍale mukhamaṇḍalaṃ dṛśyate /
XXbsu022_u:1232: dṛṣṭvā ca punastuṣṭā udagrā āttamanā pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā bhavati sma //
XXbsu022_u:1233: bodhisattvasya khalu punarbhikṣavo mātuḥ kukṣigatasyādhiṣṭhitaṃ satataṃ samitaṃ rātriṃdivaṃ divyāni tūryāṇi abhi(nirmāya) pranadanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1237: kālena ṛtavo nakṣatrāṇi ca parivartante sma /
XXbsu022_u:1238: kṣemaṃ ca rājyaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca sumanākulamanubhavati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1239: sarve ca kapilāhvaye mahāpuravare śākyā anye ca sattvāḥ khādanti sma, pibanti sma, (ramante sma,) krīḍanti
XXbsu022_u:1240: sma, pravicārayanti sma, dānāni ca dadanti sma, puṇyāni ca kurvanti sma,
XXbsu022_u:1245: evaṃrūpeṇa bhikṣava ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigato 'sthāt /
XXbsu022_u:1247: drakṣyasi tvamānanda ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ yatra bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigato vyāhārṣīt
XXbsu022_u:1249: darśayati sma tathāgata āyuṣmata ānandasya śakrasya devānāmindrasya caturṇāṃ ca lokapālānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ ca devamanuṣyāṇām /
XXbsu022_u:1250: dṛṣṭvā ca te tuṣṭā abhūvan udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1251: sa ca brahmā sahāpatiḥ punareva brahmaloke samāropya pratiṣṭhāpayati sma caityārtham //
XXbsu022_u:1252: tatra khalu bhagavān punarapi bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma - iti hi bhikṣavo
XXbsu022_u:1253: daśamāsakukṣigatena bodhisattvena ṣaṭtriṃśannayutāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ triṣu yāneṣu paripācitānyabhūvan
XXbsu022_u:1255: bodhisattva agrasattva mātukukṣisaṃsthitaḥ prakampitā ca ṣaḍvikāra medinī sakānanā /
XXbsu022_u:1256: suvarṇavarṇa ābha mukta sarvāpāya śodhitā praharṣitāśca devasaṃgha dharmagañju bheṣyate // suṃsaṃsthito mahāvimānu naikaratnacitrito yatra vīru āruhitva tiṣṭhate vināyakaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1257: gandhottamena candanena pūrito virocate yasyaikakarṣu trisahasramūlyaratnapūrito // Lal_6.24
XXbsu022_u:1258: mahāsahasralokadhātu heṣvi bhindiyitvanā udāgato guṇākarasya padmaojabinduko /
XXbsu022_u:1259: so saptarātra puṇyateja brahmaloki udgato gṛhītva brahma ojabindu bodhisattva nāmayī // Lal_6.25
XXbsu022_u:1260: na asti sarvasattvakāyi bhuktu yo jareya taṃ anyatra bhūri bodhisattva brahmakalpasaṃnibhe
XXbsu022_u:1261: anekakalpa puṇyateja ojabindu saṃsthito bhujitva sattva kāyacitta jñānaśuddha gacchiṣu // śakra brahma lokapāla pūjanāya nāyakaṃ trīṇi kāla āgamitva bodhisattvamantikam /
XXbsu022_u:1262: vandayitva pūjayitva dharma śṛṇute varaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ karitva sarva gacchiṣū yathāgatā // Lal_6.27
XXbsu022_u:1264: bodhisattva dharmakāma enti lokadhātuṣu prabhāviyūha āsaneṣu te niṣaṇṇa dṛśyiṣu /
XXbsu022_u:1265: parasparaṃ ca śrutva dharma yānaśreṣṭhamuttamaṃ prayānti sarvi hṛṣṭacitta varṇamāla bhāṣato ye ca iṣṭidārakāsu duḥkhitā tadā abhūt bhūtaspṛṣṭa kṣiptacitta nagna pāṃśumrakṣitā /
XXbsu022_u:1266: te ca sarva dṛṣṭva māya bhonti labdhacetanā smṛtīmatīgatīupeta gehi gehi gacchiṣu // Lal_6.29
XXbsu022_u:1267: vātato va pittato va śleṣmasaṃnipātakaiḥ ye ca cakṣuroga śrotraroga kāyacittapīḍitā /
XXbsu022_u:1268: naikarūpa naikajāti vyādhibhiśca ye hatā sthāpite sma māya mūrdhni pāṇi bhonti nirjarā // athāpi vā tṛṇasya tūli bhūmito gṛhītvanā dadāti māya āturāṇa sarvi bhonti nirjarā /
XXbsu022_u:1269: saukhyaprāpti nirvikāra gehi gehi gacchiṣu bhaiṣajyabhūti vaidyarāji kukṣisaṃpratiṣṭhite // yasmi kāli māyadevi svātanuṃ nirīkṣate adṛśāti bodhisattva kukṣiye pratiṣṭhitam /
XXbsu022_u:1270: yathaiva candra antarīkṣa tārakai parīvṛtaṃ tathaiva nāthu bodhisattvalakṣaṇairalaṃkṛtam // no ca tasya rāga doṣa naiva moha bādhate kāmachandu naiva tasya īrṣi naiva hiṃsitā /
XXbsu022_u:1271: tuṣṭacitta hṛṣṭacitta prīti saumanasthitā kṣudhāpipāsa śīta uṣṇa naiva tasya bādhate // Lal_6.33
XXbsu022_u:1272: aghaṭṭitāśca nityakāla divyatūrya vādiṣu pravarṣayanti divyapuṣpa gandhaśreṣṭha śobhanā /
XXbsu022_u:1273: deva paśyi mānuṣāśca mānuṣā amānuṣāṃ no viheṭhi no vihiṃsi tatra te parasyaram // Lal_6.34
XXbsu022_u:1275: ramanti sattva krīḍayanti annapānudenti ca ānandaśabda ghoṣayanti hṛṣṭatuṣṭamānasāḥ //
XXbsu022_u:1276: kṣamā rajoanākulā ca kāli deva varṣate tṛṇāśca puṣpa oṣadhīya tasmi kāli rohiṣu // Lal_6.35
XXbsu022_u:1277: rājagehi saptarātra ratnavarṣa varṣito yato daridrasattva gṛhya dāna denti bhuñjate /
XXbsu022_u:1278: nāsti sattva yo daridra yo ca āsi duḥkhito bherumūrdhni nandaneva eva sattva nandiṣu // Lal_6.36
XXbsu022_u:1279: so ca rāju śākiyāna poṣadhī upoṣito rājyakāryu no karoti dharmameva gocarī /
XXbsu022_u:1280: tapovanaṃ ca so praviṣṭa māyādevī pṛcchate kīdṛśenti kāyi saukhya agrasattva dhārati // Lal_6.37
XXbsu022_u:1285: iti hi bhikṣavo daśamāseṣu nigateṣu bodhisattvasya janmakālasamaye pratyupasthite rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhodyāne dvātriṃśatpūrvanimittāni prādurabhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:1286: katamāni dvātriṃśat? sarvapuṣpāṇi suṅgībhūtāni na puṣpanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1287: puṣkariṇīṣu cotpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāṇyabhyudgatāni kuḍmalībhūtāni na puṣpanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1288: tadā ca puṣpaphalavṛkṣā dharaṇītalādabhyudgamya kṣārakajātā na phalanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1290: viṃśati ca ratnanidhānaśatasahasrāṇyutplatya vyavasthitāni dṛśyante sma /
XXbsu022_u:1293: himavatparvatapārśvācca siṃhapotakā āgatyāgatyābhinadantaḥ kapilāhvayapuravaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya dvāramūleṣvavatiṣṭhante sma, na kaṃcitsattvaṃ viheṭhayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1294: pañcaśatāni pāṇḍarāṇāṃ hastiśāvakānāmāgatya rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāgrakaraiścaraṇāvabhilikhanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1295: mekhalībaddhakāśca devadārakā rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāntaḥpure utsaṅgenotsaṅgamanuparivartamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
XXbsu022_u:1296: gaganatalagatārdhakāyā nāgakanyā nānāpūjopakaraṇaparigṛhītā adhyālambamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma
XXbsu022_u:1299: daśa ca pūrṇakumbhasahasrāṇi kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvanti saṃdṛśyante sma /
XXbsu022_u:1300: daśa ca devakanyāsahasrāṇi gandhodakabhṛṅgāraparigṛhītā mūrdhni dhārayantyo 'vasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
XXbsu022_u:1301: daśa ca devakanyāsahasrāṇi chatradhvajapatākāparigṛhītā avasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
XXbsu022_u:1302: bahūni cāpsaraḥśatasahasrāṇi śaṅkhabherīmṛdaṅgapaṇavaiḥ ghaṇṭāvasaktaiḥ pratīkṣamāṇānyavasthitāni saṃdṛśyante sma /
XXbsu022_u:1304: sarvanadī ca prasravaṇāni ca na vahanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1307: ratnajālaparisphuṭaṃ ca rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhaṃ saṃsthitamabhūt /
XXbsu022_u:1309: kūṭāgāraprāsādatoraṇadvārakataleṣu ca maṇiratnānyabhipralambamānāni ca saṃdṛśyante sma /
XXbsu022_u:1314: utkūlanikūlāśca pṛthivīpradeśāḥ samāḥ samavasthitāḥ sarvavīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakarathyāntarāpaṇamukhāni ca pāṇitalamṛṣṭānīva puṣpābhikīrṇāni virocante sma /
XXbsu022_u:1316: sarvaśālavanadevatāśca patreṣvardhakāyānabhinirmāya namyamānāḥ sthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
XXbsu022_u:1319: atha khalu māyādevī bodhisattvasya janmakālasamayaṃ jñātvā bodhisattvasyaiva tejonubhāvena rātryāṃ prathame yāme rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramya gāthābhirabhyabhāṣata -
XXbsu022_u:1320: deva śṛṇu hi mahyaṃ bhāṣato yaṃ mataṃ me aciraciracireṇā jāta udyānabuddhiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1321: yadi ca tava na roṣo naiva doṣo na mohaḥ kṣipramahu vrajeyā krīḍaudyānabhūmim // Lal_7.1 //
XXbsu022_u:1322: tvamiha tapasi khinno dharmacittaprayukto ahu ca cirapraviṣṭā śuddhasattvaṃ dharentī /
XXbsu022_u:1323: drumavara pratibuddhāḥ phullitā śālavṛkṣāḥ yukta bhaviya devā gantumudyānabhūmim // Lal_7.2
XXbsu022_u:1324: ṛtupravara vasanto yoṣitāṃ maṇḍanīyo bhramaravaravighuṣṭāḥ kokilabarhigītāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1325: śuciruciravicitrā bhrāmyate puṣpareṇuḥ sādhu dadahi ājñāṃ gacchamo mā vilambaḥ // Lal_7.3
XXbsu022_u:1326: vacanamimu śruṇitvā deviye pārthivendraḥ tuṣṭo muditacittaḥ pāriṣadyānavocat /
XXbsu022_u:1327: hayagajarathaṃ paṅktyā vāhanā yojayadhvaṃ pravaraguṇasamṛddhāṃ lumbinīṃ maṇḍayadhvam // Lal_7.4
XXbsu022_u:1328: nīlagirinikāśāṃ meghavarṇānubaddhāṃ viṃśati ca sahasrān yojayadhvaṃ gajānām /
XXbsu022_u:1329: maṇikanakavicitrāṃ hemajālopagūḍhāṃ ghaṇṭarucirapārśvān ṣaḍviṣāṇāṃ gajendrān // Lal_7.5 //
XXbsu022_u:1330: himarajatanikāśāṃ muñjakeśāṃ sukeśāṃ viṃśati ca sahasrān yojayadhvaṃ hayānām /
XXbsu022_u:1333: viṃśati ca sahasrān yojayadhvaṃ suśīghraṃ māya saparivārāṃ rakṣathā apramattā // Lal_7.7 //
XXbsu022_u:1335: maṇikanakaniṣiktāṃ lumbinīṃ kārayadhvaṃ vividhavasanaratnaiḥ sarvavṛkṣāṃ pravethā /
XXbsu022_u:1336: vividhakusumacitraṃ nandanaṃ vā surāṇāṃ vadatha ca mama śīghraṃ sarvametaṃ vidhāya // Lal_7.8
XXbsu022_u:1337: vacanamimu niśamyā pāriṣadyaiḥ kṣaṇena vāhana kṛta sajjā lumbinī maṇḍitā sā /
XXbsu022_u:1339: jaya jaya hi narendrā āyu pālehi dīrghaṃ sarva kṛtu yathoktaṃ kāru deva pratīkṣa // Lal_7.9
XXbsu022_u:1340: so ca naravarendro hṛṣṭacitto bhavitvā gṛhavaramanuviṣṭo iṣṭikānevamāha /
XXbsu022_u:1341: yasya ahu manāpo yā ca me prītikāmā sā mi kuruta ājñāṃ maṇḍayitvātmabhāvam
XXbsu022_u:1342: varasurabhisugandhāṃ bhāvaraṅgāṃ vicitrāṃ vasana mṛdumanojñāṃ prāvṛṇothā udagrāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1343: urasi vigalitānāṃ muktahārā bhavethā ābharaṇavibhūṣāṃ darśayethādya sarvāḥ
XXbsu022_u:1345: bhūya kuruta harṣaṃ devakanyāna yūyaṃ śrutva madhuraghoṣaṃ devatāpi spṛheyuḥ // Lal_7.12 //
XXbsu022_u:1346: ekarathavaresmiṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ māyadevī mā ca puruṣa istrī anya tatrāruheyā /
XXbsu022_u:1347: nāri vividhavarmā taṃ rathaṃ vāhayantāṃ mā ca pratikūlaṃ mā manāpaṃ śruṇeṣyā // Lal_7.13 //
XXbsu022_u:1348: hayagajarathapattīṃ sainyaśrīmadvicitrāṃ dvāri sthita nṛpasyā śrūyate uccaghoṣāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1351: māya yada gṛhāto nirgatā dvāramūlaṃ ghaṇṭa śatasahasrā tāḍitā maṅgalārtham
XXbsu022_u:1352: so ca ratha vicitro maṇḍitaḥ pārthivena api ca marusahasrairdivyasiṃhāsanebhiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1353: caturi ratanavṛkṣā patrapuṣpopapetā abhinaditamanojñāṃ haṃsakrauñcān mayūrān // Lal_7.16 //
XXbsu022_u:1355: maruvadhu gaganesmiṃ taṃ rathaṃ prekṣayante divyamadhuraghoṣaṃ śrāvayantyaḥ stuvanti // Lal_7.17
XXbsu022_u:1356: upaviśati yadā sā māya siṃhāsanāgre pracalita trisahasrā medinī ṣaḍvikāram
XXbsu022_u:1357: puṣpa maru kṣipiṃsū ambarāṃ bhrāmayiṃsū adya jagati śreṣṭho jāyate lumbinīye // Lal_7.18 //
XXbsu022_u:1358: caturi jagatipālāstaṃ rathaṃ vāhayante tridaśapatirapīndro mārgaśuddhiṃ karoti /
XXbsu022_u:1359: brahma puratu gacchī durjanāṃ vārayanto amaraśatasahasrāḥ prāñjalīkā namante // Lal_7.19 //
XXbsu022_u:1360: nṛpati muditacitto vīkṣate tāṃ viyūhāṃ tasya bhavati evaṃ vyakta yaṃ devadevo /
XXbsu022_u:1361: yasya caturi pālā brahma sendrāśca devāḥ kuruta vipulapūjāṃ vyakta yaṃ śuddhabhāvī // Lal_7.20
XXbsu022_u:1362: nāsti tribhavi sattvo yaḥ sahetpūjametāṃ deva atha ca nāgāḥ śakra brahmā ca pālāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1363: mūrdha tada phaleyā jīvitaṃ cāsya naśyet ayu puna atidevaḥ sarvapūjāṃ sahāti // Lal_7.21 //
XXbsu022_u:1364: atha khalu bhikṣavo māyādevī caturaśītyā hayarathasahasraiḥ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaiḥ parivṛtā caturaśītyā gajarathasahasraiḥ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaiḥ caturaśītyā ca pattisahasraiḥ śūrairvīrairvarāṅgarūpibhiḥ susaṃnaddhadṛḍhavarmakavacitairanuparigṛhītā ṣaṣṭyā ca śākyakanyāsahasraiḥ puraskṛtā catvāriṃśatā ca sahasrai (Vaidya
XXbsu022_u:1365: 61) rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya jñātikulaprasūtaiḥ śākyaiḥ vṛddhadaharamadhyamaiḥ saṃrakṣitā, ṣaṣṭyā ca sahasrai rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāntaḥpureṇa gītavādyasamyaktūryatāḍāvacarasaṃgītisaṃpravāditena parivṛtā, caturaśītyā ca devakanyāsahasraiḥ parivṛtā, caturaśītyā ca nāgakanyāsahasraiḥ
XXbsu022_u:1366: caturaśītyā ca gandharvakanyāsahasraiḥ caturaśītyā ca kinnarakanyāsahasraiḥ caturaśītyā cāsurakanyāsahasraiḥ nānāvyūhālaṃkārālaṃkṛtābhiḥ nānāgītavādyavarṇabhāṣiṇībhiranugamyamānā niryāti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1368: sarvavṛkṣāśca tasmin vanavare akālapatrapuṣpaphalāni dadanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1369: devaiśca tathā tadvanaṃ samalaṃkṛtamabhūt tadyathāpi nāma miśrakāvanaṃ devānāṃ samalaṃkṛtam
XXbsu022_u:1370: atha khalu māyādevī lumbinīvanamanupraviśya tasmādrathavarādavatīrya naramarukanyāparivṛtā vṛkṣeṇa vṛkṣaṃ paryaṭantī vanādvanaṃ caṃkramyamāṇā drumād drumaṃ nirīkṣamāṇā anupūrveṇa yenāsau plakṣo mahādrumaratnavarapravaraḥ suvibhaktaśākhaḥ samapatramañjarīdharo divyamānuṣyanānāpuṣpasaṃpuṣpito varapravarasurabhigandhinānāgandhinānāraṅgavastrābhipralambito vividhamaṇivicitraprabhojjvalitaḥ sarvaratnamūladaṇḍaśākhāpatrasamalaṃkṛtaḥ suvibhaktavistīrṇaśākhaḥ
XXbsu022_u:1371: karatalanibhe bhūmibhāge suvibhaktavistīrṇanīlatṛṇamayūragrīvāsaṃnibhe kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśe dharaṇītale saṃsthitaḥ pūrvajinajanetryābhinivāsitaḥ devasaṃgītyanugītaḥ śubhavimalaviśuddhaḥ śuddhāvāsadevaśatasahasraiḥ praśāntacittairabhinatajaṭāmakuṭāvalambitāvanatamūrdhabhirabhinandyamānastaṃ plakṣavṛkṣamupajagāma //
XXbsu022_u:1372: atha sa plakṣavṛkṣo bodhisattvasya tejonubhāvenāvanamya praṇamati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1373: atha māyādevī gaganatalagateva vidyut dṛṣṭiṃ dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya plakṣaśākhāṃ gṛhītvā salīlaṃ gaganatalaṃ prekṣamāṇā vijṛmbhamānā sthitābhūt /
XXbsu022_u:1374: atha tasmin samaye ṣaṣṭyapsaraḥśatasahasrāṇi kāmāvacaradevebhya upasaṃkramya māyādevyā upasthāne paricaryāṃ kurvanti sma //
XXbsu022_u:1375: evaṃrūpeṇa khalu puna ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigato 'sthāt /
XXbsu022_u:1376: sa paripūrṇānāṃ daśānāṃ māsānāmatyayena māturdakṣiṇapārśvānniṣkramati sma smṛtaḥ saṃprajānannanupalipto garbhamalairyathā nānyaḥ kaściducyate 'nyeṣāṃ garbhamala iti //
XXbsu022_u:1377: tasmin khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samaye śakro devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāpatiḥ purataḥ sthitāvabhūtām, yau bodhisattvaṃ paramagauravajātau
XXbsu022_u:1378: divyakāśikavastrāntaritaṃ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaiḥ smṛtau saṃprajñau pratigṛhṇāte sma //
XXbsu022_u:1379: yasmiṃśca kūṭāgāre bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigato 'sthāt, taṃ brahmā sahāpatirbrahmakāyikāśca devaputrā abhyutkṣipya brahmalokaṃ caityārthaṃ pūjārthaṃ copanāmayāmāsuḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1381: kenacinmanuṣyabhūtena, atha tahi bodhisattvaṃ devatāḥ prathamataraṃ pratigṛhṇanti sma //
XXbsu022_u:1383: samanantarāvatīrṇasya ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāpṛthivīṃ bhittvā mahāpadmaṃ prādurabhūt
XXbsu022_u:1385: 62) sthitvā śītoṣṇe dve vāridhāre 'bhinirbhiṃttvā bodhisattvaṃ snāpayataḥ sma /
XXbsu022_u:1386: śakrabrahmalokapālāḥ pūrvaṃgamāścānye ca bahavo devaputrāḥ śatasahasrā ye bodhisattvaṃ jātamātraṃ nānāgandhodakamuktakusumaiḥ snāpayantyabhyavakiranti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1387: antarikṣe ca dve cāmare ratnacchatraṃ ca prādurbhūtam /
XXbsu022_u:1388: sa tasmin mahāpadme sthitvā caturdiśamavalokayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1390: tasmin khalu punaḥ samaye bodhisattvaḥ pūrvakuśalamūlavipākajenāpratihatena divyacakṣuprādurbhūtena divyena cakṣuṣā sarvāvantaṃ trisāhastraṃ mahāsāhastraṃ lokadhātuṃ sanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṃ sadevamānuṣaṃ paśyati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1391: sarvasattvānāṃ ca cittacaritaṃ ca prajānāti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1392: jñātvā ca vyavalokayati sma - asti tvasau kaścitsattvo yo mayā sadṛśaḥ śīlena vā samādhinā vā prajñayā vā kuśalamūlacaryayā vā /
XXbsu022_u:1393: yadā ca bodhisattvaḥ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau na kaṃcitsattvamātmatulyaṃ paśyati sma,
XXbsu022_u:1394: atha tasminsamaye bodhisattvaḥ siṃha iva vigatabhayabhairavo 'saṃtrastaḥ
XXbsu022_u:1395: astambhī sucintitaṃ smṛtvā cintayitvā sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaritāni jñātvā aparigṛhīto bodhisattvaḥ pūrvāṃ diśamabhimukhaḥ sapta padāni prakrāntaḥ -
XXbsu022_u:1397: tasya prakramata uparyantarīkṣe 'parigṛhītaṃ divyaśvetavipulachatraṃ cāmaraśubhe gacchantamanugacchanti sma - yatra yatra ca bodhisattvaḥ padamutkṣipati sma, tatra tatra padmāni prādurbhavanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1398: dakṣiṇāṃ diśamabhimukhaḥ sapta padāni prakrāntaḥ - dakṣiṇīyo bhaviṣyāmi devamanuṣyāṇām /
XXbsu022_u:1400: saptame sthitvā siṃha ivāhlādanātmikāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate sma - ahaṃ loke jyeṣṭho 'haṃ loke śreṣṭhaḥ iyaṃ me paścimā jātiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1402: uttarāṃ diśamabhimukhaḥ sapta padāni prakrāntaḥ - anuttaro bhaviṣyāmi sarvasattvānām /
XXbsu022_u:1405: sarvanairayikāṇāṃ ca nirayāgnipratighātāya saha dharmameghavṛṣṭiṃ varṣiṣyāmi, yena te sukhasamarpitā bhaviṣyanti /
XXbsu022_u:1407: prakrāntaḥ, urdhvaṃ cāvalokayati sma - ullokanīyo bhaviṣyāmi sarvasattvānām /
XXbsu022_u:1409: atha tasmin samaye ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ svareṇābhivijñāpto 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:1411: yadā bodhisattvaścaramabhavika upajāyate, yadā cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate, tadā asyemānyevaṃrūpāṇi ṛddhiprātihāryāṇi
XXbsu022_u:1412: bhavanti - tasmin khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samaye saṃhṛṣitaromakūpajātāḥ sarvasattvā abhūvan
XXbsu022_u:1416: sarvartukālikāśca (Vaidya 63) vṛkṣāstasmin samaye trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau saṃkusumitāḥ phalitāśca /
XXbsu022_u:1418: apagatameghācca gaganācchanaiḥ sūkṣmasūkṣmo devaḥ pravarṣati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1423: paramasukhasaṃsparśayā ca sarvasattvakāyacittasukhasaṃjananyā lokottarayā anekaśatasahasravarṇaprabhayā sarvatrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ parisphuṭo 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:1429: cakṣurvikalaiśca sattvaiścakṣuḥ pratilabdham, śrotravikalaiśca sattvaiḥ śrotram /
XXbsu022_u:1433: āvīcimādiṃ kṛtvā sarvanairayikāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvakāraṇād duḥkhaṃ tasminsamaye prasrabdham
XXbsu022_u:1436: yadā ca bodhisattvo jātamātraḥ sapta padāni prakrānto 'bhūt,
XXbsu022_u:1437: asaṃkhyeyākalpakoṭinayutaśatasahasraiḥ sucaritacaraṇairmahāvīryamahāsthāmadharmatāpratilambhena tasmin samaye daśadiglokadhātusthitā buddhā bhagavantastaṃ pṛthvīpradeśaṃ vajramayadhitiṣṭhanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1439: tāvanmahābalavegasamanvāgato hi bhikṣavo jātamātro bodhisattvaḥ sapta padāni prakrānto 'bhūt
XXbsu022_u:1440: sarvalokāntarikāśca tasmin samaye mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭā abhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:1444: saṃkṣepādacintyā sā kriyābhūt, yadā bodhisattvo loke prādurabhūt sarvalokābhyudgataḥ //
XXbsu022_u:1445: atha khalvāyuṣmānānandaḥ utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - sarvasattvānāṃ bhagavaṃstathāgata āścaryabhūto 'bhūt, bodhisattvabhūt evādbhutadharmasamanvāgataśca /
XXbsu022_u:1452: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - bhaviṣyanti khalu punarānanda anāgate 'dhvani kecidbhikṣavo 'bhāvitakāyā abhāvitacittā abhāvitaśīlā abhāvitaprajñā bālā apaṇḍitā ābhimānikā uddhatā unnatā asaṃvṛtā vikṣiptacittāḥ kāṅkṣāparīttā vicikitsābahulā aśraddhāḥ śramaṇamalāḥ śramaṇapratirūpakāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1453: te na śraddāsyanti imāmevaṃrūpāṃ bodhisattvasya garbhāvakrāntipariśuddhim /
XXbsu022_u:1455: saṃnipātyaivaṃ vakṣyanti - paśyata bho yūyametadapūjyamānaṃ bodhisattvasya kila mātuḥ kukṣigatasyoccāraprasrāvamaṇḍoparimiśrasya īdṛśī vibhūtirāsīt /
XXbsu022_u:1456: sa ca kila abhiniṣkrāman māturdakṣiṇāyāḥ kukṣeranupalipto garbhamalenābhūditi /
XXbsu022_u:1457: kathametadyojyate? na punaste mohapuruṣā evaṃ jñāsyanti - na sukṛtakarmaṇāṃ sattvānāmuccāraprasrāvamaṇḍe kāyaḥ saṃbhavatīti /
XXbsu022_u:1459: garbhāvasthitaśca sattvānukampayā hi bodhisattvo manuṣyaloke upapadyate, na devabhūta eva dharmacakraṃ pravartayati /
XXbsu022_u:1461: devabhūtaḥ sa bhagavān tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ, vayaṃ tu manuṣyamātrāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1463: na khalu punasteṣāṃ mohapuruṣāṇāṃ dharmastainyakānāmevaṃ bhaviṣyati - acintyo hi sa
XXbsu022_u:1465: api tu khalvānanda buddhaṛddhiprātihāryamapi te tasmin kāle nāvakalpayiṣyanti, kimaṅga punarbodhisattvabhūtasya tathāgatasya bodhisattvaprātihāryāṇi /
XXbsu022_u:1466: paśya ānanda kiyantaṃ te mohapuruṣā bahvapuṇyābhisaṃskāramabhisaṃskariṣyanti, ye buddhadharmān pratikṣepsyanti lābhasatkāraślokābhibhūtā uccāralagnā lābhasatkārābhibhūtā itarajātīyāḥ ānanda āha - mā maivaṃrūpā bhagavan anāgate 'dhvani bhikṣavo bhaviṣyanti ya imāmevaṃ bhadrikāṃ sūtrāntāṃ pratikṣepsyanti pratipakṣaṃ pakṣanti ca //
XXbsu022_u:1467: bhagavānāha - evaṃrūpāśca te ānanda sūtrāntāṃ prapikṣepsyanti,
XXbsu022_u:1470: ānanda āha - kā punarbhagavan teṣāṃ tathārūpāṇāmasatpuruṣāṇāṃ
XXbsu022_u:1472: bhagavānāha - yā gatirbuddhabodhimantardhāyāpyatītānāgatapratyutpannāṃśca buddhān bhagavato 'tyākhyāya tāṃ te gatiṃ gamiṣyanti //
XXbsu022_u:1473: atha khalvāyuṣmānānandaḥ saṃharṣitaromakūpajāto namo buddhāya ityuktvā bhagavantametadavocatmūrchā me bhagavan kāyasyābhūdimaṃ teṣāmasatpuruṣāṇāṃ samudācāraṃ śrutvā //
XXbsu022_u:1477: te tena viṣamena samudācāreṇavīcau mahānarake prapatiṣyanti /
XXbsu022_u:1478: tatkasya hetoḥ? ye kecidānanda bhikṣavo vā bhikṣuṇyo vā
XXbsu022_u:1479: upāsako vā upāsikā vā imānevaṃrūpān sūtrāntān śrutvā nādhimokṣyanti na śraddhāsyanti na prativetsyanti, te cyutāḥ samānā avīcau mahānarake prapatiṣyanti /
XXbsu022_u:1482: aprameyo hyānanda tathāgato gambhīro vipulo duravagāhaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1485: amoghaṃ ca teṣāṃ jīvitam, amoghaṃ ca teṣāṃ mānuṣyam, sucaritacaraṇāśca te, ādattaṃ ca taiḥ sāram, muktāśca te tribhyo 'pāyebhyaḥ, bhaviṣyanti ca te putrāstathāgatasya, pariprāptaṃ ca taiḥ sarvakāryam, amoghaśca teṣāṃ śraddhāpratilambhaḥ, suvibhakta ca tai rāṣṭrapiṇḍam, prasannāśca te 'grasattvaiḥ, saṃchinnāstairmārapāśāḥ,
XXbsu022_u:1486: nistīrṇaśca taiḥ saṃsārāṭavīkāntāraḥ, samuddhṛtaśca taiḥ śokaśalyaḥ,
XXbsu022_u:1487: anuprāptaṃ ca taiḥ prāmodyavastu, sugṛhītāni ca taiḥ śaraṇagamanāni,
XXbsu022_u:1488: dakṣiṇīyāśca te pūjārhāḥ, durlabhaprādurbhāvāśca te loke, dakṣiṇīyāśca te dhārayitavyāḥ
XXbsu022_u:1489: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi - te sarvaloke imamevaṃ
XXbsu022_u:1491: na te ānanda sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhavanti /
XXbsu022_u:1492: te cānanda sattvā mamaikajātipratibaddhāni mitrāṇi bhaviṣyanti /
XXbsu022_u:1494: kaścidānanda śravaṇādeva priyo bhavati manāpaśca na tu darśanena /
XXbsu022_u:1495: kaścidānanda darśanenāpi priyo bhavati manāpaśca na tu khalu punaḥ śravaṇena /
XXbsu022_u:1496: kaścidānanda darśanenāpi śravaṇenāpi priyo bhavati manāpaśca /
XXbsu022_u:1497: teṣāṃ keṣāṃcidānanda ahaṃ darśanena vā śravaṇena vā priyo manāpo bhaveyaṃ niṣṭhāṃ tvaṃ tatra gacchethāḥ - na tāni mamaikajātipratibaddhāni mitrāṇi /
XXbsu022_u:1498: dṛṣṭāste tathāgatena, mocayitavyāste tathāgatena, te samaguṇapratyaṃśāḥ,
XXbsu022_u:1499: te tathāgataguṇapratyaṃśāḥ, te tathāgatena kartavyā upāsakāḥ, te tathāgataṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ, upāttāste tathāgatena /
XXbsu022_u:1500: mamāntikāt khalvapyānanda pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāmeva tāvaccarato ye kecidbhayārditāḥ sattvā āgatya abhayaṃ pratiyācante sma, tebhyo 'haṃ sattvebhyo 'bhayaṃ
XXbsu022_u:1504: yadānanda tathāgatena yuṣmākaṃ karaṇīyaṃ kṛtam, tattathāgatena śodhito mānaśalyaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1505: śravaṇenāpyānanda mitrasya nanu yojanaśatāntaramapi gacchanti, gatvā ca sukhitā bhavanti adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ mitraṃ dṛṣṭvā /
XXbsu022_u:1506: kaḥ punarvādo ye māṃ niśritya kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti /
XXbsu022_u:1507: jñāsyantyānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ - pūrva mitrāṇyete sattvāstathāgatānām, asmākamapyete mitrāṇi bhavantīti /
XXbsu022_u:1508: tatkasmāt khalu punarānanda mitraṃ mitrasya priyaṃ ca manāpaṃ ca bhavati? tasyāpi (tadapi) priyameva bhavati, mitrasya yatpriyaṃ mitram, tadapi priyameva bhavati manāpaṃ ca /
XXbsu022_u:1514: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda kasyacideva puruṣasyaikaputrako bhavet suvayāḥ pradakṣiṇagrāhī /
XXbsu022_u:1516: sa tasmin pitari kālagate na hi vihanyeta pitṛmitrasuparigṛhītaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1517: evabheva ānanda ye kecinmama śraddhāsyanti tānahamupādadāmi /
XXbsu022_u:1521: tāni ca tathāgatasya mitrāṇi bhūtavādīni na mṛṣāvādīni /
XXbsu022_u:1526: iti hi jāte bodhisattve gaganatalagatānyapsaraḥkoṭinayutaśatasahasrāṇi divyaiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanavastrābharaṇairmāyādevīmabhyavakiranti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1528: śubhavimalaviśuddhahemaprabhā candrasūryaprabhā ṣaṣṭi daśasahasra devāpsarā mañjughoṣasvarāḥ
XXbsu022_u:1529: tasmi kṣaṇi upetya tāṃ lumbinīṃ māyadevyabruvan mā khu jani viṣādu tuṣṭā bhavopasthāyikāṣte vayam // Lal_7.22 //
XXbsu022_u:1530: bhaṇahi kiṃ karaṇīyu kiṃ kurmahe kena kāryaṃ ca te vayaṃ tava susamarthopasthāyikā premabhāvasthitāḥ
XXbsu022_u:1531: api ca bhava udagra harṣānvitā mā ca khedaṃ janehi jarāmaraṇavighāti vaidyottamaṃ adya devī janeṣī laghum // Lal_7.23 //
XXbsu022_u:1532: yatha druma pariphulla saṃpuṣpitā śālavṛkṣā ime yatha ca marusahasra pārśve sthitā bhrāmayanto bhujān /
XXbsu022_u:1533: yatha ca cali sasāgarā medinī ṣaḍvikārā iyaṃ divi divi ca vighuṣṭa lokottaraṃ tvaṃ janeṣī sutam // Lal_7.24 //
XXbsu022_u:1534: yatha ca prabha viśuddha vibhrājate svarṇavarṇa śubhā tūryaśata manojñā cāghaṭṭitā ghuṣyayante 'mbare /
XXbsu022_u:1535: yatha ca śatasahasra śuddhā śubhā vītarāgāḥ surā namiṣu muditacittā adyo jane sarvaloke hitam śakramapi ca brahmapālāpi cānyā ca yā devatā tuṣṭamuditacittā pārśve sthitā nāmayanto bhujām
XXbsu022_u:1536: so ca puruṣasiṃha śuddhavrato (bhittva) kukṣinirdhāvito kanakagirinikāśa śuddhavrato niṣkramī nāyakaḥ // Lal_7.26 //
XXbsu022_u:1538: śakramapi ca brahma tau pāṇibhiḥ saṃpratīcchā muniṃ kṣetra śatasahasra saṃkampitā ābha muktā śubhā /
XXbsu022_u:1539: api ca triṣu apāyi sattvā sukhī nāsti duḥkhaṃ puna amaraśatasahasra puṣpāṃ kṣipī bhrāmayantyambarān vīryabalaupeta vajrātmikā medinī saṃsthitā ('bhuttadā)
XXbsu022_u:1540: padmu ruciracitru abhyudgato yatra (cakrāṅgacitrebhiḥ) padbhyāṃ sthito ('pi) nāyakaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1541: sapta pada kramitva brahmasvaro muñci ghoṣottamaṃ jaramaraṇavighāti vaidyottamo bheṣyi sattvottamaḥ gaganatala sthihitva brahmottamo śakradevottamaḥ śuciruciraprasannagandhodakairvisnapī nāyakam
XXbsu022_u:1542: api ca uragarājā śītoṣṇa dve vāridhāre śubhe (vyamuñcatāntarīkṣe sthitāḥ)
XXbsu022_u:1545: trisahasrā iyaṃ bhūmiḥ kampate sacarācarā // Lal_7.30 //
XXbsu022_u:1546: prabhā ca rucirā muktā apāyāśca viśodhitāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1547: kleśaduḥkhāśca te śāntā jāte lokavināyake // Lal_7.31 //
XXbsu022_u:1549: krama sapta padāṃ vīraḥ kramate balavīryavān // Lal_7.32 //
XXbsu022_u:1550: pādau nikṣipate yatra bhūmau padmavarāḥ śubhāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1554: vyavalokayitvā ca viśārado diśaḥ tato girāṃ muñcati arthayuktām /
XXbsu022_u:1555: jyeṣṭho 'haṃ sarvalokasya śraṣṭho (loke vināyakaḥ) iyaṃ ca jātirmama
XXbsu022_u:1557: hāsyaṃ ca muktaṃ naranāyakena salokapālairmarubhiśca sendraiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1560: api coragendraiḥ sahitaiḥ samagraiḥ gandhogradhārāvisaraiḥ snapiṃsu /
XXbsu022_u:1561: anye 'pi devā nayutā (sthitāḥ) 'ntarīkṣe snapiṃsu gandhāgrajine svayaṃbhum
XXbsu022_u:1562: śvetaṃ ca vipulaṃ chatraṃ cāmarāṃśca śubhāmbarān /
XXbsu022_u:1563: antarīkṣe gatā devāḥ snāpayanti nararṣabham // Lal_7.38 //
XXbsu022_u:1565: puruṣa tvaritu gatva śuddhodanamabravīt harṣito vṛddhi vipula jātu devā suto bhūṣito lakṣaṇaiḥ
XXbsu022_u:1567: na ca bhavi pratiśatru jambudhvaje ekachatro bhavet // Lal_7.39 //
XXbsu022_u:1568: dvitiyu puruṣu gatva (rājñi) śuddhodane śleṣayitvā krame
XXbsu022_u:1569: vṛddhi vipula deva jātā nṛpe śākiyānāṃ kule /
XXbsu022_u:1570: pañcaviṃśatisahasra jātāḥ sutāḥ śākiyānāṃ gṛhe sarvi balaupeta nagnāḥ samā duṣpradharṣā paraiḥ aparu puruṣa āha devā śruṇā nandaśabdaṃ mamā chandakapramukhāni ceṭīsutā jāta aṣṭau śatā /
XXbsu022_u:1571: api ca daśasahasra jātā hayāḥ kaṇṭhakasya sakhā turagavarapradhāna hemaprabhā mañjukeśā varāḥ viṃśati ca sahasra paryantakāḥ koṭṭarājāstathā nṛpati kramatalebhi cānvākramī sādhu devā jayā
XXbsu022_u:1572: ājñā khalu dadāhi gacchāma kiṃ vā karomo nṛpā tvamiha vaśitu prāptu bhṛtyā vayaṃ bhaṭṭa devā jayā // Lal_7.42 //
XXbsu022_u:1573: viṃśati ca sahasra nāgottamā hemajālojjvalā tvaritamupagamiṃsu rājño gṛhaṃ garjamānā nabhe
XXbsu022_u:1574: kṛṣṇaśabala vatsa gopāmukhā jāta ṣaṣṭiśatā iyamapi suti devadevottame vṛddhi rājño gṛhe // (Vaidya 69)
XXbsu022_u:1575: api ca nṛpati gaccha prekṣa svayaṃ sarvameva prabho (puṇyateja prabho)
XXbsu022_u:1576: naramarutasahasra ye harṣitā dṛṣṭva jāte guṇāṃ /
XXbsu022_u:1577: bodhivara aśoka saṃprasthitāḥ kṣipra bhomā jināḥ // Lal_7.44 //
XXbsu022_u:1579: iti hi bhikṣavo jāte bodhisattve tatkṣaṇaṃ dānanisargaḥ punaruttari pravartate sma /
XXbsu022_u:1580: pañca ca kulikāśatāni prasūyante sma, daśa ca kanyāsahasrāṇi yaśovatīpramukhāni /
XXbsu022_u:1583: pañca kareṇusahasrāṇi pañca piṅgasahasrāṇi prasūyante sma /
XXbsu022_u:1584: tāni sarvāṇi rājñā śuddhodanena pustavaropitāni kumārasya krīḍārthaṃ dattānyabhūvan //
XXbsu022_u:1585: caturṇāṃ ca dvīpakoṭīśatasahasrāṇāṃ madhye pṛthivīpradeśe aśvatthayaṣṭiḥ prādurabhūdantardvīpe ca candanavanaṃ prādurbabhūva bodhisattvasya paribhogārthaṃ bodhisattvasyaivānubhāvena /
XXbsu022_u:1587: pañca ca nidhānasahasrāṇi dharaṇītalādutplutya mukhaṃ darśayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1588: iti hi ye kecidrājñaḥ śuddhodanasyārthābhipretā abhūvan, te sarve samṛddhābhipretā
XXbsu022_u:1590: tato rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyaitadabhūt - kimahaṃ kumārasya nāmadheyaṃ
XXbsu022_u:1592: tato 'syaitadabhūt - asya hi jātamātreṇa mama sarvārthāḥ saṃsiddhāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1594: tato rājā bodhisattvaṃ mahatā satkāreṇa satkṛtya sarvārthasiddho 'yaṃ kumāro nāmnā bhavatu iti nāmāsyākārṣīt //
XXbsu022_u:1595: iti hi bhikṣavo jāte bodhisattve mātuḥ kukṣipārśvamakṣatamanupahatamabhavadyathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt /
XXbsu022_u:1597: pañcāpsaraḥ - sahasrāṇi divyagandhaparivāsitatailaparigṛhītāni bodhisattvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujātajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1598: pañcāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi divyānulepanaparigṛhītāni bodhisattvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujātajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1599: pañcāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi divyagandhodakaparipūrṇaghaṭāparigṛhītāni bodhisattvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujātajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1600: paccāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi divyānulepanaparigṛhītani bodhisattvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujātajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1601: pañcāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi divyadārakācīvaraparigṛhītāni bodhisatvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujārajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1602: pañcāpsaraḥ - sahasrāṇi divyadārakābharaṇaparigṛhītāni bodhisattvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujātajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1603: pañcāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi divyatūryasaṃgītisaṃprabhaṇitena bodhisattvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujātajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1604: yāvantaśceha jambudvīpe bāhyāḥ pañcabhijñā ṛṣayaste sarve gaganatalenāgatya rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya purataḥ sthitvā jayavṛddhiśabdamanuśrāvayanti sma //
XXbsu022_u:1605: iti hi bhikṣavo jātamātro bodhisattvaḥ saptarātraḥ lumbinīvane divyamānuṣyakaistūryatālāvacaraiḥ satkriyate sma, gurukriyate sma, mānyate
XXbsu022_u:1606: sma, pūjyate sma, khādyabhojyasvādanīyāni (Vaidya 70) viśrāṇyante sma /
XXbsu022_u:1607: sarvaśākyagaṇāśca saṃnipātyānandaśabdamudīrayanti sma, dānāni ca dadanti
XXbsu022_u:1609: dvātriṃśacca brāhmaṇaśatasahasrāṇi dine dine saṃtarpyante sma /
XXbsu022_u:1611: śakraśca devānāmindro brahmā ca tasyāṃ brāhmaṇaparṣadi māṇavakarūpamabhinirmāyāgrāsane niṣadyemāṃ maṅgalyāṃ gāthāmabhyabhāṣatām -
XXbsu022_u:1612: apāyāśca yathā śāntā sukhī sarvaṃ yathā jagat /
XXbsu022_u:1613: dhruvaṃ sukhāvaho jātaḥ sukhe sthāpayitā jagat // Lal_7.45 //
XXbsu022_u:1615: abhibhūtā na bhāsante dhruvaṃ puṇyaprabhodbhavaḥ // Lal_7.46 //
XXbsu022_u:1618: na bādhante yathā kleśā jātaṃ maitrajanaṃ jagat /
XXbsu022_u:1620: yathā saṃpuṣpitāḥ śālā medinī ca samā sthitā /
XXbsu022_u:1625: śamenti vyādhiṃ sattvānāṃ vaidyarājo bhaviṣyati // Lal_7.51 //
XXbsu022_u:1628: yathā ca manujā devān devāḥ paśyanti mānuṣān /
XXbsu022_u:1629: heṭhayanti na cānyonyaṃ sārthavāho bhaviṣyati // Lal_7.53 //
XXbsu022_u:1630: yathā ca jvalanaḥ śāntaḥ sarvā nadyaśca visthitāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1631: sūkṣmaṃ ca kampate bhūmiḥ bhavitā tattvadarśakaḥ // Lal_7.54 //
XXbsu022_u:1633: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saptarātrajātasya bodhisattvasya mātā māyādevī kālamakarot /
XXbsu022_u:1635: syāt khalu punarbhikṣavo yuṣmākamevaṃ bodhisattvāparādhena māyādevī kālagateti? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
XXbsu022_u:1636: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? etat paramaṃ hi tasyā āyuṣpramāṇamabhūt /
XXbsu022_u:1637: atītānāmapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvānāṃ saptarātrajātānāṃ janetryaḥ kālamakurvanta /
XXbsu022_u:1641: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saptame divase yādṛśenaiva vyūhena māyādevī kapilavastuno
XXbsu022_u:1642: mahānagarādudyānabhūmimabhiniṣkrāntābhūt, tataḥ koṭīśatasahasraguṇottareṇa mahāvyūhena bodhisattvaḥ kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ prāvikṣat /
XXbsu022_u:1643: tasya ca praviśataḥ pañca pūrṇakumbhasahasrāṇi gandhodakaparipūrṇāni purato nīyante sma /
XXbsu022_u:1644: evaṃ pañcakanyāsahasrāṇi mayūrahastakamparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1645: pañca ca kanyāsahasrāṇi tālavṛkṣakaparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma
XXbsu022_u:1646: / pañca sa kanyāsahasrāṇi gandhodakabhṛṅgāraparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti
XXbsu022_u:1648: pañca ca kanyāsahasrāṇi vicitrapaṭalakaparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1649: pañca ca kanyāsahasrāṇi navavicitrapralambanamālāparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1650: pañca ca kanyāsahasrāṇi ratnabhadrālaṃkāraparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma, mārgaṃ śodhayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1651: pañca ca kanyāsahasrāṇi bhadrāsanaparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1652: pañca ca brāhmaṇasahasrāṇi ghaṇṭāparigṛhītāni māṅgalyaśabdaṃ śrāvayantaḥ purato gacchanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1653: viṃśati nāgasahasrāṇi sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāni purato gacchanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1654: viṃśati hayasahasrāṇi suvarṇālaṃkārasaṃchannāni sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāni purato gacchanti sma
XXbsu022_u:1656: cattvāriṃśatpadātisahasrāṇi śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgurūpiṇāṃ saṃnaddhadṛḍhavarmakavacānāṃ bodhisattvaṃ gacchantamanugacchanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1657: gaganatalagatāni cāprameyāsaṃkhyeyānyabhijñātāni kāmāvacarāṇāṃ rūpāvacaradevaputrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi nānāprakrāramanekavyūhairbodhisattvasya pūjāṃ kurvanto 'nugacchanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1658: yasmiṃśca varapravararathe bodhisattvaḥ samabhirūḍho 'bhūt, sa kāmāvacarairdevairanekairmahāvyūhaiḥ samalaṃkṛto 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:1659: viṃśati ca devakanyāsahasrāṇi sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāni ratnasūtraparigṛhītāni taṃ rathaṃ vahanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1660: dvayoścāpsarasormadhye ekā mānuṣī kanyā dvayormānuṣīkanyayormadhye ekāpsarā /
XXbsu022_u:1662: na ca mānuṣā apsarasāṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā pramādamāpadyante sma yadidaṃ bodhisattvasya tejonubhāvena
XXbsu022_u:1663: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ kapilāhvaye puravare sarvārthasiddhāya pañcamātraiḥ śākyaśataiḥ pañcagṛhaśatāni nirmāpitānyabhūvan bodhisattvamuddiśya /
XXbsu022_u:1664: te bodhisattvaṃ nagaraṃ praviśantaṃ svasvagṛhadvāramūle sthitvā kṛtāñjalipuṭā abhinatakāyāḥ sagauravā evamāhuḥ - iha bhoḥ sarvārthasiddha praviśa /
XXbsu022_u:1673: tataścopādāya kumārasyeha sarvārthasiddhaḥ sarvārthasiddha iti saṃjñāmagamat //
XXbsu022_u:1674: tatra rājā śuddhodanasteṣāṃ sarveṣāmanuvartanārthaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sarvagṛheṣu praveśya caturṇāṃ māsānāmatyayādbodhisattvaṃ svagṛhe praveśayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1675: tatra ca nānāratnavyūho nāma (Vaidya 72) mahāprāsādastaṃ bodhisattvaḥ samārūḍho 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:1676: tatra te bṛddhavṛddhāḥ śākyāḥ saṃnipatyaivaṃ mataṃ cārayanti sma - kā nu khalu samarthā bodhisattvaṃ gopāyituṃ kelayituṃ mamāyituṃ hitacittatayā maitracittatayā guṇacittatayā
XXbsu022_u:1680: tatra mahallakamahallikāḥ śākyā evamāhuḥ - sarvā etā vadhūkā navā dahnāstaruṇyaḥ rūpayauvanamadamattāḥ
XXbsu022_u:1682: atha ca punariyaṃ mahāprajāpatī gautamī kumārasya mātṛsvasā /
XXbsu022_u:1683: eṣā samarthā kumāraṃ samyaksukhena saṃvardhayitum, rājānaṃ ca śuddhodanamabhidhārayitum /
XXbsu022_u:1684: iti hi te sarve samagrā bhūtvā mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīmutsāhayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:1685: iti hi mahāprajāpatī gautamī kumāraṃ saṃvardhayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:1686: tatra bodhisattvasyārthe dvātriṃśaddhātryaḥ saṃsthāpitā abhuvan aṣṭāvaṅgadhātryaḥ, aṣṭau
XXbsu022_u:1688: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ sarvaṃ śākyagaṇaṃ saṃnipātyaivaṃ mīmāṃsate sma - kiṃ nu khalvayaṃ kumāro rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī, āhosvidabhiniṣkramiṣyati
XXbsu022_u:1690: tena ca samayena himavataḥ parvatarājasya pārśve asito nāma maharṣiḥ prativasati sma pañcābhijñaḥ sārdhaṃ naradattena bhāgineyena /
XXbsu022_u:1692: gaganatalagatāṃśca devaputrān buddhaśabdamanuśrāvayato 'mbarāṇi ca bhrāmayata itastataḥ pramuditān bhramato 'drākṣīt /
XXbsu022_u:1695: sa divyena cakṣuṣā sarvaṃ jambudvīpamanuvilokayannadrākṣīt kapilāhvaye mahāpuravare rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhe kumāraṃ jātaṃ śatapuṇyatejastejitaṃ sarvalokamahitaṃ dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtagātram /
XXbsu022_u:1696: dṛṣṭvā ca punarnaradattaṃ māṇavakamāmantrayate sma - yat khalu māṇavaka jānīyā jambudvīpe mahāratnamutpannam /
XXbsu022_u:1697: kapilavastuni mahānagare rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhe kumāro jātaḥ śatapuṇyatejastejitaḥ sarvalokamahito dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1699: rājā bhaviṣyati caturaṅgaścakravartī vijitavān dhārmiko dharmarājo jānapadasthāmavīryaprāptaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1704: asya putrasahasraṃ bhaviṣyati śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
XXbsu022_u:1705: sa imaṃ mahāpṛthivīmaṇḍalaṃ samudraparikhamadaṇḍenāśastreṇa svena (dharmeṇa) balenābhibhūyābhinirjitya rājyaṃ kariṣyatyaiśvaryādhipatyena /
XXbsu022_u:1707: pravrajiṣyati, tathāgato bhaviṣyati arhan samyaksaṃbuddho netā ananyaneyaḥ
XXbsu022_u:1710: atha khalvasito maharṣiḥ sārdhaṃ naradattena bhāgineyena rājahaṃsa iva gaganatalādabhyudgamya samutplutya yena kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:1711: upasaṃkramya ṛddhiṃ pratisaṃhṛtya padbhyāmeva kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ praviśya yena rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:1714: iti hi bhikṣavo 'sito maharṣiḥ paśyati sma rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhadvāre
XXbsu022_u:1716: atha khalvasito maharṣirdauvārikamupasaṃkramyaivamāha - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya, nivedaya dvāre ṛṣirvyavasthita iti /
XXbsu022_u:1717: parameti dauvāriko 'sitasya maharṣeḥ pratiśrutya yena rājā śuddhodanastenopasaṃkrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:1718: upasaṃkramya kṛtāñjalipuṭo rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha - yat khalu deva
XXbsu022_u:1719: jānīyā ṛṣirjīrṇo vṛddho mahallako dvāre sthitaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1722: atha rājā śuddhodano 'sitasya maharṣerāsanaṃ prajñāpya taṃ puruṣamevamāha - praviśatu ṛṣiriti
XXbsu022_u:1723: atha sa puruṣo rājakulānniṣkramyāsitaṃ maharṣimevamāha - praviśeti //
XXbsu022_u:1725: upasaṃkramya purataḥ sthitvā rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha - jaya jaya mahārāja, ciramāyuḥ pālaya, dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayeti //
XXbsu022_u:1726: atha sa rājā śuddhodano 'sitasya maharṣerarghapādyamarcanaṃ ca kṛtvā sādhu suṣṭhu ca parigṛhya āsanenopanimantrayate sma /
XXbsu022_u:1727: sukhopaviṣṭaṃ cainaṃ jñātvā sagauravaḥ supratīta evamāha - na smarāmyahaṃ tava ṛṣe darśanam
XXbsu022_u:1729: evamukte 'sito maharṣī rājānaṃ śuddhodanametadavocat - putraste mahārāja jātastamahaṃ draṣṭukāma ihāgata iti //
XXbsu022_u:1732: ṛṣiravocat - na mahārāja tādṛśā mahāpuruṣāściraṃ svapanti /
XXbsu022_u:1734: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhasattvo 'sitasya maharṣeranukampayā jāgaraṇanimittamakarot /
XXbsu022_u:1735: atha khalu rājā śuddhodanaḥ sarvārthasiddhaṃ kumāramubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu cānuparigṛhya asitasya maharṣerantikamupanāmayati sma //
XXbsu022_u:1736: iti hi asito maharṣirbodhisattvamavalokya dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgatamaśītyanuvyañjanasuvicitragātraṃ śakrabrahmalokapālātirekavapuṣaṃ dinakaraśatasahasrātirekatejasaṃ sarvāṅgasundaraṃ dṛṣṭvā codānamudānayati sma - āścaryapudgalo batāyaṃ loke
XXbsu022_u:1737: prādurbhūta, mahāścaryapudgalo batāyaṃ loke prādurbhūtaḥ ityutthāyāsanātkṛtāñjalipuṭo bodhisattvasya caraṇayoḥ praṇipatya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ca bodhisattvamaṅkena parigṛhya nidhyāyannavasthito 'bhūt
XXbsu022_u:1738: / so 'drākṣīdbodhisattvasya dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni yaiḥ samanvāgatasya puruṣapudgalasya dve gatī bhavato nānyā /
