XXbsu022_u:1740: sacetpunaragārādanagārikāṃ pravrajati tathāgato bhaviṣyati vighuṣṭaśabdaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ
XXbsu022_u:1741: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā prārodīdaśrūṇi ca pravartayan gambhīraṃ ca niśvasati sma //
XXbsu022_u:1743: adrākṣīdrājā śuddhodano 'sitaṃ maharṣiṃ rudantamaśrūṇi ca pravartayamānaṃ gambhīraṃ ca niśvasantam
XXbsu022_u:1744: dṛṣṭvā ca saṃharṣitaromakūpajātastvaritatvaritaṃ dīnamanā asitaṃ maharṣimetadavocat
XXbsu022_u:1745: - kimidamṛṣe rodasi aśrūṇi ca pravartayasi gambhīraṃ ca niśvasasi? mā khalu kumārasya kācidvipratipattiḥ
XXbsu022_u:1746: evamukte 'sito maharṣī rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha - nāhaṃ mahārāja kumārasyārthena rodimi, nāpyasya kācidvipratipattiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1748: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? ahaṃ ca mahārāja jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1751: abhisaṃbudhya cānuttaraṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati apravartitaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā anyena vā punaḥ kenacilloke sahadharmeṇa /
XXbsu022_u:1752: sadevakasya lokasya hitāya sukhāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam /
XXbsu022_u:1753: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ sattvānāṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyati
XXbsu022_u:1754: asmāttaṃ dharmaṃ śratvā jātidharmāṇaḥ sattvā jātyā parimokṣante /
XXbsu022_u:1766: abhisaṃbudhya ca sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi saṃsārasāgarāt pāramuttārayiṣyati, amṛte ca pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati /
XXbsu022_u:1767: vayaṃ ca taṃ buddharatnaṃ na drakṣyāmaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1768: ityeva tadahaṃ mahārāja rodimi paridīnamanā dīrghaṃ ca niśvasāmi yadahamimaṃ nārogye 'pi rādhayiṣyāmi
XXbsu022_u:1769: yathā hyasmākaṃ mahārāja mantravedaśāstreṣvāgacchati - nārhati sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāro 'gāramadhyāvasitum
XXbsu022_u:1770: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāro dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samānvāgataḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1773: anena mahārāja prathamena mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇena samanvāgataḥ sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1776: ūrṇā mahārāja sarvārthasiddhasya kumārasya bhruvo rmadhye jātā himarajataprakāśā /
XXbsu022_u:1804: dīrghāṅguliradhaḥkramatalayormahārāja sarvārthasiddhasya kumārasya cakre jāte ci (arciṣmatī prabhāsvare site)
XXbsu022_u:1807: anena mahārāja dvātriṃśattamena mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇena samanvāgataḥ sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ
XXbsu022_u:1808: na ca mahārāja cakravartināmevaṃvidhāni lakṣaṇāni bhavanti /
XXbsu022_u:1810: saṃvidyante khalu punarmahārāja sarvārthasiddhasya kumārasya kāye
XXbsu022_u:1813: katamāni ca mahārāja tānyaśītyanuvyañjanāni? tadyathā - tuṅganakhaśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1814: tāmranakhaśca snigdhanakhaśca vṛttāṅguliśca anupūrvacitrāṅguliśca gūḍhaśiraśca gūḍhagulphaśca ghanasaṃdhiśca aviṣamasamapādaśca āyatapārṣṇiśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1815: snigdhapāṇilekhaśca tulyapāṇilekhaśca gambhīrapāṇilekhaśca ajihmapāṇilekhaśca anupūrvapāṇilekhaśca bimboṣṭhaśca noccavacanaśabdaśca mṛdutaruṇatāmrajihvaśca gajagarjitābhistanitameghasvaramadhuramañjughoṣaśca paripūrṇavyañjanaśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1816: pralambabāhuśca śucigātravastusaṃpannaśca mṛdugātraśca viśālagātraśca adīnagātraśca anupūrvonnatagātraśca susamāhitagātraśca suvibhaktagātraśca pṛthuvipulasuparipūrṇajānumaṇḍalaśca vṛttagātraśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1817: suparimṛṣṭagātraśca ajihmavṛṣabhagātraśca anupūrvagātraśca gambhīranābhiśca ajihmanābhiśca anupūrvanābhiśca śucyācāraśca ṛṣabhavatsamantaprāsādikaśca paramasuviśuddhavitimirālokasamantaprabhaśca nāgavilambitagatiśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1818: siṃhavikrāntagatiśca ṛṣabhavikrāntagatiśca haṃsavikrāntagatiśca abhipradakṣiṇāvartagatiśca vṛttakukṣiśca mṛṣṭakukṣiśca ajihmakukṣiśca cāpodaraśca vyapagatachandadoṣanīlakālakāduṣṭaśarīraśca vṛttadaṃṣṭraśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1819: tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraśca anupūrvadaṃṣṭraśca tuṅganāsaśca śucinayanaśca vimalanayanaśca prahasitanayanaśca āyatanayanaśca viśālanayanaśca nīlakuvalayadalasadṛśanayanaśca sahitabhrūśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1820: citrabhrūśca asitabhrūśca saṃgatabhrūśca anupūrvabhrūśca pīnagaṇḍaśca aviṣamagaṇḍaśca vyapagatagaṇḍadoṣaśca anupahatakruṣṭaśca suviditendriyaśca suparipūrṇendriyaśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ saṃgatamukhalalāṭaśca paripūrṇottamāṅgaśca asitakeśaśca sahitakeśaśca
XXbsu022_u:1827: atha khalu rājā śuddhodano 'sitasya maharṣeḥ sakāśātkumārasyedaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā saṃtuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāta utthāyāsanādbodhisattvasya caraṇayoḥ praṇipatyemāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
XXbsu022_u:1829: vaidya sarvasya lokasya vande 'hamapi tvāṃ vibho // Lal_7.55 //
XXbsu022_u:1830: iti hi bhikṣavo rājā śuddhodano 'sitaṃ maharṣi sārdhaṃ naradattena
XXbsu022_u:1833: atha khalvasito maharṣistata evarddhyā vihāyasā prākramat, yena svāśramastenopāsaṃkrāmat
XXbsu022_u:1834: atha khalu dvayaṃ saṃkramya tatra khalvasito maharṣirnaradattaṃ māṇavakametadavocat - yadā tvaṃ naradatta śṛṇuyā buddho loke utpanna iti,
XXbsu022_u:1835: tadā tva gatvā tasya śāsane pravrajeḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1838: dṛṣṭvā devagaṇānnabhastalagatān buddhaśravodgāriṇo devarṣīrasito 'drikandaragataḥ prītiṃ parāṃ prāptavān /
XXbsu022_u:1839: buddho nāma padaṃ kimetadiha bho harṣāvahaṃ prāṇināṃ prahlāda mama kāya eti sukhitaṃ śāntaṃ ca cittaṃ param // Lal_7.56 //
XXbsu022_u:1840: kiṃ devo tvasuro 'thavāpi sa bhaved garuḍo 'thavā kinnaraḥ buddho nāma kimetadaśrutapadaṃ prītikaraṃ modanam /
XXbsu022_u:1841: divyā cakṣuṣa prekṣate daśa diśaḥ śailān mahīṃ sāgarān bhūyaḥ paśyati cādbhutaṃ bahuvidhaṃ bhūmau girau sāgare // Lal_7.57 //
XXbsu022_u:1842: ābheyaṃ pravirājate surucirā prahlādayantī tanuṃ jātāścaiva yathā hi śailaśikhare snigdhāḥ pravālāṅkurāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1843: vṛkṣāścaiva yathā supuṣpabharitā nānāphalairmaṇḍitāḥ suvyaktaṃ tribhave bhaviṣyati laghu ratnodbhavaḥ śobhanaḥ // Lal_7.58 //
XXbsu022_u:1844: bhūmirbhāti yathā ca pāṇisadṛśā sarvā samā nirmalā devāścaiva yathā prahṛṣṭamanasaḥ khe bhrāmayantyambarān
XXbsu022_u:1848: yadvacchānta apāya duḥkhavigatāḥ sattvāśca saukhyānvitāḥ yadvaddevagaṇā nabhastalagatā gacchanti harṣānvitāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1849: yatha ca snigdharavaṃ manojña śṛṇuyā divyāna saṃgītināṃ ratanasyā iva prādurbhāvu tribhave yasyā nimittā ime // Lal_7.60 //
XXbsu022_u:1850: asitaḥ prekṣati jambusāhvayamidaṃ divyena vai cakṣuṣā so 'drākṣīt kapilāhvaye puravare śuddhodanasyālaye
XXbsu022_u:1851: jāto lakṣaṇapuṇyatejabharito nārāyaṇasthāmavān dṛṣṭvā cāttamanā udagramanasaḥ sthāmāsya saṃvardhitaḥ udyuktastvarito 'tivismitamanā cāsau svaśiṣyānvitaḥ āgatvā kapilāhvayaṃ puravaraṃ dvāri sthito bhūpateḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1852: anubaddhā bahuprāṇikoṭinayutā dṛṣṭvā ṛṣirjīrṇakaḥ avacī sārathi rājña vedaya laghuṃ dvāre ṛṣistiṣṭhati // Lal_7.62 //
XXbsu022_u:1853: śrutvā cāśu praviśya rājabhavanaṃ rājñastamākhyātavān dvāre deva tapasvi tiṣṭhati mahān jīrṇo ṛṣirjarjaraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1854: so cāpī abhinandate ṛṣivaraḥ prāveṣṭu rājño gṛhaṃ ājñā dīyatu tāva pārthivavarā demi praveśaṃ tesā // Lal_7.63 //
XXbsu022_u:1855: sthāpyā cāsanamasya cāha nṛpatiḥ gaccha praveśaṃ dada asitaḥ sārathivākya śrutva muditaḥ prītyā sukhenānvitaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1856: śītaṃ vāri yathābhikāṅkṣi tṛṣito bhuktvādito cāśanaṃ tadvatsukhyabhinandito ṛṣivaraḥ taṃ draṣṭu sattvottamam // Lal_7.64 //
XXbsu022_u:1857: jaya bhoḥ pārthiva ityuvāca mudito cāyuṃ ciraṃ pālaya vṛddhiṃ kṛtva niṣaṇṇa dāntamanasaḥ śāntendriyaḥ sūrataḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1858: rājā vai abhivādya taṃ sunibhṛtaṃ provāca kiṃ kāraṇaṃ āgāmastava pārthivendra nilaye tad brūhi śīghraṃ mune // Lal_7.65 //
XXbsu022_u:1859: putraste vararūpa pāramigato jāto mahātejavān dvātriṃśadvaralakṣaṇaiḥ kavacito nārāyaṇasthāmavān
XXbsu022_u:1860: taṃ draṣṭuṃ hi mamepsitaṃ narapate sarvārthasiddhaṃ śiśum ityarthaṃ samupāgato 'smi nṛpate nāstyanyakāryaṃ mama // Lal_7.66 //
XXbsu022_u:1862: sādhu svāgatu yācase kilamitaḥ prīto 'smi te darśanāt eṣo 'sau śayitaḥ kumāra varado draṣṭuṃ na śakyo 'dhunā /
XXbsu022_u:1863: sādhū tāva mūhūrtamāgama ihā yad drakṣyase nirmalaṃ candraṃ vā yatha pūrṇamāsi vimalaṃ tārāgaṇairmaṇḍitam yada cāsau pratibuddha sārathivaraḥ paripūrṇacandraprabhaḥ tada rājā pratigṛhya vahnivapuṣaṃ sūryātirekaprabham /
XXbsu022_u:1864: hantā paśya ṛṣe nṛdevamahitaṃ hemāgrabimbopamam asito dṛṣṭva ca tasya tau sucaraṇau cakrāṅkitau śobhanau // Lal_7.68 //
XXbsu022_u:1865: pratyutthāya tataḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭo caraṇāni so vandate aṅke gṛhya mahātmaśāstrakuśalo nidhyāyato prekṣate /
XXbsu022_u:1866: so 'paśyadvaralakṣaṇaiḥ kavacitaṃ nārāyaṇasthāmavaṃ śīrṣaṃ kampya sa vedaśāstrakuśalo dve tasya paśyadgatī // Lal_7.69 //
XXbsu022_u:1867: rājā vā bhavi cakravarti balavān buddho va lokottamaḥ bāṣpaṃ tyakta sudīnakāyamanaso gambhīra niśvasya ca /
XXbsu022_u:1868: udvignaśca babhūva pārthivavaraḥ kiṃ brāhmaṇo roditī mā vighnaṃ khalu paśyate 'yamasitaḥ sarvārthasiddhasya me // Lal_7.70 //
XXbsu022_u:1869: bhūtaṃ vyāhara kiṃ tu rodiṣi ṛṣe śreyo 'tha kiṃ pāpakaṃ pāpaṃ nāsti na cāntarāyamiha bhoḥ sarvārthasiddhasya te /
XXbsu022_u:1870: ātmānaṃ bahu śocamī narapate jīrṇo 'smi yajjarjaraḥ yadayaṃ bheṣyati buddha lokamahito dharmaṃ yadā vakṣyate // Lal_7.71 //
XXbsu022_u:1871: na drakṣe ahu labdhaprītimanaso ityartha rodāmyahaṃ yasyā kāyi bhavanti lakṣaṇavarā dvātriṃśati nirmalā /
XXbsu022_u:1872: dve tasyā gatayo na anya tṛtiyā jānīṣva evaṃ nṛpa rājā vā bhavi cakravarti balavān buddho 'tha lokottamaḥ // Lal_7.72 //
XXbsu022_u:1873: nāyaṃ kāmaguṇebhirarthiku punaḥ buddho ayaṃ bheṣyati śrutvā vyākaraṇaṃ ṛṣeḥ sa nṛpatiḥ prītiṃ sukhaṃ labdhavān /
XXbsu022_u:1874: pratyutthāya tataḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭo caraṇāvasau vandate devaistvaṃ svabhipūjitaḥ subalavān ṛṣibhiśca saṃvarṇitaḥ // Lal_7.73 //
XXbsu022_u:1875: vande tvāṃ varasārthavāha tribhave sarve jage pūjitaṃ asitaḥ prāha ca bhāgineya muditaḥ saṃśrūyatāṃ bhāṣato /
XXbsu022_u:1877: buddhā bodhi yadā śṛṇoṣi jagato varteti cakraṃ hyayaṃ śīghraṃ pravraja śāsane 'sya munaye tatprāpsyase nirvṛtim // Lal_7.74 //
XXbsu022_u:1878: vanditvā caraṇau hyasau munivaraḥ kṛtvā ca prādakṣiṇaṃ lābhā te nṛpate sulabdha vipulā yasyedṛśaste sutaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1879: eṣo loka sadevakaṃ samanujaṃ dharmeṇa tarpeṣyati niṣkrāmaṃ kapilāhvayādṛṣivaro 'raṇye sthitaḥ svāśrame // Lal_7.75 //
XXbsu022_u:1881: iti hi bhikṣavo jātamātrasya bodhisattvasya maheśvaro devaputraḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikān devaputrānāmantryaivamāha - yo 'sau mārṣā asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrasukṛtakarmadānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñopāyaśratacaraṇavratatapaḥsucaritacaraṇaḥ mahāmaitrīmahākaruṇāmahāmuditāsamanvāgataḥ upekṣāsamudgatacittaḥ sarvasattvahitasukhodyataḥ dṛḍhavīryakavacasusaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ pūrvajinakṛtakuśalamūloditaḥ śatapuṇyalakṣaṇasamalaṃkṛtaḥ sukṛtaniścayaparākramaḥ paracakrapramathanaḥ suvimalaśuddhāśayasaṃpannaḥ
XXbsu022_u:1882: sucaritacaraṇo mahājñānaketudhvajaḥ mārabalāntakaraṇaḥ trisāhasramahāsāhasrasārthavāhaḥ devamanuṣyapūjitamahāyajñayaṣṭaḥ susamṛddhapuṇyanicayaniḥsaraṇābhiprāyo jātijarāmaraṇāntakaraḥ sujātajātaḥ ikṣvākurājakulasaṃbhūto jagadvibodhayitā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manuṣyaloka upapannaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1884: hanta gacchāmastamabhivandituṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitumabhistotumanyeṣāṃ ca mānābhibhūtānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ mānamadadarpacchedanārtham /
XXbsu022_u:1887: tatteṣāṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātramarthāya hitāya sukhāya yāvadamṛtādhigamāya /
XXbsu022_u:1889: tattvavyākaraṇena ca bodhisattvaṃ vyākṛtya punarapyāgamiṣyāma iti //
XXbsu022_u:1890: atha khalu maheśvaro devaputro dvādaśabhirdevaputraśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ sarvakapilavastumahānagaramavabhāsena sphurayitvā yena rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:1891: upasaṃkramya dauvārike nivedya rājñābhyanujñāto rājakulaṃ praviśya bodhisattvasya pādau śirasābhivandyaikāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvāṃ anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bodhisattvamaṅke samāropya rājānaṃ śuddhodanamāśvāsayati sma - tuṣṭo mahārāja bhava paramaprītaśca /
XXbsu022_u:1892: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? yathā mahārāja bodhisattvasya lakṣaṇairanuvyañjanaiśca kāyaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ, yathā ca kumāro 'bhibhavati sadevamānuṣāsuralokaṃ varṇena tejasā ca yaśasā lakṣmyā ca, niḥsaṃśayaṃ mahārāja bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ
XXbsu022_u:1894: iti hi bhikṣavo maheśvaro devaputraḥ sārdhaṃ śuddhāvāsakāyikairdevaputrairbodhisattvasya mahatpūjopasthānaṃ kṛtvā bodhisattvaṃ tattvavyākaraṇena vyākṛtya punarapi svabhavanaṃ prākrāmat //
XXbsu022_u:1897: jātasya tasya guṇasāgarasāgarasya jñātvā sureśvaramarud bruvate udagraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1898: yasyā sudurlabhaśravo bahukalpakoṭyā hantetha taṃ vrajama pūjayituṃ munīndram // Lal_7.76
XXbsu022_u:1900: kapilāhvayaṃ puravaraṃ samupetya śīghraṃ dvāri sthitā narapateḥ suvilambacūḍāḥ // Lal_7.77
XXbsu022_u:1901: te dvārapālamavadan sumanojñaghoṣāḥ prativedayasva nṛpate bhavanaṃ praviśya /
XXbsu022_u:1902: dauvāriko vacana śrutva gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ prahvaḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭo nṛpatiṃ babhāṣe // Lal_7.78
XXbsu022_u:1903: jaya deva nityamanupālaya dīrghamāyuḥ dvāre sthitā vipulapuṇyaviśuddhabhāsaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1905: chāyāṃ na teṣa nṛpate kvacidapyapaśyan śabdaṃ na caiva caraṇotkṣipaṇe śṛṇomi /
XXbsu022_u:1906: na ca medinīṃ vicarato rajamutkṣipanti tṛptiṃ na yānti ca janāḥ samudīkṣatāṃ vai // Lal_7.80
XXbsu022_u:1907: kāyaprabhā suvipulā ca vibhāti teṣāṃ vācā manojña yatha nāsti ha mānuṣāṇām /
XXbsu022_u:1908: gambhiraślakṣṇasuśilā ca suākarā ca śaṅkā hi me suragaṇā na hi te manuṣyāḥ
XXbsu022_u:1910: niḥsaṃśayaṃ nṛpati draṣṭu kumāramete devādhideva marutāgata pūjanārtham //
XXbsu022_u:1912: rājā niśāmya vacanaṃ paramaṃ udagro gacchā bhaṇāhi praviśantu gṛhaṃ bhavantaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1913: na hi mānuṣāṇa iyamīdṛśa ṛddhi kāci yatha bhāṣase ca guṇa teṣa yathā ca iryā // Lal_7.83 //
XXbsu022_u:1914: dauvārikaḥ kṛtapuṭo marutaivamāha praviśī bhavanta anujñātu narādhipena /
XXbsu022_u:1915: te hṛṣṭatuṣṭamanaso varamālyahastā gehaṃ praviṣṭa nṛpateramarālayaṃ vā //
XXbsu022_u:1916: dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ suravarāṃ praviśanta gehaṃ pratyutthito nṛpatirañjali saṃpragṛhya /
XXbsu022_u:1917: saṃvidyayanta ima āsana ratnapādā atrā niṣīdata bhavannanukampya buddhyā // Lal_7.85 //
XXbsu022_u:1918: te mānadarpavigatā sthita āsaneṣu yasyārthi āgata ihā nṛpate śṛṇuṣva /
XXbsu022_u:1920: asmo vidhijña varalakṣaṇalakṣaṇajñā yeṣāṃ tathā bhavati yā gati yaḥ prayogaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:1921: tatsādhu pārthivavara prajahasva khedaṃ paśyāma lakṣaṇavicitravibhūṣitāṅgam // Lal_7.87 //
XXbsu022_u:1922: sa strīgaṇaiḥ parivṛto nṛpatiḥ prahṛṣṭo gṛhya kumāramasamaṃ jvalanārcivarṇam /
XXbsu022_u:1923: upanāmayan suravarāṃ suvilambacūḍāṃ dvārāttu niṣkramatu kampita trisahasrāḥ // Lal_7.88 //
XXbsu022_u:1924: dṛṣṭvaiva te suravarā krama nāyakasya tāmrā nakhāṃ vimalapatraviśuddhatejā /
XXbsu022_u:1925: te utthitā tvarita rūpavilambacūḍā mūrdhnābhivandiṣu kramāṃ vimalaprabhasya // Lal_7.89 //
XXbsu022_u:1926: yatha lakṣaṇā yatha ca darśita lakṣitā ca yatha puṇyateji śiri mūrdha vilokitaṃ ca /
XXbsu022_u:1928: yatha irya netra vimalāprabha ūrṇakośā niḥsaṃśayaṃ spṛśati bodhi vijitya māram // Lal_7.90
XXbsu022_u:1929: te taṃ stuvanti guṇabhūta yathārthadarśī dhyāyī guṇāṃ vigatakleśatamonudasya /
XXbsu022_u:1932: tvaṃ dharmamegha trisahasra spharitva dhīrā amṛtodakena praśameṣyasi kleśatāpam // Lal_7.92
XXbsu022_u:1933: tvaṃ maitravākya karuṇānvita ślakṣṇavākya brahmasvarāracitaghoṣa manojñavāṇi /
XXbsu022_u:1934: trisahasra ājñaparivijñapanī jagasya kṣipraṃ pramuñca bhagavan mahabuddhaghoṣam // Lal_7.93
XXbsu022_u:1935: bhagnā kutīrthikagaṇā viparītadṛṣṭiḥ bhavarāgabandhananimagna sthitā bhavāgre /
XXbsu022_u:1936: hetu pratītya bhava śūnya śruṇitva dharmā siṃhasya kroṣṭukagaṇaiva palāyināste // Lal_7.94
XXbsu022_u:1937: bhittvā avidyapaṭalaṃ mahakleśadhūmaṃ paryutthitā janataye niyataprakāśe /
XXbsu022_u:1938: jñānārciprajñaprabhavidyuvilokitena sarvaṃ jage vidhamaye mahadandhakāram // Lal_7.95 //

XXbsu022_u:2198: ayaṃ taṃ prāpsyate dharmaṃ yajjagattārayiṣyati // Lal_11.7 //
XXbsu022_u:2201: ayaṃ taṃ prāpsyate dharmaṃ yajjaganmocayiṣyati // Lal_11.8 //
XXbsu022_u:2204: ayaṃ taṃ prāpsyate dharmaṃ jātimṛtyupramocakam // Lal_11.9 //
XXbsu022_u:2206: atha khalu te ṛṣayo bodhisattvamābhirgāthābhirabhistutvā tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya vihāyasā prakrāntāḥ
XXbsu022_u:2207: rājāpi śuddhodano bodhisattvamapaśyan bodhisattvena vinā na ramate sma /
XXbsu022_u:2208: so 'vocat - kumāraḥ kva gataḥ? nainaṃ paśyāmīti /
XXbsu022_u:2210: tato 'nyatama amātyo bodhisattvaṃ paśyati sma jambucchāyāyāṃ paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇaṃ dhyāyantam /
XXbsu022_u:2211: sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ ca tasmin samaye chāyā parivṛttābhūt /
XXbsu022_u:2212: jambucchāyā ca bodhisattvasya kāyaṃ na vijahāti sma /
XXbsu022_u:2213: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ tvaramāṇarūpo rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramya gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣata -
XXbsu022_u:2215: yathā śakro 'thavā brahmā śriyā tejena śobhate // Lal_11.10 //
XXbsu022_u:2217: sainaṃ na jahate chāyā dhyāyantaṃ purūṣottamam // Lal_11.11 //
XXbsu022_u:2218: atha rājā śuddhodano yena sa jambuvṛkṣastenopasaṃkrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:2222: hutāśano vā girimūrdhni saṃsthitaḥ śaśīva nakṣatragaṇānucīrṇaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2223: vepanti gātrāṇi mi paśyato imaṃ dhyāyantu tejo nu pradīpakalpam //
XXbsu022_u:2225: yadā cāsi mune jāto yadā dhyāyasi cārciman /
XXbsu022_u:2226: ekadvirapi te nātha pādau vande vināyaka // Lal_11.13 //
XXbsu022_u:2227: tatra triphalavāhakā dārakāḥ śabdaṃ kurvanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:2228: tānamātyā evamāhuḥ - mā śabdaṃ mā śabdaṃ kārṣṭeti /
XXbsu022_u:2232: dhyāyantaṃ girinicalaṃ narendraputraṃ siddhārthaṃ na jahati saiva vṛkṣachāyā // Lal_11.14
XXbsu022_u:2234: grīṣme vasanta samudāgata jeṣṭhamāse saṃpuṣpite kusumapallavasaṃprakīrṇe /
XXbsu022_u:2237: chando 'bhyuvāca parivāritu dārikebhiḥ hantā kumāra vani gacchama
XXbsu022_u:2239: kiṃ te gṛhe nivasato hi yathā dvijasya hanta vrajāma vaya codananārisaṃgham // Lal_11.16 //
XXbsu022_u:2240: madhyāhnakālasamaye suviśuddhasattvaḥ pañcāśataiḥ parivṛtaiḥ saha ceṭakebhiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2241: na ca mātu naiva ca pituḥ prativedayitvā so 'buddha niṣkrāmiti gacchi kṛṣāṇagrāmam // Lal_11.17
XXbsu022_u:2243: dṛṣṭvā kumāra pratibuddha dukhena cotto dhiksaṃskṛteti bahuduḥkha kṛṣī karoti // Lal_11.18
XXbsu022_u:2244: so jambuchāyamupagamya vinītacitto tṛṇakāni gṛhya svaya saṃstaru saṃstaritvā /
XXbsu022_u:2245: paryaṅkamābhujiya ujju karitva kāyaṃ catvāri dhyāna śubha dhyāyi sa bodhisattvaḥ // Lal_11.19
XXbsu022_u:2246: pañcā ṛṣī khagapathena hi gacchamānā jambūya mūrdhni na prabhonti parākrametum /
XXbsu022_u:2247: te visthitā nihatamānamadāśca bhūtvā sarve samagrasahitā samudīkṣayanto //
XXbsu022_u:2248: vaya meruparvatavaraṃ tatha cakravālān nirbhidya gacchama javena asajjamānāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2249: te jambuvṛkṣa na prabhoma atikrametuṃ ko nvatra heturayamadya bhaviṣyatīha
XXbsu022_u:2250: avatīrya medinitale ca pratiṣṭhihitvā paśyanti śākyatanayaṃ tahi jambumūle /
XXbsu022_u:2251: jambunadārcisadṛśaṃ prabhatejaraśmiṃ paryaṅkabandhu tada dhyāyatu bodhisattvam // Lal_11.22
XXbsu022_u:2253: te vismitā daśanakhā kariyāna mūrdhni praṇatā kṛtāñjalipuṭā nipatan krameṣu /
XXbsu022_u:2254: sādho sujāta sumukhaṃ karuṇā jagasya śīghraṃ vibuddha amṛte vinayasva sattvān // Lal_11.23
XXbsu022_u:2255: parivṛtta sūrya na jahī sugatasya chāyā olambate drumavaraṃ yatha padmapatram /
XXbsu022_u:2256: devā sahasra bahavaḥ sthita añjalībhiḥ vandanti tasya caraṇau kṛtaniścayasya // Lal_11.24
XXbsu022_u:2257: śuddhodanaśca svagṛhe parimārgamāṇaḥ saṃpṛcchate kva nu gataḥ sa hi me kumāraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2258: mātṛsvasā avaci mārgata no labhāmi saṃpṛcchatā narapate kva gataḥ kumāraḥ
XXbsu022_u:2259: śuddhodanastvaritu pṛcchati kāñcukīyaṃ dauvārikaṃ tathapi cāntajanaṃ samantāt /
XXbsu022_u:2260: dṛṣṭaṃ kumāra mama kenaci niṣkramanto śṛṇute varūpagatu deva kṛṣāṇagrāmam
XXbsu022_u:2261: so śīghrameva tvaritaṃ saha śākiyebhiḥ niṣkrāntu prekṣi kṛṣigrāmagiriṃ praviṣṭam /
XXbsu022_u:2262: yatha sūryakoṭiniyutāni samudgatāni tatha prekṣate hitakaraṃ śiriyā jvalantam // Lal_11.27
XXbsu022_u:2263: mukuṭaṃ ca khaṅga tatha pāduka chorayitvā kṛtvā daśāṅguli śire abhivandite tam /
XXbsu022_u:2264: sādhū subhūtavacanā ṛṣayo mahātmā vyaktaṃ kumāra abhiniṣkrami bodhihetoḥ // Lal_11.28 //
XXbsu022_u:2265: paripūrṇa dvādaśaśatā suprasannadevāḥ paccāśatā upagatā yatha śākiyānām /
XXbsu022_u:2266: dṛṣṭvā ca ṛddhi sugate guṇasāgarasya saṃbodhicittu janayaṃ dṛḍhaāśayena //
XXbsu022_u:2268: so kampayitva trisahasra aśeṣabhūmiṃ smṛtu saṃprajānu pratibuddha tataḥ samādheḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2269: brahmasvaraḥ pitaramālapate dyutīmān utsṛjya tāta kṛṣigrāmabhato gaveṣa //
XXbsu022_u:2270: yadi svarṇakāryu ahu svarṇa pravarṣayiṣye yadi vastrakāryu ahameva pradāsyi vastrāṃ /
XXbsu022_u:2271: atha dhānyakāryu ahameva pravarṣayiṣye samyakprayukta bhava sarvajage narendra // Lal_11.31
XXbsu022_u:2272: anuśāsayitva pitaraṃ janapāriṣadyāṃ tasmin kṣaṇe puravaraṃ puna so pravekṣī /
XXbsu022_u:2273: anuvartamāna jagataḥ sthihate puresmiṃ naiṣmkramyayuktamanasaḥ suviśuddhasattvaḥ // Lal_11.32
XXbsu022_u:2279: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saṃvṛddhe kumāre rājā śuddhodano 'pareṇa samayena śākyagaṇena sārdhaṃ saṃsthāgāre niṣaṇṇo 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:2280: tatra te mahallakamahallakāḥ śākyā rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāhuḥ - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt
XXbsu022_u:2281: ayaṃ sarvārthasiddhakumāro naimittikairbrāhmaṇaiḥ kṛtaniścayaiśca devairyadbhūyasaivaṃ nirdiṣṭo yadi kumāro 'bhiniṣkramiṣyati, tathāgato bhaviṣyatyarhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2282: uta nābhiniṣkramiṣyati rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturaṅgo vijitavān dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2284: tadyathā - cakraratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam
XXbsu022_u:2286: saṃpūrṇaṃ cāsya putrasahasraṃ bhaviṣyati śūrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
XXbsu022_u:2292: tato rājā śuddhodana evamāha - yadyevaṃ tena hi vyavalokayata kamatā kanyā
XXbsu022_u:2295: ekaika evamāha - mama duhitā anurūpā syāt kumārasya /
XXbsu022_u:2300: tataśca te sarve saṃnipatya kumārasyaināṃ prakṛtimārocayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:2301: tān kumāra uvāca - saptame divase prativacanaṃ śroṣyatheti //
XXbsu022_u:2305: kāmaguṇi na me 'sti chandarāgo na ca ahu śobhami istrigāramadhye /
XXbsu022_u:2306: yannu ahu vane vaseya tūṣṇīṃ dhyānasamādhisukhena śāntacittaḥ // Lal_12.2
XXbsu022_u:2309: sa punarapi mīmāṃsopāyakauśalyamāmukhīkṛtya sattvaparipākamavekṣamāṇo mahākarūṇāṃ saṃjanayya tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
XXbsu022_u:2310: saṃkīrṇi paṅki padumāni vivṛddhimanti ākīrṇa rāja naramadhyi labhāti pūjām
XXbsu022_u:2311: yada bodhisattva parivārabalaṃ labhante tada sattvakoṭinayutānyamṛte vinenti // Lal_12.3 //
XXbsu022_u:2312: ye cāpi pūrvaka abhūdvidu bodhisattvāḥ sarvebhi bhārya suta darśita istrigārāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2313: na ca rāgarakta na ca dhyānasukhebhi bhraṣṭāḥ hantānuśikṣayi ahaṃ pi guṇeṣu teṣām // Lal_12.4
XXbsu022_u:2314: na ca prākṛtā mama vadhū anukūla yā syād yasyā na iṣyatu guṇā sada satyavākyam /
XXbsu022_u:2315: yā cinti mahyamabhirādhayate 'pramattā rūpeṇa janmakulagotratayā suśuddhā
XXbsu022_u:2316: so gāthalekha likhite guṇaarthayuktā yā kanya īdṛśa bhave mama tāṃ varethā /
XXbsu022_u:2317: na mamārthu prākṛtajanena asaṃvṛtena yasyā guṇā kathayamī mama tāṃ varethā
XXbsu022_u:2318: yā rūpayauvanavarā na ca rūpamattā mātā svasā va yatha vartati maitracittā /
XXbsu022_u:2319: tyāge ratā śramaṇabrāhmaṇadānaśīlā tāṃ tādṛśāṃ mama vadhūṃ varayasva tāta
XXbsu022_u:2320: yasyā na mānu na khilo na ca doṣamasti na ca śāṭhya īrṣya na ca māya na ujjubhraṣṭā /
XXbsu022_u:2321: svapnāntare 'pi purūṣe na pare 'bhiraktā tuṣṭā svakena patinā śayate
XXbsu022_u:2323: na ca garvitā na pi ca uddhata na pragalbhā nirmāna mānavigatāpi ca ceṭibhūtā /
XXbsu022_u:2325: na ca pānagṛddha na raseṣu na śabdagandhe nirlobhabhidhyavigatā svadhanena tuṣṭā // Lal_12.9
XXbsu022_u:2326: satye sthitā na pi ca cañcala naiva bhrāntā na ca uddhatonnatasthitā hirivastrachannā /
XXbsu022_u:2327: na ca dṛṣṭimaṅgalaratā sada dharmayuktā kāyena vāca manasā sada śuddhabhāvā // Lal_12.10 //
XXbsu022_u:2328: na ca styānamiddhabahulā na ca mānamūḍhā mīmāṃsayukta sukṛtā sada dharmacārī /
XXbsu022_u:2329: śvaśrau ca tasya śvaśure yatha śāstṛpremā dāsī kalatra jani yādṛśamātmaprema // Lal_12.11
XXbsu022_u:2330: śāstre vidhijña kuśalā gaṇikā yathaiva paścāt svapet prathamamutthihate ca śayyāta /
XXbsu022_u:2331: maitrānuvarti akuhāpi ca mātṛbhūtā etādṛśīṃ mi nṛpate vadhukāṃ vṛṇīṣva //
XXbsu022_u:2333: atha khalu bhikṣavo rājā śuddhodana imā gāthā vācayitvā purohitamāmantrayate sma - gaccha tvaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa kapilavastumahānagare
XXbsu022_u:2335: yasyā ete guṇāḥ saṃvidyante kṣatriyakanyāyā vā brāhmaṇakanyāyā vā vaiśyakanyāyā vā śūdrakanyāyā vā tāṃ kanyāmasmākaṃ prativedaya /
XXbsu022_u:2336: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi kumāraḥ kulārthiko na gotrārthikaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2339: brāhmaṇīṃ kṣatriyāṃ kanyāṃ veśyāṃ śūdrīṃ tathaiva ca /
XXbsu022_u:2340: yasyā ete guṇāḥ santi tāṃ me kanyāṃ pravedaya // Lal_12.13 //
XXbsu022_u:2341: na kulena na gotreṇa kumāro mama vismitaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2342: guṇe satye ca dharme ca tatrāsya ramate manaḥ // Lal_12.14 //
XXbsu022_u:2344: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa purohitastaṃ gāthālekhaṃ gṛhītvā kapilavastuni mahānagare gṛhādgṛhaṃ vyavalokayan gatvā hiṇḍan kanyāṃ paryeṣate sma /
XXbsu022_u:2346: so 'nupūrveṇa vicaran yena daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:2347: sa taṃ niveśanaṃ praviṣṭo 'drākṣīt kanyāmabhirūpāṃ prāsādikāṃ darśanīyāṃ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgatāṃ nātidīrghāṃ nātihrasvāṃ nātisthūlāṃ
XXbsu022_u:2348: nātikṛśāṃ nātigaurāṃ nātikṛṣṇāṃ prathamayauvanāvasthāṃ strīratnamiva khyāyamānām /
XXbsu022_u:2350: atha sā dārikā purohitasya caraṇau gṛhītvā evamāha - kena te mahābrāhmaṇa
XXbsu022_u:2354: teneti gātha likhitā guṇaye vadhūnāṃ yasyā guṇāsti hi ime sa hi tasya patnī // Lal_12.15 //
XXbsu022_u:2356: atha sā dārikā taṃ gāthālekhaṃ vācayitvā smitamupadarśya taṃ purohitaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣat -
XXbsu022_u:2357: mahyeti brāhmaṇa guṇā anurūpa sarve so me patirbhavatu saumya surūparūpaḥ
XXbsu022_u:2358: bhaṇahi kumāru yadi kārya ma hū vilamba mā hīnaprākṛtajanena bhaveya vāsaḥ // Lal_12.16
XXbsu022_u:2360: atha sa khalu purohito rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaiva tamarthamārocayati sma - dṛṣṭā mayā deva kanyā yā kumārasyānurūpā syāt /
XXbsu022_u:2361: āha - kasyāsau? āha - daṇḍapāṇerdeva śākyasya duhitā //
XXbsu022_u:2362: atha rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyaitadabhavat - durāsadaḥ kumāraḥ śubhādhimuktaśca
XXbsu022_u:2366: tatra yasyāṃ dārikāyāṃ kumārasya cakṣurabhiniveśyati, tāṃ kumārasya varayiṣyāmīti //
XXbsu022_u:2367: atha khalu rājā śuddhodano 'śokabhāṇḍāni kārayati sma suvarṇamayāni
XXbsu022_u:2369: kārayitvā ca kapilavastuni mahānagare ghaṇṭāghoṣaṇāṃ kārayāmāsa - saptame divase kumāro darśanaṃ
XXbsu022_u:2372: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saptame divase bodhisattvaḥ saṃsthāgāramupasaṃkramya bhadrāsane nyaṣīdat
XXbsu022_u:2374: yasyāṃ dārikāyāṃ kumārasya cakṣuḥ saṃniviśet, tāṃ mamārocayadhvamiti //
XXbsu022_u:2375: iti hi bhikṣavo yāvantyaḥ kapilavastuni mahānagare dārikāstāḥ sarvā yena saṃsthāgāro yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāman bodhisattvasya darśanāya aśokabhāṇḍakāni ca pratigṛhītum //
XXbsu022_u:2377: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathāgatābhyastābhyo dārikābhyo
XXbsu022_u:2379: tāśca dārikā na śaknuvanti sma bodhisattvasya śriyaṃ tejaśca soḍhum /
XXbsu022_u:2380: tā aśokabhāṇḍakāni gṛhītvā śīghraṃ śīghrameva prakrāmanti sma //
XXbsu022_u:2381: atha daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā, sā dāsīgaṇaparivṛtā puraskṛtā yena saṃsthāgāro yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:2383: / tadyadā bodhisattvena sarvāṇyaśokabhāṇḍāni dattāni, tadā sā bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya prahasitavadanā bodhisattvamevamāha - kumāra kiṃ te mayāpanītaṃ yastvaṃ māṃ vimānayasi?
XXbsu022_u:2384: āha - nāhaṃ tvāṃ vimānayāmi, api tu khalu punastvamabhipaścādāgateti /
XXbsu022_u:2386: sā prāha - idamahaṃ kumāra tavāntikādarhāmi? āha - imāni
XXbsu022_u:2388: sā āha - na vayaṃ kumāraṃ vyalaṃkariṣyāmaḥ?
XXbsu022_u:2391: tatastairguhyapuruṣai rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaiṣa vṛttānto nivedito 'bhūt - deva daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā, tasyāṃ kumārasya cakṣurniviṣṭam, muhūrtaṃ ca tayoḥ saṃlāpo 'bhūt //
XXbsu022_u:2392: ityetatkhalu vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā śuddhodano daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya purohitaṃ dautyena preṣayati sma - yā te duhitā, sā mama kumārasya pradīyatāmiti //
XXbsu022_u:2394: asmākaṃ cāyaṃ kuladharmaḥ śilpajñasya kanyā dātavyā nāśilpajñasyeti /
XXbsu022_u:2398: tato rājña etadabhavat - dvirapīdamahaṃ sahadharmeṇa coditaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2399: yadāpi mayoktaṃ kasmācchākyakumārāḥ kumārasyopasthānāya nāgacchantīti tadāpyahamabhihitaḥ - kiṃ vayaṃ maṇḍakasyopasthānaṃ kariṣyāma iti /
XXbsu022_u:2404: rājā āha - alaṃ te kumāra anena /
XXbsu022_u:2406: yāvattrirapi bodhisattvo rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ paripṛcchati sma //
XXbsu022_u:2408: tato rājā śuddhodano bodhisattvāya tāṃ prakṛtimārocayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:2409: tāṃ śrutvā bodhisattva āha - deva asti punariha nagare kaścidyo mayā sārdhaṃ samarthaḥ śilpena
XXbsu022_u:2410: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ prahasitavadano bodhisattvamevamāha - śakyasi punastvaṃ putra śilpamupadarśayitum? sa āha - bāḍhaṃ śakyāmi deva /
XXbsu022_u:2411: tena hi saṃnipātyantāṃ sarvaśilpajñāḥ, yeṣāṃ purataḥ svaṃ śilpamupadarśayiṣyāmi
XXbsu022_u:2412: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ kapilavastuni mahānagaravare ghaṇṭāghoṣaṇāṃ kārayati sma - saptame divase kumāraḥ svaṃ śilpamupadarśayati /
XXbsu022_u:2414: tatra saptame divase pañcamātrāṇi śākyakumāraśatāni saṃnipatitānyabhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:2415: daṇḍapāṇeśca śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā jayapatākā sthāpitābhūt - yo vā atra asidhanuṣkalāpayuddhasālambheṣu jeṣyati, tasyaiṣā bhaviṣyatīti //
XXbsu022_u:2416: tatra sarvapurato devadattaḥ kumāro nagarādabhiniṣkrāmati sma /
XXbsu022_u:2417: śvetaśca hastī mahāpramāṇo bodhisattvasyārthe nagaraṃ praveśyate sma /
XXbsu022_u:2418: tatra devadattaḥ kumāra īrṣyayā ca śākyabalamadena ca mattaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2419: sa taṃ hastināgaṃ vāmena pāṇinā śuṇḍāyāṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena pāṇinā capeṭayā ekaprahāreṇaiva hato 'bhūt //
XXbsu022_u:2423: dṛṣṭvā ca paryapṛcchat - kenāyaṃ hata iti /
XXbsu022_u:2426: sa taṃ hastināgaṃ lāṅgūle gṛhītvā nagaradvārādapakarṣati sma //
XXbsu022_u:2429: dṛṣṭvā ca paryapṛcchat - kenāyaṃ hata iti /
XXbsu022_u:2439: tataḥ kumāro rathasya evaikaṃ pādaṃ bhūmau prasārya pādāṅguṣṭhena taṃ hastināgaṃ lāṅgūle gṛhitvā sapta prākārān sapta ca parikhānatikramya bahirnagarasya krośamātre prakṣipati sma /
XXbsu022_u:2440: yatra va pradeśe sa hastī patitastasmin pradeśe mahadbilaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ yatsāṃprataṃ hastigartetyabhidhīyate
XXbsu022_u:2446: sapta purāparikhā atikramya kṣiptu bahiḥ svapurātu ayaṃ hi // Lal_12.17 //
XXbsu022_u:2449: saṃsārapurātu bahirdhā eka kṣapiṣyati prajñabalena // Lal_12.18 //
XXbsu022_u:2450: iti hi pañcamātrāṇi śākyakumāraśatāni nagarānniṣkamya yenānyatamaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo yatra śākyakumārāḥ śilpamupadarśayanti sma tenopasaṃkrāman
XXbsu022_u:2451: / rājāpi śuddhodano mahallakamahallakāśca śākyā mahāṃśca janakāyo yenāsau pṛthivīpradeśastenopasaṃkrāman bodhisattvasya cānyeṣāṃ ca śākyakumārāṇāṃ
XXbsu022_u:2453: tatra ādita eva ye śākyakumārā lipyāṃ paṭuvidhijñāste bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ lipiṃ viśeṣayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:2454: tatra taiḥ śākyairviśvāmitra ācāryaḥ sākṣī sthāpito 'bhūt - sa tvaṃ vyavalokaya katamo 'tra kumāro lipijñāne viśiṣyate yadi vā lekhyato yadi vā bahulipiniryāṇataḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2455: atha viśvāmitra ācāryaḥ pratyakṣo bodhisattvasya lipijñāne smitamupadarśayannime gāthe
XXbsu022_u:2458: yāvanti kecillipi sarvaloke tatraiṣa pāraṃgatu śuddhasattvaḥ // Lal_12.19
XXbsu022_u:2459: nāmāpi yūyaṃ ca ahaṃ ca teṣāṃ lipīna jānāma na cākṣarāṇām /
XXbsu022_u:2460: yānyeṣa jānāti manuṣyacandro ahamatra pratyakṣu vijeṣyate 'yam //
XXbsu022_u:2463: tatrārjuno nāma śākyagaṇako mahāmātraḥ saṃkhyāgaṇanāsu pāraṃgataḥ, sa sākṣī sthāpito 'bhūt - sa tvaṃ vyavalokaya
XXbsu022_u:2465: tatra bodhisattvaścoddiśati sma, ekaśca śākyakumāro nikṣipati sma, na ca pariprāpayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:2466: bodhisattvasyaika dvau trayaścatvāraḥ pañcadaśa viṃśattriṃśaccatvāriṃśatpañcāśacchataṃ yāvatpañcāpi śākyakumāraśatāni yugapatkāle nikṣipanti sma, na ca pariprāpayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:2467: tato bodhisattva āha - uddiśata yūyam, ahaṃ nikṣepsyāmīti /
XXbsu022_u:2468: tatraikaśākyakumāro bodhisattvasyoddiśati sma, na ca pariprāpayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:2470: pañcāpi daśāpi viṃśatyapi triṃśadapi catvāriṃśadapi pañcāśadapi yāvatpañcāpi śākyakumāraśatāni yugapaduddiśanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:2471: na ca pariprāpayanti sma bodhisattvasya nikṣipataḥ //
XXbsu022_u:2482: īdṛśī ca iyaṃ prajñā buddhirjñānaṃ smṛtirmatiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2483: adyāpi śikṣate cāyaṃ gaṇitaṃ jñānasāgaraḥ // Lal_12.22 //
XXbsu022_u:2485: ekakaṇṭhāścemāṃ vācamabhāṣanta - jayati jayati bhoḥ sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2486: sarve cāsanebhya utthāya kṛtāñjalipuṭā bhūtvā bodhisattvaṃ namaskṛtya rājānaṃ śuddhodanametadavocan - lābhāste mahārāja paramasulabdhāḥ, yasya te putra evaṃ śīghralaghujavacapalaparipṛcchāpratibhāna iti //
XXbsu022_u:2487: atha sa rājā śuddhodano bodhisattvamevamāha - śakyasi putra arjunena
XXbsu022_u:2490: athārjuno gaṇakamahāmātro bodhisattvamevamāha - jānīṣe tvaṃ kumāra koṭiśatottarāṃ nāma gaṇanāgatim? bodhisattva āha - śakyāmi deva /
XXbsu022_u:2493: gaṇanāgatiranupraveṣṭavyā? bodhisattva āha - śataṃ koṭīnāmayutaṃ nāmocyate
XXbsu022_u:2516: iti hi tallakṣaṇagaṇanayā sumerūparvatarājo lakṣanikṣepakriyayā parikṣayaṃ gacchet /
XXbsu022_u:2517: ato 'pyuttari dhvajāgravatī nāma gaṇanā, yasyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lakṣanikṣepakriyayā parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2525: ato 'pyuttari sarvanikṣepā nāma gaṇanā, yasyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ daśa gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lakṣanikṣepakriyayā parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2526: ato 'pyuttari agrasārā nāma gaṇanā, yatra koṭīśataṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lakṣanikṣepāḥ parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2529: bodhimaṇḍavarāgragataṃ ca sarvaṃdharmābhiṣekābhimukhaṃ bodhisattvaṃ nānyaḥ kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate ya etāṃ gaṇanāṃ prajānāti anyatrāhaṃ vā yo vā syānmādṛśaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2548: tatra ko yuṣmākaṃ yojanapiṇḍaṃ prajānāti? kiyanti tāni paramāṇurajāṃsi bhavanti? arjuno 'vocat - ahameva tāvatkumāra saṃmohamāpannaḥ, kimaṅga punarye cānye 'lpabuddhayaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2549: nirdiśatu kumāro yojanapiṇḍaṃ kiyanti tāni paramāṇurajāṃsi bhavantīti /
XXbsu022_u:2551: - tatra yojanapiṇḍaḥ paramāṇurajasāṃ paripūrṇamakṣobhyanayutamekaṃ triṃśacca koṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭiśca koṭīśatāni dvātriṃśatiśca
XXbsu022_u:2552: koṭyaḥ pañca ca daśaśatasahasrāṇi dvādaśa ca sahasrāṇi etāvān yojanapiṇḍaḥ paramāṇurajonikṣepasya
XXbsu022_u:2557: anena praveśenemaṃ cāturdvīpakaṃ lokadhātūṃ pramukhaṃ kṛtvā paripūrṇakoṭīśataṃ cāturdvīpakānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ yatra koṭīśataṃ mahāsamudrāṇām, koṭīśataṃ
XXbsu022_u:2558: cakravālamahācakravālānām, koṭīśataṃ sumerūṇāṃ parvatarajānām, koṭīśataṃ caturmahārājikānāṃ devānām, koṭīśataṃ trayatriṃśānām, koṭīśataṃ yāmānām,
XXbsu022_u:2562: koṭīśataṃ parīttābhānām, koṭīśataṃ apramāṇābhānām, koṭīśataṃ ābhāsvarāṇām,
XXbsu022_u:2565: koṭīśataṃ bṛhatphalānām, kīṭīśataṃ asaṃjñisattvānām, koṭīśataṃ abṛhānām,
XXbsu022_u:2566: koṭīśataṃ atapānām , koṭīśataṃ sudṛśānām, koṭīśataṃ sudarśanānām,
XXbsu022_u:2570: yojanasahasrāṇi, yāvanti yojanakoṭayaḥ, yāvanti yojananayutāni ........peyālaṃ.............yāvadyāvanto yojanāgrasārā gaṇanāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2574: asmin khalu punargaṇanāparivarte bodhisattvena nirdiśyamāne arjuno gaṇakamahāmātraḥ sarvaśca śākyagaṇastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramudita āścaryādbhutaprāpto 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:2579: koṭīśataṃ ca ayutā nayutāstathaiva niyutānu kaṅkaragatī tatha bimbarāśca /
XXbsu022_u:2580: akṣobhiṇī paramajñānu na me 'styato 'rtha - mata uttare gaṇanamapratimasya
XXbsu022_u:2583: trisāhasri rajāśrayantakā tṛṇavana oṣadhiyo jalasya bindūn /
XXbsu022_u:2584: huṃkāreṇa nyaseya ekinaiṣo ko puni vismayu pañcabhiḥ śatebhiḥ // Lal_12.24
XXbsu022_u:2587: yāvanta sattva nikhilena triyadhvayuktāḥ cittāni caitasikasaṃjñi vitarkitāni /
XXbsu022_u:2588: hīnāḥ praṇīta tatha saṃkṣipavikṣipā ye ekasmi cittaparivarti prajāni sarvān // Lal_12.25 //
XXbsu022_u:2589: iti hi bhikṣavo 'bhibhūtāḥ sarve śākyakumārā abhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:2591: tadanantaraṃ laṅghite plavite javite sarvatra bodhisattva eva viśiṣyate sma /
XXbsu022_u:2594: atha kṛtulaghukāyacittanetā tasya javasya viśeṣatāṃ śṛṇotha // Lal_12.26
XXbsu022_u:2595: iha gṛhagata yuṣme paśyathā sattvasāram api ca daśasu dikṣū gacchate 'yaṃ
XXbsu022_u:2598: na ca puna gati āgatiṃ ca asyā yūyaṃ prajānatha tāvadṛddhiprāpto /
XXbsu022_u:2599: ko 'tra javiti vismayo janeyā asadṛśa eṣa karotha gauravo 'smin //
XXbsu022_u:2600: evaṃ kṛtvā bodhisattva eva viśiṣyate sma //
XXbsu022_u:2601: tatra śākyā āhuḥ - yuddheṣu tāvatkumāro viśeṣayitavyo jijñāsyaśca /
XXbsu022_u:2603: tāni ca pañcamātrāṇi śākyakumāraśatāni yugapadyudhyanti sma //
XXbsu022_u:2608: tau bodhisattvasya balaṃ tejaścāsahamānau dharaṇītale prapatitāvabhūtām /
XXbsu022_u:2609: tadanantaraṃ devadattaḥ kumāro garvitaśca mānī ca balavāneva tabdhaḥ śākyamānena ca tabdho bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ vispardhamānaḥ sarvāvantaṃ raṅgamaṇḍalaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vikrīḍamāno bodhisattvamabhipatati sma /
XXbsu022_u:2610: atha bodhisattvo 'saṃbhrānta evātvaran dakṣiṇena pāṇinā salīlaṃ devadattaṃ kumāraṃ gṛhītvā trirgaganatale parivartya mānanigrahārthamavihiṃsābuddhyā maitreṇa cittena dharaṇītale nikṣipati sma /
XXbsu022_u:2614: atha te sarve harṣitā bhūtvā bodhisattvamabhinipatitāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2615: te samanantaraspṛṣṭā bodhisattvena bodhisattvasya śriyaṃ tejaśca kāyabalaṃ sthāmaṃ cāsahamānāḥ spṛṣṭamātrā eva bodhisattvena dharaṇitale prāpatan /
XXbsu022_u:2618: yāvanta sattvanayutā daśasū diśāsu te duṣṭamallamahanagnasamā bhaveyuḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2619: ekakṣaṇena nipateyu nararṣabhasya saṃspṛṣṭamātra nipateyu kṣitītalesmiṃ //
XXbsu022_u:2620: merūḥ sumeru tatha vajrakacakravālāḥ ye cānya parvata kvaciddaśasū diśāsu
XXbsu022_u:2621: pāṇibhya gṛhya masicūrṇanibhāṃ prakuryāt ko vismayo manujaāśrayake asāre // Lal_12.30 //
XXbsu022_u:2622: eṣo drumendrapravare mahaduṣṭamallaṃ māraṃ sasainyasabalaṃ sahayaṃ dhvajāgre /
XXbsu022_u:2623: maitrībalena vinihatya hi kṛṣṇabandhuṃ yāvat spṛśiṣyati anuttarabodhi sāntam // Lal_12.31
XXbsu022_u:2625: evaṃ kṛtvā bodhisattva eva viśiṣyate sma //
XXbsu022_u:2626: atha daṇḍapāṇiḥ śākyakumārānetadavocat - jijñāsitamidaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ ca /
XXbsu022_u:2628: tatra ānandasya dvayoḥ krośayorayasmayī bherī lakṣaṃ sthāpitābhūt /
XXbsu022_u:2629: asyānantaraṃ devadattasya caturṣu krośeṣvayasmayī bherī sthāpitābhūt /
XXbsu022_u:2633: tasyānantaraṃ sapta tālā ayasmayī varāhapratimā yantrayuktā sthāpitābhūt /
XXbsu022_u:2636: devadattena catuḥkrośasthā bheryāhatābhūt, nottari śaknoti sma /
XXbsu022_u:2637: sundaranandena ṣaṭkrośasthā bheryāhatābhūt, nottari śaknoti sma /
XXbsu022_u:2638: daṇḍapāṇinā dviyojanasthā bheryāhatābhūt, nirviddhā ca nottari śaknoti sma /
XXbsu022_u:2639: tatra bodhisattvasya yadyadeva dhanurupānamyate sma, tattadeva vicchidyate sma /
XXbsu022_u:2640: tato bodhisattva āha - astīha deva nagare kiṃcidanyaddhanuryanmamāropaṇaṃ saheta kāyabalasthāmaṃ ca? rājā āha - asti putra /
XXbsu022_u:2642: taddeva? rājā āha - tava putra pitāmahaḥ siṃhahanurnāmābhūt, tasya yaddhanustadeva tarhi devakule gandhamālyairmahīyate /
XXbsu022_u:2643: na punastatkaścicchaknoti sma taddhanurāropayituṃ prāgeva pūrayitum /
XXbsu022_u:2647: tatra sarve śākyakumārāḥ parameṇāpi prayatnena vyāyacchamānā na śaknuvanti sma taddhanurāropayituṃ prāgeva pūravitum /
XXbsu022_u:2649: atha daṇḍapāṇiḥ śākyaḥ sarvaṃ kāyabalasthāma saṃjanayya taddhanurāropayitumārabdho 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:2652: tadbodhisattvo gṛhītvā āsanādanuttiṣṭhannevārdhaparyaṅkaṃ kṛtvā vāmena pāṇinā(gṛhītvā) dakṣiṇena pāṇinā ekāṅgulyagreṇāropitavānabhūt /
XXbsu022_u:2653: tasya dhanuṣa āropyamāṇasya sarvaṃ kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ śabdenābhivijñaptamabhūt /
XXbsu022_u:2655: anye tadavocan - siddhārthena kila kumāreṇa paitāmahadhanurāropitam, tasyāyaṃ śabda iti /
XXbsu022_u:2657: gaganatalagatāśca devaputrā rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ taṃ ca mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣanta
XXbsu022_u:2658: yatha pūrita eṣa dhanurmuninā na ca utthitu āsani no ca bhūmī /
XXbsu022_u:2659: niḥsaṃśayu pūrṇamabhiprāyu munirlaghu bheṣyati jitva ca māracamūm //
XXbsu022_u:2660: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvastaddhanuḥ pūrayitveṣuṃ gṛhītvā tādṛśena balasthāmnā tamiṣuṃ kṣipati sma, yena yā cānandasya bherī yā ca
XXbsu022_u:2661: devadattasya yāvatsunddaranandasya yāvaddaṇḍapāṇetāḥ sarvā abhinirbhidya tāṃ ca daśakrośasthāṃ svakāmayasmayīṃ bherīṃ saptatālāṃ yantrayuktavarāhapratimāmabhinirbhidya sa iṣurdharaṇītalaṃ praviśya adarśanābhāso 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:2662: yatra ca pradeśe sa iṣurbhūmitalaṃ bhittvā praviṣṭastasmin pradeśe kūpaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ, yadadyatve 'pi śarakūpa ityabhidhīyate /
XXbsu022_u:2664: sarvaśca śākyagaṇo vismito 'bhūt āścaryaprāptaḥ - (Vaidya 108) āścaryaṃ bhoḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2665: na ca nāma anena yogyā kṛtā, idaṃ cedṛśaṃ śilpakauśalam /
XXbsu022_u:2666: gaganatalagatāśca devaputrā rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ taṃ ca mahāntaṃ janakāyamevamāhuḥ - ko 'tra vismayo manujāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2668: eṣa dharaṇimaṇḍe purvabuddhāsanasthaḥ śamathadhanu gṛhītvā śūnyanairātmabāṇaiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:2669: kleśaripu nihatvā dṛṣṭijālaṃ ca bhittvā śivavirajamaśokāṃ prāpsyate bodhimagryām // Lal_12.33
XXbsu022_u:2670: evamuktvā te devaputrā bodhisattvaṃ divyaiḥ puṣpairabhyavakīrya prākrāman
XXbsu022_u:2671: evaṃ laṅghite prāgvallipimudrāgaṇanāsaṃkhyasālambhadhanurvede javite plavite taraṇe iṣvastre hastigrīvāyāmaśvapṛṣṭhe rathe dhanuṣkalāpe sthairyasthāmni suśaurye bāhuvyāyāme aṅkuśagrahe pāśagrahe udyāne niryāṇe avayāne muṣṭibandhe padabandhe śikhābandhe chedye bhedye dālane sphālane akṣuṇṇavedhitve marmavedhitve śabdavedhitve dṛḍhaprahāritve akṣakrīḍāyāṃ kāvyakaraṇe granthe citre rūpe rūpakarmaṇi dhīte agnikarmaṇi vīṇāyāṃ vādye
XXbsu022_u:2672: nṛtye gīte paṭhite ākhyāne hāsye lāsye nāṭye viḍambite mālyagrathane saṃvāhite maṇirāge vastrarāge māyākṛte svapnādhyāye śakunirute strīlakṣaṇe puruṣalakṣaṇe aśvalakṣaṇe hastilakṣaṇe golakṣaṇe ajalakṣaṇe miśralakṣaṇe kauṭubheśvaralakṣaṇe nirghaṇṭe nigame purāṇe itihāse vede vyākaraṇe nirukte śikṣāyāṃ chandasvinyāṃ yajñakalpe jyotiṣe sāṃkhye yoge kriyākalpe vaiśike vaiśeṣike arthavidyāyāṃ bārhaspatye āmbhirye āsurye mṛgapakṣirute hetuvidyāyāṃ jalayantre madhūcchiṣṭakṛte sūcikarmaṇi vidalakarmaṇi
XXbsu022_u:2674: divyamānuṣyakātikrāntāsu sarvatra bodhisattva eva viśiṣyate sma //
XXbsu022_u:2675: atha khalu punastena samayena daṇḍapāṇiḥ śākyaḥ svāṃ duhitaraṃ gopāṃ śākyakanyāṃ bodhisattvāya prādāt /
XXbsu022_u:2676: sā ca rājñā śuddhodanenānupūrveṇa bodhisattvasya vṛtābhūt //
XXbsu022_u:2677: tatra khalvapi bodhisattvaścaturaśītistrīsahasrāṇāṃ madhye prāpto lokānubhavanatayā ramamāṇaṃ krīḍayantaṃ paricārayantamātmānamupadarśayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:2678: tāsāṃ caturaśīte strīsahasrāṇāṃ gopā śākyakanyā sarvāsāmagramahiṣyabhiṣiktābhūt //
XXbsu022_u:2679: tatra khalvapi gopā śākyakanyā na kaṃcid dṛṣṭvā vadanaṃ chādayati sma śvaśrūṃ vā śvaśuraṃ vāntarjanaṃ vā /
XXbsu022_u:2680: te tāmupadhyāyanti sma, vicārayanti sma - navavadhūkā hi nāma pratilīnā tiṣṭhati, iyaṃ punarvivṛtaiva
XXbsu022_u:2682: tato gopā śākyakanyā etāṃ prakṛtiṃ śrutvā sarvasyāntarjanasya purataḥ sthitvā imā gāthā abhāṣata

XXbsu022_u:3038: lokānukampako hitaiṣīva varmitakavacitavīryaḥ sattvapramokṣālambanamahākaruṇābalavikramaparākramaḥ avaivartikasarvasattvasamacittatyāgapraharaṇo yathābhiprāyasattvāśayasaṃtoṣaṇo bodhibhājanībhūtaḥ kālākṣuṇṇadharmavedhī bodhipariṇāmapraṇidhiḥ anavanāmitadhvajastrimaṇḍalapariśodhanadānaparityāgī jñānavaravajradṛḍhapraharaṇaḥ sunigṛhītakleśapratyarthikaḥ śīlaguṇacāritrapratipannaḥ svārakṣitakāyavāṅbhanaskarmānto 'ṇumātrāvadyabhayadarśī supariśuddhaśīlaḥ amalavimalanirmalacittaḥ sarvaduruktadurāgatavacanapathākrośaparibhāṣaṇakutsanatāḍanatarjanavadhabandhanāvarodhanaparikleśāluḍitacitto
XXbsu022_u:3040: sarvasattvahitārthāyottaptavīryārambhī dṛḍhasamādānasarvakuśalamūladharmasamudānayanāpratyudāvartyasmṛtimān susaṃprajñāsusamāhito 'vikṣiptacitto dhyānaikāgramanasikāro dharmapravicayakuśalo labdhāloko vigatatamondhakāraḥ anityaduḥkhātmāśubhākāraparibhāvitacetāḥ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇaṛddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgārya satyasarvabodhipakṣadharmasuparikarmakṛtamanasikāraḥ śamathavipaśyanāsuparyavadātabuddhiḥ pratītyasamutpādasatyadarśī satyānubodhādaparapratyayastrivimokṣasukhavikrīḍito māyāmarīcisvapnodakacandrapratiśrutkāpratibhāsopamasarvadharmanayāvatīrṇaḥ iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaivaṃ bhavati pratikṛtiḥ - evaṃ dharmavihārī evaṃ guṇamāhātmyavihārī evaṃ sattvārthābhiyuktavihārī abhūt /
XXbsu022_u:3041: bhūyasyā mātrayā ābhirdaśadigbuddhādhiṣṭhānatūryasaṃgītiviniḥsṛtābhirgāthābhiḥ saṃcoditaḥ sa tasyāṃ velāyāṃ pūrveṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ caramabhavopagatānāmantaḥpuraparipācitāni (Vaidya 132) catvāri dharmamukhānyāmukhīkaroti sma /
XXbsu022_u:3042: katamāni catvāri? yadidaṃ dānaṃ priyavacanamarthakriyāṃ samānārthatāṃ ca /
XXbsu022_u:3047: imāni catvāri dharmamukhānyāmukhīkṛtya bodhisattvaḥ sarvasyāntaḥpurasya paripācanārthaṃ tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpamṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhisaṃskaroti sma, yathārūpeṇa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtena tebhyaḥ saṃgītirutebhyo bodhisattvānubhāvenemānyevaṃrūpāṇi dharmamukhaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma /
XXbsu022_u:3049: udārachandena ca āśayena adhyāśayenā karuṇāya prāṇiṣu /
XXbsu022_u:3050: utpadyate cittu varāgrabodhaye śabde ca rūpasturiyebhi niścarī //
XXbsu022_u:3051: śraddhā prasādo adhimukti gauravaṃ nirmānatā onamanā gurūṇām /
XXbsu022_u:3053: dāne dabhe saṃyamaśīlaśabdaḥ kṣāntīya śabdastatha vīryaśabdaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3054: dhyānābhinirhārasamādhiśabdaḥ prajñā upāyasya ca śabda niścarī //
XXbsu022_u:3055: maitrāya śabdaḥ karuṇāya śabdo muditāupekṣāya abhijñaśabdaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3063: anirodhaśabdaśca anālayaṃ ca nirvāṇaśabdasturiyebhi niścarī // Lal_13.139
XXbsu022_u:3065: yaṃ śrutva sarvā pramadā nu śikṣitā varāgrasattve praṇidhenti bodhaye //
XXbsu022_u:3066: iti hi bhikṣavo antaḥpuramadhyagatena bodhisattvena tāni caturaśītistrīsahasrāṇi paripācitānyabhūvan anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bahūni ca devatāśatasahasrāṇi ye tatra saṃprāptā abhūvan //
XXbsu022_u:3067: tathā abhiniṣkramaṇakāle tasmin samaye bodhisattvasya hrīdevo nāma tuṣitakāyiko devaputro 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ sa rātrau praśāntāyāṃ dvātriṃśatā devaputrasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena
XXbsu022_u:3070: cyuti darśitā atiyaśā janma ca saṃdarśitaṃ puruṣasiṃha /
XXbsu022_u:3072: paripācitā ti bahavo deva manuja loki dharmamanuprāpya /
XXbsu022_u:3073: ayamadya kālasamayo niṣkramye mati vicintehi // Lal_13.142 //
XXbsu022_u:3074: na hi baddha mocayātī na cāndhapuruṣena darśiyati mārgaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3075: muktastu mocayātī sacakṣuṣā darśayati mārgaḥ // Lal_13.143 //
XXbsu022_u:3076: ye sattva kāmadāsā gṛhe dhane putrabhāryapariśraddhāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3077: te tubhya śiṣyamāṇā naiṣkramyamatau spṛhāṃ kuryuḥ // Lal_13.144 //
XXbsu022_u:3078: aiśvarya kāmakrīḍā catudvīpā sapta ratna vijahitvā /
XXbsu022_u:3079: niṣkrānta tvāṃ viditvā spṛhayetsanarāmaro lokaḥ // Lal_13.145 //
XXbsu022_u:3080: kiṃ cāpi dhyānasaukhyairviharasi dharmairna cāsi kāmarataḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3081: atha puna ciraprasuptāṃ bodhaya marumānuṣaśatāni // Lal_13.146 //
XXbsu022_u:3086: uttāraya pratijñāṃ kuruṣva cārthaṃ suragaṇānām // Lal_13.148 //
XXbsu022_u:3088: te tṛpta yeṣa prajñā āryā lokottarā virajā // Lal_13.149 //
XXbsu022_u:3089: tvamiha priyo manāpo rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya rāṣṭrasya /
XXbsu022_u:3092: śīghraṃ pramokṣamārge sthāpaya śānte asamavīrā // Lal_13.151 //
XXbsu022_u:3098: drakṣyāma bodhiprāptaṃ niruttaraṃ dharma śroṣyāmaḥ // Lal_13.154 //
XXbsu022_u:3099: drakṣyati ca bhujagarājo bhavanaṃ avabhāsitaṃ tava śirīye /
XXbsu022_u:3102: dāsyāma caturi pātrāṃ bodhidhvaji pūrṇamanasasya // Lal_13.156 //
XXbsu022_u:3104: adhyoṣiṣye narendraṃ vartenti niruttaraṃ cakram // Lal_13.157 //
XXbsu022_u:3106: utpatsye 'yaṃ satya ti drakṣyāmyabhibudhyato bodhim // Lal_13.158 //
XXbsu022_u:3107: satyaṃ hi bodhisattvā antaḥpuriye kriyā vidarśenti /
XXbsu022_u:3108: pūrvaṃgamo bhava tvaṃ mā bheṣyasi paścimasteṣām // Lal_13.159 //
XXbsu022_u:3110: bhūtaṃ tathā avitathā jinaghoṣarutaṃ udīrehi // Lal_13.160 //
XXbsu022_u:3115: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ saṃcoditaḥ san tena devaputreṇa rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyemaṃ svapnamupadarśayati sma - yadrājā śuddhodanaḥ suptaḥ
XXbsu022_u:3119: sa pratibuddhaḥ tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ kāñcukīyaṃ paripṛcchati sma - kaccit kumāro 'ntaḥpure 'sti? so 'vocat - asti deveti //
XXbsu022_u:3127: tato rājñā śuddhodanena kumārasya paribhogārthaṃ trayo yathartukāḥ prāsādāḥ kāritā abhūvan graiṣmiko vārṣiko haimantikaśca /
XXbsu022_u:3131: ekaikasya ca prāsādasya sopānāni pañca pañca puruṣaśatānyutkṣipanti sma, nikṣipanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:3132: teṣāṃ tathotkṣipyamāṇānāṃ nikṣipyamāṇānāṃ ca śabdo 'rdhayojane śrūyate sma - mā khalu kumāro
XXbsu022_u:3135: tato rājā maṅgaladvārasya mahānti kapāṭāni kārayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:3136: ekaikaṃ ca kapāṭaṃ pañca pañca puruṣaśatānyuddhāṭayanti sma, apaghāṭayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:3140: atha bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ sārathiṃ prāha - śīghraṃ sārathe rathaṃ yojaya
XXbsu022_u:3142: tataḥ sārathī rājānaṃ śuddhoddhanamupasaṃkramyaivamāha - deva kumāra udyānabhūmimabhiniryāsyatīti
XXbsu022_u:3143: atha rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyaitadabhavat - na kadācinmayā kumāra
XXbsu022_u:3147: tataḥ kumāraḥ strīgaṇaparivṛto ratiṃ vetsyate, nābhiniṣkramiṣyatīti //
XXbsu022_u:3148: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ snehabahumānābhyāṃ bodhisattvasya nagare ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇāṃ kārayati sma saptame divase kumāra udyānabhūmiṃ niṣkramiṣyatīti (subhūmidarśanāya) /
XXbsu022_u:3149: tatra bhavadbhiḥ sarvāmanāpāni cāpanayitavyāni - mā kumāraḥ pratikūlaṃ paśyet /
XXbsu022_u:3152: tataḥ saptame divase sarvaṃ nagaramalaṃkṛtamabhūt udyānabhūmimupaśobhitaṃ nānāraṅgadūṣyavitānīkṛtaṃ chatradhvajapatākāsamalaṃkṛtam /
XXbsu022_u:3153: yena ca mārgeṇa bodhisattvo 'bhinirgacchati sma, sa mārgaḥ siktaḥ saṃmṛṣṭo gandhodakapariṣikto muktakusumāvakīrṇo nānāgandhaghaṭikānirdhūpitaḥ pūrṇakumbhopaśobhitaḥ kadalīvṛkṣocchrito nānāvicitrapaṭavitānavitato ratnakiṅkiṇījālahārārdhahārābhipralambito 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:3155: atha śuddhāvāsakāyikā devā nidhyāpayanti sma bodhisattvamāharitum, tatra bodhisattvasya pūrveṇa nagaradvāreṇodyānabhūmimabhiniṣkrāmato mahatā vyūhena atha bodhisattvasyānubhāvena śuddhavāsakāyikairdevaputraistasmin mārge puruṣo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallako dhamanīsaṃtatagātraḥ khaṇḍadanto valīnicitakāyaḥ palitakeśaḥ kubjo gopānasīvakro vibhagno daṇḍaparāyaṇa
XXbsu022_u:3156: āturo gatayauvanaḥ kharakharāvasaktakaṇṭhaḥ prāgbhāreṇa kāyena daṇḍamavaṣṭabhya pravepayamānaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaiḥ purato mārgasyopadarśito 'bhūt //
XXbsu022_u:3158: kiṃ sārathe puruṣa durbala alpasthāmo ucchuṣkamāṃsarudhiratvacasnāyunaddhaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3159: śvetaṃśiro viraladanta kṛśāṅgarūpo ālambya daṇḍa vrajate asukhaṃ skhalantaḥ // Lal_14.1 //
XXbsu022_u:3161: eṣo hi deva puruṣo jarayābhibhūtaḥ kṣīṇendriyaḥ sudukhito balavīryahīnaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3162: bandhūjanena paribhūta anāthabhūtaḥ kāryāsamartha apaviddhu vaneva dāru //
XXbsu022_u:3164: kuladharma eṣa ayamasya hitaṃ bhaṇāhi athavāpi sarvajagato 'sya iyaṃ hyavasthā /
XXbsu022_u:3165: śīghraṃ bhaṇāhi vacanaṃ yathabhūtametat śrutvā tathārthamiha yoniśa cintayiṣye // Lal_14.3
XXbsu022_u:3167: naitasya deva kuladharma na rāṣṭradharmaḥ sarve jagasya jara yauvanu dharṣayāti /
XXbsu022_u:3168: tubhyaṃ pi mātṛpitṛbāndhavajñātisaṃgho jarayā amukta na hi anya gatirjanasya // Lal_14.4 //
XXbsu022_u:3171: dhiksārathe abudha bālajanasya buddhiḥ yadyauvanena madamatta jarāṃ na paśyet /
XXbsu022_u:3172: āvartayāśu mi rathaṃ punarahaṃ pravekṣye kiṃ mahya krīḍaratibhirjarayāśritasya // Lal_14.5
XXbsu022_u:3173: atha bodhisattvaḥ pratinirvatya rathavaraṃ punarapi puraṃ prāviśat //
XXbsu022_u:3174: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo 'pareṇa kālasamayena dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇodyānabhūmimabhiniṣkraman mahatā vyūhena so 'drākṣīnmārge
XXbsu022_u:3175: puruṣaṃ vyādhispṛṣṭaṃ dagdhodarābhibhūtaṃ durbalakāyaṃ svake mūtrapurīṣe nimagnamatrāṇamapratiśaraṇaṃ kṛcchreṇocchvasantaṃ praśvasantam /
XXbsu022_u:3177: kiṃ sārathe puruṣa ruṣyavivarṇagātraḥ sarvendriyebhi vikalo guru praśvasantaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3178: sarvāṅgaśuṣka udarākula kṛcchraprāpto mūtre purīṣi svaki tiṣṭhati kutsanīye // Lal_14.6 //
XXbsu022_u:3180: eṣo hi deva puruṣo paramaṃ gilāno vyādhībhayaṃ upagato maraṇāntaprāptaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3183: ārogyatā ca bhavate yatha svapnakrīḍā vyādhībhayaṃ ca imamīdṛśu ghorarūpam
XXbsu022_u:3184: ko nāma vijñapuruṣo ima dṛṣṭvavasthāṃ krīḍāratiṃ ca janayecchubhasaṃjñatāṃ vā // Lal_14.8
XXbsu022_u:3185: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ pratinivartya rathavaraṃ punarapi puravaraṃ prāvikṣat //
XXbsu022_u:3186: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo 'pareṇa kālasamayena paścimena nagaradvāreṇodyānabhūmimabhiniṣkraman mahatā vyūhena so 'drākṣīt puruṣaṃ mṛtaṃ kālagataṃ mañce samāropitaṃ cailavitānīkṛtaṃ jñātisaṃghaparivṛtaṃ sarvai rudadbhiḥ krandadbhiḥ paridevamānaiḥ prakīrṇakeśaiḥ
XXbsu022_u:3191: kiṃ sārathe puruṣa mañcapari gṛhīto uddhūtakeśanakha pāṃśu śire kṣipanti /
XXbsu022_u:3194: eṣo hi deva puruṣo mṛtu jambudvīpe nahi bhūyu mātṛpitṛ drakṣyati putradārāṃ /
XXbsu022_u:3195: apahāya bhogagṛha (mātṛpitṛ) mitrajñātisaṃghaṃ paralokaprāptu na hi drakṣyati bhūyu jñātīṃ bodhisattva āha -
XXbsu022_u:3197: dhigjīvitena viduṣā nacirasthitena dhikpaṇḍitasya puruṣasya ratiprasaṅgaiḥ
XXbsu022_u:3198: yadi jara na bhaveyā naiva vyādhirna mṛtyuḥ tathapi ca mahaduḥkhaṃ pañcaskandhaṃ dharanto
XXbsu022_u:3199: kiṃ puna jaravyādhirmṛtyu nityānubaddhāḥ sādhu pratinivartyā cintayiṣye pramokṣam // Lal_14.12
XXbsu022_u:3200: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ pratinivartya taṃ rathavaraṃ punarapi puraṃ prāvikṣat //
XXbsu022_u:3201: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyāpareṇa kālasamayenottareṇa nagaradvāreṇodyānabhūmimabhiniṣkrāmatastaireva devaputrairbodhisattvasyānubhāvenaiva tasminmārge bhikṣurabhinirmito 'bhūt
XXbsu022_u:3202: / adrākṣīdbodhisattvastaṃ bhikṣuṃ śāntaṃ dāntaṃ saṃyataṃ brahmacāriṇamavikṣiptacakṣuṣaṃ yugamātraprekṣiṇaṃ prāsādikenairyāpathena
XXbsu022_u:3203: saṃpannaṃ prāsādikenābhikramapratikrameṇa saṃpannaṃ prāsādikenāvalokitavyavalokitena prāsādikena samiñjitaprasāritena prāsādikena saṃghāṭīpātracīvaradhāraṇena mārge sthitam /
XXbsu022_u:3205: kiṃ sārathe puruṣa śāntapraśāntacitto notkṣiptacakṣu vrajate yugamātradarśī /
XXbsu022_u:3206: kāṣāyavastravasano supraśāntacārī pātraṃ gṛhītva na ca uddhatu unnato vā
XXbsu022_u:3209: eṣo hi deva puruṣo iti bhikṣunāmā apahāya kāmaratayaḥ suvinītacārī /
XXbsu022_u:3212: sādhū subhāṣitamidaṃ mama rocate ca pravrajya nāma vidubhiḥ satataṃ praśastā /
XXbsu022_u:3213: hitamātmanaśca parasattvahitaṃ ca yatra sukhajīvitaṃ sumadhuraṃ amṛtaṃ phalaṃ ca // Lal_14.15
XXbsu022_u:3214: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ pratinivartya taṃ rathavaraṃ punarapi puravaraṃ prāvikṣat
XXbsu022_u:3215: iti hi bhikṣavo rājā śuddhodano bodhisattvasyemāmevaṃrūpāṃ saṃcodanāṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca bhūyasyā mātrayā bodhisattvasya parirakṣaṇārthaṃ prākārān māpayate sma, parikhāḥ khānayati sma, dvārāṇi ca gāḍhāni kārayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:3220: caturṣu nagaradvāraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu caturo mahāsenāvyūhān sthāpayati sma bodhisattvasya parirakṣaṇārtham
XXbsu022_u:3221: ya enaṃ rātriṃdivaṃ rakṣanti sma - mā bodhisattvo 'bhiniṣkramiṣyatīti /
XXbsu022_u:3222: antaḥpure cājñāṃ dadāti sma - mā sma kadācitsaṃgītiṃ vicchetsyatha /
XXbsu022_u:3223: sarvaratikrīḍāścopasaṃhartavyāḥ, strīmāyāścopadarśayata, nirbandhata kumāraṃ yathānuraktacitto na nirgacchetpravrajyāyai //
XXbsu022_u:3225: dvāre sthāpita yuddhaśauṇḍapuruṣāḥ khaḍgāyudhāpāṇayo hastīaśvarathāśca varmitanarā ārūḍha nāgāvalī /
XXbsu022_u:3226: parikhā khoṭakatoraṇāśca mahatā prākāra ucchrāpitā dvārā baddha sugāḍhabandhanakṛtāḥ krośasvarāmuñcanāḥ sarve śākyagaṇā viṣaṇṇamanaso rakṣanti rātriṃdivaṃ nirghoṣaśca balasya tasya mahataḥ śabdo mahā śrūyate /
XXbsu022_u:3227: nagaraṃ vyākulu bhītatrastamanaso mā smād vrajetsūrato mā bhūcchākyakuloditasya gamane chidyeta vaṃśo hyayam // Lal_14.17 //
XXbsu022_u:3228: ājñapto yuvatījanaśca satataṃ saṃgīti mā chetsyathā vasthānaṃ prakarotha krīḍaratibhirnirbandhathā mānasam /
XXbsu022_u:3230: ye vā istriyamāya nekavividhā darśetha ceṣṭāṃ bahuṃ ārakṣāṃ prakarotha vighna kuruthā mā khu vrajetsūrataḥ // Lal_14.18 //
XXbsu022_u:3231: tasyā niṣkramikāli sārathivare pūrve nimittā ime haṃsā kroñca mayūra sārika śukā no te ravaṃ muñciṣu /
XXbsu022_u:3232: prāsādeṣu gavākṣatoraṇavareṣvātālamañceṣu ca jihmājihva sudurmanā asukhitā dhyāyantyadhomūrdhakāḥ puḍinīpuṣkariṇīṣu padma rucirā mlānāni mlāyanti ca vṛkṣāḥ śuṣkapalāśa puṣparahitāḥ puṣpanti bhūyo na ca /
XXbsu022_u:3233: vīṇāvallakivaṃśatantriracitā chidyantyakasmāttadā bherīścaiva mṛdaṅga pāṇyabhihatā bhidyanti no vādyiṣu // Lal_14.20 //
XXbsu022_u:3234: sarvaṃ vyākulamāsi tacca nagaraṃ nidrābhibhūtaṃ bhṛśaṃ no nṛtte na ca gāyite na ramite bhūyo manaḥ kasyacit /

XXbsu022_u:3236: ekasmiṃ śayane sthite sthitamabhūdgopā tathā pārthivo gopā rātriyi ardharātrasamaye svapnānimāṃ paśyati /
XXbsu022_u:3237: sarveyaṃ pṛthivī prakampitamabhūcchailā sakūṭāvaṭī vṛkṣā mārutaeritā kṣiti patī utpāṭya mūloddhṛtāḥ candrāsūrya nabhātu bhūmipatitau sajyotiṣālaṃkṛtau keśānadṛśi lūna dakṣiṇi bhuje mukuṭaṃ ca vidhvaṃsitam /
XXbsu022_u:3238: hastau chinna tathaiva chinna caraṇau nagnā dṛśī ātmanaṃ muktāhāra tathaiva mekhalamaṇī chinnā dṛśī ātmanaḥ // Lal_14.23 //
XXbsu022_u:3239: śayanasyā dṛśi chinna pāda caturo dharaṇītalesmiṃ chayī chatre daṇḍu sucitru śrīma ruciraṃ chinnā dṛśī pārthive /
XXbsu022_u:3240: sarve ābharaṇā vikīrṇa patitā muhyanti te vāriṇā bhartuścābharaṇā savastramukuṭā śayyāgatā vyākulā // Lal_14.24 //
XXbsu022_u:3241: ulkāṃ paśyati niṣkramanta nagarāttamasābhibhūtaṃ puraṃ chinnāṃ jālikamadṛśāti supine ratanāmikāṃ śobhanāṃ /
XXbsu022_u:3243: muktāhāru pralambamānu patitaḥ kṣubhito mahāsāgaraṃ meruṃ parvatarājamadṛśi tadā sthānātu saṃkampitam // Lal_14.25 //
XXbsu022_u:3244: etānīdṛśa śākyakanya supināṃ supināntare adṛśī dṛṣṭvā sā pratibuddha ruṇṇanayanā svaṃ svāminaṃ abravīt /
XXbsu022_u:3245: devā kiṃ mi bhaviṣyate khalu bhaṇā supināntarāṇīdṛśā bhrāntā me smṛti no ca paśyami punaḥ śokārditaṃ me manaḥ // Lal_14.26 //
XXbsu022_u:3246: śrutvāsau kalaviṅkadundubhiruto brahmasvaraḥ susvaro gopāmālapate bhava pramuditā pāpaṃ na te vidyate /
XXbsu022_u:3247: ye sattvā kṛtapuṇyapūrvacaritā teṣeti svapnā ime ko 'nyaḥ paśyati naikaduḥkhavihitaḥ svapnāntarāṇīdṛśā yatte dṛṣṭā medinī kampamānā kūṭā śailā medinīye patantā /
XXbsu022_u:3248: devā nāgā rākṣasā bhūtasaṃghāḥ sarve tubhyaṃ pūjyaśreṣṭhāṃ karonti //

XXbsu022_u:3250: kṣipraṃ gope kleśajālaṃ chinitvā dṛṣṭījālaṃ uddharī saṃskṛtātaḥ //
XXbsu022_u:3251: yatte dṛṣṭau candrasūryau patantau dṛṣṭā nakṣatrā jyotiṣā nīpatantaḥ /

XXbsu022_u:3262: yatte dṛṣṭaṃ muktahāraṃ prabhagnaṃ chinnaṃ caiva svarṇasūtraṃ vicitram /

XXbsu022_u:3268: kalpā koṭī saṃskṛtā me anantā bodhīmārgo śodhito me praṇītaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3269: tasmānmahyaṃ ye prasādaṃ karonti sarve chinnā teṣu trīṇyapyapāyāḥ //
XXbsu022_u:3270: harṣaṃ vindā mā ca khedaṃ janehi tuṣṭiṃ vindā saṃjanehī ca prītim /
XXbsu022_u:3271: kṣipraṃ bheṣye prītiprāmodyalābhī sehī gope bhadrakā te nimittā //
XXbsu022_u:3272: so puṇyatejabharito siritejagarbho pūrve nimittasupine imi adṛśāsi /
XXbsu022_u:3274: ye bhonti pūrvaśubhakarmasamuccayānāṃ naiṣkramyakālasamaye narapuṃgavānām // Lal_14.40
XXbsu022_u:3275: so adṛśāsi ca karāccaraṇāddhatānā mahasāgarebhi catubhirjala lolayantā /
XXbsu022_u:3276: sarvāmimāṃ vasumatīṃ śayanaṃ vicitraṃ meruṃ ca parvatavaraṃ śirasopadhānam // Lal_14.41
XXbsu022_u:3277: ābhā pramukta supine tada adṛśāsi loke vilokitu mahātamasāndhakāram /
XXbsu022_u:3278: chatrodgataṃ dharaṇiye spharate trilokaṃ ābhāya spṛṣṭa vinipātadukhā praśāntā // Lal_14.42
XXbsu022_u:3279: kṛṣṇā śubhā caturi prāṇaka pāda lekhī catuvarṇa etva śakunādbhuta ekavarṇāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3280: mīḍhaṃgirī paramahīna jugupsanīyā abhibhūya caṃkramati tatra ca nopalipto // Lal_14.43
XXbsu022_u:3281: bhūyo 'dṛśī supini nadya jalaprapūrṇā bahusattvakoṭinayutāni ca uhyamānā /
XXbsu022_u:3282: so nāva kṛtva prataritva parāṃ pratārya sthāpeti so sthalavare abhaye aśoke // Lal_14.44 //
XXbsu022_u:3283: bhūyo 'dṛśāti bahu ātura rogaspṛṣṭāṃ ārogyatejarahitāṃ balaviprahīnāṃ /

XXbsu022_u:3285: siṃhāsane va hi niṣaṇṇa sumerupṛṣṭhe śiṣyāṃ kṛtāñjalipuṭānamarānnamantāṃ /
XXbsu022_u:3286: saṃgrāmamadhyi jayu adṛśi ātmanaśca ānandaśabdamamarāṃ gagane bruvantaḥ //

XXbsu022_u:3294: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - ayuktametanmama syādakṛtajñatā ca yadahamaprativedya mahārājñaḥ śuddhodanasya
XXbsu022_u:3296: sa rātrau praśāntāyāṃ svakādupasthānaprāsādādavatīrya rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya prāsādatale pratiṣṭhito 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:3300: / dṛṣṭvā ca punastvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ kāñcukiyamāmantrayāmāsa - kiṃ bhoḥ kāñcukīya sūryo 'bhyudgato yeneyaṃ prabhā virājate? kāñcukīya āha - adyāpi tāvadeva rajanyā upārdhaṃ nātikrāntam /

XXbsu022_u:3309: so ca sthihitva purato nṛpatiṃ avocat mā bhūyu vighna prakarohi ma caiva khedam /

XXbsu022_u:3314: tada bodhisattva avacī madhurapralāpī icchāmi deva caturo vara tān mi dehi /

XXbsu022_u:3316: icchāmi deva jara mahya na ākrameyyā śubhavarṇa yauvanasthito bhavi nityakālam /

XXbsu022_u:3318: rājā śruṇitva vacanaṃ paramaṃ dukhārto asthānu yācasi kumāra na me 'tra

XXbsu022_u:3327: na cāsya kaścidgamanaṃ vā āgamanaṃ vā saṃjānīte sma //
XXbsu022_u:3328: iti hi bhikṣavo rājā śuddhodanastasyā rātryā atyayena sarvaṃ śākyagaṇaṃ saṃnipātyaināṃ prakṛtimārocayati sma - abhiniṣkramiṣyati kumāraḥ /

XXbsu022_u:3331: tatkasmāt? ayaṃ ca mahāñśākyagaṇaḥ, sa caikākī /

XXbsu022_u:3335: evaṃ dakṣiṇe paścime uttare nagaradvāre pañca pañca śākyakumāraśatāni kṛtāstrāṇi kṛtayogyāni iṣvastraśikṣitāni mahānagnabalopetāni /
XXbsu022_u:3336: ekaikaśca śākyakumāraḥ pañcarathaśataparivāraḥ, ekaikaṃ ca rathaṃ pañcapattiśataparivāraṃ sthāpitamabhūta bodhisattvasya rakṣārtham /
XXbsu022_u:3338: rājā ca śuddhodanaḥ pañcabhiḥ śākyakumāraśataiḥ sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ svake gṛhadvāre hayeṣu ca gajeṣu ca samabhiruhya jāgarti sma /
XXbsu022_u:3340: jvāletha dīpa vimalāṃ dhvajāgri maṇiratna sarvi sthāpethā /

XXbsu022_u:3351: tatha tatha parākramathā yathā vighātaṃ na vindeyā // Lal_15.16 //
XXbsu022_u:3352: yā nāri śaktidhārī śayanaṃ parivārayantu vimalasya /

XXbsu022_u:3354: chādetha ratanajālai idaṃ gṛhaṃ pārthivasya rakṣārtham /

XXbsu022_u:3356: anyonya bodhayethā ma vasayathā rakṣathā imāṃ rajanīm /
XXbsu022_u:3357: mā hu abhiniṣkramethā vijahya rāṣṭraṃ ca rājyaṃ ca // Lal_15.19 //
XXbsu022_u:3361: pāñcikayajñasenāpatipūrvaṃgamāni ca pañcahāritīputraśatānyekasmin saṃnipātyaivaṃ mataṃ vicārayanti sma - adya mārṣā bodhisattvo
XXbsu022_u:3365: catvāraśca mahārājāno alakavatīṃ rājadhānīṃ praviśya tāṃ mahatīṃ yakṣaparṣadamāmantrayate sma - adya mārṣā bodhisattvo 'bhiniṣkramiṣyati /
XXbsu022_u:3368: vajradṛḍha abhedya nārāyaṇo ātmabhāvo guru vīryabalaupetu so 'kampito
XXbsu022_u:3370: girivara mahameru utpāṭya śakyaṃ nabhe dhārituṃ kenacit na tu jinaguṇameru śailairguruḥ puṇyajñānāśritaḥ śakya netuṃ kvacit // Lal_15.21 //
XXbsu022_u:3372: ye mānagarvita narā guru teṣu śāstā ye premagauravasthitā laghu te vijāni /

XXbsu022_u:3374: ahaṃ ca purato yāsye yūyaṃ ca vahathā hayam /
XXbsu022_u:3376: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindro devāṃstrāyatriṃśānāmantrayate sma
XXbsu022_u:3378: tatra yuṣmābhiḥ sarvaiḥ pūjākarmaṇe autsukyena bhavitavyam //
XXbsu022_u:3379: tatra śāntamatirnāma devaputraḥ sa evamāha - ahaṃ tāvatkapilavastuni mahānagare sarvastrīpuruṣadārakadārikāṇāṃ prasvāpanaṃ kariṣyāmi /
XXbsu022_u:3380: lalitavyūho nāma devaputraḥ sa evamāha - ahamapi sarvahayagajakharoṣṭragomahiṣastrīpuruṣadārakadārikāṇāṃ śabdamantardhāpayiṣyāmi /
XXbsu022_u:3381: vyūhamatirnāma devaputraḥ sa evamāha - ahaṃ gaganatale saptarathavistārapramāṇaṃ ratnavedikāparivṛtaṃ sūryakāntamaṇiratnaprabhojjvalitamuchritachatradhvajapatākaṃ nānāpuṣpābhikīrṇaṃ nānāgandhaghaṭikānidhūpitaṃ mārgavyūhaṃ kariṣyāmi, yena mārgeṇa bodhisattvo 'bhiniṣkramiṣyati /
XXbsu022_u:3382: airāvaṇo nāma nāgarājā sa evamāha - ahamapi ca svasyāṃ śuṇḍāyāṃ dvātriṃśadyojanapramāṇaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ māpayiṣyāmi /
XXbsu022_u:3384: tūryasaṃgītisaṃprabhaṇitena mahatā gītavāditena bodhisattvasyopasthānaparicaryāṃ kurvantyo gamiṣyanti /
XXbsu022_u:3385: svayaṃ ca śakro devānāmindra evamāha - ahaṃ dvārāṇi vivariṣyāmi /
XXbsu022_u:3388: saṃcodako devaputra āha - ahaṃ bodhisattvaṃ śayanādutthāpayiṣyāmi /
XXbsu022_u:3390: tatra varuṇaśca nāma nāgarājo manasvī ca nāgarājaḥ sāgaraśca nāgarājo
XXbsu022_u:3391: 'navataptaśca nāgarājo nandopanandau nāgarājāvevamāhuḥ - vayamapi bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe kālānusārimeghamabhinirmāya uragasāracandanacūrṇavarṣamabhivarṣayiṣyāmaḥ //
XXbsu022_u:3392: iti hi bhikṣavo devanāgayakṣagandharvaiścāyamevaṃrūpo niścayābhiprāyaścintito 'bhūd vyavasitaśca
XXbsu022_u:3393: bodhisattvasyaivaṃ dharmacintānupraviṣṭasya saṃgītiprāsādeṣu sukhaśayanagatasya antaḥpuramadhyagatasya pūrvabuddhacarita vicintayataḥ sarvasattvahitamanucintayataścatvāri pūrvapraṇidhānapadānyāmukhībhavanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:3395: sarvajñatāṃ prārthayamānenaivaṃ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddho 'bhūt - sattvān duḥkhitān dṛṣṭā aho batāhaṃ
XXbsu022_u:3396: lokasaṃniveśasya saṃsāracārakaṃ bhittvā bandhanapramokṣaśabdaṃ codīrayeyaṃ tṛṣṇayā sanigaḍagāḍhabandhanabaddhāṃśca sattvān pramocayeyam /
XXbsu022_u:3398: aho batāhaṃ saṃsāramahāvidyāndhakāragahanaprakṣiptasya lokasyājñānapaṭalatimirāvṛtanayanasya prajñācakṣurvirahitasyāvidyāmohāndhakārasya mahāntaṃ dharmālokaṃ kuryām /
XXbsu022_u:3404: aho batāhaṃ vyupaśāntasya lokasya tandrākulajātasya guṇāvaguṇṭhitabhūtasyājavaṃjavasamāpannasyāsmāllokāt paraṃ lokaṃ paralokādimaṃ lokaṃ saṃghāvataḥ saṃsarataḥ saṃsārādabhinivṛttasyālātacakrasamārūḍhasyopaśamikaṃ prajñātṛptikaraṃ dharmaṃ saṃprakāśayeyam /

XXbsu022_u:3633: iti hi bhikṣavaśchandako bodhisattvasya vacanamupaśrutyāśrupūrṇanayano bodhisattvamevamāha - āryaputra tvaṃ ca kālajño velajñaśca samayajñaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3636: bodhisattva āha - chandaka, ayaṃ sa kālaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3639: yattanmayā prārthitu dīrgharātraṃ sattvānamarthaṃ parimārgatā hi /
XXbsu022_u:3640: avāpya bodhiṃ ajarāmaraṃ padaṃ moce jagattasya kṣaṇo upasthitaḥ //
XXbsu022_u:3644: bhaumāntarīkṣāśca tathaiva pālāḥ śakraśca devādhipatiḥ sayakṣaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3645: yāmāśca devāstuṣitāśca nirmitāḥ paranirmitodyukta tathaiva devāḥ //
XXbsu022_u:3646: varuṇo manasvī api nāgarājā anāvataptaśca tathaiva māgaraḥ abhiyukta te cāpyabhipūjanārthaṃ naiṣkramyakāle narapuṃgavasya //
XXbsu022_u:3647: ye cāpi rūpāvacareṣu devāḥ praśāntacārī saha dhyānagocarāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3650: drakṣyāmahe niṣkramaṇaṃ jinasya pūjāṃ kariṣyāmi tathānurūpām // Lal_15.64
XXbsu022_u:3651: sa cāpi guhyādhipatirmahātmā pradīptavajro nabhasi pratisthitaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3652: saṃnaddhagātro balavīryavikramaḥ kareṇa guhya jvalamānu vajram //
XXbsu022_u:3653: candraśca sūryo ubhi devaputrau pradakṣiṇaṃ vāmaku supratisthitau /
XXbsu022_u:3655: puṣyaśca nakṣatra sapāriṣadyo audārikaṃ nirmiṇi ātmabhāvam /
XXbsu022_u:3657: sarve 'dya siddhāḥ śubha tubhya maṅgalāḥ puṣyaśca yuktaḥ samayaśca gantum /
XXbsu022_u:3664: sa cāpi paryaṅkavare niṣaṇṇo devairvṛto bhrājati dīptatejaḥ // Lal_15.70
XXbsu022_u:3665: nagare istrika dārakāśca puruṣā yāścābhavan dārikāḥ sarve te śayitā kilāntamanaso īryāpathebhyaścyutāḥ
XXbsu022_u:3666: hasti aśvagavāśca sārikaśukāḥ kroñcā mayūrāstathā sarve te śayitā kilāntamanasaḥ paśyanti rūpaṃ na te // Lal_15.71 //
XXbsu022_u:3667: ye cā te dṛḍhavajratomaradharā śākyaiḥ sutāḥ sthāpitāḥ hastiaśvaratheṣu toraṇavare te cāpyavasvāpitāḥ
XXbsu022_u:3668: rājā rājakumāra pārthivajanaḥ sarve prasuptā bhavan api cā nārigaṇā vinagnavasanā suptā na te buddhiṣū // Lal_15.72 //
XXbsu022_u:3669: so ca brahmaruto manojñavasanaḥ kalaviṅkaghoṣasvaro rātrau nirgata ardharātrasamaye taṃ chandakaṃ abravīt /
XXbsu022_u:3670: sādhū chandaka dehi kaṇṭhaku mama svālaṃkṛtaṃ śobhanaṃ mā vighnaṃ kuru me dadāhi capalaṃ yadi me priyaṃ manyase // Lal_15.73 //
XXbsu022_u:3671: kva tvaṃ yāsyasi sattvasārathivarā kiṃ aśvakāryaṃ ca te kālajñaḥ samayajña dharmacaraṇo kālo na gantu kvacit /
XXbsu022_u:3672: dvārāste pithitā dṛḍhārgalakṛtā ko dāsyate tāṃ tava /
XXbsu022_u:3673: śakreṇā manasātha cetanavaśātte dvāra muktā kṛtāḥ dṛṣṭvā chandaka harṣito puna dukhī aśrūṇi so 'vartayī /
XXbsu022_u:3674: hā dhikko mi sahāyu kiṃ tu kurumī dhāvāmi kāṃ vā diśaṃ ugraṃtejadhareṇa vākyu bhaṇitaṃ śakyaṃ na saṃdhāritum // Lal_15.74 //
XXbsu022_u:3676: sā senā caturaṅginī balavatī kiṃ bhū karotīha hā rājā rājakumāra pārthiva jano nemaṃ hi budhyanti te /
XXbsu022_u:3677: strīsaṃghaḥ śayitastathā yaśavatī osvāpitā devataiḥ hā dhiggacchati sidhyate 'sya praṇidhiryaścintitaḥ pūrvaśaḥ // Lal_15.75
XXbsu022_u:3678: devāḥ koṭisahasra hṛṣṭamanasastaṃ chandakaṃ abruvan sādhu chandaka dehi kaṇṭhakavaraṃ mā khedayī nāyakam /
XXbsu022_u:3679: bherīśaṅkhamṛdaṅgatūryanayutā devāsurairvāditā naivedaṃ pratibudhyate puravaraṃ osvāpitaṃ devataiḥ // Lal_15.76 //
XXbsu022_u:3680: paśya chandaka antarīkṣa vimalaṃ divyā prabhā śobhate paśya tvaṃ bahubodhisattvanayutāṃ ye pūjanāyāgatāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3681: śakraṃ paśya śacīpatiṃ balavṛtaṃ dvārasthitaṃ bhrājate devāṃścāpyasurāṃśca kinnaragaṇāṃ ye pūjanārthāgatāḥ // Lal_15.77 //
XXbsu022_u:3682: śrutvā chandaka devatāna vacanaṃ taṃ kaṇṭhakaṃ ālapī eṣvāgacchati sattvasārathivaraḥ tvaṃ tāva heṣiṣyase /
XXbsu022_u:3683: so taṃ varṣikuvarṇa kāñcanakhuraṃ svālaṃkṛtaṃ kṛtvanā upanetī guṇasāgarasya vahanaṃ rodantako durmanā // Lal_15.78 //
XXbsu022_u:3684: eṣā te varalakṣaṇā hitakarā aśvaḥ sujātaḥ śubho gaccha sidhyatu tubhya eva praṇidhiryaścintitaḥ pūrvaśaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3685: ye te vighnakarā vrajantu praśamaṃ āsāṃ vrataṃ sidhyatāṃ bhavahī sarvajagasya saukhyadadanaḥ svargasya śāntyāstathā // Lal_15.79 //
XXbsu022_u:3686: sarvā kampita ṣaḍvikāra dharaṇī śayanādyadā sotthitaḥ ārūḍhaḥ śaśipūrṇamaṇḍalanibhaṃ taṃ aśvarājottamam
XXbsu022_u:3687: pālā pāṇiviśuddhapadmavimalā nyasayiṃsu aśvottame śakro brahma ubhau ca tasya purato darśyanti mārgo hyayam // Lal_15.80 //
XXbsu022_u:3688: ābhā tena pramukta acchavimalā obhāsitā medinī sarve śānta apāya sattva sukhitā kleśairna bādhyī tadā /
XXbsu022_u:3689: puṣpā varṣiṣu tūryakoṭi raṇiṣū devāsurāstuṣṭuvuḥ sarve kṛtva pradakṣiṇaṃ puravaraṃ gacchanti harṣānvitāḥ // Lal_15.81 //
XXbsu022_u:3691: puravarottami devata dīnamanā upagamya gacchati mahāpuruṣe /
XXbsu022_u:3692: purataḥ sthitā karuṇadīnamanā girayā samālapati padmamukham // Lal_15.82
XXbsu022_u:3693: tamasākulaṃ bhuvimu sarvapuraṃ nagaraṃ na śobhati tvaya rahitam /
XXbsu022_u:3694: na mamātra kāci rati prītikarī tyaktaṃ tvayā ca yadidaṃ bhavanam //
XXbsu022_u:3695: na punaḥ śruṇiṣyi rutu pakṣigaṇe antaḥpure madhuraveṇuravam /
XXbsu022_u:3696: maṅgalyaśabda tatha gītaravaṃ pratibodhanaṃ tava anantayaśaḥ // Lal_15.84
XXbsu022_u:3697: darśe na bhūyu surasiddhagaṇāṃ kurvantu pūja tava rātridivam /
XXbsu022_u:3698: ghrāyiṣyi gandha na ca divya punaḥ tvayi nirgate nihatakleśagaṇe //
XXbsu022_u:3699: nirbhuktamālyamiva paryuṣitaṃ tyaktaṃ tvayādya bhavanaṃ hi tathā /
XXbsu022_u:3700: naṭaraṅgakalpa pratibhāyati me tvayi nirgate na bhuyu tejaśiri //
XXbsu022_u:3701: ojo balaṃ harasi sarvapure na ca śobhate aṭavitulyamidam /
XXbsu022_u:3702: vitathaṃ ṛṣīṇa vacanādya bhutaṃ yehī viyākṛtu bhuvi cakrabalo // Lal_15.87
XXbsu022_u:3703: abalaṃ balaṃ bhuvimu śākyabalaṃ ucchinna vaṃśa iha rājakule /
XXbsu022_u:3704: āśā pranaṣṭa iha śākyagaṇe tvayi nirgate mahati puṇyadrume // Lal_15.88 //
XXbsu022_u:3705: ahameva tubhya gati gacchayamī yatha tvaṃ prayāsi amalā vimalā /
XXbsu022_u:3707: api cā kṛpā karuṇa saṃjaniya vyavalokayasva bhavanaṃ tvamidam // Lal_15.89
XXbsu022_u:3708: vyavalokya caiva bhavanaṃ matimān madhurasvaro giramudīritavān /
XXbsu022_u:3709: nāhaṃ pravekṣi kapilasya puraṃ aprāpya jātimaraṇāntakaram // Lal_15.90 //
XXbsu022_u:3711: yāvanna labdha varabodhi mayā ajarāmaraṃ padavaraṃ hyamṛtam // Lal_15.91
XXbsu022_u:3712: yadasau jagatpradhāno niṣkrāntu bodhisattvo tasyā nabhe vrajanto stavayiṃsu apsarāṇām /
XXbsu022_u:3713: eṣa maha dakṣiṇīyo eṣa maha puṇyakṣetraṃ puṇyarthikāna kṣetraṃ amṛtāphalasya dātā // Lal_15.92
XXbsu022_u:3714: ena bahukalpakoṭī dānadamasaṃyamenā samudānitāsya bodhiḥ sattvakaruṇāyamānā /
XXbsu022_u:3715: eṣa pariśuddhaśīlo suvrata akhaṇḍacārī na ca kāma naiva bhogāṃ prārthentu śīlarakṣī // Lal_15.93
XXbsu022_u:3716: eṣa sada kṣāntivādī chidyanti aṅgamaṅge na ca krodhu naiva roṣaḥ sattvaparitrāyaṇārtham /
XXbsu022_u:3717: eṣa sada vīryavanto avikhinna kalpakoṭyaḥ samudānitāsya bodhiryaṣṭā ca yakṣakoṭīḥ // Lal_15.94
XXbsu022_u:3718: eṣa sada dhyānadhyāyī śāntapraśāntacitto dhyāyitva sarvakleśāṃ moceṣyi sattvakoṭīḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3719: eṣo asaṅga prājñaḥ kalpairvikalpamukto kalpairvimuktacitto jinu bheṣyate svayaṃbhūḥ // Lal_15.95
XXbsu022_u:3720: eṣa sada maitracitto karuṇāya pāraprāpto mudito upekṣadhyāyī brāhme pathi vidhijñaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3724: śaraṇaṃ bhayārditānāṃ dīpo acakṣuṣāṇāṃ layano upadrutānāṃ vaidyaścirāturāṇām /
XXbsu022_u:3725: rājeva dharmarājo indraḥ sahasranetro brahmasvayaṃbhubhūtaḥ kāyapraśabdhacitto // Lal_15.97
XXbsu022_u:3726: dhīraḥ prabhūtaprajño vīro viviktacittaḥ śūraḥ kileśaghātī ajitaṃjayo jitāriḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3727: siṃho bhayaprahīṇo nāgaḥ sudāntacitto ṛṣabho gaṇapradhānaḥ kṣāntaḥ prahīṇakopaḥ // Lal_15.98
XXbsu022_u:3730: padmaṃ anopaliptaṃ puṣpaṃ suśīlapatraṃ merūrakampi śāstā pṛthivī yathopajīvyo ratanākaro akṣobhyaḥ ena jitu kleśamāro ena jitu skandhamāro ena jitu mṛtyumāro nihato 'sya
XXbsu022_u:3732: eṣa maha sārthavāho kupathapratisthitānāṃ aṣṭāṅgamārgaśreṣṭhaṃ deśeṣyate nacireṇā // Lal_15.100
XXbsu022_u:3733: jaramaraṇakleśaghātī tamatimiravipramukto bhuvi divi ca saṃpraghuṣṭo jinu bheṣyate svayaṃbhūḥ
XXbsu022_u:3734: stuta stavitu aprameyo varapuruṣarūpadhārī yatpuṇya tvāṃ stavitvā bhoma yatha vādisiṃhaḥ // iti hi bhikṣavo 'bhiniṣkrānto bodhisattvo 'tikramya śākyānatikramya kroḍyānatikramya mallān maineyānāmanuvaineye niga me ṣaṭsu yojaneṣu /
XXbsu022_u:3736: tato bodhisattvo kaṇṭhakādavatīrya dharaṇītale sthitvā taṃ mahāntaṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragasaṃghaṃ visarjayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:3737: visarjya cāsyaitadabhūt -imānyābharaṇāni kaṇṭhakaṃ ca chandakasya haste visarjayāmīti //
XXbsu022_u:3740: yatra ca pradeśe chandako nivṛttastatra caityaṃ sthāpitamabhūt /
XXbsu022_u:3743: punaśca bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat - kathaṃ ca nāma cūḍā ca pravrajyā ceti
XXbsu022_u:3744: / sa khaḍgena cūḍāṃ chittvā antarikṣe kṣipati sma /
XXbsu022_u:3745: sā ca trāyatriṃśatā devaiḥ parigṛhītābhūt pūjārtham /
XXbsu022_u:3746: adyāpi ca trāyatriṃśatsu deveṣu cūḍāmaho vartate /
XXbsu022_u:3749: punarapi bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - kathaṃ hi nāma pravrajyā ca kāśikāni
XXbsu022_u:3751: sacedvanavāsānurūpāṇi kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi labheyam, śobhanaṃ syāt /
XXbsu022_u:3753: tatraiko devaputro divyaṃ rūpamantardhāpya lubdhakarūpeṇa kāṣāyavastraprāvṛto bodhisattvasya purato 'sthāt /
XXbsu022_u:3754: atha bodhisattvastametadavocat - sacenme tvaṃ mārṣā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dadyāḥ,
XXbsu022_u:3760: tatastena lubdhakarūpiṇā devaputreṇa bodhisattvāya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattānyabhūvan
XXbsu022_u:3762: atha sa devaputro gauravajātastāni vastrāṇi ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ śirasi kṛtvā tata eva devalokamagamat teṣāṃ pūjārtham
XXbsu022_u:3766: yadā ca bodhisattvena cūḍāṃ chittvā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi prāvṛtāni, tasmin samaye devaputraśatasahasrā hṛṣṭāstuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ
XXbsu022_u:3771: yāvajjarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ parimocya saṃsārasāgarāt pāramuttāryānuttare kṣeme 'bhaye 'śoke nirūpadrave śive virajase 'mṛte dharmadhātau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyatīti /
XXbsu022_u:3773: tato 'ntaḥpurikābhiḥ kumāramapaśyantībhiḥ grīṣmikavārṣikahaimantikeṣu prāsādeṣvāsaneṣu ca gṛheṣu parimāgamāṇā yadā na paśyanti sma, tadā ekībhūtābhiḥ kurarībhirivotkrṛṣṭamabhūt tatra kāścitstriyaḥ paramaśokārtā hā tātehi krandanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:3783: kāścidvikṣiptakeśyaḥ, kāścitkeśaṃ viluñcantyaḥ, kāścidūrdhvabāhavaḥ uccairutkrośanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:3784: kāścinmṛgya iva digdhaviddhāḥ sahasā pradhāvantyo (Vaidya 165) rudanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:3785: kāścinmārutakampitā iva kadalyaḥ pravikampyamānā rudanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:3787: kāścijjālotkṣiptamatsyā iva pṛthivyāṃ parivartyamānā rudanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:3788: kāścinmūlachinnā iva vṛkṣāḥ sahasā dharaṇītale nipatya rudanti sma //
XXbsu022_u:3789: taṃ ca śabdaṃ rājā śrutvā śākyānāmantrayate sma - kimetaduccairantaḥpure śabdaḥ śrūyate? śākyā vijñāya kathayanti sma - kumāraḥ kila mahārāja
XXbsu022_u:3795: mahāprajāpatyapi gautamī paridevamānā mahītale parivartate sma /
XXbsu022_u:3796: rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha kṣipraṃ māṃ mahārāja putreṇa samaṅginīṃ kuruṣveti //
XXbsu022_u:3798: gacchata, yāvatkumāraṃ na paśyatha, tāvanmā nivartayatha //
XXbsu022_u:3800: te maṅgaladvāreṇa gacchantaḥ paśyanti sma antarāpathi puṣpavarṣaṃ prapatitam /
XXbsu022_u:3803: te svalpamantaraṃ gatvā taṃ devaputraṃ paśyanti sma bodhisattvasya kāśikavastrāṇi śirasi kṛtvā āgacchantam /
XXbsu022_u:3805: mā khalvanenaiṣāṃ vastrāṇāmarthe kumāro jīvitādvyaparopitaḥ syāt /
XXbsu022_u:3809: tataste parasparamūcuḥ - mā tāvadbhoḥ sāhasaṃ mā kārṣṭa /
XXbsu022_u:3811: te chandakaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - he chandaka, mā khalvanenaiva puruṣeṇa
XXbsu022_u:3814: api tu anena kumārāya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattāni /
XXbsu022_u:3816: atha sa devaputrastāni vastrāṇyubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ śirasi kṛtvā tata eva devalokamagamat teṣāṃ pūjārtham //
XXbsu022_u:3817: evaṃ ca te bhūyaśchandakaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - tatkiṃ manyase chandaka
XXbsu022_u:3818: gacchāmo vayam? śakyaḥ kumāraḥ pratinivartayitum? sa āha - mā khalu /
XXbsu022_u:3820: evaṃ ca tenoktam - na tāvadahaṃ punarapi kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pravekṣyāmi, yāvanme nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeti /
XXbsu022_u:3824: tatastānyābharaṇāni cireṇa kālena bhadrikasya śākyakumārasya mahānāmno
XXbsu022_u:3826: tāni mahānārāyaṇasaṃghaṭanakāyārthamanye (Vaidya 166) nārāyaṇasaṃhananā na śaknuvanti sma dhārayitum /
XXbsu022_u:3827: yadā na kaścittāni dhārayituṃ śaknoti sma, tadā mahāprajāpatyā gautamyā
XXbsu022_u:3828: cintitamabhūt - yāvadahamimānyābharaṇāni paśyāmi, tāvanmama hṛdaye śoko
XXbsu022_u:3831: tato mahāprajāpatī gautamī tānyābharaṇāni puṣkariṇyāṃ prakṣipati sma /
XXbsu022_u:3834: niṣkrāntu śūro yada vidu bodhisattvo nagaraṃ vibuddhaṃ kapilapuraṃ samagram /
XXbsu022_u:3835: manyanti sarve śayanagato kumāro anyonya hṛṣṭāḥ pramudita ālabhante //
XXbsu022_u:3836: gopā vibuddhā tatha api istrigārā śayanaṃ nirīkṣī na ca dṛśi bodhisattvam /
XXbsu022_u:3837: utkrośu mukto narapatino agāre hā vañcitāḥ smaḥ kahi gatu bodhisattvo //
XXbsu022_u:3838: rājā śruṇitvā dharaṇitale nirasto utkrośu kṛtvā aho mama ekaputro /
XXbsu022_u:3839: so stemito hi jalaghaṭasaṃprasikto āśvāsayantī bahuśata śākiyānām //
XXbsu022_u:3840: gopā śayāto dharaṇitale nipatya keśāṃ lunātī avaśiri bhūṣaṇāni /
XXbsu022_u:3841: aho subhāṣṭaṃ mama puri nāyakenā sarvapriyebhirnaciratu viprayogaḥ //
XXbsu022_u:3842: rūpā surūpā vimalavicitritāṅgā acchā viśuddhā jagati priyā manāpā /
XXbsu022_u:3843: dhanyā praśastā divi bhuvi pūjanīyā kva tvaṃ gato 'si mama śayi chorayitvā
XXbsu022_u:3844: na pāsyi pānaṃ na ca madhu na pramādaṃ bhūmau śayiṣye jaṭamakuṭaṃ dhariṣye
XXbsu022_u:3845: snānaṃ jahitvā vratatapa ācariṣye yāvanna drakṣye guṇadharu bodhisattvam // Lal_15.107
XXbsu022_u:3847: udyāna sarve aphala apatrapuṣpā hārā viśuddhā tamarajapāṃśutulyāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3848: veśmaṃ na śobhī aṭavi puraṃ prakāśaṃ yattena tyaktaṃ naravarapuṃgavena //
XXbsu022_u:3849: hā gītavādyāḥ sumadhura mañjughoṣāḥ hā istrigārā vigalita bhūṣaṇābhiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3850: hā hemajālaiḥ parisphuṭamantarikṣaṃ na bhūyu drakṣye guṇadharaviprahīṇā //
XXbsu022_u:3851: mātṛsvasā cā paramasukṛcchraprāptā āśvāsayāti ma rudahi śākyakanye /
XXbsu022_u:3852: pūrve ca uktaṃ naravarapuṃgavena kartāsmi loke jaramaraṇātpramokṣam //
XXbsu022_u:3853: so cā maharṣī kuśalasahasra cīrṇaḥ ṣaḍ yojanāni pratigatu rātriśeṣe /
XXbsu022_u:3854: chandasya detī hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni chandā gṛhītvā kapilapuraṃ prayāhi //
XXbsu022_u:3855: mātāpitaṇāṃ mama vacanena pṛcche gataḥ kumāro na ca puna śocayethā /
XXbsu022_u:3856: buddhitva bodhiṃ punarihamāgamiṣye dharmaṃ śruṇitvā bhaviṣyatha śāntacittāḥ // Lal_15.112
XXbsu022_u:3857: chando rudanto pratibhaṇi nāyakasya na me 'sti śaktirbalata parākramo vā /
XXbsu022_u:3858: haneyu mahyaṃ naravarajñātisaṃghāḥ chandā kva nīto guṇadharu bodhisattvo // Lal_15.113
XXbsu022_u:3859: mā tāhi chandā pratibhaṇi bodhisattvo tuṣṭā bhavitvā api mama jñātisaṃghāḥ
XXbsu022_u:3860: śāstārasaṃjñā tvayi sada bhāviṣyanti premeṇa mahyaṃ tvayamapi vartiṣyante // Lal_15.114
XXbsu022_u:3861: chando gṛhītvā hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni udyānaprāpto naravarapuṃgavasya /
XXbsu022_u:3863: udyānapālaḥ pramuditu vegajāto ānandaśabdaṃ pratibhaṇi śākiyānām //
XXbsu022_u:3864: ayaṃ kumāro hayavaru chandakaśca udyānaprāpto na ca puna śocitavyo /
