XXbsu022_u:3865: rājā śraṇitvā parivṛtu śākiyebhiḥ udyānaprāpto pramuditu vegajāto //
XXbsu022_u:3866: gopā viditvā dṛḍhamati bodhisattvaṃ no cāpi harṣī na ca gira śraddadhāti /
XXbsu022_u:3867: asthānametadvinigatu yatkumāro aprāpya bodhiṃ punariha āgameyā //
XXbsu022_u:3868: dṛṣṭvā tu rājā hayavaru chandakaṃ ca utkrośu kṛtvā dharaṇitale nirasto /
XXbsu022_u:3869: hā mahya putrā sukuśalagītavādyā kva tvaṃ gato 'si vijahiya sarvarājyam //
XXbsu022_u:3870: sādhū bhaṇāhi vacana mameha chandā kiṃ vā prayogaḥ kva ca gatu bodhisattvaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3871: kenātha nīto vivarita kena dvārā pūjā ca tasyā katha kṛta devasaṃghaiḥ //
XXbsu022_u:3872: chando bhaṇātī śṛṇu mama pārthivendrā rātrau prasupte nagari sabālavṛddhe
XXbsu022_u:3873: so mañjughoṣo mama bhaṇi bodhisattvo chandā dadāhi mama laghu aśvarājam //
XXbsu022_u:3874: so bodhayāmi naragaṇi nārisaṃghaṃ suptā prasuptā na ca gira te śruṇanti /
XXbsu022_u:3875: so rodamāno dadi ahu aśvarājaṃ hanta vrajāhī hitakara yena kāmam //
XXbsu022_u:3876: śakreṇa dvārā vivarita yantrayuktāḥ pālāścatasro hayacaraṇe śiliṣṭāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3877: ārūḍhi śūre pracalita trisahasrāḥ mārgo nabhe 'smin suvipula yena krānto
XXbsu022_u:3879: ābhā pramuktā vihatatamondhakārā puṣpā patiṃsū turiyaśatā raṇiṃṣū /
XXbsu022_u:3880: devāḥ staviṃsū tathapi hi cāpsarāṇi nabhasā prayāto parivṛtu devasaṃghaiḥ
XXbsu022_u:3881: chando gṛhītvā hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni antaḥpure so upagatu rodamāno /
XXbsu022_u:3882: dṛṣṭvā tu gopā hayavaru chandakaṃ ca saṃmūrchayitvā dharaṇitale nirastā //
XXbsu022_u:3883: udyukta sarvā suvipula nārisaṃghāḥ vāriṃ gṛhītvā snapayiṣu śākyakanyām /
XXbsu022_u:3884: mā haiva kālaṃ kariṣyati śokaprāptā dvābhyāṃ priyābhyāṃ bahu bhavi viprayogo // Lal_15.125
XXbsu022_u:3885: sthāmaṃ janitvā suduḥkhita śākyakanyā kaṇṭhe 'valambyā hayavaraaśvarāje /
XXbsu022_u:3886: anusmaritvā purimaka kāmakrīḍāṃ nānāpralāpī pralapati śokaprāptā //
XXbsu022_u:3887: hā mahya prītijananā hā mama narapuṃgavā vimalacandramukhā /
XXbsu022_u:3888: hā mama surūparūpā hā mama varalakṣaṇā vimalatejadharā // Lal_15.127 //
XXbsu022_u:3889: hā mama aninditāṅgā sujāta anupūrvaudgatā asamā /
XXbsu022_u:3890: hā mama guṇāgradhāriṃ naramarūbhiḥ pūjitā paramakārūṇikā // Lal_15.128 //
XXbsu022_u:3892: hā mama sumāñjaghoṣā kalaviṅkarutasvarā madhurabrahmarutā // Lal_15.129 //
XXbsu022_u:3894: hā mama anantavarṇā guṇagaṇapratimaṇḍitā ṛṣigaṇaprītikarā // Lal_15.130 //
XXbsu022_u:3895: hā mama sujātajātā lumbinivana uttame bhramaragītarute /
XXbsu022_u:3896: hā mama vighuṣṭaśabdā divi bhuvi abhipūjitā vipulajñānadrumā // Lal_15.131
XXbsu022_u:3897: hā mama rasārasāgrā bimboṣṭhā kamalalocanā kanakanibhā /
XXbsu022_u:3899: hā mama sunāsa subhrū ūrṇābhru mukhāntare sthitā vimalā /
XXbsu022_u:3900: hā mama suvṛttaskandhā cāpodara eṇeyajaṅghavṛttakaṭī // Lal_15.133 //
XXbsu022_u:3903: iti tasya bhūṣaṇāni puṇyehi kṛtāni pārthive prītikarā // Lal_15.134 //
XXbsu022_u:3905: hā mahya puṣpagandhā antaḥpuri gītavāditairharṣakarā // Lal_15.135 //
XXbsu022_u:3906: hā kaṇṭhakā sujātā mama bhartu sahāyakastvayā kva nīto /
XXbsu022_u:3907: hā chandakā nikaruṇā na bodhayasi gacchamānake naravariṣṭhe // Lal_15.136
XXbsu022_u:3908: gacchatyayaṃ hitakaro ekā gira tasminnantari na bhasi kasmāt /
XXbsu022_u:3909: itu adya puravarāto gacchati naradamyasārathiḥ kāruṇikaḥ // Lal_15.137 //
XXbsu022_u:3910: katha vā gato hitakaro kena ca niṣkramito itu sa rājakulāt /
XXbsu022_u:3911: katamāṃ diśāmanugato dhanyā vanagulmadevatā yāsya sakhī // Lal_15.138 //
XXbsu022_u:3912: atiduḥkha mahya chandā nidhidarśiya netrauddhṛtā cakṣudadā /
XXbsu022_u:3914: tānapi jahitva nirgatu kiṃ punarima istrikāmaratim /
XXbsu022_u:3915: hā dhik priyairviyogo naṭaraṅgasvabhāvasaṃnibhā anityā // Lal_15.140 //
XXbsu022_u:3917: prāgeva tena bhaṇitaṃ nāsti jarāmaraṇasaṃskṛte kāści sakhā // Lal_15.141
XXbsu022_u:3919: buddhitva bodhivirajāṃ punarapi etū ihā puravareṃ asmin // Lal_15.142 //
XXbsu022_u:3921: sāśrukaṇṭha gira saṃprabhāṣate sādhu gopi niśṛṇohi me vacaḥ // Lal_15.143
XXbsu022_u:3922: rātriye rahasi yāmi madhyame sarvanārigaṇi saṃprasuptake /
XXbsu022_u:3923: so tadā ca śatapuṇyaudgato ālapeti mama dehi kaṇṭhakam // Lal_15.144 //
XXbsu022_u:3924: taṃ niśāmya vacanaṃ tadantaraṃ tubhya prekṣami śayāni suptikām /
XXbsu022_u:3925: uccaghoṣu ahu tatra muñcamī utthi gopi ayu yāti te priyo // Lal_15.145 //
XXbsu022_u:3927: devatā vacanu taṃ nirodhayi eka istri napi kāci budhyate /
XXbsu022_u:3928: rodamāna samalaṃkaritvanā aśvarāju dadamī narottame // Lal_15.146 //
XXbsu022_u:3929: kaṇṭhako hiṣati ugratejasvī krośamātru svaru tasya gacchatī /
XXbsu022_u:3930: no ca kaści śṛṇute purottame devatābhi osvāpanaṃ kṛtam // Lal_15.147 //
XXbsu022_u:3932: sā raṇī madhurabhīṣmaśobhanā no ca keci śṛṇuvanti mānuṣāḥ // Lal_15.148 //
XXbsu022_u:3933: puṣyayuktu abhu tasmi antare candrajyotiṣa nabhe pratisthitā /
XXbsu022_u:3934: devakoṭi gagane kṛtāñjalī onamanti śirasābhivandiṣū // Lal_15.149 //
XXbsu022_u:3936: kaṇṭhakasya caraṇāṃ kare nyasī padmakeśaraviśuddhanirmalam // Lal_15.150
XXbsu022_u:3938: ṣaḍvikāra dharaṇī prakampitā buddhakṣetra sphuṭa ābhanirmalā // Lal_15.151
XXbsu022_u:3939: śakra devaguruḥ śacīpatiḥ svāma dvāra vivarī tadantare /
XXbsu022_u:3940: devakoṭinayutaiḥ puraskṛto so vrajī amaranāgapūjito // Lal_15.152 //
XXbsu022_u:3941: saṃjñamātra iha jāti kaṇṭhako lokanāthu vahatī nabho 'ntare /
XXbsu022_u:3943: devadānavagaṇā saindrikāḥ ye vahanti sugatasya gacchataḥ // Lal_15.153 //
XXbsu022_u:3945: kaṇṭhakasya balu te dadantikāḥ muñci ghoṣu madhuraṃ manoramam //
XXbsu022_u:3946: kaṇṭhakā vahahi lokanāyakaṃ śīghra śīghra ma janehi khedatām /
XXbsu022_u:3948: ekameka abhinandate suro vāhanaṃ smi ahu lokanāyake /
XXbsu022_u:3949: no ca kiṃcidapi deśu vidyate devakoṭicaraṇairna marditam // Lal_15.156 //
XXbsu022_u:3950: paśya kaṇṭhaka nabhontare imaṃ mārgu saṃsthitu vicitraśobhanam /
XXbsu022_u:3952: ena kaṇṭhaka śubhena karmaṇā trāyatriṃśabhavane sunirmito /
XXbsu022_u:3953: apsarai parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto divyakāmaratibhī ramiṣyase // Lal_15.158 //
XXbsu022_u:3954: sādhu gopi ma khu bhūyu rodahī tuṣṭa bhohi paramapraharṣitā /
XXbsu022_u:3955: drakṣase nacirato narottamaṃ bodhiprāptamamaraiḥ puraskṛtam // Lal_15.159
XXbsu022_u:3956: ye narāḥ sukṛtakarmakārakāḥ te na gopi sada roditavyakāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3957: so ca puṇyaśatatejaudgato harṣitavya na sa roditavyakaḥ // Lal_15.160 //
XXbsu022_u:3959: saptarātra bhaṇabhānu gopike sā viyūha napi śakya kṣepitum /
XXbsu022_u:3960: yā viyūha abhu tatra pārthive niṣkramanti naradevapūjite // Lal_15.161 //
XXbsu022_u:3961: lābha tubhya paramā acintiyā yaṃ tyupasthitu jage hitaṃkaro /
XXbsu022_u:3962: mahya saṃjñi svakameva vartate tvaṃ hi bheṣyasi yathā narottamaḥ //
XXbsu022_u:3968: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavaśchandako bodhisattvādhisthānena rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyāśca sarvasya cāntaḥpurasya sarvasya ca śākyagaṇasya śokavinodakathāmakārṣīt //
XXbsu022_u:3969: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lubdhakarūpāya devaputrāya kāśikāni vastrāṇi dattvā tasya sakāśātkāṣāyāni vastrāṇi gṛhītvā svayameva pravajyāṃ lokānuvartanāmupādāya sattvānukampāyai sattvaparipācanārtham atha bodhisattvo yenaiva śākyā brāhmaṇyā āśramastenopasaṃkrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:3970: sā bodhisattvaṃ vāsena bhaktena copanimantrayate sma /
XXbsu022_u:3971: tato bodhisattvaḥ padmāyā brāhmaṇyā āśramaṃ gacchati sma /
XXbsu022_u:3976: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo 'nupūrveṇa vaiśālīṃ mahānagarīmanuprāpto 'bhut
XXbsu022_u:3977: tena khalu punaḥ samayenārāḍaḥ kālāpo vaiśālīmupanisṛtya prativasati sma mahatā śrāvakasaṃghena sārdhaṃ tribhiḥ śiṣyaśataiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3978: sa śiṣyebhya ākiṃcanyāyatanasahavratāyai dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:3979: sa bodhisattvaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptaḥ śiṣyānāmantrayate sma - paśyata paśyata bho rūpamasyeti /
XXbsu022_u:3986: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - asti me chando 'sti vīryamasti smṛtirasti samādhirasti prajñā, yannvahameko 'pramatta ātāpī vyapakṛṣṭo vihareyaṃ
XXbsu022_u:3988: atha khalvahaṃ bhikṣavo eko 'pramatta ātāpī vyapakṛṣṭo viharannalpakṛcchreṇaivaṃ taṃ dharmamadhyavagacchan sākṣādakārṣam //
XXbsu022_u:3990: etāvadbho tvayā ārāḍa dharmo 'dhigataḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ? so 'vocat -
XXbsu022_u:3992: tamahamavocat - mayāpi bho eṣa dharmaḥ sākṣātkṛto 'dhigataḥ /
XXbsu022_u:3993: so 'vocat - tena hi bho gautama yadahaṃ dharma jānāmi,
XXbsu022_u:3994: bhavānapi taṃ jānāti, yaṃ bhavān jānāti, ahamapi taṃ jānāmi /
XXbsu022_u:3996: iti hi bhikṣava ārāḍaḥ kālāpaḥ paramayā pūjayā māṃ pūjayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:3997: antevāsiṣu ca māṃ samānārthatayā sthāpayati sma //
XXbsu022_u:3999: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - ayaṃ khalvārāḍasya dharmo na nairyāṇiko na
XXbsu022_u:4000: niryāti, tatkatarasya samyagduḥkhakṣayāya? yannvahamata uttari paryeṣamāṇaścareyam //
XXbsu022_u:4001: atha khalvahaṃ bhikṣavo yathābhirāmaṃ vaiśālyāṃ vihṛtya magadheṣu ca prakrānto 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:4002: so 'haṃ magadheṣu caryāṃ caran yena māgadhakānāṃ rājagṛhaṃ nagaraṃ tadanusṛto yena ca pāṇḍavaḥ
XXbsu022_u:4006: tato 'haṃ kalyameva saṃnivāsya pātracīvaramādāya tapodadvāreṇa rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat prāsādikenābhikrāntena pratikrāntena vyavalokitena saṃmiñjitena prasāritena prāsādikena saṃghāṭīpaṭapātracīvaradhāraṇenāvikṣiptairindriyairabahirgatena mānasena
XXbsu022_u:4008: tatra māṃ rājagṛhakā manuṣyā dṛṣṭvā vismitā abhūvan - kiṃ svidayaṃ brahmā bhaviṣyati śakro devānāmindra āhosvidvaiśravaṇo āhosvitkiṃcidgiridaivatam //
XXbsu022_u:4010: atha vimaladharo hyanantatejo svayamiha pravrajiyāna bodhisattvaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4011: śāntamanu dānta īryavanto viharati pāṇḍavaśailarājapārśve // Lal_16.1 //
XXbsu022_u:4012: rajani vigatu jñātva bodhisattvaḥ paramasudarśaniyaṃ nivāsayitvā /
XXbsu022_u:4013: pātra pratigṛhīya nīcamāno praviśati rājagṛhaṃ sapiṇḍapātram // Lal_16.2
XXbsu022_u:4015: naragaṇa tatha nāri prekṣamāṇo na ca bhavate kvaci tṛpti darśanena //
XXbsu022_u:4016: vīthi racita ratnavastradhāryai avaśiriyā janu yāti pṛṣṭhato 'sya /
XXbsu022_u:4017: ko nu ayu adṛṣṭapūrvasattvo yasya prabhāya puraṃ vibhāti sarvam //
XXbsu022_u:4018: upari sthihiya nāriṇāṃ sahasrā tathariva dvāri tathaiva vātayāne /
XXbsu022_u:4020: rathya bharita gehi śūnya kṛtvā naravaru prekṣiṣu te ananyakarmāḥ //
XXbsu022_u:4021: na ca bhuyu krayavikrayaṃ karontī na ca puna sauṇḍa pibanti madyapānam /
XXbsu022_u:4022: na ca gṛhi na ca vīthiye ramante puruṣavarasya nirīkṣamāṇa rūpam //
XXbsu022_u:4023: puruṣa tvaritu gacchi rājagehaṃ avaciṣu rāja sa bimbisāra tuṣṭo /
XXbsu022_u:4024: deva parama tubhya labdha lābhā svayamiha brahma pure carāti piṇḍam //
XXbsu022_u:4025: keci avaci śakra devarājo apari bhaṇanti suyāma devaputraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4026: tatha api saṃtuṣitaṃ va nirmitaśca apari bhaṇanti sunirmiteṣu devaḥ //
XXbsu022_u:4027: keci puna bhaṇanti candrasūryau tathapi ca rāhu baliśca vemacitrī /
XXbsu022_u:4028: keci puna bhaṇanti vācamevaṃ ayu so pāṇḍavaśailarājavāsī // Lal_16.9 //
XXbsu022_u:4029: vacanamimu śruṇitva pārthivo 'sau paramaudagramanā sthito gavākṣe /
XXbsu022_u:4030: prekṣati varasattva bodhisattvaṃ jvalatu śirīya sudhātukāñcanaṃ vā //
XXbsu022_u:4031: piṇḍa dadiya rāja bimbisāraḥ puruṣamavocannirīkṣa kva prayātī /
XXbsu022_u:4032: dṛṣṭva girivaraṃ sa gacchamāno avaciṣu deva gataḥ sa śailapārśvam //
XXbsu022_u:4033: rajani vigatu jñātva bimbisāro mahata janaiḥ parivārito narendraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4034: upagami pāṇḍavaśailarājamūle śiriya jvalantu tamadṛśāti śailam //
XXbsu022_u:4036: dharaṇi vrajitu yāni oruhitvā paramasugaurava prekṣi bodhisattvam /
XXbsu022_u:4037: meruriva yathā hyakampamāno nyasiya tṛṇāni niṣaṇṇa sostikena // Lal_16.13
XXbsu022_u:4038: śirasi caraṇi vandayitva rājā vividhakathāṃ samudāharitva vocat /
XXbsu022_u:4039: dadami tava upārdhu sarvarājyād rama iha kāmaguṇairahaṃ ca piṇḍam //
XXbsu022_u:4040: prabhaṇati giri bodhisattva ślakṣṇaṃ dharaṇipate ciramāyu pālayasva /
XXbsu022_u:4041: ahamapi pravijahya rājyamiṣṭaṃ pravrajito nirapekṣi śāntihetoḥ //
XXbsu022_u:4043: vipula dhana pratīccha nārisaṃghaṃ iha mama rājyi vasāhi bhuṅkṣva kāmāṃ //
XXbsu022_u:4044: paramapramudito 'smi daśanātte avaciṣu sa māgadharāja bodhisattvam /
XXbsu022_u:4045: bhavahi mama sahāyu sarvarājyaṃ ahu tava dāsyi prabhūta bhuṅkṣva kāmāṃ //
XXbsu022_u:4046: mā ca puna vane vasāhi śūnye ma bhuyu tṛṇeṣu vasāhi bhūmivāsam /
XXbsu022_u:4047: paramasukumāru tubhya kāyo iha mama rājyi vasāhi bhuṅkṣva kāmāṃ //
XXbsu022_u:4048: prabhaṇati giri bodhisattva ślakṣṇaṃ akuṭila premaṇiyā hitānukampī /
XXbsu022_u:4049: svasti dharaṇipāla te 'stu nityaṃ na ca ahu kāmaguṇebhirarthiko 'smi //
XXbsu022_u:4051: vidubhi vigarhita cāpyanārya kāmā jahita mayā yathā pakvakheṭapiṇḍam //
XXbsu022_u:4053: kāma drumaphalā yathā patantī yathamiva abhrabalāhakā vrajanti /
XXbsu022_u:4054: adhruva capalagāmi mārutaṃ vā vikiraṇa sarvaśubhasya vañcanīyā //
XXbsu022_u:4055: kāma alabhamāna dahyayante tatha api labdha na tṛpti vindayantī /
XXbsu022_u:4056: yada puna avaśasya bhakṣayante tada mahaduḥkha janenti ghora kāmāḥ //
XXbsu022_u:4057: kāma dharaṇipāla ye ca divyā tatha api mānuṣa kāma ye praṇītā /
XXbsu022_u:4058: eku naru labheta sarvakāmāṃ na ca so tṛpti labheta bhūyu eṣan // Lal_16.23
XXbsu022_u:4059: ye tu dharaṇipāla śāntadāntā ārya anāśrava dharmapūrṇasaṃjñā /
XXbsu022_u:4060: prajñaviduṣa tṛpta te sutṛptā na ca puna kāmaguṇeṣu kāci tṛptiḥ //
XXbsu022_u:4061: kāma dharaṇipāla sevamānā purima na vidyati koṭi saṃskṛtasya /
XXbsu022_u:4062: lavaṇajala yathā hi nārū pītvā bhuyu tṛṣa vardhati kāma sevamāne //
XXbsu022_u:4063: api ca dharaṇipāla paśya kāyaṃ adhruvamasāraku duḥkhayantrametat /
XXbsu022_u:4064: navabhi vraṇamukhaiḥ sadā sravantaṃ na mama narādhipa kāmachandarāgaḥ //
XXbsu022_u:4065: ahamapi vipulāṃ vijahya kāmāṃ tathapi ca istrisahasra darśanīyāṃ /
XXbsu022_u:4066: anabhiratu bhaveṣu nirgato 'haṃ paramaśivāṃ varabodhi prāptukāmaḥ //
XXbsu022_u:4068: katama diśi kuto gato 'si bhikṣo kva ca tava janma kva te pitā kva mātā /
XXbsu022_u:4070: kṣatriya atha brāhmaṇo 'tha rājā parikatha bhikṣu yadī na bhārasaṃjñā //
XXbsu022_u:4072: śratu ti dharaṇipāla śākiyānāṃ kapilapuraṃ paramaṃ suṛddhisphītam /
XXbsu022_u:4073: pitu mama śuddhodaneti nāmnā tanu ahu pravrajito guṇābhilāṣī // Lal_16.29
XXbsu022_u:4075: sādhu tava sudṛṣṭadarśanaṃ te yanu tava janma vayaṃ pi tasya śiṣyāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4076: api ca mama kṣamasva āśayenā yamapi nimantritu kāmavītarāgo // Lal_16.30
XXbsu022_u:4077: yadi tvaya anuprāptu bhoti bodhiḥ tada mama seti bhoti dharmasvāmim /
XXbsu022_u:4078: api ca mama purā sulabdha lābhā mama vijite vasasīha yatsvayaṃbho //
XXbsu022_u:4079: punarapi caraṇāni vandayitvā kṛtva pradakṣiṇu gauraveṇa rājā /
XXbsu022_u:4080: svakajanaparivārito narendraḥ punarapi rājagṛhaṃ anupraviṣṭaḥ // Lal_16.32
XXbsu022_u:4081: magadhapuri praveśi lokanātho vihariya śāntamanā yathābhiprāyam /
XXbsu022_u:4082: arthu kariya devamānuṣāṇāṃ upagami tīru nirañjanā narendraḥ // Lal_16.33
XXbsu022_u:4087: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena rudrako nāma rāmaputro rājagṛhaṃ nāma mahānagaramupanisṛtya viharati sma mahatā śiṣyagaṇena sārdhaṃ saptabhiḥ śiṣyaśataiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4088: sa tebhyo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasahavratāyai dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4089: adrākṣīt khalvapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo rudrakaṃ rāmaputraṃ saṃghegaṇinaṃ gaṇācāryaṃ jñātamabhīpsitaṃ bahujanapūjitaṃ paṇḍitasaṃmatam /
XXbsu022_u:4090: dṛṣṭvā cāsyaitadabhūt - ayaṃ khalvapi rudrako rāmaputraḥ saṃghegaṇī gaṇācāryaḥ jñāto 'bhīpsito bahujanapūjitaḥ paṇḍitasaṃmataḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4091: sacedahamasyāntikamupasaṃkramya vratatapamārabheyam, naiṣa mamāntike viśiṣṭasaṃjño bhavennāpi pratyakṣajñānena jñāto bhavennāpi saṃskṛtānāṃ
XXbsu022_u:4092: sāśravānāṃ sopādānānāṃ dhyānasamādhisamāpattīnāṃ doṣo datto bhavet /
XXbsu022_u:4093: yannvahaṃ tathārupamupāyamupasaṃdarśayeyaṃ yenaite ca pratyakṣā bhaveyuḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4094: dhyānagocarāṇāṃ ca samāpattyārambaṇānāṃ laukikasamādhīnāmaniḥsaraṇatā darśitā bhavet /
XXbsu022_u:4095: yannvahaṃ rudrakasya rāmaputrasya sakāśamupasaṃkramya svasamādhiguṇaviśeṣodbhāvanārthaṃ śiṣyatvamabhyupagamya saṃskṛtasamādhīnāmasāratāmupadarśayeyamiti //
XXbsu022_u:4096: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattva idamarthavaśamadhikṛtya yena rudrako rāmaputrastenopasaṃkrāmat
XXbsu022_u:4098: kaste mārṣa śāstā, kasya vā dharmaṃ deśitamājānāsi?
XXbsu022_u:4099: ityevamukte rudrako rāmaputro bodhisattvamevamāha - na me mārṣa
XXbsu022_u:4101: api tu khalu punaḥ svayameva mayedaṃ samyagadhigatamiti /
XXbsu022_u:4104: bodhisattva āha - labhemahi vayaṃ bhavataḥ sakāśādavavādānuśāsanīyasya samādhermārgam? āha
XXbsu022_u:4107: tato bodhisattva ekāntaṃ gatvā paryaṅkamābhujyopaviśati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4108: samanantaropaviṣṭasya ca bodhisattvasya puṇyaviśeṣeṇa ca jñānaviśeṣeṇa ca pūrvasucaritacaryāphalaviśeṣeṇa ca sarvasamādhiparicayaviśeṣeṇa ca dhyānapramukhāni sarvāṇi laukikāni lokottarāṇi samāpattiśatānyāmukhībhavanti sma sākārāṇi soddeśāni yathāpi taccittavaśavartitvāt /
XXbsu022_u:4109: atha ca bodhisattvaḥ smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan utthāyāsanādyena rudrako rāmaputrastenopasaṃkrāmat
XXbsu022_u:4110: upasaṃkramya rudrakaṃ rāmaputramevamāha astyanyo 'pi mārṣa kaściduttare naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattermārgaḥ? so 'bravīt - nāstīti //
XXbsu022_u:4111: tato bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat - na khalu rudrakasyaivāsti śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā
XXbsu022_u:4112: mamāpyasti śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā /
XXbsu022_u:4113: atha bodhisattvo rudrakaṃ rāmaputramevamāha - mayāpyeṣa mārṣa dharmo
XXbsu022_u:4115: so 'vocat - tena hyāgaccha, tvaṃ cāhaṃ cemaṃ gaṇaṃ pariharāva iti /
XXbsu022_u:4119: nirvṛtaye na virāgāya na nirodhāya nopaśamāya nābhijñāyai na saṃbodhaye na śrāmaṇāya na brāhmaṇāya na nirvāṇāya saṃvartate //
XXbsu022_u:4120: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo rudrakasya rāmaputrasya saśiṣyasyāvarjanīkṛtva yāvadalamiti kṛtvā prakrāmat - alaṃ mamāneneti //
XXbsu022_u:4121: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcakā bhadravargīyā rudrake rāmaputre brahmacaryaṃ caranti sma
XXbsu022_u:4123: dīrgharātraṃ ghaṭāmahe udyujyāmahe, na ca śaknumo 'ntaṃ vā paryantaṃ cādhigantum, tacchramaṇena gautamenālpakakṛcchaṇādhigantuṃ sākṣātkṛtam /
XXbsu022_u:4128: evaṃ vimṛṣya pañcakā bhadravargīyā rudrakarāmaputrasakāśādapakramya bodhisattvamanvabadhnan
XXbsu022_u:4129: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathābhipretaṃ rājagṛhe vihṛtya magadheṣu cārikāṃ prakrāmat sārdhaṃ pañcakairbhadravargīyaiḥ //
XXbsu022_u:4130: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāntarācca rājagṛhasya antarācca gayāyā yo 'nyatamo
XXbsu022_u:4131: gaṇa utsavaṃ karoti sma, tena ca gaṇena bodhisattvo 'bhinimantrito 'bhūt
XXbsu022_u:4133: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo magadheṣu caryāṃ caran yena māgadhakānāṃ gayā tāmanusṛtya tāmanuprāpto 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:4134: tatra khalvapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ prahāṇārthī viharati sma gayāśīrṣe parvate /
XXbsu022_u:4135: tatrāsya viharatastisra upamāḥ pratibhānti sma aśrutapūrvā anabhijñātapūrvāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4136: katamāstisraḥ? ye kecitte khalvapi śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo 'navakṛṣṭakāyā viharanti sma
XXbsu022_u:4138: yāpi caiṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandiḥ kāmeṣu rāgaḥ kāmeṣu chandaḥ kāmeṣu tṛṣṇā kāmeṣu pipāsā kāmeṣu mūrchā kāmeṣu paridāhaḥ kāmeṣvadhyavasānatā, sāpyanupaśāntā /
XXbsu022_u:4139: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante
XXbsu022_u:4140: atha tarhi abhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
XXbsu022_u:4141: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo 'gnyarthī jyotirgaveṣī jyotiṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ sa ārdraṃ kāṣṭhamādāya ārdrāṃ cottarāraṇīmudake prakṣipya mathnīyāt, abhavyo
XXbsu022_u:4143: evameva ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo 'navakṛṣṭakāyā anavakṛṣṭacittāśca viharanti, yāpyeṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandiḥ kāmeṣu rāgaḥ kāmeṣu chandaḥ kāmeṣu tṛṣṇā kāmeṣu pipāsā kāmeṣu mūrchā kāmeṣu paridāhaḥ kāmeṣvadhyavasānaṃ tadapyanupaśāntam /
XXbsu022_u:4144: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante
XXbsu022_u:4146: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prathamā upamā pratibhāti sma //
XXbsu022_u:4148: bhūyaścāsyaitadabhūt - ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyacittā viharanti, yāpi teṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandīti sarvaṃ kartavyaṃ
XXbsu022_u:4150: sa ārdraṃ kāṣṭhamādāya sthale sthāpayitvā ārdrāṃ cottarāraṇiṃ mathnīyāt, abhavyo 'sāvagnimutpādayitum
XXbsu022_u:4151: evameva ye ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇā iti sarvaṃ pūrvavatkāryaṃ yāvadabhavyā uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
XXbsu022_u:4152: iyaṃ dvitīyā upamā pratibhāti sma pūrvamaśrutā cāvijñātā ca //
XXbsu022_u:4153: punaraparaṃ ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇā bhavantaḥ kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyacittā
XXbsu022_u:4157: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante
XXbsu022_u:4158: atha khalu punarbhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum
XXbsu022_u:4159: tadyathāpi nāma iha syātpuruṣo 'gnyarthī jyotirgaveṣī jyotiḥ paryeṣamāṇaḥ, sa śuṣkaṃ kāṣṭhamādāya śuṣkāṃ cottarāraṇiṃ sthale pratiṣṭhāpya mathnīyāt, sa bhavyo 'gnimabhinirvartayituṃ tejaḥ prāduṣkartum /
XXbsu022_u:4160: evameva ya ime bhavantaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇā iti sarvaṃ yāvadvedanāṃ vedayanta iti /
XXbsu022_u:4161: atha ca punarbhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
XXbsu022_u:4162: iyaṃ tṛtīyā upamā pratibhāti sma aśrutapūrvā ca avijñātapūrvā ca //
XXbsu022_u:4163: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - ahaṃ khalvetarhi kāmebhyo
XXbsu022_u:4165: yāpi me kāmeṣu nandīti sarvaṃ yāvattadapi me upaśāntam /
XXbsu022_u:4166: kiṃ cāpi ahamātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāmiti peyālaṃ yāvadvedanāṃ vedmi /
XXbsu022_u:4168: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathābhipretaṃ gayāyāṃ vihṛtya gayāśīrṣe parvate jaṅgāvihāramanucaṃkramyamāṇo yenorubilvā senāpatigrāmakastadanusṛtastadanuprāpto 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:4169: tatrādrākṣīnnadīṃ nairañjanāmacchodakāṃ sūpatīrthāṃ prāsādikaiśca drumagulmairalaṃkṛtāṃ samantataśca gocaragrāmām /
XXbsu022_u:4171: prasannamabhūt - samo batāyaṃ bhūmipradeśo ramaṇīyaḥ pratisaṃlayanānurūpaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4176: jambudvīpe 'vatīrṇo hīnādhimuktikeṣu sattveṣvākīrṇatīrthyavargeṣu nānādṛṣṭipraskanneṣu kāyapiṇḍagrāhābhiniviṣṭeṣu nānāvidhaiścātāpanaparitāpanaiḥ kāyaśuddhiṃ paryeṣante, prajñāpayanti ca saṃmūḍhāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4182: pakṣakṣapaṇamāsakṣapaṇacāndrāyaṇaiśca gṛdhrolūkapakṣadhāraṇaiśca phalamuñjāsanavalkaladarbhabalbajoṣṭrakambalājakambalakeśakambalacarmaniveśanaiśca ārdrapaṭāstopakajālaśayanaiśca bhasmaśarkarāpāṣāṇaphalakakaṇṭakatṛṇamusalaśayanāvākchirotkuṭukasthaṇḍilaśayanaiśca ekavāsadvitricatuṣpañcaṣaṭsaptabahuvāsobhirnagnabhāvaiśca sthānāsthānavidhibhiśca dīrghakeśanakhaśmaśrujaṭāmakuṭadhāraṇaiśca ekakolatilataṇḍulāhāraiśca bhasmamasinirmālyoddhṛtatamorajapāṃśupaṅkaparimrakṣaṇaiśca lomamuñjakeśanakhacīvarapañjarakaraṅkadhāraṇaiśca uṣṇodakataṇḍulodakaparisrāvitakāmbalikasthālīpānīyapānaiśca aṅgāradhātukaṣāyatridaṇḍamuṇḍikakuṇḍikakapālakhaṭvāṅgadhāraṇaiśca śuddhiṃ pratyavagacchanti saṃmūḍhāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4188: brahmendrarudraviṣṇudevīkumāramātṛkātyāyanīcandrādityavaiśravaṇavaruṇavāsavāśvinaunāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragarākṣasapretabhūtakumbhāṇḍapārṣadagaṇapatipiśācāṃśca devarṣirājarṣibrahmarṣīśca namasyanti, teṣu ca sārasaṃjñino bhavanti /
XXbsu022_u:4194: evaṃvidhāni ime tīrthyāḥ kurvante, āśrayante ca saṃsārabhayabhītāḥ //
XXbsu022_u:4195: iha ca kecitparatra manyante svargāpavargāvasmākametebhyo nirvartsyeta iti mithyāmārgaprayātā aśaraṇe śaraṇasaṃjñino 'maṅgalye maṅgalasaṃjñino
XXbsu022_u:4196: 'śuddhyā śuddhiṃ manyatoyannvahaṃ tādṛśaṃ vratatapoviśeṣamālabheyaṃ yathā sarvaparapravādinaśca nigṛhītāḥ syuḥ, karmakriyāpraṇaṣṭānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ
XXbsu022_u:4198: dhyānagocarāṇāṃ ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ dhyānaviśeṣopadarśanādāvarjanaṃ kuryāmiti //
XXbsu022_u:4199: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattva evaṃ cintayitvā ṣaḍvarṣikaṃ mahāghoraṃ vratatapaḥsuduṣkarātsuduṣkarāṃ duṣkaracaryāmālabhate sma /
XXbsu022_u:4200: kena kāraṇenocyate duṣkaracaryeti? duṣkarakārikaiṣā, tenocyate duṣkaracaryeti /
XXbsu022_u:4201: na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā, yaḥ samarthastathārūpaṃ duṣkaraṃ caritum, anyatra caramabhavikādbodhisattvāt,
XXbsu022_u:4203: kena kāraṇenocyate āsphānakamiti? sa caturthadhyānamādita eva samāpadyamāna āśvāsapraśvāsānuparodhayati saṃnirodhayati /
XXbsu022_u:4204: akalpaṃ tad dhyānamavikalpamaniñjanamapanītamaspandanaṃ sarvatrānugataṃ ca sarvatra cāniśritam
XXbsu022_u:4205: na ca tad dhyānaṃ jātu kenacitsamāpannaṃ pūrvaṃ śaiṣyeṇa vā aśaiṣyeṇa vā pratyekabuddhena
XXbsu022_u:4208: ākāśamaspharaṇamakaraṇamavikaraṇaṃ tacca sarvaṃ spharatīti hyākāśasamaṃ tad dhyānam /
XXbsu022_u:4210: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lokasyāścaryasaṃdarśanārthaṃ tīrthikānāṃ ca darpanirghātanārthaṃ parapravādināṃ ca nigrahārthaṃ devānāṃ cāvarjanārthamucchedaśāśvatavādināṃ ca sattvānāṃ krarmakriyāpraṇaṣṭānāṃ karmakriyāvatāraṇārthaṃ puṇyaphalodbhāvanārthaṃ jñānaphalasaṃdarśanārthaṃ dhyānāṅgavibhajanārtha kāyabalasthāmasaṃdarśanārthaṃ cittaśauryasaṃjananārthaṃ ca asaṃskṛtāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ paryaṅkamābhujya niṣīdati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4211: niṣadya ca svakāyaṃ cetasā nigṛhṇīte sma, niṣpīḍayati sma //
XXbsu022_u:4212: tato me bhikṣavo haimantikāsvaṣṭakarātriṣu tathā kāyaṃ nigṛhṇato niṣpīḍayataḥ kakṣābhyāmapi svedāḥ praśravanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:4214: bhūmau nipatanti sma avaśyāyanta ūṣmāyanto bāṣpāyantaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4215: tadyathāpi nāma balavān puruṣo durbalataraṃ puruṣaṃ grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣpīḍayet, evameva bhikṣava imaṃ kāyaṃ cetasā nigṛhṇato niṣpīḍayataḥ kakṣābhyāmapi svedāḥ praśravanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:4217: bhūbhau nipatanti sma avaśyāyanta ūṣmāyanto bāṣpāyantaḥ //
XXbsu022_u:4218: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahamāsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyeyam /
XXbsu022_u:4219: tato me bhikṣava āsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyato mukhato nāsikātaścāśvāsapraśvāsā upaniruddhāvabhūtām
XXbsu022_u:4221: tadyathāpi nāma karmāragagayā mathyamānāyāmuccaśabdo mahāśabdo niścarati,
XXbsu022_u:4222: evameva me bhikṣavo mukhanāsikābhyāmāśvāsapraśvāsāvuparuddhāvabhūtāṃ śrotachidrābhyāmuccaśabdo mahāśabdo niścarati sma //
XXbsu022_u:4223: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahaṃ bhūya āsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyeyamiti /
XXbsu022_u:4226: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavaḥ puruṣaḥ kuṇḍayā śaktyā śiraḥkapālamupahanyād, evameva me bhikṣavo mukhanāsikāśrotreṣūparuddheṣu āśvāsapraśvāsā urdhvaṃ śiraḥkapālamupanighnanti sma //
XXbsu022_u:4227: tāṃ cāvasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā bodhisattvasya tatra keciddevā evamāhu - kaṣṭaṃ bhoḥ kālagato batāyaṃ siddhārthaḥ kumāraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4231: mā khalvayaṃ śākyanarendragarbho hyapūrṇasaṃkalpa ihaiva raṇye /
XXbsu022_u:4232: kṛtvā trilokaṃ dukhitaṃ hyanāthaṃ kālaṃ kariṣyatyakṛtārtha eva // Lal_17.1
XXbsu022_u:4235: vayaṃ purā te tuṣiteṣu nāthā kva sā pratijñā tava śuddhasattva // Lal_17.2
XXbsu022_u:4236: atha te devaputrāstrāyatriṃśeṣu deveṣu gatvā māyādevyā evamarthaṃ śrāvayanti - kālagataḥ kumāraḥ
XXbsu022_u:4237: atha māyādevī apsarāgaṇaparivṛtā ardharātrasamaye nairañjanāyāstīre yena bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāntā
XXbsu022_u:4241: yadā jāto 'si me putra vane lumbinisāhvaye /
XXbsu022_u:4242: siṃhavaccāgṛhītastvaṃ prakrāntaḥ sapta padā svayam // Lal_17.3 //
XXbsu022_u:4243: diśāṃ cālokya cature vācā te pravyāhṛtā śubhā /
XXbsu022_u:4244: iyaṃ me paścimā jātiḥ sā te na paripūritā // Lal_17.4 //
XXbsu022_u:4246: kṣuṇṇaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ tasya na dṛṣṭā tena nityatā // Lal_17.5 //
XXbsu022_u:4248: na ca bodhimanuprāpto yāto 'si nidhanaṃ vane // Lal_17.6 //
XXbsu022_u:4249: putrārthe kaṃ prapadyāmi kaṃ va krandāmi duḥkhitā /
XXbsu022_u:4250: ko me dadyekaputrasya kiṃcitprāṇasya jīvitam // Lal_17.7 //
XXbsu022_u:4252: kaiṣā ati tvāṃ karuṇaṃ rudāsi prakīrṇakeśā vinivṛttaśobhā /
XXbsu022_u:4253: putraṃ hyatīvā paridevayantī viceṣṭamānā dharaṇītalasthā // Lal_17.8 //
XXbsu022_u:4255: mayā tu daśamāsāṃ vai kukṣau vajra ivā dhṛtaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4256: sā te 'haṃ putrakā mātā vilapāmi suduḥkhitā // Lal_17.9 //
XXbsu022_u:4257: atha bodhisattva āśvāsayannuvāca - na bhetavyaṃ putralālase, śramaṃ te saphalaṃ kariṣyasi
XXbsu022_u:4261: api śatadhā vasudhā vikīryeta meruḥ plave cāmbhasi ratnaśṛṅgaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4262: candrārkatārāgaṇa bhū pateta pṛthajano naiva ahaṃ mriyeyam /
XXbsu022_u:4264: yasmānna śoko tvayi atra kāryo na vai cirād drakṣyasi buddhabodhim //
XXbsu022_u:4265: sahaśravaṇādeva devī māyā saṃpraharṣitaromakūpajātā bodhisattvaṃ māndāravapuṣpairabhyavakirya tripradakṣiṇīkṛtvā divyatūryaiḥ saṃpravādyamānairyena svabhavanaṃ tenopajagāma //
XXbsu022_u:4266: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - santyeke śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye alpāhāratayā śuddhiṃ manyante /
XXbsu022_u:4269: syātkhalu punarbhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ eṣā buddhiḥ - mahattaraṃ tatra kāle kolamāsīditi /
XXbsu022_u:4272: tasya me bhikṣava ekameva kolamāhāramāharato 'dvitīyaṃ kāyo 'tyarthaṃ karśito 'bhūddurbalaḥ
XXbsu022_u:4273: / tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣava āsītakīparvāṇi vā kālāparvāṇi vā, evameva me 'ṅgapratyaṅgānyabhūvan
XXbsu022_u:4274: tadyathāpi nāma karkaṭapārśukā, evameva me pārśukā abhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:4275: tadyathāpi nāma vāhanakāraśālāyāṃ vā hastiśālāyāṃ vā jīrṇāyāmubhayato vivṛtāyāṃ gopānasyāntarikāśca virājante vyavabhāsante,
XXbsu022_u:4276: evameva me pārśukā antaḥkāye ubhayato virājante sma vyavabhāsante sma /
XXbsu022_u:4277: tadyathāpi nāma vartanyā veṇī unnatāvanatā bhavati samaviṣamā, evaṃ me pṛṣṭhīkaṇṭako 'bhūdunnatāvanataḥ samaviṣamaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4278: tadyathā tiktakālābustaruṇo lūna āmlāno bhavati saṃmlānaḥ samutpuṭakajātaḥ evameva śira āmlānamabhūtsaṃmlānaṃ samutpuṭakajātam /
XXbsu022_u:4279: tadyathāpi nāma grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse kūpatārakā dūragatā bhavanti, kṛcchreṇa saṃprakāśyante, evameva me 'kṣitārakau duragatāvabhūtāṃ kṛcchreṇa saṃprakāśyete sma /
XXbsu022_u:4280: tadyathāpi nāmājapadaṃ voṣṭrapadaṃ vā, evameva me kakṣākukṣivakṣādīnyabhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:4281: tato yadāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ pāṇinā kukṣiṃ spṛśāmīti pṛṣṭhikaṇṭakamevāsprākṣam /
XXbsu022_u:4283: tataḥ kṛcchreṇotthito 'pi pāṃśukṛtāni gātrāṇi pāṇinā pramṛjato me pūtiromāṇi
XXbsu022_u:4285: yāpi me 'bhūtpaurāṇī śubhavarṇatanuḥ sāpyantaradhādyathāpīdaṃ rūkṣapradhānaṃ prahitātmanaḥ
XXbsu022_u:4286: sāmantāśca me gocaragrāmavāsina evaṃ saṃjānante sma - kālako bata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ śyāmako bata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4289: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayālpāhāratayā
XXbsu022_u:4292: syādbhikṣavo yuṣmākamevaṃ mahattaraṃ taṇḍulaṃ tasmin kāle 'bhūditi /
XXbsu022_u:4295: tasya me bhikṣava ekaṃ taṇḍulamāharataḥ kṣipraṃ kāyo 'bhūditi pūrvavadyāvanmadguracchavirbata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautama iti /
XXbsu022_u:4298: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayālpāhāratāyai
XXbsu022_u:4303: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - santyeke śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye 'nāhāratayā
XXbsu022_u:4308: kāyo 'tīva śuṣko 'bhūt kṛśo durbalaḥ, tadyathāpi nāma āsitakīparvāṇi vā kālāparvāṇi vā /
XXbsu022_u:4310: tadyathā karkaṭakapārśukā vāhanaśālāyāṃ vā gopānasī (pārśve) dviparivartanā veṇīvatpṛṣṭhīkaṇṭakaḥ
XXbsu022_u:4313: kṛcchreṇāpi cotthitaḥ pāṃśukṛtāni me gātrāṇi pramṛjataḥ pūtimūlāni romāṇyaśīryanta /
XXbsu022_u:4316: sāmantāśca me gocaragrāmavāsino janā evaṃ saṃjānante sma - kālako bata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ
XXbsu022_u:4320: rājāpi tadā śuddhodanaḥ pratipratidivasaṃ bodhisattvasyāntike dūtaṃ preṣayati sma //
XXbsu022_u:4321: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lokasyādbhutakriyāsaṃdarśanārthaṃ pūrvavadyāvatkarmakriyāpraṇaṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ karmakriyāvatāraṇārthaṃ puṇyasaṃcayānāṃ codbhāvanārthaṃ mahājñānasya ca guṇasaṃdarśanārthaṃ dhyānāṅgānāṃ ca vibhajanārthamekatilakolataṇḍulena ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaracaryāmanuvartayantamupadarśayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4322: adīnamānasaḥ ṣaḍvarṣā bodhisattvo yathā niṣaṇṇa evāsthāt paryaṅkena /
XXbsu022_u:4325: na ca vātātapavṛṣṭiparitrāṇamakaronna ca daṃśamaśakasarīsṛpānapanayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4335: ye ca tatrāgaman grāmakumārakā vā grāmakumārikā vā gopālakā vā paśupālakā vā tṛṇahārikā vā kāṣṭhahārikā vā gomayahārikā vā, te bodhisattvaṃ pāṃśupiśācamiti manyante sma /
XXbsu022_u:4339: 'bhūt, yadasya karṇaśrotābhyāṃ tṛṇatūlakaṃ prakṣipya nāsāśrotābhyāṃ niṣkāsyate sma /
XXbsu022_u:4345: ye ca te devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyā bodhisattvasya guṇeṣu pratyakṣāḥ, te rātriṃdivaṃ samadhiṣṭhā
XXbsu022_u:4348: tatra bodhisattvena tai ṣaḍbhirvarṣairduṣkaracaryāṃ saṃdarśayatā paripūrṇāni dvādaśanayutāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ tribhiryānaiḥ paripācitānyabhūvan //
XXbsu022_u:4359: na ca kumbhamukhakaroṭānna dhārakuśalāntarācca gṛhṇanti // Lal_17.15 //
XXbsu022_u:4360: na ca yatra svānubhavatī na cāhitaṃ tena tiṣṭhavākyasya /
XXbsu022_u:4361: kulabhikṣa eka gṛhyā śuddhaṃ manyantihātmānam // Lal_17.16 //
XXbsu022_u:4365: apare bhramanti nagnāḥ satyamidaṃ mohamanyaditi mūḍhāḥ // Lal_17.18 //
XXbsu022_u:4376: yaṃ duṣkaraṃ na śakyaṃ carituṃ devairmanuṣyairvā // Lal_17.23 //
XXbsu022_u:4378: yaṃ dhyānaṃ na samarthāḥ pratyekajināpi darśayitum // Lal_17.24 //
XXbsu022_u:4380: teṣa paripākaheto duṣkaravratatapa rabheya sūtīvram // Lal_17.25 //
XXbsu022_u:4385: kalpaṃ no na vikalpaṃ na ceñjanaṃ nāpimanyena pracāram /
XXbsu022_u:4387: na ca ātapātu chāyāṃ chāyāyā nātapaṃ gataścāsau /
XXbsu022_u:4392: anyatra karuṇacitto bhāvī lokasya vipulārtham // Lal_17.31 //
XXbsu022_u:4394: pāṃśupiśācakamiti taṃ manyante pāṃśunā ca mrakṣanti // Lal_17.32 //
XXbsu022_u:4395: aśucīnā ca kirante vividhāste kāraṇāśca kārenti /
XXbsu022_u:4396: na ca iñjate bhramati vā dhyāyatyāsphānakaṃ dhyānam // Lal_17.33 //
XXbsu022_u:4397: na ca namati no vinamate na kāyaparirakṣaṇā spṛśati /
XXbsu022_u:4398: kiṃcinnoccāraprasravaṃ śabdeṣu na saṃtrasī na paraprekṣī // Lal_17.34 //
XXbsu022_u:4400: udarācca pṛṣṭhivaṃśo vidṛśyate vartitā yathā veṇī // Lal_17.35 //
XXbsu022_u:4404: praṇidhiṃ ca kurvate te vayamapi tādṛśa bhavāmahe kṣipram /
XXbsu022_u:4405: yatha eṣa gaganacitto dhyāyatyāsphānakaṃ dhyānam // Lal_17.37 //
XXbsu022_u:4406: na ca kevalamātmārthaṃ na dhyānasvādanānna sukhabuddhyā /
XXbsu022_u:4407: anyatra karuṇabuddhyā kariṣyatyarthaṃ vipula loke // Lal_17.38 //
XXbsu022_u:4409: karmakriyā ca darśita yā proktā kāśyape vācā // Lal_17.39 //
XXbsu022_u:4410: krakucchandakasya bodhi bodhiriha sudurlabhā bahubhi kalpaiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4418: māraśca bhikṣavaḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvasya ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaracaryāṃ carataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho 'bhūt avatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī /
XXbsu022_u:4428: śākyaputrā samuttiṣṭha kāyakhedena kiṃ tava // Lal_18.3 //
XXbsu022_u:4429: jīvato jīvitaṃ śreyo jīvan dharmaṃ cariṣyasi /
XXbsu022_u:4430: jīvaṃ hi tāni kurute yāni kṛtvā na śocati // Lal_18.4 //
XXbsu022_u:4431: kṛśo vivarṇo dīnastvaṃ antike maraṇaṃ tava /
XXbsu022_u:4432: sahasrabhāge maraṇaṃ ekabhāge ca jīvitam // Lal_18.5 //
XXbsu022_u:4433: dadataḥ satataṃ dānaṃ agnihotraṃ ca juhvataḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4434: bhaviṣyati mahatpuṇyaṃ kiṃ prahāṇe kariṣyasi // Lal_18.6 //
XXbsu022_u:4436: imāṃ vācaṃ tadā māro bodhisattvamathābravīt // Lal_18.7 //
XXbsu022_u:4439: aṇumātraṃ hi me puṇyairartho māra na vidyate /
XXbsu022_u:4440: artho yeṣāṃ tu puṇyena tānevaṃ vaktumarhasi // Lal_18.9 //
XXbsu022_u:4441: naivāhaṃ maraṇaṃ manye maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam /
XXbsu022_u:4444: kiṃ punaḥ śoṣayetkāyaṃ śoṇitaṃ prahitātmanām // Lal_18.11 //
XXbsu022_u:4446: śoṇite tu viśuṣke vai tato māṃsaṃ viśuṣyati /
XXbsu022_u:4450: cittaṃ nāvekṣate kāyaṃ paśya sattvasya śuddhatām // Lal_18.13 //
XXbsu022_u:4451: asti chandaṃ tathā vīryaṃ prajñāpi mama vidyate /
XXbsu022_u:4452: taṃ na paśyāmyahaṃ loke vīryādyo māṃ vicālayet // Lal_18.14 //
XXbsu022_u:4454: saṃgrāme maraṇaṃ śreyo yacca jīvetparājitaḥ // Lal_18.15 //
XXbsu022_u:4455: nāśūro jayate senāṃ jitvā caināṃ na manyate /
XXbsu022_u:4456: śūrastu jayate senāṃ laghu māra jayāmi te // Lal_18.16 //
XXbsu022_u:4458: tṛtīyā kṣutpipāsā te tṛṣṇā senā caturthikā // Lal_18.17 //
XXbsu022_u:4459: pañcamī styānamiddhaṃ te bhayaṃ ṣaṣṭī nirucyate /
XXbsu022_u:4460: saptamī vicikitsā te krodhamrakṣau tathāṣṭamī // Lal_18.18 //
XXbsu022_u:4461: lobhaślokau ca saṃskārau mithyālabdhaṃ ca yadyaśaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4462: ātmānaṃ yaśca utkarṣedyaśca vai dhvaṃsayetparāṃ // Lal_18.19 //
XXbsu022_u:4463: eṣā hi namuceḥ senā kṛṣṇabandhoḥ pratāpinaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4465: yā te senā dharṣayati lokamenaṃ sadevakam /
XXbsu022_u:4466: bhetsyāmi prajñayā tāṃ te āmapātramivāmbunā // Lal_18.21 //
XXbsu022_u:4467: smṛtiṃ sūpasthitāṃ kṛtvā prajñāṃ caiva subhāvitām /
XXbsu022_u:4468: saṃprajānaṃ cariṣyāmi kiṃ kariṣyasi durmate // Lal_18.22 //
XXbsu022_u:4469: evamukte māraḥ pāpīyān duḥkhī durmanā anāttamanā vipratisārī tatraivāntaradhāt //
XXbsu022_u:4470: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - ye kecicchramaṇā brāhmaṇā vā atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasvātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti etāvatparamaṃ te duḥkhamanubhavanti //
XXbsu022_u:4472: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - anayāpi khalu mayā caryayā anayāpi pratipadā
XXbsu022_u:4477: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhavat - yadahaṃ piturudyāne jambucchāyāyāṃ niṣaṇṇo viviktaṃ kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ
XXbsu022_u:4478: vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya vyāhārṣaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānamupasaṃpadya vyāhārṣam, syātsa mārgo bodherjātijarāmaraṇaduḥkhasamudāyānāmasaṃbhavāyāstaṃgamāyeti /
XXbsu022_u:4481: tasya mamaitadabhūt - nāsau mārgaḥ śakyaḥ evaṃ daurbalyaprāptenābhisaṃboddhum /
XXbsu022_u:4482: sacetpunarahamabhijñājñānabalenaiva lūhaṃ durbalakāya eva bodhimaṇḍamupasaṃkrameyam, na me paścimā janatā anukampitā syāt /
XXbsu022_u:4485: tatra bhikṣavo ye te lūhādhimuktā devaputrāste mama cetasaścetasaiva parivitarkamājñāya yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya māmevamāhuḥ - mā sma tvaṃ
XXbsu022_u:4488: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - ahaṃ khalvanaśana ityātmānaṃ pratijāne,
XXbsu022_u:4489: sāmantāśca me gocaragrāmavāsino janā evaṃ saṃjānante sma yathānaśanaḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4490: itīva me khalu lūhādhimuktā devaputrā romakūpairojaḥ prakṣipanti /
XXbsu022_u:4492: tato bodhisattvo mṛṣāvādaparihārārthaṃ tān devaputrān pratikṣipyaudārikamāhāramāhartu cittaṃ nāmayati sma //
XXbsu022_u:4493: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ṣaḍvarṣavratatapaḥsamuttīrṇo bodhisattvo 'smādāsanādutthāyaudārikamāhāramāhariṣyāmīti vācaṃ niścārayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4495: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ pañcānāṃ bhadravargīyānāmetadabhūt - tayāpi tāvaccaryayā tayāpi tāvatpratipadā śramaṇena gautamena na śakitaṃ kiṃciduttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum, kiṃ punaretarhi audārikamāhāramāharan sukhallikānuyogamanuyukto viharan /
XXbsu022_u:4497: te vārāṇasīṃ gatvā ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve vyāhārṣuḥ //
XXbsu022_u:4498: tatra bodhisattvamādita eva duṣkaracaryāṃ carantaṃ daśa grāmikaduhitaraḥ kumārya upagacchan darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya ca /
XXbsu022_u:4502: balā ca nāma dārikā balaguptā ca supriyā ca vijayasenā ca atimuktakamalā ca sundarī ca kumbhakārī ca uluvillikā ca jaṭilikā ca sujātā ca nāma grāmikaduhitāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4503: ābhiḥ kumārikābhirbodhisattvāya sarvāstā yūṣavidhāḥ kṛtvopanāmitā abhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:4504: tāścābhyavahṛtya bodhisattvaḥ krameṇa gocaragrāme piṇḍāya caran varṇarūpabalavānabhūt /
XXbsu022_u:4505: tadagreṇa bodhisattvaḥ sundaraḥ śramaṇo mahāśramaṇa ityācakṣate //
XXbsu022_u:4506: tatra ca bhikṣavaḥ sujātā grāmikaduhitā bodhisattvasya duṣkaracaryāṃ carataḥ ādita eva bodhisattvasya vratatapaḥsamuttāraṇārthaṃ śarīrasyāpyāyanahetośca pratidivasamaṣṭaśataṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ bhojayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4507: evaṃ ca praṇidadhāti sma - mama bhojanaṃ bhuktvā bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ
XXbsu022_u:4509: tasya me bhikṣavaḥ ṣaḍvarṣavyativṛttasya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi parijīrṇānyabhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:4510: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - sacedahaṃ kaupīnapracchādanaṃ labheyam, śobhanaṃ syāt //
XXbsu022_u:4511: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena sujātāyā grāmikaduhiturdāsī rādhā nāma kālagatābhūt /
XXbsu022_u:4516: atha bhaumā devā antarīkṣāṇāṃ devānāṃ ghoṣamanuśrāvayanti sma - āścaryaṃ mārṣā adbhutamidaṃ mārṣāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4517: yatra hi nāmaivaṃ mahārājakulaprasūtasya cakravartirājyaparityāginaḥ pāṃśukūle cittaṃ natamiti
XXbsu022_u:4518: antarīkṣā devā bhaumānāṃ devānāṃ śabdaṃ śratvā cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānāṃ ghoṣamudīrayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:4525: iti hi bhikṣavastatkṣaṇaṃ tallavaṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhuvanādekaghoṣa ekasaṃnirnādo 'bhyudgato 'bhūt āścaryamidaṃ mārṣā adbhutamidam /
XXbsu022_u:4526: yatra hi nāmaivaṃ mahārājakulaprasūtasya cakravartirājyaparityāginaḥ pāṃśukūle cittaṃ natamiti
XXbsu022_u:4527: atha bodhisattvasya punarapyetadabhavat - labdhaṃ mayā pāṃśukūlam /
XXbsu022_u:4529: tatastatraiva devatā pāṇinā mahīṃ parāhanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:4534: labheyam, yatredaṃ pāṃśukūlaṃ prakṣālayeyam, śobhanaṃ syāt /
XXbsu022_u:4537: atha śakro devarājo bodhisattvamevamāha - dadasvedaṃ satpuruṣa mahyam /
XXbsu022_u:4539: tato bodhisattvaḥ svayaṃkāritāṃ pravrajyāyāḥ saṃdarśayituṃ tatpāṃśukūlaṃ śakrasyādatvā svayameva prakṣālayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4544: tatra devatāṃ bodhisattvo lokānuvṛttyā devatānugrahārthaṃ cābravīt - āhara devate vṛkṣaśākhāmiti
XXbsu022_u:4547: uttīrya ca tasya kakubhapādapasyādhastāttatpāṃśukūlaṃ saṃghāṭīkṛtya āsīvyati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4548: adyāpi tat pāṃśukūlaṃ sīvanamityevaṃ saṃjñāyate sma //
XXbsu022_u:4549: atha vimalaprabho nāma śuddhāvāsakāyiko devaputraḥ, sa divyāni cīvarāṇi
XXbsu022_u:4551: bodhisattvaśca tāni gṛhītvā pūrvāhṇe nivāsya saṃghāṭīprāvṛtya gocaragrāmābhimukho 'bhut //
XXbsu022_u:4552: tatra devatābhirurubilvāsenāpatigrāmake nandikagrāmikaduhituḥ sujātāyā ārocitamabhūdardharātrasamaye - yadarthaṃ tvaṃ mahāyajñaṃ yajase tasmādvratāduttīrṇaḥ saḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4554: tvayā ca pūrve praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam - mama bhojanaṃ bhuktvā bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ
XXbsu022_u:4557: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sujātā nandikagrāmaduhitā teṣāṃ devatānāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā śīghraṃ gosahasrasya kṣīrātsaptakṛtsāroddhṛtādagryamojomaṇḍaṃ gṛhṇīte sma /
XXbsu022_u:4560: tasmiṃśca sādhyamāne imāni pūrvanimittāni saṃdṛśyante sma - tasmin khalvapi kṣīre
XXbsu022_u:4563: niḥsaṃśayamidaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuktvā bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāpsyati /
XXbsu022_u:4566: tataḥ sujātā taṃ pāyasaṃ pakvaṃ sthaṇḍilamupalipya puṣpairavakīrya gandhodakenābhyukṣya āsanaṃ prajñāpya satkṛtyottarāṃ nāma ceṭīmāmantrayate sma - gacchottare brāhmaṇamānaya /
XXbsu022_u:4568: sādhvārya iti pratiśrutya uttarā pūrvāṃ diśamagamat /
XXbsu022_u:4572: evaṃ paścimāmuttarāmeva diśaṃ gacchati sma, tatra tatra bodhisattvamevādrākṣīt
XXbsu022_u:4573: / tena khalu punaḥ samayena śuddhāvāsakāyikairdevaputraiḥ sarve
XXbsu022_u:4576: tataḥ sā āgatvā svāminīmevamāha - na khalvārye anyaḥ kaścid dṛśyate śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā, anyatra yato yata eva gacchāmi, tatra tatra śramaṇameva sundaraṃ paśyāmi /
XXbsu022_u:4577: sujātā āha - gacchottare sa eva brāhmaṇaḥ, sa eva śramaṇaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4580: sādhvārye ityuttarā gatvā bodhisattvasya caraṇayoḥ praṇipatya sujātāyā (Vaidya 196)
XXbsu022_u:4582: tato bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ sujātāyā grāmikaduhiturniveśanaṃ gatvā prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat
XXbsu022_u:4583: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sujātā grāmikaduhitā suvarṇamayīṃ pātrīṃ madhupāyasapūrṇāṃ bodhisattvasyopanāmayati sma //
XXbsu022_u:4586: atha bodhisattvastadbhojanaṃ pratigṛhya sujātāṃ grāmikaduhitarametadavocat - iyaṃ bhagini suvarṇapātrī /
XXbsu022_u:4587: kiṃ kriyatām? sā āha - tavaiva bhavatviti /
XXbsu022_u:4588: bodhisattva āha - na mamedṛśena bhājanena prayojanam /
XXbsu022_u:4592: atha bodhisattvastaṃ piṇḍapātramādāyorubilvāyā niṣkramya nāganadīṃ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nadīṃ nairañjanāmupasaṃkramya taṃ piṇḍapātraṃ cīvarāṇi caikānte nikṣipya nadīṃ nairañjanāmavatarati sma gātrāṇi śītalīkartum //
XXbsu022_u:4593: bodhisattvasya khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ snāyato 'nekāni devaputraśatasahasrāṇi divyāgurucandanacūrṇavilepanairnadīmāloḍayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:4594: divyāni ca nānāvarṇāni kusumāni jale kṣipanti sma yaduta bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe //
XXbsu022_u:4595: tena khalu punaḥ samayena nairañjanā nadī divyairgandhaiḥ puṣpaiśca samākulā vahati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4596: yena ca gandhodakena bodhisattvaḥ snāto 'bhūt, taṃ devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyabhyutkṣipya svakasvakāni bhavanāni nayanti sma caityārthaṃ pūjārthaṃ ca //
XXbsu022_u:4597: yāni ca bodhisattvasya keśaśmaśrūṇyabhūvan, tāni sarvāṇi sujātā
XXbsu022_u:4598: grāmikaduhitā maṅgalyānīti kṛtvā caityārthaṃ pūjārthaṃ ca parigṛhṇīte sma //
XXbsu022_u:4599: nadyuttīrṇaśca bodhisattvaḥ pulinaṃ nirīkṣate sma upaveṣṭukāmaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4600: atha yā nairañjanāyāṃ nadyāṃ nāgakanyā sā dharaṇitalādabhyudgabhya maṇimayaṃ
XXbsu022_u:4602: tatra bodhisattvo niṣadya yāvadarthaṃ taṃ madhupāyasaṃ paribhuṅkte sma sujātāyā grāmikaduhituranukampāmupādāya
XXbsu022_u:4603: paribhujya ca tāṃ suvarṇapātrīmanapekṣo vāriṇi prākṣipati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4604: kṣiptamātrāṃ ca tāṃ sāgaro nāgarājaścittikārabahumānajāto gṛhītvā svabhavanābhimukhaḥ prasthito
XXbsu022_u:4606: atha daśaśatanayanaḥ puraṃdaro garuḍarūpamabhinirmāya vajratuṇḍo bhūtvā sāgarasya nāgarājasyāntikāttāṃ suvarṇapātrīṃ hartumārabdhaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4607: yadā na śaknoti sma, tadā svarūpeṇādareṇa yācitvā
XXbsu022_u:4610: adyāpi ca trāyatriṃśeṣu deveṣu pratisaṃvatsaraṃ pātrīmaho vartate /
XXbsu022_u:4611: tacca bhadrāsanaṃ tayaiva nāgakanyayā parigṛhītaṃ caityārthaṃ pūjārthaṃ ca //
XXbsu022_u:4614: atha tatkṣaṇameva bodhisattvasya puṇyabalena prajñābalena pūrvikā kāye śubhavarṇapuṣkaratā prādurabhūt /
XXbsu022_u:4617: ṣaḍvarṣa vrata uttaritva bhagavān evaṃ matiṃ cintayan so 'haṃ
XXbsu022_u:4619: gaccheyaṃ drumarājamūlaviṭapaṃ sarvajñatāṃ buddhituṃ no me syādanukampitā hi janatā evaṃ bhavet paścimā // Lal_18.23 //
XXbsu022_u:4620: yattvaudārika bhuktva bhojanavaraṃ kāye balaṃ kṛtvanā gaccheyaṃ drumarājamūlaviṭapaṃ sarvajñatāṃ budhyitum /
XXbsu022_u:4621: mā haivetvarapuṇya devamanujā lūhena jñānekṣiṇo no śaktā siya budhyanāya amṛtaṃ kāyena te durbalāḥ //
XXbsu022_u:4622: sā ca grāmikadhīta pūrvacaritā nāmnā sujātā iti yajñā nityu yajāti evamanasā siddhe vrataṃ nāyake /
XXbsu022_u:4623: sā devāna niśāmya codana tadā gṛhyā madhūpāyasaṃ upagamyā naditīri hṛṣṭamanasā nairañjanāyāḥ sthitā // Lal_18.25 //
XXbsu022_u:4624: so cākalpasahasracīrṇacarito śāntapraśāntendriyo devairnāgagaṇairṛṣī parivṛto āgatya nairañjanām
XXbsu022_u:4625: tīrṇastāraku pārasattva matimāṃ snāne matiṃ cintayan oruhyā nadi snāpi śuddhavimalo lokānukampī muniḥ // Lal_18.26 //
XXbsu022_u:4626: devā koṭisahasra hṛṣṭamanasā gandhāmbu cūrṇāni ca oruhyā nadi loḍayanti salilaṃ snānārtha sattvottame /
XXbsu022_u:4627: snānā snātvana bodhisattva vimalastīre sthitaḥ sūrataḥ harṣurdevasahasra snānasalilaṃ pūjārtha sattvottame // Lal_18.27 //
XXbsu022_u:4628: kāṣāyāni ca vastra nirmala śubhā tā devaputro dade kalpīyāni ca saṃnivāsya bhagavāṃstīre hi nadyāḥ sthitaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4629: nāgākanya udagra hṛṣṭamanasā bhadrāsanaṃ sā nyaṣīt yatrāsau niṣasāda śāntamanaso lokasya cakṣuṣkaraḥ (Vaidya 198)
XXbsu022_u:4630: dattvā bhojanu sā sujāta matimāṃ svarṇāmaye bhājane vanditvā caraṇāni sā pramuditā paribhuṅkṣva me sārathe /
XXbsu022_u:4631: bhuktvā bhojanu yāvadartha matimān pātrīṃ jale prākṣipat tāṃ jagrāha puraṃdaraḥ suraguruḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyāmyaham // Lal_18.29 //
XXbsu022_u:4632: yada bhuktaṃ ca jinena bhojanavaraṃ odārikaṃ tatkṣaṇe tasyā kāyabalaṃ ca tejaśiriyā pūrvaṃ yathā saṃsthitam /
XXbsu022_u:4633: dharmā kṛtva kathā sujāta maruṇāṃ kṛtvā ca arthaṃ bahuṃ siṃho haṃsagatirgajendragamano bodhidrumaṃ saṃsthitaḥ // Lal_18.30 //
XXbsu022_u:4638: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo nadyāṃ nairañjanāyāṃ snātvā ca bhuktvā kāyabalasthāma saṃjanayya yena ṣoḍaśākārasaṃpannapṛthivipradeśe mahābodhidrumarājamūlaṃ tena pratasthe vijayayā tayā ca gatyā, yāsau mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ gatiranuccalitagatirindriyeṣṭigatiḥ susaṃsthitagatiḥ merurājagatirajihmagatirakuṭilagatiranupadrutagatiravilambitagatiraluḍitagatiraskhalitagatirasaṃghaṭitagatiralīnagatiracapalagatiḥ salīlagatiḥ vimalagatiḥ śubhagatiradoṣagatiramohagatiraraktagatiḥ
XXbsu022_u:4639: siṃhagatiḥ haṃsarājagatirnāgarājagatirnārāyaṇagatiḥ dharaṇitalāsaṃsṛṣṭagatiḥ sahasrāracakradharaṇītalacitragatiḥ jālāṅgulitāmranakhagatiḥ dharaṇītalanirnādagatiḥ śailarājasaṃghaṭanagatiḥ
XXbsu022_u:4643: trisāhasramahāsāhasraikaśūragatiḥ svayaṃbhvanabhibhūtagatiḥ sarvajñajñānābhigamanagatiḥ smṛtimatigatiḥ sugatigamanagatiḥ jarāmaraṇapraśamanagatiḥ śivavirajāmalābhayanirvāṇapuragamanagatiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4645: iti hi bhikṣavo yāvacca nadyā nairañjanāyā yāvacca bodhimaṇḍādestasminnantare vātabalāhakairdevaputraiḥ saṃmṛṣṭamabhūt /
XXbsu022_u:4647: / yāvadeva trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau vṛkṣāste sarve yena bodhimaṇḍastenābhinatāgrā abhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:4650: ye 'pi ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau sumerupramukhāḥ parvatāste 'pi sarve yena bodhimaṇḍastena praṇatā abhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:4651: nadīṃ ca nairañjanāmupādāya yāvadbodhimaṇḍo 'sminnantare kāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ krośavistāraikapramāṇo mārgo 'bhivyūhito 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:4652: tasya ca mārgasya vāmadakṣiṇayoḥ pārśvayoḥ saptaratnamayī vedikā abhinirmitā 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:4653: saptatālānuccaistvena upariṣṭādratnajālasaṃchannā divyachatradhvajapatākāsamalaṃkṛtā iṣukṣepe saptaratnamayāstālā abhinirmitā abhūvan tasyā vedikāyā abhyudgatāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4655: dvayośca tālayormadhye puṣkariṇī māpitābhūt gandhodakaparipūrṇā suvarṇavālikrāsaṃstṛtā utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkasaṃchannā ratnavedikāparivṛtā vaidūryamaṇiratnasopānapratyuptā (Vaidya 200)
XXbsu022_u:4657: taṃ ca mārgamaśītyapsaraḥsahasrāṇi gandhodakena siñcanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:4659: sarvasya ca tālavṛkṣasya purato ratnavyomakaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:4660: sarvasmiṃśca ratnavyomake aśītyapsaraḥ sahasrāṇi candanāgurucūrṇakapuṭāparigṛhītāni kārānusāridhūpaghaṭikāparigṛhītāni sthitānyabhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:4662: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ prakampyamānaiḥ kṣetrai raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścārayaṃstūryaśatasahasraiḥ
XXbsu022_u:4664: dundubhiśatasahasraiḥ parāhanyamānaiḥ, garjadbhiḥ pragarjadbhiḥ hayagajavṛṣabhaiḥ, pradakṣiṇīkurvadbhiḥ
XXbsu022_u:4667: anenaivaṃrūpeṇa mārgavyūhena bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍaṃ gacchati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4668: yāṃ ca rātriṃ bodhisattvo bodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmo 'bhūt, tāmeva rātriṃ vaśavartī nāma trisāhasramahāsāhasrādhipatirbrahmā
XXbsu022_u:4670: eṣa sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho mahāpratijñānutsṛṣṭo dṛḍhasaṃnāhasaṃnaddho
XXbsu022_u:4672: pāraṃgataḥ sarvabodhisattvabhūmiṣu vaśitāprāptaḥ sarvabodhisattvāśayasuviśuddhaḥ sarvasattvendriyeṣvanugataḥ sarvatathāgataguhyasthāneṣu supraviṣṭaḥ sarvamārakarmapathasamatikrāntaḥ sarvakuśalamūleṣvaparapratyayaḥ sarvatathāgatairadhiṣṭhitaḥ sarvasattveṣu pramokṣamārgadeśayitā mahāsārthavāhaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4676: mahāprajñāprabhotsarjanakaraḥ mahāketurājaḥ aṣṭalokadharmānupaliptaḥ mahāpadmabhūtaḥ sarvadharmadhāraṇyasaṃpramuṣitaḥ mahāsāgarabhūtaḥ anunayapratighāpagataḥ acalo 'prakampī mahāsumerūbhūtaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4677: sunirmalaḥ supariśuddhaḥ svavadarpitavimalabuddhirmahāmaṇiratnabhūtaḥ sarvadharmavaśavartī sarvakarmaṇyacitto mahābrahmabhūto bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍamupasaṃkramati mārasainyapradharṣaṇārthamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4678: daśabalavaiśāradyāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmaparipuraṇārthaṃ mahādharmacakrapravartanārthaṃ mahāsiṃhanādanādanārthaṃ sarvasattvān dharmadānena saṃtarpaṇārthaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ dharmacakṣurviśodhanārthaṃ sarvaparapravādīnāṃ sahadharmeṇa nigrahārthaṃ pūrvapratijñāpāripūrisaṃdarśanārthaṃ sarvadharmaiśvaryavaśitāprāptyartham tatra yuṣmābhirmārṣā sarvaireva bodhisattvasya pūjopasthānakarmaṇyutsukairbhavitavyam /
XXbsu022_u:4679: atha khalu vaśavartī mahābrahmā tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
XXbsu022_u:4680: yasyā tejatu puṇyataśca śiriye brāhmaḥ patho jñāyate maitrī vā karuṇā upekṣa muditā dhyānānyabhijñāstathā
XXbsu022_u:4683: pūjāṃ sādhu karotha tasya munino āśivrate sādhanām // Lal_19.1 //
XXbsu022_u:4684: yaṃ gatvā śaraṇaṃ na durgatibhayaṃ prāpnoti naivākṣaṇaṃ deveṣviṣṭasukhaṃ ca prāpya vipulaṃ brahmālayaṃ gacchati /
XXbsu022_u:4685: ṣaḍvaṣāṇi caritva duṣkaracariṃ yātyeṣa bodhidrumaṃ sādhū sarvi udagrahṛṣṭamanasaḥ pūjāsya kurvāmahe // Lal_19.2 //
XXbsu022_u:4686: rājāsau trisahasri īśvaravaro dharmeśvaraḥ pārthivaḥ śakrābrahmapure ca candrasuriye nāstyasya kaścit samaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4687: yasyā jāyata kṣetrakoṭinayutā saṃkampitā ṣaḍvidhā saiṣo 'dya vrajate mahādrumavaraṃ mārasya jetuṃ camūn // Lal_19.3 //
XXbsu022_u:4688: mūrdhnaṃ yasya na śakyamīkṣitumiha brahmālaye 'pi sthitaiḥ kāyo yasya varāgralakṣaṇadharo dvātriṃśatālaṃkṛtaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4689: vāgyasyeha manojñavalgumadhurā brahmasvarā susvarā cittaṃ yasya praśānta doṣarahitaṃ gacchāma tatpūjane // Lal_19.4 //
XXbsu022_u:4690: yeṣāṃ vā mati brahmaśakrabhavane nityaṃ sukha kṣepituṃ athavā sarvakileśabandhanalatāṃ chettuṃ hi tāṃ jālinīm /
XXbsu022_u:4691: aśrutvā parataḥ spṛśeyamamṛtaṃ pratyekabodhiṃ śivāṃ buddhatvaṃ yadi vepsitaṃ tribhuvane pūjetvasau nāyakam // Lal_19.5 //
XXbsu022_u:4692: tyaktā yena sasāgarā vasumatī ratnānyanantānyatho prāsādāśca gavākṣaharmyakalikā yugyāni yānāni ca /
XXbsu022_u:4693: bhūmyālaṃkṛta puṣpadāma rucirā udyānakūpāsarāḥ hastā pādaśirottamāṅganayanā so bodhimaṇḍonmukhaḥ iti hi bhikṣavastrisāhasramahāsāhasriko mahābrahmā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ tatkṣaṇaṃ samamadhyatiṣṭhat /
XXbsu022_u:4695: sarve ca tadā mahāsamudrā dharaṇītalasaṃsthitā abhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:4697: imaṃ caiva lokadhātumalaṃkṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca daśasu dikṣu śakrabrahmalokapālairbodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe buddhakṣetraśatasahasrāṇi samalaṃkṛtānyabhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:4698: bodhisattvaiśca divyamānuṣyakātikrāntaiḥ pūjāvyūhairdaśasu dikṣvaprameyāṇi buddhakṣetrāṇi pratimaṇḍitānyabhūvan (Vaidya 202) bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe /
XXbsu022_u:4699: sarvāṇi ca tāni buddhakṣetrāṇyekamiva buddhakṣetraṃ saṃdṛśyante sma,
XXbsu022_u:4701: na ca bhūyo lokāntarikā na ca kālaparvatā na ca cakravālamahācakravālāḥ prajñāyante sma /
XXbsu022_u:4702: sarvāṇi ca tāni buddhakṣetrāṇi bodhisattvasyābhayā sphuṭāni saṃdṛśyante sma /
XXbsu022_u:4704: tadyathā - utkhalī ca nāma devaputraḥ sūtkhalī ca nāma prajāpatiśca śūrabalaśca keyūrabalaśca supratisthitaśca mahiṃdharaśca avabhāsakaraśca vimalaśca dharmeśvaraśca dharmaketuśca siddhapātraśca apratihatanetraśca mahāvyūhaśca śīlaviśuddhanetraśca padmaprabhaśca /
XXbsu022_u:4705: itīme ṣoḍaśa bodhimaṇḍapratipālakā devaputrāḥ sarve 'vaivartyakṣāntipratilabdhāste bodhisattvasya pūjārthaṃ bodhimaṇḍaṃ
XXbsu022_u:4707: samantādaśītiyojanāni saptabhī ratnavedikābhiḥ parivṛtaṃ saptabhistālapaṅktibhiḥ saptabhī ratnakiṅkiṇījālaiḥ saptabhī ratnasūtraiḥ
XXbsu022_u:4709: ye ca daśasu dikṣu nānālokadhātuṣu vividhā vṛkṣāḥ santyabhijātā abhipūjitā divyamānuṣyakāste 'pi sarve tatra bodhimaṇḍe
XXbsu022_u:4711: yāśca daśasu dikṣu nānāprakārā jalasthalajāḥ puṣpajātayastā api sarvāstatra bodhimaṇḍe saṃdṛśyante sma /
XXbsu022_u:4712: ye 'pi ca daśasu dikṣu nānālokadhātuṣu bodhisattvā bodhimaṇḍālaṃkurvantyapramāṇapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāravyūhaiste 'pi tatra bodhimaṇḍe saṃdṛśyante sma //
XXbsu022_u:4713: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhimaṇḍaparipālakairdevaputraistādṛśā vyūhā bodhimaṇḍe abhinirmitā abhūvan, yān dṛṣṭvā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsurāḥ svabhavanāni śmaśānasaṃjñāmutpādayāmāsuḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4720: ete catvāro bodhivṛkṣadevatā bodhisattvasya pūjārthaṃ bodhivṛkṣaṃ māpayanti sma mūlasaṃpannaṃ skandhasaṃpannaṃ śākhāpatrapuṣpaphalasaṃpannaṃ ārohapariṇāhasaṃpannaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ vistīrṇamaśītistālānuccaistvena tadanurūpeṇa pariṇāhena citraṃ darśanīyaṃ manoramaṃ saptabhī ratnavedikābhiḥ parivṛtaṃ saptabhī ratnatālapaṅktibhiḥ saptabhī ratnakiṅkiṇījālaiḥ saptabhī ratnasūtraiḥ samantādanuparivṛtairanuparikṣiptaṃ pārijātakakovidāraprakāśamatṛptacakṣurdarśanam sa ca pṛthivīpradeśastrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuvajreṇābhidṛḍhaḥ sāro 'bhedyavajramayaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt yatra bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇo
XXbsu022_u:4722: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvena bodhimaṇḍamupasaṃkramatā tathārūpā kāyātprabhā muktābhūt, yayā prabhayā sarve 'pāyāḥ śāntā abhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:4725: ye ca sattvā vikalendriyā abhūvan, te sarve paripūrṇendriyatāmanuprāpnuvan /
XXbsu022_u:4735: na ca kasyacitsattvasya tasmin samaye rāgo bādhate dveṣo va moho vā krodho vā lobho vā khilo vā vyāpādo vā īrṣyā vā mātsaryo vā /
XXbsu022_u:4736: na kaścitsattvastasmin samaye mriyate sma, na cyavate sma, nopapadyate sma /
XXbsu022_u:4737: sarvasattvāśca tasmin samaye maitracittā hitacittāḥ parasparaṃ mātāpitṛsaṃjñino 'bhūvan //
XXbsu022_u:4740: duḥkhaṃ praśāntaṃ sattvānāṃ sukhaṃ vindanti vedanām // Lal_19.7 //
XXbsu022_u:4742: maitracittā hite jātāḥ spṛṣṭā bhābhirmahāmune // Lal_19.8 //
XXbsu022_u:4749: rāgadveṣādibhiḥ kleśaiḥ sattvā bādhyanta ye sadā /
XXbsu022_u:4753: na khilaṃ na ca mātsaryaṃ vyāpādo na ca vigrahaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4760: sarve te vipulāḥ kṣetrāḥ dṛśyantyekaṃ yathā tathā // Lal_19.17 //
XXbsu022_u:4767: te sarve tatra dṛśyante bodhisattvasya tejasā // Lal_19.20 //
XXbsu022_u:4769: svāni svāni vimānāni śmaśānānīva menire // Lal_19.21 //
XXbsu022_u:4777: pārijāto divi yathā tasmādapi viśiṣyate // Lal_19.25 //
XXbsu022_u:4778: guṇāḥ śakyā na te vācā sarve saṃparikīrtitum /
XXbsu022_u:4780: iti hi bhikṣavastayā bodhisattvasya kāyapramuktayā prabhayā kālikasya nāgarājasya bhavanamavabhāsitamabhūt viśuddhayā vimalayā kāyacittaprahlādaudvilyajananyā sarvakleśāpakarṣiṇyā sarvasattvasukhaprītiprasādaprāmodyajananyā dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ kāliko nāgarājastasyāṃ velāyāṃ svasya parivārasya purataḥ sthitvemā gāthā
XXbsu022_u:4781: krakuchande yatha ābha dṛṣṭa rucirā dṛṣṭā ca kanakāhvaye yadvatkāśyapi dharmarājamanaghe dṛṣṭā prabhā nirmalā /
XXbsu022_u:4782: niḥsaṃśayaṃ varalakṣaṇo hitakaro utpanna jñānaprabho yenedaṃ bhavanaṃ virocati hi me svarṇaprabhālaṃkṛtam nāsmiṃ candraraviprabhā suvipulā saṃdṛśyate veśmani no cāgnerna maṇerna vidyudamalā no ca prabhā jyotiṣām /
XXbsu022_u:4783: no vā śakraprabhā na brahmaṇa prabhā no ca prabhā āsurī ekāntaṃ tamasākulaṃ mama gṛhaṃ prāgduṣkṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ // Lal_19.28 //
XXbsu022_u:4785: adyedaṃ bhavanaṃ virājati śubhaṃ madhye raviṃdīptivat cittaṃ prīti janeti kāyu sukhito gātrādbhutā śītalā /
XXbsu022_u:4786: taptā vālika yā śarīri nipatī jātā sa me śītalā suvyaktaṃ bahukalpakoṭicarito bodhidramaṃ gacchati // Lal_19.29 //
XXbsu022_u:4787: śīghraṃ gṛhṇata nāgapuṣpa rucirā vastrāṃ sugandhāṃ śubhāṃ muktāhārapinaddhatāṃśca valayāṃścūrṇāni dhūpottamā /
XXbsu022_u:4788: saṃgītiṃ prakṛrudhva vādya vividhā bherīmṛdaṅgaiḥ śubhaiḥ hantā gacchatha pūjanā hitakaraṃ pūjārha sarve jage // Lal_19.30 //
XXbsu022_u:4789: so 'bhyutthāya ca nāgakanyasahitaścaturo diśaḥ prekṣate adrākṣīdatha meruparvatanibhaṃ svālaṃkṛtaṃ tejasā /
XXbsu022_u:4790: devairdānavakoṭibhiḥ parivṛtaṃ brahmendrayakṣaistathā pūjāṃ tasya karonti hṛṣṭamanaso darśenti mārgo hyayam // Lal_19.31 //
XXbsu022_u:4791: saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sa hi nāgarāṭ sumuditaścābhyarcya lokottamaṃ vanditvā caraṇau ca gauravakṛtastasthau muneragrataḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4792: nāgākanya udagra hṛṣṭamanasaḥ kurvanti pūjāṃ muneḥ puṣpaṃ gandhavilepanā ca kṣipiṣustūryāṇi nirnādayan // Lal_19.32 //
XXbsu022_u:4793: kṛtvā cāñjali nāgarāṭ sumuditastuṣṭāva tathyairguṇaiḥ sādhurdarśitu pūrṇacandravadane lokottame nāyake /
XXbsu022_u:4794: yatha me dṛṣṭa nimitta pūrvaṛṣiṇāṃ paśyāmi tāneva te adya tvaṃ vinihatya mārabalavāniṣṭaṃ padaṃ lapsyase // Lal_19.33 //
XXbsu022_u:4795: yasyārthe damadānasaṃyama pure sarvā ti tyāgī abhūt yasyārthe damaśīlamaitrakaruṇākṣāntibalaṃ bhāvitam /
XXbsu022_u:4796: yasyārthe damavīryadhyānanirataḥ prajñāpradīpaḥ kṛtaḥ saiṣā te paripūrṇa sarva praṇidhī adyā jino bheṣyase // Lal_19.34 //
XXbsu022_u:4797: yadvadvṛkṣa sapatrapuṣpa saphalā bodhidrumaṃ saṃnatāḥ yadvatkumbhasahasra pūrṇasalilā kurvanti prādakṣiṇam /
XXbsu022_u:4798: yadvaccāpsaragaṇāśca saṃpramuditā snigdhaṃ rutaṃ kurvate haṃsā kroñcagaṇā yathā ca gagane gacchanti līlānvitaṃ kurvante sumanāḥ pradakṣiṇamṛṣiṃ bhāvi tvamadyārhavān // Lal_19.35 //
XXbsu022_u:4800: yatha vā kāñcanavarṇa ābha rucirā kṣatrāśatā gacchate śāntāścāpi yathā apāya nikhilā duḥkhairvimuktā prajāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4801: yadvadvṛṣṭita candrasūryabhavanā vāyurmṛdurvāyate adyā bheṣyasi sārthavāhu tribhave jātījarāmocako yadvatkāmaratī vihāya ca surāstvatpūjane 'bhyāgatāḥ
XXbsu022_u:4802: brahmā brahmapurohitāśca amarā utsṛjya dhyānaṃ sukham /
XXbsu022_u:4803: ye kecittribhave tathaiva ca pure sarve ihābhyāgatāḥ adyā bheṣyasi vaidyarāju tribhave jāṭījaramocako mārgaścāpi yathā viśodhitu surairyenādya tvaṃ gacchase etenāgatu krakucchandu bhagavān kanakāhvayaḥ kāśyapaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4804: yatha vā padma viśuddha nirmala śubhā bhittvā mahīmudgatāḥ yasmiṃ nikṣipase kramānatibalāṃ bhāvi tvamadyārhavān // Lal_19.38 //
XXbsu022_u:4805: mārāḥ koṭisahasra nekanayutā gaṅgā yathā vālikāḥ te tubhyaṃ na samartha bodhiviṭapāccāletu kampetu vā /
XXbsu022_u:4806: yajñā naikavidhāḥ sahasranayutā gaṅgā yathā vālikāḥ yaṣṭāste caratā hitāya jagatasteneha vibhrājase nakṣatrā saśaśī satārakaravī bhūmau patedambarāt svasthānācca calenmahāgirivaraḥ śuṣyedatho sāgaraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4807: caturo dhātava kaści vijñapuruṣo darśeya ekaikaśaḥ naiva tvaṃ drumarājamūlupagato aprāpya bodhyutthihet // Lal_19.40 //
XXbsu022_u:4808: lābhā mahya sulabdha vṛddhi vipulā dṛṣṭo 'si yatsārathe pūjā caiva kṛtā guṇāśca kathitā bodhāya cotsāhitaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4809: sarvā nāgavadhū ahaṃ ca sasutā mucyemito yonitaḥ tvaṃ yāsī yatha mattavāraṇagate gacchema evaṃ vayam // Lal_19.41 //
XXbsu022_u:4811: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ kālikasya nāgarājasyāgramahiṣī suvarṇaprabhāsā nāma, sā saṃbahulābhirnāgakanyābhiḥ parivṛtā puraskṛtā nānāratnachatraparigṛhītābhiḥ nānādūṣyaparigṛhītābhirnānāmuktāhāraparigṛhītābhiḥ nānāmaṇiratnaparigṛhītābhiḥ divyamānuṣyakamālyavilepanaguṇṭhaparigṛhītābhiḥ nānāgandhaghaṭikāparigṛhītābhiḥ nānātūryasaṃgītisaṃpravāditairnānāratnapuṣpavarṣairbodhisattvaṃ gacchantamabhyavakiranti sma //
XXbsu022_u:4814: abhrāntā atrastā abhīrū achambhī alīnā adīnā prahṛṣṭā dudharṣā /
XXbsu022_u:4815: araktā aduṣṭā amūḍhā alubdhā viraktā vimuktā namaste maharṣe // Lal_19.42
XXbsu022_u:4816: bhiṣaṅkā viśalyā vineyā vineṣī suvaidyā jagasyā dukhebhyaḥ pramocī /
XXbsu022_u:4817: alenā atrāṇā ahīnā viditvā bhavā lenu trāṇo trilokesmi jātaḥ // Lal_19.43
XXbsu022_u:4818: prasannā prahṛṣṭā yathā devasaṃghāḥ pravarṣī nabhasthā mahatpuṣpavarṣam /
XXbsu022_u:4819: mahācailakṣepaṃ karontī yatheme jino bheṣyase 'dyā kuruṣva praharṣam //
XXbsu022_u:4820: upehi drumendraṃ niṣīdā achambhī jinā mārasenāṃ dhuna kleśajālam /
XXbsu022_u:4821: vibuddhya praśāntāṃ varāmagrabodhiṃ yathā paurvakaistairvibuddhā jinendraiḥ // Lal_19.45 //
XXbsu022_u:4822: tvayā yasya arthe bahūkalpakoṭyaḥ kṛtā duṣkarāṇī jaganmocanārtham /
XXbsu022_u:4823: prapūrṇā ti āśā ayaṃ prāptu kālo upehi drumendraṃ spṛśasvāgrabodhim //
XXbsu022_u:4825: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat - kutra niṣaṇṇaistaiḥ pūrvakaistathāgatairanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā iti /
XXbsu022_u:4827: atha khalvantarīkṣagatāni śuddhāvāsakāyikadevaśatasahasrāṇi bodhisattvasya cetobhireva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāyaivaṃ vāco bhāṣante sma - evametat
XXbsu022_u:4829: tṛṇasaṃstare satpuruṣa niṣadya taiḥ pūrvakaistathāgatairanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā iti //
XXbsu022_u:4830: adrākṣītkhalvapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo mārgasya dakṣiṇe pārśve svastikaṃ yāvasikam tṛṇāni lūnāti sma nīlāni mṛdukāni sukumārāṇi ramaṇīyāni kuṇḍalajātāni pradakṣiṇāvartāni /
XXbsu022_u:4832: dṛṣṭvā ca (Vaidya 208) punarbodhisattvo mārgādapakramya yena svastiko yāvasikastenopasaṃkrāmat
XXbsu022_u:4833: upasaṃkramya svastikaṃ yāvasikaṃ madhurayā vācā samālapati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4834: yāsau vāgājñāpanī vijñāpanī vispaṣṭā anekalokaikavarṇasukhā valguḥ śravaṇīyā snigdhā smaraṇīyā codanī toṣaṇī premaṇī akarkaśā agadgadā aparuṣā acapalā ślakṣṇā madhurā karṇasukhā kāyacittodbilyakaraṇī rāgadoṣamohakalikaluṣavinodanī kalaviṅkarutasvarā
XXbsu022_u:4835: kuṇālajīvaṃjīvakābhinaditaghoṣā dundubhisaṃgītirutaravitanirghoṣavatī anapahatā satyā acchā bhūtā brahmasvarutaravitanirghoṣā samudrasvaraveganibhā śailasaṃghaṭṭanavatī devendrāsurendrābhiṣṭutā
XXbsu022_u:4836: gambhīrā duravagāhā namucibalābalakaraṇī parapravādamathanī siṃhasvaravegā hayagajagarjitaghoṣā nāganirnādanī meghastanitābhigarjitasvarā daśadiksarvabuddhakṣetraspharaṇī vineyasattvasaṃcodanī adrutā anupahatā avilambitā sahitā yuktā kālavādinī samayānatikramaṇī dharmaśatasahasrasugrathitā saumyā asaktā adhiṣṭhitapratibhānā ekarutā sarvarutaracanī sarvābhiprāyajñāpanī sarvasukhasaṃjananī
XXbsu022_u:4838: īdṛśyā vācā bodhisattvaḥ svastikaṃ yāvasikaṃ gāthābhirabhyabhāṣata -
XXbsu022_u:4839: tṛṇu dehi mi svastika śīghraṃ adya mamārthu tṛṇaiḥ sumahāntaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4840: sabalaṃ namuciṃ nihanitvā bodhimanuttaraśānti spṛśiṣye // Lal_19.47 //
XXbsu022_u:4841: yasya kṛte mayi kalpasahasrā dānu damo 'pi ca saṃyama tyāgo /
XXbsu022_u:4842: śīlavrataṃ ca tapaśca sucīrṇā tasya mi niṣpadi bheṣyati adya // Lal_19.48
XXbsu022_u:4843: kṣāntibalaṃ tatha vīryabalaṃ ca dhyānabalaṃ tatha jñānabalaṃ ca /
XXbsu022_u:4844: puṇyaabhijñavimokṣabalaṃ ca tasya mi niṣpadi bheṣyati adya // Lal_19.49 //
XXbsu022_u:4845: prajñabalaṃ ca upāyabalaṃ ca ṛddhima saṃgatamaitrabalaṃ ca /
XXbsu022_u:4846: pratisaṃvidaparisatyabalaṃ ca teṣa mi niṣpadi bheṣyati adya // Lal_19.50
XXbsu022_u:4848: puṇyabalaṃ ca tavāpi anantaṃ yanmama dāsyasi adya tṛṇāni /
XXbsu022_u:4849: na hyaparaṃ tava etu nimittaṃ tvaṃ pi anuttaru bheṣyasi śāstā // Lal_19.51
XXbsu022_u:4850: śrutvā svastiku vāca nāyake suruciramadhurāṃ tuṣṭo āttamanāśca harṣitaḥ pramuditamanasaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4851: gṛhṇītvā tṛṇamuṣṭi sparśanavatī mṛdutaruṇaśubhāṃ purataḥ sthitvana vāca bhāṣate pramuditahṛdayaḥ yadi tāva ṇṛkebhi labhyate padavaramamṛtaṃ bodhī uttama śānta durdṛśā purimajinapathaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4852: tiṣṭhatu tāva mahāguṇodadhe aparimitayaśā ahameva prathame nu budhyami padavaramṛtam // Lal_19.53
XXbsu022_u:4853: naiṣā svastika bodhi labhyate tṛṇavaraśayanaiḥ acaritvā bahukalpa duṣkarī vratatapa vividhā
XXbsu022_u:4854: prajñāpuṇyaupāyaudgato yada bhavi matimāṃ tada paścājjina vyākaronti munayo bhaviṣyasi virajaḥ yadi bodhi iya śakyu svastikā parajani dadituṃ piṇḍīkṛtya dadeya prāṇināṃ ma bhavatu vimatiḥ
XXbsu022_u:4855: yada bodhī maya prāpta jānasī vibhajami amṛtaṃ āgatvā śṛṇu dharmayukta tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi virajaḥ gṛhṇītvā tṛṇamuṣṭi nāyakaḥ paramasumṛdukāṃ siṃhāhaṃsagatiśca prasthitaḥ pracalita dharaṇī
XXbsu022_u:4856: devā nāgagaṇāḥ kṛtāñjalī pramuditamanasaḥ adyā mārabalaṃ nihatyayaṃ spṛśiṣyati amṛtam // Lal_19.56
XXbsu022_u:4857: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasya bodhivṛkṣamupasaṃkrāmato 'śītibodhivṛkṣasahasrāṇi devaputraiśca bodhisattvaiśca maṇḍitānyabhūvan -
XXbsu022_u:4858: iha niṣadya bodhisattvo bodhiṃ prāpsyatyabhisaṃbhotsyata iti /
XXbsu022_u:4866: sarveṣu teṣu bodhivṛkṣamūleṣu yathānurūpāṇi siṃhāsanāni prajñaptānyabhūvan nānādivyadūṣyasaṃstṛtāni
XXbsu022_u:4869: bodhisattvaśca lalitavyūhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma /
XXbsu022_u:4870: samanantarasamāpannasya ca bodhisattvasyemaṃ lalitavyūhaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhim, atha tatkṣaṇameva bodhisattvaḥ sarveṣu ca teṣu bodhivṛkṣamūleṣu siṃhāsane saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma lakṣaṇānuvyañjanasamalaṃkṛtena kāyena /
XXbsu022_u:4871: ekaikaśca bodhisattvo devaputraiścaivaṃ saṃjānīte sma - mamaiva siṃhāsane bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇo nānyeṣāmiti /
XXbsu022_u:4872: yathā ca te saṃjānate sma - tathāsyaiva lalitavyūhasya bodhisattvasamādheranubhāvena
XXbsu022_u:4873: sarvanirayatiryagyoniyamalokikāḥ sarve devamanuṣyāśca sarve gatyupapannāḥ sarvasattvā bodhisattvaṃ paśyanti sma bodhivṛkṣamūle siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇam //
XXbsu022_u:4874: atha ca punarhīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ matiparitoṣaṇārthaṃ bodhisattvastṛṇamuṣṭimādāya yena bodhivṛkṣastenopasaṃkrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:4875: upasaṃkramya bodhivṛkṣaṃ saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svayamevābhyantarāgraṃ bahirmūlaṃ samantabhadraṃ tṛṇasaṃstaraṇaṃ saṃstīrya siṃhavacchūravadbalavaddṛḍhavīryavatsthāmavannāgavadaiśvaryavatsvayaṃbhūvajjñānivadanuttaravadviśeṣavadabhyudratavadyaśovatkīrtivaddānavacchīlavatkṣāntivadvīryavaddhyānavatprajñāvajjñānavatpuṇyavannihatamārapratyarthikavatsaṃbhāravatparyaṅkamābhujya tasmiṃstṛṇasaṃstare nyaṣīdat prāṅmukha ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya abhimukhāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya /
XXbsu022_u:4877: ihāsane śuṣyatu me śarīraṃ tvagasthimāṃsaṃ pralayaṃ ca yātu /
XXbsu022_u:4884: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasya bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasyaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi ṣaṭ kāmāvacarā devāḥ sthitā abhūvan - mā bodhisattvasya kaścidantarāyaṃ
XXbsu022_u:4886: evaṃ dakṣiṇapaścimottarā diśo devaiḥ parigṛhītā abhūvan //
XXbsu022_u:4887: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bodhisattvasaṃcodanīṃ nāma raśmiṃ prāmuñcat, yayā raśmyā samantāddaśasu
XXbsu022_u:4889: atha khalu pūrvasyāṃ diśi vimalāyāṃ lokadhātau vimalaprabhāsasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrāllalitavyūho nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:4890: upasaṃkramya ca tasyāṃ velāyāṃ bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe tathārūpamṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhisamakarod yenaddharyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtena daśasu dikṣvākāśadhātuparyavasānāni sarvabuddhakṣetrāṇyekaṃ maṇḍalamātramādarśayati sma śuddhasya nīlavaiḍūryasya /
XXbsu022_u:4891: pañcagatyupapannānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ purato bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇaṃ bodhisattvamupadarśayati sma
XXbsu022_u:4893: sattvo lalitaḥ, ko 'yamevaṃrūpaḥ sattvo virājata iti /
XXbsu022_u:4894: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ purato bodhisattvo bodhisattvānnirmimīte sma /
XXbsu022_u:4895: tatra te bodhisattvavigrahā imā gāthā abhāṣanta -
XXbsu022_u:4896: yasyā kiṃcana rāgadoṣakaluṣā sā vāsanā uddhṛtā yasyā kāyaprabhākṛtā daśadiśe sarve prabhā niṣprabhāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4897: yasyā puṇyasamādhijñānanicayaḥ kalpaughasaṃvardhiṃtaḥ so 'yaṃ śākyamunirmahāmunivaraḥ sarvā diśo bhrājate // Lal_20.1 //
XXbsu022_u:4899: atha khalu bhikṣavo dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi ratnavyūhāyā lokadhāto ratnārciṣastathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādratnacchatrakūṭasaṃdarśano nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:4900: upasaṃkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe ekaratnachatreṇa taṃ sarvāvantaṃ maṇḍalamātraṃ saṃchādayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4904: yena cchatrasahasrakoṭinayutā gandhāna ratnāna ca dattā apratimeṣu maitramanasā tiṣṭhanti ke nirvṛte /
XXbsu022_u:4906: so eṣo varalakṣaṇo hitakaro nārāyaṇasthāmavān bodhermūlamupāgato guṇadharastasyaiṣa pūjā kṛtā iti //
XXbsu022_u:4907: atha khalu paścimāyā diśaścampakavarṇāyā lokadhātoḥ puṣpāvalivanarājikusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādindrajālī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopajagāma /
XXbsu022_u:4908: upetya ca bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe sarvāvantaṃ maṇḍalamātramekaratnajālena saṃchādayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4909: tatra daśasu dikṣu devanāgayakṣagandharvāḥ parasparamevamāhuḥ - kasyāyamevaṃrūpo prabhāvyūha iti /
XXbsu022_u:4911: ratnākaro ratanaketu ratistriloke ratnottamo ratanakīrti rataḥ sudharme /
XXbsu022_u:4912: ratnāni trīṇi na ca chetsyati vīryaprāptaḥ so bodhi prāpsyati varāmiya tasya pūjā // Lal_20.3
XXbsu022_u:4914: atha khalūttarasyāṃ diśi sūryāvartāyā lokadhātoścandrasūryajihmīkaraprabhasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādvyūharājo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:4915: upasaṃkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe yāvanto daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāstān sarvāṃstasmin maṇḍalamātre saṃdarśayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4916: tatra kecidbodhisattvā evamāhuḥ - kasyema evaṃrūpā vyūhāḥ? atha tebhyaḥ sarvavyūhebhya iyaṃ gāthā niścarati sma -
XXbsu022_u:4917: kāyo yena viśodhitaḥ subahuśaḥ puṇyena jñānena ca yenā vāca viśodhitā vratatapaiḥ satyena dharmeṇa ca /
XXbsu022_u:4918: cittaṃ yena viśodhitaṃ hiridhṛtī kāruṇyamaitryā tathā so eṣo drumarājamūlupagataḥ śākyarṣabhaḥ pūjyate // Lal_20.4 //
XXbsu022_u:4920: atha khalu pūrvadakṣiṇasyā diśo guṇākarāyā lokadhātorguṇarājaprabhāsasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādruṇamatirnāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:4921: upasaṃkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe sarvaguṇavyūhaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ tasmin maṇḍalamātre 'bhinirmimīte sma /
XXbsu022_u:4923: kasyāyamevaṃrūpaḥ kūṭāgāravyūhaḥ? tataśca kūṭāgārādiyaṃ gāthā niścarati sma -
XXbsu022_u:4924: yasya guṇaiḥ satataṃ guṇagandhikā bhonti surāsura yakṣa mahoragāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4926: so guṇavān guṇarājakulodito bodhiviṭape upaviṣṭu guṇodadhiḥ // Lal_20.5 //
XXbsu022_u:4928: atha khalu dakṣiṇapaścimāyā diśo ratnasaṃbhavāyā lokadhāto ratnayaṣṭestathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādratnasaṃbhavo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:4929: upasaṃkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān ratnavyomakāṃstasminmaṇḍalamātre 'bhinirmimīte sma /
XXbsu022_u:4933: vyomālaṃkṛta puṣpadāma rucirā udyāna kūpā sabhā hastā pāda śirottamāṅganayanāḥ so bodhimaṇḍe sthitaḥ // Lal_20.6 //
XXbsu022_u:4935: atha khalu paścimottarasyā diśo meghavatyā lokadhātormegharājasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrānmeghakūṭābhigarjitasvaro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:4936: upasaṃkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe kālānusāryagurumeghamabhinirmāyoragasāracandanacūrṇavarṣaṃ tasmin maṇḍalamātre 'bhipravarṣati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4938: dharmāmegha sphuritva sarvatribhave vidyādhimuktaprabhaḥ saddharmaṃ ca virāga varṣiṃ amṛtaṃ nirvāṇasaṃprāpakam /
XXbsu022_u:4939: sarvā rāgakileśabandhanalatā so vāsanā chetsyati dhyānarddhībalaindriyaiḥ kusumitaḥ śraddhākaraṃ dāsyate // Lal_20.7 //
XXbsu022_u:4941: atha khalūttarapūrvasyā diśo hemajālapratichannāyā lokadhāto ratnacchatrābhyudgatāvabhāsasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrāddhemajālālaṃkṛto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayāprabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena
XXbsu022_u:4943: upasaṃkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe sarveṣu teṣu kūṭāgāreṣu ratnavyomakeṣu dvātriṃśallakṣaṇasamalaṃkṛtān bodhisattvavigrahānabhinirmimīte sma /
XXbsu022_u:4944: sarve ca te bodhisattvavigrahā divyamānuṣyakapuṣpadāmaparigṛhītā yena bodhisattvastenābhinatakāyāstāni puṣpadāmānyabhipralambayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:4946: yena buddhanayutā stavita pūrva gauraveṇa mahatā janiya śraddhām /
XXbsu022_u:4947: brahmaghoṣavacanaṃ madhuravāṇiṃ bodhimaṇḍopagataṃ śirasi vande // Lal_20.8
XXbsu022_u:4950: atha khalvadhastāddiśaḥ samantavilokitāyā lokadhātoḥ samantadarśinastathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādratnagarbho nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:4951: upasaṃkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe tasmin vaidūryamayamaṇḍalamātre jāmbūnadasuvarṇapadmānyabhyudgatānyupadarśayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4952: teṣāṃ ca padmānāṃ karṇikāsvardhakāyikā nāryo varṇarūpasaṃpannāḥ sarvālaṃkārapratimaṇḍitā upadarśayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:4953: vāmadakṣiṇe pāṇibhirharṣakaṭakakeyūrasuvarṇasūtramuktāhārādivividhābharaṇaparigṛhītāḥ puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni cābhipralambayantyo yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bodhisattvastenoparyabhinatakāyāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4956: nirmāṇasuśīla sadojju praṣṭho tasyā onamathā guṇadharasya // Lal_20.9 //
XXbsu022_u:4958: atha khalūpariṣṭāddiśo varagaganāyā lokadhātorgaṇendrasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādgaganagañjo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastayā prabhayā saṃcoditaḥ san gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto yena
XXbsu022_u:4960: upasaṃkramya bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe gaganatalastha eva yāvanto daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣvadṛṣṭāśrutapūrvāḥ santi puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaravastrālaṃkārachatradhvajapatākāvaijayantiratn
XXbsu022_u:4961: amaṇikanakarajatamuktāhārahayagajarathapattivāhanapuṣpavṛkṣapatrapuṣpaphaladārakadārikā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragaśakrabrahmalokapālamānuṣyāmānuṣyāṇāṃ sarvā gaganatalānmahāntaṃ puṣpavarṣamabhipravarṣanti sma sarvasattvaprītisukhasaṃjananaṃ ca na ca kasyacitsattvasya bhayaṃ cotpīḍāṃ vā karoti sma //
XXbsu022_u:4963: peyālameṣa diśatāsu jinaurasā ye saṃpūjituṃ hitakaraṃ anuprāpta bodhim /
XXbsu022_u:4965: ke cāgatā nabhasi megha iva stananto hārā sahasranayutāni pralambayantaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4966: ke cāgatā makuṭaratnavilambacūḍāḥ pauṣpaṃ vimāna gagane upadarśayantaḥ //
XXbsu022_u:4968: ke cāgatā dharaṇisiṃha ivā nadantaḥ śūnyānimittapraṇidhīravamuñcamānāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4969: ke cāgatā yatha vṛṣā abhinandamānāḥ na ca dṛṣṭapūrva rucirāṇi kṣipanti puṣpāṃ // Lal_20.12
XXbsu022_u:4970: ke cāgatā nabhasi sāra ivā ravanto varṇāsahasra svaki ātmani darśayantaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4971: ke cāgatā śaśirivā gagane supūrṇāḥ sugatātmajasya guṇamālamudīrayantaḥ //
XXbsu022_u:4972: ke cāgatā raviriva prabha muñcamānāḥ sarvāṇi mārabhavanāni karonti jihmā /
XXbsu022_u:4973: ke cāgatā vimalaketu yathendrayaṣṭyaḥ saṃbhārapuṇyanicitāstahi bodhimaṇḍe
XXbsu022_u:4974: kecitkṣipanti gaganānmaṇiratnajālā candrā sucandra tatha bāla virocamānā /
XXbsu022_u:4975: māndāravā sumanavārṣikacampadāmā saṃbodhisattva drumarājasthite kṣipanti // Lal_20.15 //
XXbsu022_u:4976: ke cāgatā dharaṇi kampayamāna padbhyāṃ saṃkampitā vasudha prītikarī janasya /
XXbsu022_u:4977: ke cāgatā grahiya meru karetalebhiḥ utsṛṣṭapuṣpapuṭa saṃsthita antarīkṣe // Lal_20.16 //
XXbsu022_u:4978: ke cāgatāścaturi sāgara gṛhya mūrdhnā utsṛṣṭa siñci vasudhāṃ varagandhatoyaiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4979: ke cāgatā ratanayaṣṭi gṛhītva citraṃ saṃbodhisattvamupadarśaya sthitva dūre // Lal_20.17 //
XXbsu022_u:4980: ke cāgatā bhaviya brahma praśāntarūpāḥ śāntā praśāntamanasaḥ sthita dhyānadhyāyī /
XXbsu022_u:4981: romebhi teṣa svaru niścarate manojña maitrīupekṣakaruṇāmuditāpramāṇā //
XXbsu022_u:4982: ke cāgatā maruta śakra ivā yathaiva devaiḥ sahasranayutaiśca purākṛtāste /
XXbsu022_u:4984: upagamya bodhivaṭu gṛhya kṛtāñjalībhiḥ śakrābhilagna maṇiratna kṣipanti citrā // Lal_20.19
XXbsu022_u:4985: ke cāgatāścatudiśā ca yathaiva pālā gandharvarākṣasaparīvṛta kinnarebhiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4986: vidyutsphuṭānta kusumāni pravarṣamāṇāḥ gandharvakinnararūtena stuvanti vīram // Lal_20.20
XXbsu022_u:4987: ke cāgatāḥ kusumitāṃ pragṛhītva vṛkṣān saphalāṃ sapuṣpavaragandha pramuñcamānāṃ /
XXbsu022_u:4988: jāteṣu teṣu sthita buddha śuddhakāyāḥ avalambamāna pratimaṇḍi kṣipanti puṣpā // Lal_20.21
XXbsu022_u:4989: ke cāgatāḥ kusumitāḥ puḍinī gṛhītvā padmotpalaiḥ kusumitaistatha puṇḍarīkaiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4990: dvātriṃśalakṣaṇadharāḥ sthita padmagarbhe staviṣṭa aliptamanasaṃ vidu bodhisattvam // Lal_20.22
XXbsu022_u:4991: ke cāgatā vipulakāya tatheva meru sthitvāntarīkṣa svakamātmanamutsṛjanti /
XXbsu022_u:4992: utsṛjyamātra bhaviyā navapuṣpadāmāḥ saṃchādayanti trisahasri jinasya kṣetram // Lal_20.23
XXbsu022_u:4993: ke cāgatā ubhayacakṣuṣi kalpadāhaṃ saṃdarśayanta vibhavaṃ tatha saṃbhavaṃ ca /
XXbsu022_u:4994: teṣāṃ śarīri bahudharmasukhā raṇanti tāṃ śrutva sattvanayutā prajahanti tṛṣṇām // Lal_20.24
XXbsu022_u:4996: kanyā yathaiva sualaṃkṛta citrahārāḥ prekṣanta yāṃ suragaṇā na labhanti tṛptim // Lal_20.25
XXbsu022_u:4997: ke cāgatā vajirakāya ivā abhedyāḥ heṣṭhā paskandhacaraṇaiḥ pratigrāhyamāṇāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:4999: ke cāgatā ravirivā śaśipūrṇavaktrāḥ jyotsnākarāḥ prabhakarā hatakleśadoṣāḥ
XXbsu022_u:5000: ke cāgatā ratanamaṇḍita ratnapāṇī saṃchādayitva bahukṣetrasahasrakoṭyaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:5001: varṣanti ratnavara puṣpa sugandhagandhā saṃtoṣaṇārthaṃ bahusattvahitaṃ sukhārtham // Lal_20.27
XXbsu022_u:5002: ke cāgatā mahati dhāraṇi ratnakośāḥ romebhi sūtranayutāni prabhāṣamāṇāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:5003: pratibhānavanta mativanta subuddhivanto mattapramattajanatāṃ pratibodhayantaḥ // Lal_20.28
XXbsu022_u:5004: ke cāgatā grahiya bheri yathaiva meru ākoṭyamānu gagane sumanojñaghoṣām /
XXbsu022_u:5005: yasyā ravaṃ daśadiśe vraji kṣetrakoṭyā adyāvaboddhumamataṃ anubuddhi śāstā // Lal_20.29
XXbsu022_u:5011: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvaiścema evaṃrūpā vyūhā bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe bodhimaṇḍe 'bhisaṃkṛtā abhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:5012: svayaṃ ca bodhisattvo yāvanto daśasu dikṣvatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu bodhimaṇḍālaṃkāravyūhāstān sarvāṃstasmin bodhimaṇḍe saṃdarśayati sma //
XXbsu022_u:5013: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat - iha khalu kāmadhātau māraḥ pāpīyānadhipatirīśvaro vaśavartī /
XXbsu022_u:5017: tasmin vijite sarve kāmāvacarā devādayo nigṛhītā bhaviṣyanti /
XXbsu022_u:5018: tataśca māraparṣadaḥ pūrvāvaropitakuśalamūlā mārakāyikā devaputrāste mama siṃhavikrīḍitaṃ dṛṣṭvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayiṣyanti //
XXbsu022_u:5019: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattva evamanuvicintya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhrūvivarāntarādūrṇākośāt sarvamāramaṇḍalavidhvaṃsanakarīṃ nāmaikāṃ raśmimudasṛjat /
