XXbsu022_u:5020: yayā raśmyā sarvasmiṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau sarvamārabhavanānyavabhāsya jihmīkṛtāni saṃprakampitāni cābhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:5022: tasyāśca prabhāyā māraḥ pāpīyānidamevaṃ rūpaṃ śabdamaśrauṣīt -
XXbsu022_u:5023: kalpaughacīrṇacarito hyabhiśuddhasattvaḥ śuddhodanasya tanayaḥ pravijahya rājyam /
XXbsu022_u:5024: so nirgato hitakaro hyamṛtābhilāṣī bodhidrumaṃ hyupagato 'dya
XXbsu022_u:5026: so tīrṇa ātmana parānapi tārayeyā moceṣyate sa ca parāṃ svayameva muktaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:5027: āśvāsaprāpta sa parānapi cāśvaseyā nirvāpayiṣyati parāṃ parinirvṛtaśca //
XXbsu022_u:5028: śūnyāṃ kariṣyati āpāyatrayo 'pyaśeṣāṃ pūrṇāṃ kariṣyati purāṃ suramānuṣāṇām
XXbsu022_u:5029: dhyānānabhijña paramaṃ amṛtaṃ sukhaṃ ca dāsyatyasau hitakaro amṛtaṃ spṛśitvā // Lal_21.3 //
XXbsu022_u:5030: śūnyaṃ kariṣyati puraṃ tava kṛṣṇabandho abalo balo balavihīnu apakṣyapakṣyo /

XXbsu022_u:5034: iti hi bhikṣavo māraḥ pāpīyānābhiḥ saṃcodanābhirgāthābhiḥ saṃcoditaḥ san dvātriṃśadākāraṃ svapnamapaśyat /
XXbsu022_u:5046: priyajanaparivārāśca māramutsṛjya dīnamukhā ekānte gatvā pradhyāyantamapaśyat /
XXbsu022_u:5047: agramahiṣīṃ ca māriṇīṃ śayanabhraṣṭāṃ dharaṇyāmubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ śīrṣamabhipīḍayantīmapaśyat
XXbsu022_u:5048: ye ca te māraputrā vīryavattamāśca balavattamāśca tejavattamāśca prajñāvattamāśca taṃ bodhisattvaṃ bodhimaṇḍavarāgragataṃ namasyanta evamapaśyat /
XXbsu022_u:5049: ātmanīyāśca duhitrīrhā tāta hā tāteti krandantyo 'paśyat /
XXbsu022_u:5054: yakṣarākṣasakumbhāṇḍagandharvādhipatayaḥ, tān sarvān hastāñśirasi kṛtvā rodantaḥ krandantaḥ palāyamānāṃścāpaśyat /
XXbsu022_u:5055: ye ca te kāmāvacareṣu deveṣu devādhipatayaḥ, tadyathā -
XXbsu022_u:5072: iti hi bhikṣava evaṃ dvātriṃśadākāraṃ māraḥ pāpīyān svapnamapaśyat /
XXbsu022_u:5073: sa pratibuddhaḥ san bhītastrastaḥ saṃvignaḥ sarvamantarjanaṃ saṃnipātya sabalapārṣadyasenāpatidauvārikasaṃnipatitāṃśca tān viditvā ābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣat -
XXbsu022_u:5075: dṛṣṭvāna tāṃ sa supināṃ namucī dukhārto āmantrayāti suta ye 'pi ca pāriṣadyā /
XXbsu022_u:5076: senāpatiṃ namuci siṃhahanuśca nāmnā sarveṣa teṣa paripṛcchati kṛṣṇabandhuḥ // Lal_21.5
XXbsu022_u:5078: ṣaḍvarṣa duṣkaravratāni caritva ghorā bodhidrumaṃ hyupagataḥ prakuruṣva yatnam // Lal_21.6
XXbsu022_u:5079: so cedvibuddha svayameva hi bodhisattvo bahusattvakoṭinayutāni vibodhayeta
XXbsu022_u:5080: śūnyaṃ kariṣyati sa me bhavanaṃ hyaśeṣaṃ yada lapsyate hyamṛtu sparśanaśītibhāvam // Lal_21.7
XXbsu022_u:5081: hanta vrajāma sahitā mahatā balena ghātema taṃ śramaṇu eku drumendramūle /
XXbsu022_u:5082: udyojayadhva caturaṅgiṇi śīghra senāṃ yadi icchathā mama priyaṃ ma ciraṃ karotha // Lal_21.8
XXbsu022_u:5083: pratyekabuddhabhi ca arhabhiḥ pūrṇa loko nirvāyamāṇu na balaṃ mama durbalaṃ syāt /
XXbsu022_u:5084: so bhūyu eku jinu bheṣyati dharmarājo gaṇanātivṛttu jinavaṃśu na jātu chidyet // Lal_21.9
XXbsu022_u:5085: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sārthavāho nāma māraputraḥ, sa māraṃ pāpīyāṃsaṃ
XXbsu022_u:5087: kiṃ tāt bhinnavadano 'si vivarṇavaktro hṛdayaṃ samutplavati vedhati te 'ṅgamaṅgam /
XXbsu022_u:5088: kiṃ te śrutaṃ athava dṛṣṭu bhaṇāhi śīghraṃ jñāsyāma tattvatu vicintya tathā prayogam // Lal_21.10
XXbsu022_u:5089: nirmāṇu māru avacī śṛṇu mahya vatsa pāpaṃ mi dṛṣṭu supinaṃ paramaṃ sughoram /
XXbsu022_u:5090: bhāṣeya sarvamiha parṣadi adya śeṣaṃ saṃmūrchitā kṣititale prapateyu yūyam
XXbsu022_u:5093: raṇakāli prāpti yadi nāma jayo na doṣaḥ tatraiva yastu nihato bhavate sa doṣaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:5094: svapnāntare tu yadi īdṛśa te nimittā śreyo upekṣa ma raṇe paribhāvu gacchet // Lal_21.12 //
XXbsu022_u:5096: vyavasāyabuddhi puruṣasya raṇe prasiddhi avalambya dhairya sukṛtaṃ yadi no jayaṃ syāt /
XXbsu022_u:5097: kā tasya śakti mama dṛṣṭi sapāriṣadyaṃ notthātu mahya caraṇe śirasā prapattum // Lal_21.13
XXbsu022_u:5099: vistīrṇamasti hi balaṃ ca sudurbalaṃ ca astyeka śūru balavāṃśca raṇaṃjahaśca /
XXbsu022_u:5100: khadyotakairyadi bhavettrisahasra pūrṇā eko ravirgrasati niṣprabhatāṃ karoti // Lal_21.14
XXbsu022_u:5102: yasya mānaśca mohaśca mīmāṃsā ca na vidyate /
XXbsu022_u:5103: viloma yadi vidvāṃso nāsau śakyaścikitsitum // Lal_21.15 //
XXbsu022_u:5104: iti hi bhikṣavo māraḥ pāpīyān sārthavāhasya vacanamakṛtvā mahatīṃ caturaṅginīṃ senāmudyojayati sma mahābalaraṇaśauṇḍāṃ bhīṣaṇāṃ romaharṣaṇīmadṛṣṭāśrutapūrvāṃ devamanuṣyairbahuvidhamukhavikārakoṭinayutaśatasahasravikāraprakārāṃ bhujagaśatasahasrakaracaraṇakuṭilapariveṣṭitaśarīrāṃ asidhanuśaraśaktitomarakuṭhārapaṭṭisabhuśuṇḍimusaladaṇḍapāśagadācakravajrakaṇayadharāṃ varavarmakavacavarmitaśarīrāṃ viparītaśiraḥkaracaraṇanayanāṃ jvalitaśironayanavadanāṃ duḥsaṃsthitodarapāṇipādamugratejovadanāṃ paramavikṛtavadanadarśanāṃ vikarālavikṛtadaṃṣṭrāṃ ghanabahuvipulapralambajihvāṃ suṇḍikakiliñjasadṛśajihvāṃ jvalanasadṛśakṛṣṇasarpaviṣapūrṇaraktanetrām keciddhi tatrāśīviṣān vamanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:5109: kecitparivṛttajvalitavikṛtanayanāḥ /(Vaidya 222) kecijjvalitān parvatān parigṛhya salīlamapareṣu parvateṣu abhirūḍhā āgacchanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:5113: keciddakodariṇo durbalakāyā asthikaṅkālasaṃghāṭamabhinirmāya bhagnanāsāḥ kumbhodarāḥ karoṭapādā ucchuṣkatvagmāṃsarudhirāḥ chinnakarṇanāsākaracaraṇanayanottamāṅgāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:5117: āharata haratābhihanata hanata bandhata gṛhṇata chindata bhindata mathayatotkṣipata nāśayatemaṃ śramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ sārdhaṃ drameṇeti bruvanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:5131: kecidasidhanuśaraśaktipaṭṭiśaparaśucakratomarakaṇayavajrabhuśuṇḍibhindipālādīni nānāpraharaṇāni bhrāmayanto nṛtyanto bodhisattvaṃ saṃtarjayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:5138: kecidgogardabhavarāhanakulachāgalorabhrabiḍālakapivṛkaśṛgālaromāṇaḥ āśīviṣān vamanto 'yoguḍāni nirgaranto dhūmaketūnutsṛjanto jvalitatāmralohavarṣaṃ pravarṣanto vidyudvarṣān kṣipanto vajrāśaniṃ pramuñcantastaptāmayovālikāṃ pravarṣantaḥ kālameghān saṃjanayanto vātavṛṣṭimutpādayantaḥ śarameghavarṣānutsṛjantaḥ kālarātriṃ darśayanto rāvaṃ saṃjanayanto bodhisattvamabhidhāvanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:5139: kecitpāśān bhrāmayanto mahāparvatān prapātayanto mahāsāgarān kṣobhayanto laṅghayanto mahāparvatāṃścālayanto meruṃ parvatarājaṃ vidhāvantaḥ palāyamānā vikṣipanto 'ṅgapratyaṅgāni bhrāmayantaḥ śarīrāṇi hasanto mahāhāsyāni urāṃsi prasphoṭayantaḥ urāṃsi tāḍayantaḥ keśāṃsi dhunvantaḥ pītamukhāni ca
XXbsu022_u:5140: nīlaśarīrā jvalitaśirasa ūrdhvakeśā itastato vegena paridhāvanto bherūṇḍākṣāśca bodhisattvaṃ vibhīṣayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:5141: jīrṇāḥ striyaśca rudantyo bodhisattvamupasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadanti sma - aho putra, hā mama putra,
XXbsu022_u:5143: rākṣasarūpāḥ piśācarūpāḥ kāṇakhañjadurbalāśca pretāḥ kṣutkṣāmākṣā urdhvabāhavo vikṛtāsyāḥ krandanto bhayamupadarśayantastrāsaṃ saṃjanayanto bodhisattvasya purato 'bhidhāvanti
XXbsu022_u:5145: tayā caivarūpayā mārasenayā samuditayā samantādaśītiryojanānyāyāmena vistāreṇa sphuṭamabhūt
XXbsu022_u:5146: yathā caikasya mārasyaivaṃ koṭīśatānāṃ trisāhasraparyāpannānāṃ mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāṃ senābhistiryagūrdhvaṃ ca parisphuṭamabhūt //
XXbsu022_u:5150: yattaka loki virūpa suraudrāḥ sarvi ta nirmita tatra śaṭhebhiḥ //
XXbsu022_u:5153: ekapadā dvipadā tripadāśca yāvatsahasrapadā bahu anye // Lal_21.17 //
XXbsu022_u:5154: nīlamukhāni ca pītaśarīrā pītamukhāni ca nīlaśarīrā /
XXbsu022_u:5155: anyamukhāni ca anyaśarīrāḥ ekamupāgatu kiṃkarasainyam // Lal_21.18 //
XXbsu022_u:5156: vātu pravāyati varṣati varṣaṃ vidyusahasraśatāni patanti /

XXbsu022_u:5158: varṣati deva pravarṣati varṣaṃ ogha vahanti jalākulabhūmim /
XXbsu022_u:5159: īdṛśa bhīṣaṇikā bahurāśī yatra acetana vṛkṣa patanti // Lal_21.20 //
XXbsu022_u:5160: dṛṣṭva ca tānatibhīṣaṇarūpāṃ sarvi visaṃsthita rūpavirūpāṃ /
XXbsu022_u:5161: śrīguṇalakṣaṇatejadharasyā cittu na kampati meru yathaiva // Lal_21.21 //
XXbsu022_u:5163: īdṛśa dharmanayaṃ vimṛṣanto susthitu dhyāyati saṃsthitu dharme //
XXbsu022_u:5165: yasya bhaveta ahaṃ ti mameti bhāva samucchrayi tattvaniviṣṭāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:5166: so bibhiyādabuddheḥ sthitu grāhe ātmani saṃbhrami gaccha nirīkṣya //
XXbsu022_u:5167: śākyasutastu svabhāvamabhāvaṃ dharma pratītya samutthita buddhā /
XXbsu022_u:5168: gaganopamacittu suyukto na bhramate sabalaṃ śaḍha dṛṣṭvā // Lal_21.24 //
XXbsu022_u:5169: iti hi bhikṣavo mārasya pāpīyasaḥ putrasahasram /
XXbsu022_u:5170: tatra ye māraputrā bodhisattve 'bhiprasannāḥ sārthavāhapūrvaṃgamāḥ, te mārasya dakṣiṇe pārśve sthitā abhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:5171: ye mārapākṣikāḥ, te vāme pārśve sthitā abhuvan mārasya
XXbsu022_u:5173: tatra māraḥ pāpīyāṃstān svān putrānāmantrayate sma - kīdṛśena balena vayaṃ bodhisattvaṃ dharṣayiṣyāmaḥ? tatra dakṣiṇe pārśve sārthavāho nāma māraputraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:5175: suptaṃ prabodhayitumicchati pannagendraṃ suptaṃ prabodhayitumicchati yo gajendram /
XXbsu022_u:5176: suptaṃ prabodhayitumicchati yo mṛgendraṃ suptaṃ prabodhayitumicchati so narendram // Lal_21.25
XXbsu022_u:5177: vāme pārśve durmatirnāma māraputraḥ sa evamāha -
XXbsu022_u:5178: saṃprekṣaṇena hṛdayānyabhisaṃsphuṭanti lokeṣu sāra mahatāmapi pādapānām /
XXbsu022_u:5179: kā śaktirasti mama dṛṣṭihatasya tasya saṃjīvituṃ jagati mṛtyuhatasya vāstu
XXbsu022_u:5181: vṛkṣeṣu sāra ka ihāsti tato bravīṣi dṛṣṭvā bhinanmi manujeṣvatha kā avasthā /
XXbsu022_u:5182: meruṃ giriṃ yadi bhinatsi nirīkṣaṇena naivāsya tubhya nayanebhi hatonmiṣeran // Lal_21.27
XXbsu022_u:5184: yaḥ sāgaraṃ taritumicchati vai bhujābhyāṃ toyaṃ ca tasya pibituṃ manujeṣvasantu /
XXbsu022_u:5185: śakyaṃ bhavedidamatastu vadāmi duḥkhaṃ yastasya vaktramabhito 'pyamalaṃ
XXbsu022_u:5189: mameha dehesmi śataṃ bhujānāṃ kṣipāmi caikena śataṃ śarāṇām /
XXbsu022_u:5190: bhinanmi kāyaṃ śramaṇasya tāta sukhī bhava tvaṃ vraja mā vilamba //
XXbsu022_u:5192: śataṃ bhujānāṃ yadi ko viśeṣo bhujā kimarthaṃ na bhavanti romāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:5193: bhujaikamekena tathaiva śūlāḥ taiścāpi kuryānna hi tasya kiṃcit //
XXbsu022_u:5195: maitrāvatastasya muneḥ śarīre viṣaṃ na śastraṃ kramate na cāgniḥ /
XXbsu022_u:5196: kṣiptāni śastrāṇi vrajanti puṣpatāṃ maitrī hi lokottarabhāvi tasya //
XXbsu022_u:5198: divi bhuvi ca jale ca ye balāḍhyāḥ asiparaśugharāśca guhyakā narā vā /
XXbsu022_u:5199: kṣamabalamimu prāpya te narendraṃ prabalabalālpabalā bhavanti sarve //
XXbsu022_u:5202: vṛkṣaṃ sakoṭaraṃ śuṣkaṃ dāvāgniriva sūkṣmataḥ // Lal_21.33 //
XXbsu022_u:5204: meruṃ dahestvaṃ yadi vāpi kṛtsnaṃ praviśya cāntargatu medinīṃ vā /
XXbsu022_u:5205: dagdhuṃ na śakyaḥ sa hi vajrabuddhiḥ tvatsaṃnibhairvālikagaṅgatulyaiḥ //
XXbsu022_u:5208: candrasūryau patedbhūmau mahī ca vilayaṃ vrajet // Lal_21.35 //
XXbsu022_u:5211: aprāpyaiṣa varāṃ bodhiṃ notthāsyati mahādrumāt // Lal_21.36 //
XXbsu022_u:5214: pāṇināhaṃ pramardāmi taveha bhavane sthitaḥ // Lal_21.37 //
XXbsu022_u:5216: taṃ gṛhya śramaṇaṃ tāta sāgarasya paraṃ kṣipe // Lal_21.38 //
XXbsu022_u:5217: tiṣṭhatāṃ tāta seneyaṃ mā tvaṃ śokārdito bhava /
XXbsu022_u:5218: sabodhivṛkṣamutpāṭya kṣepsye pāṇyā diśo daśa // Lal_21.39 //
XXbsu022_u:5221: tvaṃ marditāṃ prakuryāśca pāṇibhyāṃ madagarvitaḥ // Lal_21.40 //
XXbsu022_u:5223: romaṃ tasya na cāleyurbodhisattvasya dhīmataḥ // Lal_21.41 //
XXbsu022_u:5225: bhayaṃ hi te tāta bhṛśaṃ kimarthaṃ senāya madhye kimavasthitasya /
XXbsu022_u:5226: senā na tasyāsti kutaḥ sahāyāḥ kasmādbhayaṃ te bhavatīha tasmāt //
XXbsu022_u:5228: yūthaṃ na loke 'sti śaśīravīnāṃ na cakravartī na ca kesarīṇām /
XXbsu022_u:5229: na bodhisattvāniha tāta yūthaṃ ekaḥ samartho namuciṃ nihantum // Lal_21.43
XXbsu022_u:5231: na śaktiśūlā na gadā na khaṅgāḥ na hastino 'śvā na rathā na pattiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:5232: taṃ śauṇḍamekaṃ śramaṇaṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ hansye 'dya mā saṃbhrama tāta kiṃci //
XXbsu022_u:5235: nārāyaṇasya yatha kāya achedyabhedyo kṣāntibalaiḥ kavacito dṛḍhavīryakhaṅgaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:5236: trivimokṣavāhanasi prajñadhanuḥ sa tāta puṇyābalena sa hi jeṣyati mārasenām // Lal_21.45 //
XXbsu022_u:5238: na nivartate tṛṇagataḥ pradahan davāgniḥ kṣiptaṃ śaro na ca nivartati śikṣitena /
XXbsu022_u:5239: vajraṃ nabhe nipatitaṃ na nivartate ca na sthānamasti mama śākyasutaṃ hyajitvā // Lal_21.46
XXbsu022_u:5241: ārdraṃ tṛṇaṃ prāpya nivartate 'gniḥ girikūṭamāsādya nivartate śaraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:5242: vajraṃ mahīṃ prāpya adhaḥ prayāti aprāpya śāntamamṛtaṃ na nivartate ayam
XXbsu022_u:5244: śakya tāt antarīkṣe lekhyacitra citrituṃ yāvanti keci sarva sattva ekacitta sthāpitum /
XXbsu022_u:5245: candrāsūrya mārutaṃ ca śakya pāśa bandhituṃ na bodhisattva śakya tāta bodhimaṇḍi cālitum // vāme 'nupaśānta āha -
XXbsu022_u:5246: dṛṣṭīviṣeṇa mahatā pradahāmi meruṃ bhasmīkaromi salilaṃ ca mahodadhīnām /
XXbsu022_u:5247: bodhiṃ ca paśya śramaṇaṃ ca ahaṃ hi tāta dṛṣṭyā yathādya ubhayaṃ hi karomi bhasmam // Lal_21.49
XXbsu022_u:5249: viṣeṇa pūrṇo yadi vaiṣa sarvo bhavettrisāhasravaraḥ pradīptaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:5252: viṣāṇamugraṃ tribhaveha yacca rāgaśca doṣaśca tathaiva mohaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:5253: te tasya kāye ca tathaiva citte nabhe yathā paṅkarajo na santi //
XXbsu022_u:5257: lobhayitvana neṣyi purottamaṃ kāmaratiṃ hi karomi vaśe tava // Lal_21.53
XXbsu022_u:5259: dharmaratī sada tasya ratīhā dhyānaratī amṛtārtharatiśca /
XXbsu022_u:5260: sattvapramokṣaṇa maitraratiśca rāgaratiṃ sa ratiṃ na karoti // Lal_21.54
XXbsu022_u:5262: javenahaṃ candraravī graseyaṃ pravāyamānaṃ gagane ca vāyum /
XXbsu022_u:5263: adyaiva tāta śramaṇaṃ gṛhītvā prāsasya muṣṭiṃ vikirāmi vāyum // Lal_21.55
XXbsu022_u:5265: yathā tavaiṣo javavega ugraḥ tadvadyadi syātsuramānuṣāṇām /
XXbsu022_u:5266: sarve samagrāpi na te samarthāḥ kartuṃ rujāmapratipudgalasya // Lal_21.56
XXbsu022_u:5269: prāgeva saikaḥ prakaroti kiṃ te vṛndena sādhyanti hi sarvakāryā //
XXbsu022_u:5272: na siṃhavṛndaṃ bhuvi dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ dṛṣṭīviṣāṇāṃ api nāsti vṛndam /
XXbsu022_u:5273: tejasvināṃ satyaparākramāṇāṃ puruṣarṣabhāṇāṃ api nāsti vṛndam // Lal_21.58
XXbsu022_u:5275: na te śrutā tāta giro 'bhidīptā yathā nadante tanayāstaveme /
XXbsu022_u:5276: vīryeṇa vegena balena yuktā vrajāma śīghraṃ śramaṇaṃ nihantum // Lal_21.59

XXbsu022_u:5689: saṃmūḍha mārga na labhanti alenatrāṇāḥ pakṣī davāgnipataneva nirīkṣya krāntāḥ // Lal_21.193
XXbsu022_u:5690: mātā svasā pitara putra tathaiva bhrātā pṛcchanti tatra kahi dṛṣṭa kahiṃ gatā vā /
XXbsu022_u:5691: anyonya vigraha karonti tathaiva heṭhāḥ prāptā vayaṃ vyasana jīvita nāvakāśaḥ // Lal_21.194
XXbsu022_u:5692: sā mārasena vipulā mahatī akṣobhyā vibhraṣṭa sarva viralīkṛta naiva saṃdhiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:5693: divasāni sapta abhijāni paraspareṇa ābhāsi dṛṣṭa yadi jīvasi taṃ khu prītāḥ // Lal_21.195
XXbsu022_u:5694: sā vṛkṣadevata tadā karuṇāṃ hi kṛtvā vārīghāṭaṃ grahiya siñcati kṛṣṇabandhum /
XXbsu022_u:5695: uttiṣṭha śīghra vraja he ma puno vilamba evaṃ hi teṣa bhavate guruuddharāṇām // Lal_21.196
XXbsu022_u:5698: duḥkhaṃ bhayaṃ vyasana śoka vināśanaṃ ca dhikkāraśabdamavamānagataṃ ca dainyam /
XXbsu022_u:5699: prāpto 'smi adya aparādhya suśuddhasatve aśrutva vākya madhuraṃ
XXbsu022_u:5702: bhayaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ vyasanaṃ ca dainyaṃ dhikkāraśabdaṃ vadhabandhanaṃ ca /
XXbsu022_u:5703: doṣānanekāṃ labhate hyavidvān nirāparādheṣvapi rādhyate yaḥ // Lal_21.198
XXbsu022_u:5704: devāsurā garuḍa rākṣasa kinnarendrā brahmātha śakra paranirmita sākaniṣṭhāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:5705: bhāṣanti tasya vijayaṃ jaya lokavīra yatredṛśī namucisena tvayā nirastā //
XXbsu022_u:5706: hārārdhacandra dhvaja chatrapatāka dentī puṣpāgarū tagaracandanacūrṇavarṣāṃ /
XXbsu022_u:5707: tūryā parāhaniya vākyamudīrayante acchā drume tuva ca śūra jitārisiṃhā //
XXbsu022_u:5708: atraiva cāsanavare labhase 'dya bodhiṃ āveṇikāṃ daśabalāṃ pratisaṃvidaṃ ca /
XXbsu022_u:5709: sarvaṃ ca buddhaviṣayaṃ labhase 'dya śūra maitrā vijitya vipulāṃ śaṭhamārapakṣāṃ // Lal_21.201
XXbsu022_u:5710: iha māradharṣaṇakṛte ca raṇe pravṛtte saṃbodhisattvabalavikrama yebhi dṛṣṭam /
XXbsu022_u:5711: ṣaṭtriṃśakoṭinayutā cature ca viṃśā yebhirmanaḥ praṇihitaṃ varabuddhabodhau // Lal_21.202
XXbsu022_u:5717: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo nihatamārapratyarthiko marditakaṇṭako raṇaśirasi vijitavijayaḥ uchritachatradhvajapatāko viviktaṃ kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdhamaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma /
XXbsu022_u:5718: savitarkasavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamādadhyātmasaṃprasādāccetasa ekotibhāvādavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma /
XXbsu022_u:5719: sa prītervirāgādupekṣako viharati sma smṛtimān saṃprajānan sukhaṃ kāyena pratisaṃvedayate sma yattadāryā ācakṣate sma - upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī, niṣprītikaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma /
XXbsu022_u:5720: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇādduḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma //
XXbsu022_u:5721: atha bodhisattvasyathā samāhite citte pariśuddhe paryavadāte prabhāsvare
XXbsu022_u:5722: 'naṅgane vigatopakleśe mṛduni karmaṇyupasthite ānijjyaprāpte rātryāṃ prathame yāme divyasya cakṣuṣo jñānadarśanavidyāsākṣātkriyāyai cittamabhinirharati sma, abhinirnāmayati sma //
XXbsu022_u:5723: atha bodhisattvo divyena cakṣuṣā pariśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati sma cyavamānānupapadyamānān suvarṇān durvarṇān sugatān durgatān hīnān praṇītān /
XXbsu022_u:5724: yathākarmopagān sattvān prajānāti sma - ime bata bhoḥ
XXbsu022_u:5727: te mithyādṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetoḥ kāyasya bhedātparaṃ maraṇādapāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyante
XXbsu022_u:5728: ime punarbhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyasucaritena samanvāgatāḥ, vāṅbhanaḥsucaritena
XXbsu022_u:5729: samanvāgatāḥ, āryāṇāmanapavādakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ, te samyagdṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetoḥ kāyasya bhedātsugatau svargalokeṣūpapadyante //
XXbsu022_u:5730: iti hi divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvānāpaśyati sma cyavamānānupapadyamānān suvarṇān durvarṇān sugatān durgatān hīnān praṇītān yathākarmopagān /
XXbsu022_u:5731: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo rātryāṃ prathame yāme vidyāṃ sākṣātkaroti sma, tamo nihanti sma, ālokamutpādayati sma //
XXbsu022_u:5732: atha bodhisattvastathā samāhite citte pariśuddhe paryavadāte prabhāsvare niraṅgane vigatopakleśe mṛduni karmaṇyupasthite āniñjyaprāpte rātryāṃ madhyame yāme pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānadarśanavidyāsākṣātkriyāyai cittamabhinirharati sma, abhinirnāmayati sma, ātmanaḥ parasattvānāṃ cānekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsānanusmarati sma /
XXbsu022_u:5734: tisraścatasraḥ pañca daśa viṃśati triṃśaccatvāriṃśatpañcāśajjātiśataṃ (Vaidya 251) jātisahasraṃ jātiśatasahasram anekānyapi jātiśatasahasrāṇyapi jātikoṭīmapi jātikoṭīśatamapi jātikoṭīsahasramapi jātikoṭīnayutamapi /
XXbsu022_u:5735: anekānyapi jātikoṭīsahasrāṇyapi anekānyapi jātikoṭīśatasahasrāṇyapi anekānyapi jātikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi yāvatsaṃvartakalpamapi vivartakalpamapi saṃvartavivartakalpamapi anekānyapi saṃvartavivartakalpānyanusmarati sma - amutrāhamāsannevaṃnāmā evaṃgotra evaṃjātya evaṃvarṇa evamāhāra evamāyuṣpramāṇamevaṃ cirasthitikaḥ, evaṃ sukhaduḥkhaprativedī /
XXbsu022_u:5737: tataścyutvehopapanna iti sākāraṃ soddeśamanekavidhamātmanaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ ca pūrvanivāsamanusmarati sma //
XXbsu022_u:5738: atha bodhisattvastathā samāhitena cittena pariśuddhena paryavadātena prabhāsvareṇa anaṅganena vigatopakleśena mṛdunā karmaṇye sthitenāniñcyaprāptena rātryāṃ paścime yāme aruṇoddhāṭanakālasamaye nandīmukhyāṃ rātrau duḥkhasamudayāstaṃgatāyā āśravakṣayajñānadarśanavidyāsākṣātkriyāyai cittamabhinirharati sma, abhinirnāmayati sma /
XXbsu022_u:5739: tasyaitadabhavat - kṛcchraṃ batāyaṃ loka āpanno yaduta jāyate jīryate mriyate cyavate upapadyate
XXbsu022_u:5740: atha ca punarasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya niḥsaraṇaṃ na saṃprajānāti jarāvyādhimaraṇādikasya
XXbsu022_u:5741: aho batāsya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasyāntaḥkriyā na prajñāyate sarvasya jarāvyādhimaraṇādikasya
XXbsu022_u:5742: tato bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - kasmin sati jarāmaraṇaṃ bhavati,
XXbsu022_u:5743: kiṃpratyayaṃ ca punarjarāmaraṇam? tasyaitadabhūt - jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ bhavati, jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇam //
XXbsu022_u:5744: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat - kasmin sati jātirbhavati,
XXbsu022_u:5745: kiṃpratyayā ca punarjātiḥ? tasyaitadabhavat - bhave sati jātirbhavati
XXbsu022_u:5747: atha bodhisattvasyaitabhavat - kasmin sati bhavo bhavati, kiṃpratyayaśca
XXbsu022_u:5748: punarbhavaḥ? tasyaitadabhavat - upādāne sati bhavo bhavati,
XXbsu022_u:5750: atha bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat - kasmin satyupādānaṃ bhavati, kiṃpratyayaṃ ca punarupādānam? tasyaitadabhavat - tṛṣṇāyāṃ satyāmupādānaṃ bhavati,
XXbsu022_u:5752: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat - kasmin sati tṛṣṇā bhavati,
XXbsu022_u:5753: kiṃpratyayā ca tṛṣṇā? tasyaitadabhavat - vedanāyāṃ satyāṃ tṛṣṇā bhavati,
XXbsu022_u:5755: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhūt - kasmin sati vedanā bhavati,
XXbsu022_u:5756: kiṃpratyayā punarvedanā? tasyaitadabhūt - sparśe sati vedanā bhavati,
XXbsu022_u:5758: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat - kasmin sati sparśo bhavati,
XXbsu022_u:5759: kiṃpratyayaśca punaḥ sparśaḥ? tasyaitadabhavat - ṣaḍāyatane sati sparśo
XXbsu022_u:5761: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat - kasmin sati ṣaḍāyatanaṃ bhavati,
XXbsu022_u:5762: kiṃpratyayaṃ ca punaḥ ṣaḍāyatanam? tasyaitadabhavat - nāmarūpe sati ṣaḍāyatanaṃ bhavati, nānārūpapratyayaṃ hi ṣaḍāyatanam //
XXbsu022_u:5764: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat - kasmin sati nāmarūpaṃ bhavati,
XXbsu022_u:5765: kiṃpratyayaṃ ca punarnāmarūpam? tasyaitadabhavat - vijñāne sati nāmarūpaṃ
XXbsu022_u:5767: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat - kasmin sati vijñānaṃ bhavanti,
XXbsu022_u:5768: kiṃpratyayaṃ punarvijñānam? tasyaitadabhavat - saṃskāreṣu satsu vijñānaṃ
XXbsu022_u:5770: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat - kasmin sati saṃskārā bhavanti,
XXbsu022_u:5771: kiṃpratyayāśca punaḥ saṃskārāḥ? tasyaitadabhavat - avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ saṃskārā bhavanti, avidyāpratyayā hi saṃskārāḥ //
XXbsu022_u:5772: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ,
XXbsu022_u:5777: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
XXbsu022_u:5779: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasya pūrvamaśruteṣu dharmeṣu
XXbsu022_u:5782: kasminnasati jarāmaraṇaṃ na bhavati, kasya vā nirodhājjarāmaraṇanirodha
XXbsu022_u:5786: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat - kasminnasati jātirna bhavati, kasya vā nirodhājjātinirodhaḥ? tasyaitadabhavat - bhave 'sati jātirna bhavati,
XXbsu022_u:5788: atha bodhisattvasya punarapyetadabhavat - kasminnasati vistareṇa yāvatsaṃskārā na bhavanti, kasya vā nirodhātsaṃskāranirodhaḥ?
XXbsu022_u:5789: tasyaitadabhavat - avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ saṃskārā na bhavanti,
XXbsu022_u:5792: / evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavatīti //
XXbsu022_u:5793: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasya pūrvamaśruteṣu dharmeṣu
XXbsu022_u:5805: amī saṃskārā ayaṃ saṃskārasamudayo 'yaṃ saṃskāranirodha iyaṃ saṃskāranirodhagāminī
XXbsu022_u:5809: idaṃ nāmarūpamayaṃ nāmarūpasamudayo 'yaṃ nāmarūpanirodhaḥ iyaṃ nāmarūpanirodhagāminī (Vaidya 253) pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam /
XXbsu022_u:5810: idaṃ ṣaḍāyatanamayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanasamudayo 'yaṃ ṣaḍāyatananirodhaḥ iyaṃ ṣaḍāyatananirodhagāminīṃ pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam /
XXbsu022_u:5811: ayaṃ sparśo 'yaṃ spaśasamudayo 'yaṃ sparśanirodhaḥ iyaṃ sparśanirodhagāminī
XXbsu022_u:5815: iyaṃ tṛṣṇā ayaṃ tṛṣṇāsamudayo 'yaṃ tṛṣṇānirodhaḥ iyaṃ tṛṣṇānirodhagāminī
XXbsu022_u:5819: ayaṃ bhavo 'yaṃ bhavasamudayo 'yaṃ bhavanirodhaḥ iyaṃ bhavanirodhagāminī pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam
XXbsu022_u:5820: iyaṃ jātirayaṃ jātisamudayo 'yaṃ jātinirodhaḥ iyaṃ jātinirodhagāminī pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam
XXbsu022_u:5821: iyaṃ jarā ayaṃ jarāsamudayo 'yaṃ jarānirodhaḥ iyaṃ jarānirodhagāminī pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam
XXbsu022_u:5822: idaṃ maraṇamayaṃ maraṇasamudayo 'yaṃ maraṇanirodhaḥ iyaṃ maraṇanirodhagāminī pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam
XXbsu022_u:5824: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati yāvannirodho bhavatīti yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam
XXbsu022_u:5825: idaṃ duḥkhamayaṃ duḥkhasamudayo 'yaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam
XXbsu022_u:5826: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvena rātryāṃ paścime yāme
XXbsu022_u:5828: satpuruṣeṇātipuruṣeṇa mahāpuruṣeṇa puruṣarṣabheṇa puruṣanāgena puruṣasiṃhena puruṣapuṃgavena puruṣaśūreṇa puruṣadhīreṇa puruṣajānena puruṣapadmena puruṣapuṇḍarīkeṇa puruṣadhaureyeṇānuttareṇa puruṣadamyasārathinā evaṃbhūtenāryeṇa jñānena jñātavyaṃ boddhavyaṃ prāptavyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ sākṣātkartavyam, sarvaṃ tadekacittekṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya traividyādhigatā tato bhikṣavo devā āhuḥ - avakirata mārṣāḥ puṣpāṇi /
XXbsu022_u:5830: ye tatra devaputrāḥ pūrvabuddhadarśinastasmin saṃnipatitā āsaṃste 'vocan - mā sma tāvanmārṣāḥ puṣpāṇyavakirata yāvattāvadbhagavānnimittaṃ prāduḥkaroti /
XXbsu022_u:5833: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatastān devaputrān vimatiprāptāñjñātvā saptatālamātraṃ vihāyasamabhyudgamya tatrastha idamudānamudānayati sma -
XXbsu022_u:5834: chinnavartmopaśāntarajāḥ śuṣkā āsravā na punaḥ sravanti /
XXbsu022_u:5835: chinne vartmani vartata duḥkhasyaiṣo 'nta ucyate // Lal_22.1 //
XXbsu022_u:5839: iti hi bhikṣavastathāgate 'bhisaṃbuddhe vigataṃ tamo 'ndhakāram, viśodhitā
XXbsu022_u:5840: tṛṣṇā, vivartitā dṛṣṭiḥ, vikṣobhitāḥ kleśāḥ, viśāritāḥ śalyāḥ, mukto
XXbsu022_u:5842: uddhāṭitā anuśayāḥ, jñātā dharmatathatā, avabuddhā bhūtakoṭiḥ, parijñāto
XXbsu022_u:5843: dharmadhātuḥ, vyavasthāpitaḥ sattvadhātuḥ, saṃvarṇitaḥ samyaktvaniyato rāśiḥ, vivarṇito mithyātvaniyato rāśiḥ, parigṛhīto 'niyatarāśiḥ,
XXbsu022_u:5845: sattvavyādhiḥ, sattvasamutthānasiddho 'mṛtabhaiṣajaprayogaḥ, utpanno vaidyarājaḥ pramocakaḥ sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ pratiṣṭhāpako nirvāṇasukhe,
XXbsu022_u:5846: niṣaṇṇastathāgatagarbhe tathāgatamahādharmarājāsane, sarva ābaddho vimuktipakṣaḥ, praviṣṭaḥ sarvajñatānagaraṃ samavasṛtaṃ sarvabuddhaiḥ,
XXbsu022_u:5848: prathame saptāhe bhikṣavastathāgatastasminneva bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo 'sthāt - iha mayā 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:5850: samanantaraprāpte khalu punarbhikṣavo bodhisattvena sarvajñatve atha tatkṣaṇameva daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasattvāstatkṣaṇaṃ tallavaṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ parasukhasamarpitā abhuvan /
XXbsu022_u:5852: yā 'pi tā lokāntarikā aghā aghasphuṭā andhakārā iti pūrvavat /
XXbsu022_u:5853: ṣaḍvikāraṃ ca daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātavo 'kampat prākampat saṃprākampat /
XXbsu022_u:5862: tebhyaśca ratnachatrebhyaḥ evaṃrūpā raśmijālā niścaranti sma, yairdaśasu dikṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā lokadhātavo 'vabhāsyante /
XXbsu022_u:5863: daśasu dikṣu bodhisattvāśca devāputrāścanandaśabdaṃ niścārayāmāsuḥ - utpannaḥ sattvapaṇḍitaḥ
XXbsu022_u:5866: dharmavarṣavinaye janabhaiṣajāṅkuraprarohaṇaṃ sarvakuśalamūlabījānāṃ vivardhanaṃ śraddhāṅkurāṇāṃ dātā vimuktiphalānām //
XXbsu022_u:5868: māraṃ vijitya sabalaṃ sa hi puruṣasiṃho dhyānāmukhaṃ abhimukhaṃ abhito 'pi
XXbsu022_u:5870: traividyatā daśabalena yadā hi prāptā saṃkampitā daśa diśo bahukṣatrakoṭyaḥ // Lal_22.2 //
XXbsu022_u:5871: ye bodhisattva puri āgata dharmakāmā caraṇau nipatya iti bhāṣiṣu māsi klānto /
XXbsu022_u:5872: pratyakṣa asmi camu yādṛśikā subhīmā sā prajñapuṇyabalavīryabalena bhagnā // Lal_22.3 //
XXbsu022_u:5873: buddhaiśca kṣetranayutaiḥ prahitāni chatrā sādho mahāpuruṣa dharṣita mārasenām /
XXbsu022_u:5875: prāptaṃ tvayā padavaraṃ amṛtaṃ viśokaṃ saddharmavṛṣṭi tribhave abhivarṣa śīghram // Lal_22.4

XXbsu022_u:6045: buddhaśatasahasra saṃpūjitā pūrvi tubhyaṃ mune tasya viśeṣu yena bodhidrume mārasenā jitā śīlaśrutasamādhiprajñākarā jñānaketudhvajā jaramaraṇanighāti vaidyottamā lokacakṣurdadā /
XXbsu022_u:6046: trimalakhilaprahīṇa śāntendriyā śāntacittā mune śaraṇu tavamupema śākyarṣabhā dharmarājā jage bodhicarī anantatulyā abhūdvīryasthāmodgatā prajñābala upāya maitrābalaṃ brāhmapuṇyaṃ balam
XXbsu022_u:6048: eti balamanantatulyā bhavaṃ bodhi saṃprasthite daśabalabaladhārī adyā punarbodhimaṇḍe bhuto dṛṣṭva camu anantasattve surā bhītatrastābhavan mā khu śramaṇarāju bādhiṣyate bodhimaṇḍe sthitaḥ
XXbsu022_u:6049: na ca bhavatu babhūva tebhyo bhayaṃ no ca kāyeñjanā karahata gurubhāra saṃkampanā mārasenā jitā // Lal_23.49 //
XXbsu022_u:6050: yatha ca purimakebhi siṃhāsane prāpta bodhi varā tatha tvayā anubuddha tulyā samā anyathā tvaṃ na hi /
XXbsu022_u:6051: samamanasa samacitta sarvajñatā sthāma prāptaṃ tvayā tena bhava svayaṃbhu lokottamo puṇyakṣetraṃ jage // Lal_23.50 //
XXbsu022_u:6052: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ devaputraistrāyatriṃśaistathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte
XXbsu022_u:6054: atha khalu catvāro mahārājānaḥ sārdhaṃ caturmahārājakāyikairdevaputrairyena tathāgatastenopasaṃkrāmat
XXbsu022_u:6055: upasaṃkramyābhimuktakacampakasumanāvārṣikadhānuskārimālyadāmaparigṛhītā apsaraḥśatasahasraparivṛtā divyasaṃgītisaṃpravāditena tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā ābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhistuṣṭuvuḥ -
XXbsu022_u:6056: sumadhuravacanā manojñaghoṣā śaśi va praśāntikarā prasannacittā /
XXbsu022_u:6057: prahasitavadanā prabhūtajihvā paramasuprītikarā mune namaste // Lal_23.51
XXbsu022_u:6058: rutaravita ya asti sarvaloke sumadhura premaṇiyā narāmarūṇām /
XXbsu022_u:6059: bhavata svaru pramukta mañjughoṣo abhibhavate ruta sarvi bhāṣamāṇāṃ //
XXbsu022_u:6060: rāgu samayi doṣamohakleśā prīti janeti amānuṣāṃ viśuddhām /
XXbsu022_u:6061: akaluṣahṛdayā niśāmya dharmaṃ ārya vimukti labhanti te hi sarve //
XXbsu022_u:6062: na ca bhava atimanyase avidvāṃ na ca puna vidvamadena jātu mattaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6064: unnatu na ca naiva conatastvaṃ giririva susthitu sāgarasya madhye //
XXbsu022_u:6065: lābha iha sulabdha mānuṣāṇāṃ yatra hi tādṛśu jātu sattva loke /
XXbsu022_u:6066: śrīriva padumo dhanasya dātrī tatha tava dāsyati dharmu sarvaloke //
XXbsu022_u:6067: evaṃ khalu caturmahārājapramukhā mahārājakāyikā devā bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaṃ tathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ //
XXbsu022_u:6068: atha khalvantarikṣā devāstathāgatasyāntikamupasaṃkramyābhisaṃbodheḥ pūjākarmaṇe sarvamantarīkṣaṃ ratnajālena kiṅkiṇījālena ratnachatrai ratnapatākābhī ratnapaṭṭadāmai ratnāvataṃsakairvividhamuktāhārapuṣpadāmārdhakāyikadevatāparigṛhītairardhacandrakaiśca samalaṃkṛtya tathāgatāya niryātayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:6070: asmāku vāsaṃ gagane dhruvaṃ mune paśyāma sattvā cariyā yathā jage /
XXbsu022_u:6071: bhavataścariṃ prekṣiya śuddhasattva skhalitaṃ na paśyāma tavaikacitte //
XXbsu022_u:6072: ye āgatā pūjana bodhisattvā gaganaṃ sphuṭaṃ tairnaranāyakebhiḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6073: hānirvimānāna na cābhavanta tathā hi te vai gaganātmabhāvāḥ // Lal_23.57
XXbsu022_u:6074: ye antarīkṣātu pravarṣi puṣpāṃ syāccūḍabandhā hi mahāsahasrā /
XXbsu022_u:6075: te tubhya kāye patitā aśeṣā nadyo yathā sāgari saṃpraviṣṭāḥ // Lal_23.58
XXbsu022_u:6077: hārāṃśca candrāṃśca tathārdhacandrāṃ kṣipanti devā na ca saṃskaroti //
XXbsu022_u:6078: vālasya nābhūdavakāśamasmin devaiḥ sphuṭaṃ sarvata antarīkṣam /
XXbsu022_u:6079: kurvanti pūjāṃ dvipadottamasya na ca te mado jāyati vismayo vā //
XXbsu022_u:6081: evaṃ khalvantarīkṣadevā bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇaṃ tathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte 'vatasthivantaḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ //
XXbsu022_u:6082: atha khalu bhaumā devāstathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇe sarvāvantaṃ dharaṇītalaṃ suśodhitopaliptaṃ gandhodakapariṣiktaṃ puṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ca kṛtvā nānādūṣyavitānavitataṃ ca tathāgatāya niryātayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:6084: vajramiva abhedyā saṃsthitā triḥsahasrā vajramayapadenāyaṃ sthito bodhimaṇḍe /
XXbsu022_u:6085: iha mama tvacamāṃsaṃ śuṣyatāmasthimajjā na ca ahu aspṛśitvā bodhi uttheṣya asmāt // Lal_23.61
XXbsu022_u:6086: savibhava narasiṃhā sarviyaṃ triḥsahasrā na kariṣu adhisthānaṃ syādvidīrṇaśeṣā /
XXbsu022_u:6087: tādṛśa mahavegā āgatā bodhisattvā yeṣa kramatalebhiḥ kampitā kṣetrakoṭyaḥ // Lal_23.62
XXbsu022_u:6088: lābha iha sulabdhā bhūmidevairudārā yatra paramasattvaścaṃkramī medinīye /
XXbsu022_u:6089: yatra ku raju loke sarva obhāsitāste cetibhu trisahasraḥ kiṃ punastubhya kāyaḥ // Lal_23.63
XXbsu022_u:6090: hesti śatasahasraṃ yāvataścāpaskandho dharaṇitalu jagasyā yāvataścopajīvyaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6091: sarva vayu dharemo medinī triḥsahasrāṃ sarva tava dadāmo bhuṅkṣvimāṃ tvaṃ yatheṣṭam // Lal_23.64
XXbsu022_u:6092: yatra bhava sthihedvā caṃkramedvā śayedvā ye 'pi sugataputrāḥ śrāvakā gautamasya /
XXbsu022_u:6093: dharmakatha kathentī ye 'pi vā tāṃ śṛṇonti sarvakuśalamūlaṃ bodhiye nāmayāmaḥ // Lal_23.65
XXbsu022_u:6094: evaṃ khalu bhaumā devā bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaṃ tathāgatamabhiṣṭatyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ //
XXbsu022_u:6099: iti hi bhikṣavo 'bhisaṃbuddhastathāgato devairabhiṣṭūyamānaḥ paryaṅkamabhindannanimiṣanayano drumarājaṃ prekṣate sma /
XXbsu022_u:6104: rūpāvacarā api devaputrā daśagandhodakakumbhasahasrāṇi parigṛhya yena tathāgastenopasaṃkrāmanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:6105: upasaṃkramya bodhivṛkṣaṃ tathāgataṃ ca gandhodakena snāpayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:6106: gaṇanāsamatikrāntāśca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāstena tathāgatakāyapatitena gandhodakena svakasvakān kāyānupalimpanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:6108: svabhavane praviṣṭā api ca te devaputrādayo 'virahitā abhūvaṃstena gandhodakagandhena, na cāsmai gandhāya spṛhāmutpādayāmāsuḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6110: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ samantakusumo nāma devaputrastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatito 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:6111: sa tathāgatasya caraṇayornipatya prāñjalistathāgatametadavocat - ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavan samādhiryena samādhinā samanvāgatastathāgataḥ saptarātraṃ viharatyabhinnaparyaṅkaḥ? evamukto bhikṣavastathāgatastaṃ devaputrametadavocat - prītyāhāravyūho nāma devaputra ayaṃ samādhiryena samādhinā samanvāgatastathāgataḥ saptarātraṃ
XXbsu022_u:6113: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ samantakusumo devaputrastathāgataṃ gāthābhirabhyastāvīt -
XXbsu022_u:6121: saptāhaṃ mahimaṇḍe jinā na bhindanti paryaṅkam // Lal_24.4 //
XXbsu022_u:6122: kiṃ tu khalu paśyamānaḥ saptāhaṃ animeṣeṇa narasiṃhā /
XXbsu022_u:6125: kiṃ tu bhavateṣa praṇidhī utāhu sarveṣa vādisiṃhānām /
XXbsu022_u:6126: yena drumarājamūle paryaṅka na bhindi saptāham // Lal_24.6 //
XXbsu022_u:6128: pravada vacanaṃ avitathaṃ kuruṣva prītiṃ naramarūṇām // Lal_24.7 //
XXbsu022_u:6129: tamuvāca candravacanaḥ śṛṇuṣva me bhāṣato amaraputra /
XXbsu022_u:6132: saptāhu taṃ pradeśaṃ na jahāti hi dharmatā rājñām // Lal_24.9 //
XXbsu022_u:6133: evameva daśabalā api abhiṣiktā bhonti yada praṇidhipūrṇāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6134: saptāhu dharaṇimaṇḍe jinā na bhindanti paryaṅkam // Lal_24.10 //
XXbsu022_u:6136: buddhā pi bodhimaṇḍe kleśāṃ nihatāṃ nirīkṣante // Lal_24.11 //
XXbsu022_u:6138: sāhoḍhā iva caurā vināśitā ye niravaśeṣāḥ // Lal_24.12 //
XXbsu022_u:6139: iha me hatāna vividhā mānavidhāmanyunā puraniketāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6140: sarvāśravā prahīnā jñānaṃ cāgraṃ samotpannam // Lal_24.13 //
XXbsu022_u:6141: iha sā akāryakartrī bhavatṛṣṇā cāriṇī tathāvidyā /
XXbsu022_u:6143: iha sā ahaṃ mameti ca kalipāśu durānugāḍhalitamūlā /
XXbsu022_u:6145: iha te ciraṃ samāyata ullāpanakā vināśaparyantāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6146: skandhāḥ sopādānā jñānena mayā parijñātāḥ // Lal_24.16 //
XXbsu022_u:6148: maya uddhṛtā aśeṣā bhūyaśca na jātu jñāsyante // Lal_24.17 //
XXbsu022_u:6150: caturaśca viparyāsā nirdagdha mayā niravaśeṣāḥ // Lal_24.18 //
XXbsu022_u:6151: iha sā vitarkamālā saṃjñāsūtreṣu granthitā nipathī //
XXbsu022_u:6154: durgāni pañcaṣaṣṭi mohānī triṃśatiṃ ca malināni /
XXbsu022_u:6159: iha me samatikrāntā vīryabalaparākramaṃ karitvā // Lal_24.22 //
XXbsu022_u:6167: iha te kleśāraṇyaṃ chinnaṃ vinayāgninā dagdham // Lal_24.26 //
XXbsu022_u:6175: smṛtiparaśunā aśeṣā chinnā jñānāgninā dagdhā // Lal_24.30 //
XXbsu022_u:6176: iha so mayā hyatibalo asmiṃ mārastrilokavaśavartī /
XXbsu022_u:6177: jñānāsinā śaṭhātmā hato yathendreṇa daityendraḥ // Lal_24.31 //
XXbsu022_u:6179: prajñāsinā balavatā chittvā jñānāgninā dagdhā // Lal_24.32 //
XXbsu022_u:6196: baddhā mayā hyaśeṣāḥ samādhisaśubhaṃ samāgamya // Lal_24.40 //
XXbsu022_u:6199: iha mamiyitā ca sarve ādhyātmikabāhirā parikṣīṇā /
XXbsu022_u:6201: iha lālayitā sarve martyā divyā bhavāgraparyantāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6202: tyaktā mayā hyaśeṣā āgamya samādhimanivartam // Lal_24.43 //
XXbsu022_u:6203: sarvabhavabandhanāni ca muktāni mayeha tāni sarvāṇi /
XXbsu022_u:6206: saṃjñā nityānitye saṃjñā sukhaduḥkha cātmani ca // Lal_24.45 //
XXbsu022_u:6210: bhittvā kṣatre sucirāndhakāraṃ prabhāsitaṃ jñānasūryeṇa // Lal_24.47 //
XXbsu022_u:6222: iha te mayānubuddhā ripavo adhyātmikā mahākṛtsnāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6223: baddhā ca saṃpradagdhāḥ kṛtāśca me puna bhavaniketāḥ // Lal_24.53 //
XXbsu022_u:6227: yasya madhurābhiramyaḥ śabdo lokeṣu vikhyātaḥ // Lal_24.55 //
XXbsu022_u:6230: iha me tatkhalu śuddhaṃ varanayanaṃ yena (loka) dhātavaḥ sarvāṃ /
XXbsu022_u:6231: paśyāmi pāṇimadhye nyastāni yathā drumaphalāni // Lal_24.57 //
XXbsu022_u:6235: so 'pi ca tathā avitathā iha maya pīto hyamṛtamaṇḍaḥ // Lal_24.59 //
XXbsu022_u:6245: prāgjinasiṃhaiḥ pūrve iha me pīto hyamṛtamaṇḍaḥ // Lal_24.64 //
XXbsu022_u:6247: yā bhāṣitā ca vāgme mārasyehāgatasya sasainyasya /
XXbsu022_u:6248: bhetsyāmi na paryaṅkaṃ aprāpya jarāmaraṇapāram // Lal_24.65 //
XXbsu022_u:6250: prāptaṃ ca daśabalatvaṃ tasmātprabhinadmi paryaṅkam // Lal_24.66 //
XXbsu022_u:6251: prāptaṃ mayārahatvaṃ kṣīṇā me āśravā niravaśeṣāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6252: bhagnā ca namucisenā bhinadmi tasmāddhi paryaṅkam // Lal_24.67 //
XXbsu022_u:6253: nīvaraṇakapāṭāni ca pañca mayeha pradāritā sarvā /
XXbsu022_u:6254: tṛṣṇālatā vichinnā hanteha bhinadmi paryaṅkam // Lal_24.68 //
XXbsu022_u:6260: atulāṃ karonti pūjāṃ apsaranayutaiḥ saha samagrāḥ // Lal_24.71 //
XXbsu022_u:6261: evaṃ khalu devasutāḥ sahetu sapratyayaṃ ca sanidānam /
XXbsu022_u:6262: saptāhu dharaṇimaṇḍe jinā na bhindanti paryaṅkam // Lal_24.72 //
XXbsu022_u:6263: iti hi bhikṣavo 'bhisaṃbuddhabodhistathāgataḥ prathame saptāhe tatraivāsane 'sthāt - iha mayānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā, iha mayānavarāgrasya jātijarāmaraṇaduḥkhasyāntaḥ kṛta iti /
XXbsu022_u:6264: dvitīye saptāhe tathāgato dīrghacaṃkramaṃ caṃkramyate sma trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātumupagṛhya
XXbsu022_u:6266: 'nimiṣaṃ bodhimaṇḍamīkṣate sma - iha mayānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyānavarāgrasya jātijarāmaraṇaduḥkhasyāntaḥ kṛta
XXbsu022_u:6268: caturthe saptāhe tathāgato daharacaṃkramaṃ caṃkramyate sma pūrvasamudrātpaścimasamudramupagṛhya
XXbsu022_u:6269: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyān yena tathāgatastenopasaṃkrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:6270: upasaṃkramya tathāgatametadavocat - parinirvātu bhagavan, parinirvātu sugata /
XXbsu022_u:6272: evamukte bhikṣavastathāgato māraṃ pāpīyāṃsametadavocat - na tāvadahaṃ pāpīyan parinirvāsyāmi yāvanme na
XXbsu022_u:6273: sthavirā bhikṣavo bhaviṣyanti dāntā vyaktā vinītā viśāradā bahuśrutā dharmānudharmapratipannāḥ pratibalāḥ svayamācāryakaṃ jñānaṃ paridīpayitumutpannotpannānāṃ ca parapravādināṃ saha dharmeṇa nigṛhyābhiprāyaṃ prasādya saprātihāryaṃ dharmaṃ deśayitum /
XXbsu022_u:6274: na tāvadahaṃ pāpīyan parinirvāsyāmi yāvanmayā buddhadharmasaṃghavaṃśo lokena pratiṣṭhāpito bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu022_u:6275: aparimitā bodhisattvā na vyākṛtā bhaviṣyanti (Vaidya 275) anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
XXbsu022_u:6276: na tāvadahaṃ pāpīyān parinirvāsyāmi yāvanme na catasraḥ parṣado dāntā vinītā vyaktā viśāradā bhaviṣyanti yāvatsaprātihāya dharmaṃ deśayitumiti //
XXbsu022_u:6277: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyānidaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā ekānte prakrāmya sthito 'bhūt
XXbsu022_u:6278: duḥkhī durmanā vipratisārī adhomukhaḥ kāṣṭhena mahīṃ vilikhan viṣayaṃ me
XXbsu022_u:6280: atha khalu tāstisro māraduhitaro ratiścāratiśca tṛṣṇā ca māraṃ pāpīyāṃsaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣanta
XXbsu022_u:6281: durmanāsi kathaṃ tāta procyatāṃ yadyasau naraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6282: rāgapāśena taṃ buddhvā kuñjaraṃ vā nayāmahe // Lal_24.73 //
XXbsu022_u:6283: ānayitvā ca taṃ śīghraṃ kariṣyāma vaśe tava /
XXbsu022_u:6285: arahan sugato loke na rāgasya vaśaṃ vrajet /
XXbsu022_u:6287: tatastāḥ strīcāpalyādaviditaprabhāvā api bodhisattvabhūtasyaiva tathāgatasya piturvacanamaśrutvaiva prabhūtayauvanamadhyayauvanadhāriṇyo bhūtvā vicakṣuḥkarmaṇe tathāgatasyāntikamupasaṃkrāntāḥ strīmāyā ati tatsarvamakārṣuḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6288: tāśca tathāgato na manasi karoti sma /
XXbsu022_u:6291: satyaṃ vadasi nastāta na rāgeṇa sa nīyate /
XXbsu022_u:6294: gautamasya vināśārthaṃ tato 'sya hṛdayaṃ sphuṭet // Lal_24.77 //
XXbsu022_u:6297: nāhaṃ paśyāmi taṃ loke puruṣaṃ sacarācare /
XXbsu022_u:6299: śīghraṃ gatvā nivedaya atyayaṃ svakṛtaṃ muneḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6300: sarvaṃ paurāṇakaṃ kāyaṃ kariṣyati yathāmatam // Lal_24.79 //
XXbsu022_u:6301: tatastā gatvā tathāgataṃ kṣamāpayanti sma - atyayaṃ no bhagavān
XXbsu022_u:6303: atyayaṃ no sugato pratigṛhṇātu yathā bālānāṃ yathā mūḍhānāṃ yathā vyaktānāmakuśalānāmakṣetrajñānāṃ yā vayaṃ bhagavantamāsādayitavyaṃ manyāmahe /
XXbsu022_u:6309: tatkasmāt? vṛddhireṣā ārye dharmavinaye yo 'tyayamatyayato dṛṣṭvā pratideśayatyāyatyāṃ
XXbsu022_u:6311: pañcame saptāhe bhikṣavastathāgato mucilindanāgarājabhavane viharati sma saptāhe mahādurdine
XXbsu022_u:6312: atha khalu mucilindanāgarājaḥ svabhavanānniṣkramya tathāgatasya kāye saptakṛdbhogena pariveṣṭya phaṇaiśchādayati sma - mā bhagavataḥ kāyaṃ śītavātāḥ prākṣuriti /

XXbsu022_u:6754: ṣaṣṭiṃ yajñasahasrakoṭinayutā ye tatra yaṣṭā mayā ṣaṣṭiṃ buddhasahasrakoṭinayutā ye tatra saṃpūjitā /
XXbsu022_u:6755: paurāṇāmṛṣiṇāmihālayu varo vārāṇasī nāmavā devānāgamabhiṣṭuto mahitalo dharmābhinimnaḥ sadā buddhā koṭisahasra naikanavatiḥ pūrve smarāmī aha ye tasminnṛṣisāhvaye vanavare vartīsu cakrottamam
XXbsu022_u:6756: śāntaṃ cāpyupaśāntadhyānabhimukhaṃ nityaṃ mṛgaiḥ sevitaṃ ityarthe ṛṣisāhvaye vanavare vartiṣyi cakrottamam // Lal_25.36 //
XXbsu022_u:6762: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgataḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyaḥ sarvabandhanasamucchinnaḥ sarvakleśoddhṛto nirvāntamalakleśo nihatamārapratyarthikaḥ sarvabuddhadharmanayānupraviṣṭaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī daśabalasamanvāgataścaturvaiśāradyaprāpto 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmapratipūrṇaḥ pañcacakṣuḥsamanvāgato 'nāvaraṇena
XXbsu022_u:6763: buddhacakṣuṣā sarvāvantaṃ lokamavalokyaivaṃ cintayati sma - kasmā ayamahaṃ sarvaprathamaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyam? katamaḥ sattvaḥ śuddhaḥ svākāraḥ suvineyaḥ suvijñāpakaḥ suviśodhako mandarāgadoṣamoho 'parokṣavijñāno yo
XXbsu022_u:6765: deśayeyam, yaśca me dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyānna ca māṃ sa viheṭhayet //
XXbsu022_u:6766: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhūt - rudrakaḥ khalu rāmaputraḥ
XXbsu022_u:6772: devatā api tathāgatasya caraṇayornipatyaivamāhuḥ - evametadbhagavan, evametatsugata, adya saptāhakālagato rudrako rāmaputraḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6774: mahāhānirvartate rudrakasya rāmaputrasya, ya imameva supraṇītaṃ
XXbsu022_u:6777: tasmai cāhaṃ prathamaṃ dharma deśayiṣyam, na ca māṃ sa vyaheṭhayiṣyat //
XXbsu022_u:6778: punarapi bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhūt - ko 'nyaḥ sattvaḥ śuddhaḥ suvineyaḥ pūrvavadyāvanna ca dharmadeśanāṃ viheṭhayediti /
XXbsu022_u:6779: tato bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhavat - ayaṃ khalvapyārāḍaḥ kālāpaḥ śuddho yāvanna ca me dharmadeśanāṃ viheṭhayediti /
XXbsu022_u:6782: śuddhāvāsakāyikā api ca devatā enamarthaṃ tathāgatasyārocayanti sma - evametadbhagavan, evametatsugata
XXbsu022_u:6785: mahāhānirvartate arāḍasya kālāpasya, ya imamevaṃ supraṇītaṃ dharmamaśrutvā kālagata iti //
XXbsu022_u:6786: punarapi bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhūt - kaḥ khalvanyaḥ sattvaḥ śuddhaḥ svākāro yāvanna ca me dharmadeśanāṃ viheṭhayediti //
XXbsu022_u:6787: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhavat - te khalu pañcakā
XXbsu022_u:6788: bhadravargīyāḥ śuddhāḥ svākārāḥ suvijñāpakāḥ suviśodhakā mandarāgadoṣamohā aparokṣavijñānāḥ
XXbsu022_u:6794: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhavat - yannvahaṃ pañcakebhyo bhadravargīyebhyaḥ prathamaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyam //
XXbsu022_u:6795: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasya punaretadabhavat - kasminnetarhi pañcakā bhadravargīyāḥ prativasanti? atha tathāgataḥ sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ buddhacakṣuṣā vyavalokayan paśyati sma /
XXbsu022_u:6796: adrākṣītpañcakān bhadravargīyān vārāṇasyāṃ viharata ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXbsu022_u:6798: - yannvahaṃ pañcakebhyo bhadravargīyebhyaḥ sarvaprathamaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyam /
XXbsu022_u:6799: te hi mama sarvaprathamaṃ dharmaṃ deśitamājñāsyanti /
XXbsu022_u:6801: hetoḥ? caritāvino hi te bhikṣavaḥ suparipaṇḍitaśukladharmāṇo mokṣamārgābhimukhā nibandhāpanītāḥ
XXbsu022_u:6802: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgata evamanuvicintya bodhimaṇḍādutthāya trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saṃprakampyānupūrveṇa magadheṣu caryāṃ caran kāśiṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ prakrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:6803: atha gayāyāṃ bodhimaṇḍasya cāntarādanyatama ājīvako 'drākṣīttathāgataṃ dūrata evāgacchantam
XXbsu022_u:6806: ekānte sthitaśca bhikṣava ājīvakastathāgatena sārdhaṃ vividhāṃ saṃmodanīṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā evamāha - viprasannāni te āyuṣman gautama indriyāṇi /
XXbsu022_u:6807: pariśuddhaḥ paryavadātaḥ pītanirbhāsaśca te chavivarṇaḥ tadyathāpi nāma śāradaṃ kālaṃ pāṇḍuravarṇaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ pītanirbhāsaṃ bhavati, evameva bhavato gautamasya pariśuddhānīndriyāṇi pariśuddhaṃ mukhamaṇḍalaṃ paryavadātam /
XXbsu022_u:6808: tadyathāpi nāma tālaphalasya pakvasya samanantaravṛntacyutasya bandhanāśrayaḥ pītanirbhāso bhavati pariśuddhaḥ paryavadātaḥ, evameva bhavato gautamasya pariśuddhānīndriyāṇi pariśuddhaṃ mukhamaṇḍalaṃ
XXbsu022_u:6810: tadyathāpi nāma jāmbūnadavarṇaniṣkaḥ ulkāmukhaprakṛṣṭo dakṣiṇakarmāraputreṇa suparikarmakṛtaḥ pāṇḍukambalopanikṣipto varṇavān bhavati pariśuddhaḥ paryavadātaḥ pītanirbhāso 'tīva prabhāsvaraḥ, evameva bhavato gautamasya viprasannānīndriyāṇi, pariśuddhastvagvarṇaḥ,
XXbsu022_u:6814: ācāryo na hi me kaścitsadṛśo me na vidyate /
XXbsu022_u:6820: so 'vocat - jinaṃ khalu gautama mātmānaṃ pratijānīṣe /
XXbsu022_u:6822: jinā hi mādṛśā jñeyā ye prāptā āśravakṣayam /
XXbsu022_u:6823: jitā me pāpakā dharmāstenopaga jino hyaham // Lal_26.3 //
XXbsu022_u:6825: so 'vocat - kva tarhyāyuṣman gautama gamiṣyasi? tathāgato 'vocat -
XXbsu022_u:6826: vārāṇasīṃ gamiṣyāmi gatvā vai kāśināṃ purīm /
XXbsu022_u:6828: vārāṇasīṃ gamiṣyami gatvā vai kāśināṃ purīm /
XXbsu022_u:6830: vārāṇasīṃ gamiṣyāmi gatvā vai kāśināṃ purīm /
XXbsu022_u:6832: tadbhaviṣyasi gautama ityuktvā sa ājīvako dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ prākrāmat /
XXbsu022_u:6834: iti hi bhikṣavastathāgato gayāyāṃ sudarśanena nāgarājena nimantrito 'bhut
XXbsu022_u:6838: eṣu ca sarveṣu bhikṣavastathāgato gṛhapatibhirbhaktena vāsena copanimantryamāṇo 'nupūrveṇa gaṅgāyā nadyāstīramupāgamat //
XXbsu022_u:6839: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena gaṅgā mahānadī suparipūrṇā samatīrthakā vahati sma //
XXbsu022_u:6842: na me 'sti mārṣa tarapaṇyamityuktvā tathāgato vihāyasā pathā tīrātparaṃ tīramagamat /
XXbsu022_u:6843: tataḥ sa nāvikastaṃ dṛṣṭvātīva vipratisāryabhūt - evaṃvidho dakṣiṇīyo mayā na tārita iti /
XXbsu022_u:6844: hā kaṣṭamiti kṛtvā mūrchitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ patitaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6845: tata enāṃ prakṛtiṃ nāviko rājñe bimbisārāya ārocayāmāsa - śramaṇaḥ svāmi gautamastarapaṇyaṃ yācamāno nāsti tarapaṇyamityuktvā vihāyasā atastīrātparaṃ tīraṃ gata iti /
XXbsu022_u:6846: tacchrutvā tadagreṇa rājñā bimbisāreṇa sarvapravrajitānāṃ tarapaṇyamutsṛṣṭamabhavat //
XXbsu022_u:6847: iti hi bhikṣavastathāgato 'nupūrveṇa janapadacaryāṃ caran yena vārāṇasī mahānagarī tenopasaṃkrāmat
XXbsu022_u:6848: upasaṃkramya kālyameva nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vārāṇasīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat /
XXbsu022_u:6849: tasyāṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātrapratikrāntaḥ yena ṛṣipatano mṛgadāvo yena ca pañcakā bhadravargīyāstenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
XXbsu022_u:6850: adrākṣuḥ khalu punaḥ pañcakā bhadravargīyāstathāgataṃ dūrata evāgacchantam /
XXbsu022_u:6851: dṛṣṭvā ca kriyābandhamakārṣuḥ - eṣa sa āyuṣmantaḥ śramaṇo gautama āgacchati sma śaithiliko bāhulikaḥ pradhānavibhraṣṭaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6852: anena khalvapi tayāpi tāvatpūrvikayā duṣkaracaryayā na śakitaṃ kiṃciduttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
XXbsu022_u:6856: na pātracīvaraṃ pratigrahītavyaṃ nāśanaṃ dātavyaṃ na pānīyaṃ paribhogyaṃ na pādapratiṣṭhānaṃ sthāpayitvātiriktānyāsanāni /
XXbsu022_u:6862: yathā yathā ca bhikṣavastathāgato yena pañcakā bhadravargīyāstenopasaṃkrāmati sma, tathā tathā te svakasvakeṣvāsaneṣu na ramante sma, utthātukāmā abhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:6863: tadyathāpi nāma pakṣī śakuniḥ pañjaragataḥ syāt, tasya ca pañjaragatasyādho 'gnirdagdho bhavet
XXbsu022_u:6865: 'gnisaṃtaptastvaritamūrdhvamutpatitukāmo bhavet pratretukāmaśca, evameva yathā yathā tathāgataḥ pañcakānāṃ bhadravargīyāṇāṃ sakāśamupasaṃkrāmati
XXbsu022_u:6866: sma, tathā tathā pañcakā bhadravargīyāḥ svakasvakeṣvāsaneṣu na ramante
XXbsu022_u:6868: tatkasmāt? na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate yastathāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā āsanānna pratyuttiṣṭhet
XXbsu022_u:6869: yathā yathā ca tathāgataḥ pañcakān bhadravargīyānupasaṃkrāmati sma, tathā tathā pañcakā
XXbsu022_u:6870: bhadravargīyāstathāgatasya śriyaṃ tejaścāsahamānā āsanebhyaḥ prakampyamānāḥ sarve kriyākāraṃ bhittvā cotthāyāsanebhyaḥ,
XXbsu022_u:6875: evaṃ cāvocat - svāgataṃ te āyuṣman gautama, svāgataṃ te āyuṣman gautam /
XXbsu022_u:6878: pañcakā pi bhadravargīyāste tathāgatena sārdhaṃ vividhāṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ kathāṃ kṛtvaikānte niṣeduḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6879: ekānte niṣaṇṇāśca te pañcakā bhadravargīyāstathāgatametadavocan - viprasannāni te āyuṣman
XXbsu022_u:6880: gautamendriyāṇi, pariśuddhaśchavivarṇa iti hi sarvaṃ pūrvavat /
XXbsu022_u:6890: dharmamahaṃ bhikṣavo deśayiṣyāmi, āśu gacchata śṛṇuta pratipadyadhvam /
XXbsu022_u:6892: yathā mayā samyagavavaditāḥ samyaganuśiṣṭā yūyamapyāśravāṇāṃ cetovimuktaṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ ca dṛṣṭa eva dharme sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya pravedayiṣyatha - kṣīṇā no jātiruṣitaṃ ca
XXbsu022_u:6893: brahmacaryam, kṛtaṃ karaṇīyam, nāparamityato 'nyadbhavaṃ prajānāma iti /
XXbsu022_u:6894: nanu ca yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣava etadabhūt - ayaṃ khalvāyuṣmanta āgacchati
XXbsu022_u:6895: śramaṇo gautamaḥ śaithiliko bāhulikaḥ pradhānavibhraṣṭa iti pūrvavat /
XXbsu022_u:6897: teṣāṃ ca ehi bhikṣava ityukte yatkiṃcittīrthikaliṅgaṃ tīrthikadhvajaḥ, sarvo 'sau tatkṣaṇamevāntaraghāt
XXbsu022_u:6898: / tricīvaraṃ pātraṃ ca prādurabhūt, tadanu chinnāśca keśāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6901: atha khalu bhikṣavastasyāṃ velāyāṃ pañcakā bhadravargīyā bhikṣavastathāgatasya caraṇayornipatyātyayaṃ deśayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:6902: tathāgatasyāntike śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ premaṃ ca prasādaṃ ca gauravaṃ cotpādayanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:6903: gauravajātāśca bahuvicitrapuṣkariṇyāṃ tathāgatasya snānaparikarma kurvanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:6904: snānapratyuttīrṇasya (Vaidya 299) ca bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhavat - kasmin khalu pūrvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairniṣadya dharmacakraṃ
XXbsu022_u:6906: pūrvakaistathāgatairarhadbhirdharmacakraṃ pravartitamabhūt, atha tasmin pṛthivīpradeśe saptaratnamayamāsanasahasraṃ prādurabhūt //
XXbsu022_u:6907: atha tathāgataḥ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ gauraveṇa trīṇyāsanāni pradakṣiṇīkṛtya siṃha iva nirbhīścaturtha āsane paryaṅkamābhujya niṣīdati sma /
XXbsu022_u:6908: pañcakā api bhikṣavastathāgatasya pādau śirobhirabhivandya tathāgatasya purato niṣeduḥ //
XXbsu022_u:6909: atha khalu bhikṣavastasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpāṃ kāyātprabhāṃ tathāgataḥ prāmuñcadyayā prabhayā ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturmahatāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt /
XXbsu022_u:6910: tena cāvabhāsena yā api lokāntarikā aghā aghasphuṭā andhakāratamisrā yatremau candrasūryau evaṃmaharddhikāvevaṃ mahānubhāvāvevaṃ maheśākhyau ābhayā ābhāṃ varṇenaṃ varṇaṃ tejasā tejo nābhitapato nābhivirocataḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6911: tatra ye sattvā upapannāste svakasvakamapi bāhuṃ prasāritaṃ na paśyanti sma, tatrāpi tasmin samaye mahata udārasyāvabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvo 'bhut /
XXbsu022_u:6912: ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāste tenāvabhāsena parisphuṭāḥ samānā anyonyaṃ paśyanti sma /
XXbsu022_u:6914: evaṃ cāhuḥ - anye 'pi kila bhoḥ sattvā ihopapannāḥ, anye 'pi kila bhoḥ sattvā ihopapannāḥ iti /
XXbsu022_u:6925: pūrvasyāṃ diśyavanamati sma, paścimāyāṃ diśyunnamati sma /
XXbsu022_u:6926: paścimāyāṃ diśyavanamati sma, pūrvasyāṃ diśyunnamati sma /
XXbsu022_u:6927: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśyavanamati sma, uttarasyāṃ diśyunnamati sma /
XXbsu022_u:6930: tasmiṃśca samaye harṣaṇīyāstoṣaṇīyāḥ premaṇīyāḥ prasādanīyā avalokanīyāḥ prahlādanīyā nirvarṇanīyā aprativarṇanīyā asecanīyā apratikūlā anuttrāsakarāḥ śabdāḥ śrūyante sma /
XXbsu022_u:6931: na ca kasyacitsattvasya tasmin kṣaṇe viheṭhā vā trāso vā bhayaṃ vā stambhitatvaṃ vābhūt /
XXbsu022_u:6932: na ca bhūyaḥ sūryacandramasorna śakrabrahmalokapālānāṃ tasmin kṣaṇe prabhāḥ prajñāyante sma
XXbsu022_u:6933: sarvanarakatiryagyoniyamalokopapannāśca sattvāstasmin kṣaṇe vigataduḥkhā abhuvan sarvasukhasamarpitāḥ
XXbsu022_u:6934: na ca kasyacitsattvasya rāgo bādhate sma,
XXbsu022_u:6935: dveṣo vā moho vā īrṣyā vā mātsaryaṃ vā māno vā mrakṣo vā mado vā krodho vā vyāpādo vā paridāho vā /
XXbsu022_u:6936: sarvasattvāstasmin kṣaṇe maitracittāḥ hitacittāḥ parasparaṃ mātāpitṛsaṃjñino 'bhūvan /
XXbsu022_u:6942: brahmasvarāmatha giraṃ pramumoca jagatyahaṃ śreṣṭhaḥ // Lal_26.8 //
XXbsu022_u:6945: sabalaṃ nihatya māraṃ bodhiprāpto hitāya lokasya /
XXbsu022_u:6948: adhivāsitaṃ ca muninā loke kāruṇyamutpādya // Lal_26.11 //
XXbsu022_u:6951: yaḥ śrotukāmu dharmaṃ yaḥ kalpanayutaiḥ samārjitu jinena /
XXbsu022_u:6954: śreṣṭhaṃ ca dharmaśravaṇaṃ aṣṭākṣaṇavivarjana durāpāḥ // Lal_26.14 //
XXbsu022_u:6955: prāptāśca te 'dya sarve buddhotpādaḥ kṣaṇastathā śraddhā /
XXbsu022_u:6957: bhavati kadācidavasthā yaḥ kalpanayutairna śrūyate dharmaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:6958: saṃprāptaḥ sa ca vādya pramādamakhilaṃ vivarjayata // Lal_26.16 //
XXbsu022_u:6960: āyāta laghuṃ sarve vartayitā nāyako hyamṛtacakram // Lal_26.17 //
XXbsu022_u:6962: tyaktvā devasamṛddhiṃ prāptā buddhasya te pārśve // Lal_26.18 //
XXbsu022_u:6963: iti hi bhikṣavo bhaumaidevairvārāṇasyāṃ ṛpipatane mṛgadāve dharmacakrapravartanārthaṃ tathāgatasya mahāmaṇḍalamātro 'dhiṣṭhito 'bhūt
XXbsu022_u:6964: citro darśanīyo vipulo vistīrṇaḥ saptayojanaśatānyāyāmo vistāreṇa /
XXbsu022_u:6967: iha niṣadya bhagavān dharmacakraṃ pravartayatu asmākamanukampāmupādāyeti
XXbsu022_u:6968: atha khalu bhikṣavastasmin samaye pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarābhyo digbhya ūrdhvamadhaḥ samantāddaśabhyo digbhyo bahavo bodhisattvakoṭyaḥ pūrvapraṇidhānasamanvāgatā āgatya tathāgatasya caraṇayornipatya dharmacakrapravartanāyādhyeṣante sma /
XXbsu022_u:6969: ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śakro vā brahmā vā lokapālā (Vaidya 301) vā tadanye
XXbsu022_u:6972: pravartayatu bhagavān dharmacakram, pravartayatu sugato dharmacakraṃ
XXbsu022_u:6973: bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
XXbsu022_u:6978: trisahasra ito bahu brahma sureśvara pāla tathā upagamya jinasya kramebhi nipatya udāhariṣu
XXbsu022_u:6979: smara pūrvapratijñāṃ mahāmuni yā tvaya vāca kṛtā ahu jyeṣṭhu viśiṣṭu prajāya kariṣye dukhasya kṣayam // Lal_26.19 //
XXbsu022_u:6980: tvaya dharṣitu mārū sasainyu drumendri sthihitva mune varabodhi vibuddha suśānti nipātita kleśadrumāḥ /

XXbsu022_u:7532: ayaṃ sa mārṣā lalitavistaro nāma dharmaparyāyasūtrānto mahāvaipulyabodhisattvavikrīḍitaḥ buddhaviṣaye lalitapraveśa ātmopanāyikastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:7535: bodhisattvayānikāśca pudgalā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā dṛḍhataraṃ vīryamālapsyante /
XXbsu022_u:7539: yuṣmākaṃ ca taddharmadeśanādhyeṣaṇā kuśalamūlaṃ mahārthikaṃ bhaviṣyati mahāphalaṃ mahānuśaṃsam
XXbsu022_u:7540: yaḥ kaścinmārṣā asya lalitavistarasya dharmaparyāyasyāñjaliṃ saṃpragṛhītaṃ
XXbsu022_u:7552: yaḥ kaścinmārṣā imaṃ lalitavistaraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣitukāmasya dharmabhāṇakasya dharmāsanaṃ prajñāpayiṣyati, tasyāṣṭāvāsanapratilambhāḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyāḥ sahaprajñapte āsane /
XXbsu022_u:7564: ya kaścinmārṣā imaṃ lalitavistaraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣamāṇāya sādhukāraṃ
XXbsu022_u:7577: yaḥ kaścinmārṣā imaṃ lalitavistaraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pustakalikhitaṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyati satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
XXbsu022_u:7578: amātsaryacittatayā caturdiśamasya dharmaparyāyasya varṇanāṃ bhāṣiṣyate varṇanāṃ coccārayiṣyati - āgacchatemaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ likhitaṃ dhārayata vācayata cintayata svādhyāyateti, so aṣṭau mahānidhānāni pratilapsyate /
XXbsu022_u:7588: yaḥ kaścinmārṣā imaṃ lalitavistaraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ supravartitaṃ kṛtvā
XXbsu022_u:7600: yaḥ kaścinmārṣā imaṃ lalitavistaraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ parebhyaśca vistareṇa
XXbsu022_u:7601: saṃprakāśayiṣyati, evaṃcitto yaduta kathamamī sattvā eṣāmevarūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhino bhaveyuriti, sa tena kuśalamūlenāṣṭau mahāpuṇyatāḥ pratilapsyate /
XXbsu022_u:7602: katamā aṣṭau? tadyathā - rājā bhavati cakravartī, iyaṃ prathamā mahāpuṇyatā /
XXbsu022_u:7603: caturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāmādhipatyaṃ kārayiṣyati, iyaṃ dvitīyā mahāpuṇyatā /
XXbsu022_u:7604: śakro bhaviṣyati devendraḥ iyaṃ tṛtīyā mahāpuṇyatā /
XXbsu022_u:7605: suyāmo bhaviṣyati devaputraḥ, iyaṃ caturthī mahāpuṇyatā saṃtuṣito bhaviṣyati, iyaṃ pañcamī mahāpuṇyatā /
XXbsu022_u:7608: vaśavartī bhaviṣyati devarājaḥ, iyaṃ saptamī mahāpuṇyatā /
XXbsu022_u:7609: brahmā bhaviṣyati mahābrahmā, iyaṃ aṣṭamī mahāpuṇyatā /
XXbsu022_u:7610: ante ca tathāgato bhaviṣyati arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvākuśaladharmaprahīnaḥ sarvakuśaladharmasamanvāgataḥ
XXbsu022_u:7612: yaḥ kaścinmārṣā imaṃ lalitavistaraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣyamāṇamavahitaśrotaḥ śroṣyati, so 'ṣṭau cittanirmalatāḥ pratilapsyate /
XXbsu022_u:7613: katamā aṣṭau? tadyathā - yaduta maitrīṃ pratilapsyate
XXbsu022_u:7623: yasmiṃśca mārṣā grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā janapade vā janapadapradeśe vā caṃkrame vā vihāre vā ayaṃ lalitavistaro dharmaparyāyaḥ pracariṣyati,
XXbsu022_u:7624: tatrāṣṭau bhayāni na prabhaviṣyanti sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākam /
XXbsu022_u:7625: katamānyaṣṭau? tadyathā - yaduta rājasaṃkṣobhabhayaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu022_u:7636: saṃkṣepānmārṣā yadi tathāgataḥ kalpasthitikenāyuṣpramāṇena rātriṃdivamadhiṣṭhamāno 'sya dharmaparyāyasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate, naivāsya dharmaparyāyasya varṇaparyanto bhavenna ca tathāgatapratibhānasya kṣayo bhavet /
XXbsu022_u:7637: api tu khalu punarmārṣā yathaiva tathāgatasya
XXbsu022_u:7639: imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati likhiṣyati lekhayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati, parṣanmadhye ca vistareṇa
XXbsu022_u:7640: saṃprakāśayiṣyati - anena cittena kathamamī sattvā evamudārasya dharmasya
XXbsu022_u:7642: tataḥ khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapamāmantrayate sma āyuṣmantaṃ cānandaṃ maitreyaṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam - imāmahaṃ mārṣā asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭinayutaśatasahasrasamudānītāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yuṣmākaṃ haste paridāmyanuparindāmi paramayā parindanayā, svayaṃ caivamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayata, parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayata
XXbsu022_u:7643: ityuktvā ca bhagavānasyaiva dharmaparyāyasya bhūyasyā mātrayānuparindanārthaṃ tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
XXbsu022_u:7644: sattvā dṛṣṭā ye mayā buddhadṛṣṭyā syuste 'rhantaḥ śariputreṇa tulyāḥ /
XXbsu022_u:7646: pratyekabuddhāya tu yaśca pūjāṃ kuyādahorātramapi prahṛṣṭaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:7647: mālyaiḥ prakāraiśca tathāparaiśca tasmādayaṃ puṇyakṛto viśiṣyate //
XXbsu022_u:7649: syuḥ sarvasattvā yadi pratyayairjinā tāṃ pūjayetkaścidihāpramattaḥ /
XXbsu022_u:7650: puṣpaiśca gandhaiśca vilepanaiśca kalpānanekāṃ satataṃ hi tatparam //
XXbsu022_u:7651: ekasya yaścaiva tathāgatasya kuryātpraṇāmaṃ api caikaśo 'pi /
XXbsu022_u:7652: prasannācitto 'tha vadennamo 'rhate tasmādidaṃ śreṣṭhataraṃ ca puṇyam //
XXbsu022_u:7653: buddhā bhaveyuryadi sarvasattvā tāṃ pūjayedyaśca yathaiva pūrvam /
XXbsu022_u:7654: divyaiśca puṣpairatha mānurṣairvaraiḥ kalpānanekāṃ bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ //
XXbsu022_u:7655: yaścaiva saddharmavilopakātle tyaktvā svakāye ca tathaiva jīvitam /
XXbsu022_u:7656: vadyādahorātramidaṃ hi sūtraṃ viśiṣyate puṇyamidaṃ hi tasmāt // Lal_27.6
XXbsu022_u:7657: yasyepsitaṃ pūjayituṃ vināyakāṃ pratyekabuddhāṃśca tathaiva śrāvakāṃ /
XXbsu022_u:7658: dṛḍhaṃ samutpādya sa bodhicitta idaṃ sadā sūtravaraṃ dadhātu // Lal_27.7
XXbsu022_u:7660: gṛhe sthitastasya tathāgataḥ sadā tiṣṭhedidaṃ yatra hi sūtraratnam //
XXbsu022_u:7661: pratibhāṃ sa prāpnoti śubhāmanantāṃ ekaṃ padaṃ vakṣyati kalpakoṭī /
XXbsu022_u:7662: na vyañjanā bhraśyati nāpi cārthā dadyācca yaḥ sūtramida parebhyaḥ //
XXbsu022_u:7663: anuttaro 'sau naranāyakānāṃ sattvo na kaścitsadṛśo 'sya vidyate /
XXbsu022_u:7665: bhavetsamudreṇa samaśca so 'kṣayaḥ śrutvā hi yo dharmamimaṃ prapadyate //
XXbsu022_u:7668: te maheśvaradevaputrapūrvaṃgamāḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrā maitreyapūrvaṃgamāśca sarvabodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahākāśyapapūrvaṃgamāśca sarvamahāśrāvakāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan //
XXbsu022_u:7673: ye dharma hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
XXbsu022_u:7674: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
